神经系统异常	HP:0002143	Abnormality of the spinal cord	An abnormality of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647) (myelon).	脊髓异常	在`脊髓`的异常（FMA:7647）。
神经系统异常	HP:0002144	Tethered cord	During normal embryological development, the spinal cord first occupies the entire length of the vertebral column but goes on to assume a position at the level of L1 due to differential growth of the conus medullaris and the vertebral column. The filum terminale is a slender, threadlike structure that remains after the normal regression of the distal embryonic spinal cord and attaches the spinal cord to the coccyx. A tethered cord results if there is a thickened rope-like filum terminale which anchors the cord at the level of L2 or below, potentially causing neurologic signs owing to abnormal tension on the spinal cord.	脊髓栓系	在正常的胚胎发育中，脊髓最初占据整个脊柱的长度，但随着脊髓圆锥和椎体的分化、生长，最终位于L1水平的位置。终丝是远侧胚胎脊髓退缩之后形成的一种细长的线状结构并将脊髓附着在尾骨上。如果有一根粗大的绳子样的终丝将脊髓固定在L2水平或以下就会导致脊髓栓系，并且可能会因为脊髓收到的异常张力而导致神经系统体征。
神经系统异常	HP:0002145	Frontotemporal dementia	A dementia associated with degeneration of the frontotemporal lobe and clinically associated with personality and behavioral changes such as disinhibition, apathy, and lack of insight.	额颞叶痴呆	额颞叶功能退变引起的痴呆类型，临床表现为个性和行为改变，如脱抑制行为，冷漠和自知力缺乏。

神经系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0002173	Hypoglycemic seizures	Due to a variety of reasons caused by low blood sugar concentration, usually with plasma glucose concentration <2.8mmol / L, which can cause sympathetic excitability , such as agitation, hunger, weakness, sweating, tachycardia, systolic blood pressure, diastolic blood pressure, tremor, disturbance of consciousness, and even coma.	低血糖发作	由多种原因引起的血糖浓度过低所致。一般以血浆血糖浓度<2.8mmol/L，可引起交感神经兴奋症群，如激动不安、饥饿、软弱、出汗、心动过速、收缩压升高、舒张压降低、震颤，一过性黑蒙，意识障碍，甚至昏迷。

神经系统异常	HP:0002200	Pseudobulbar signs	Pseudobulbar signs result from injury to an upper motor neuron lesion to the corticobulbar pathways in the pyramidal tract. 心血管系统异常,消化系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0002249	Melena	The passage of blackish, tarry feces associated with gastrointestinal hemorrhage. Melena occurs if the blood remains in the colon long enough for it to be broken down by colonic bacteria. One degradation product, hematin, imbues the stool with a blackish color. Thus, melena generally occurs with bleeding from the upper gastrointestinal tract (e.g., sotmach ulcers or duodenal ulcers), since the blood usually remains in the gut for a longer period of time than with lower gastrointestinal bleeding.	黑便	与消化道出血相关的黑色、柏油样粪便的排泄。当血在结肠停留的时间足够长时，结肠细菌可将其降解而产生黑便。血红素是一种降解产物，可将粪便染为黑色。因此，黑便通常伴随上消化道出血（例如，胃溃疡或十二指肠溃疡），因血液在肠道中停留的时间通常较下消化道出血更长。

神经系统异常	HP:0002280	Enlarged cisterna magna	Increase in size of the cisterna magna, one of three principal openings in the subarachnoid space between the arachnoid and pia mater, located between the cerebellum and the dorsal surface of the medulla oblongata.	小脑延髓池扩大	位于小脑和延髓背面之间的小脑延髓池大小增加。
神经系统异常	HP:0002281	Gray matter heterotopias	Gray matter heterotopia is a neurological disorder caused by clumps of grey matter being located in the wrong part of the brain. It is characterized as a type of cortical malformation. The neurons in heterotopia may appear to be normal, except for their mislocation; nuclear studies have shown glucose metabolism equal to that of normally positioned gray matter. The condition causes a variety of symptoms, but usually includes some degree of epilepsy or recurring seizures, and often affects the brain&#39;s ability to function on higher levels. Symptoms range from nonexistent to profound, in which case heterotopia can result in severe seizure disorder, loss of motor skills, and mental retardation.	灰质异位	灰质异位是指因灰质团块位于脑内错误的位置导致的神经功能障碍，是皮质畸形的一种。除了位置，异位的神经元可能是正常的；且葡萄糖代谢水平与正常位置的灰质一致。这种情况可以造成的多种不同症状，但通常包含一定程度的癫痫或反复痫性发作，常会影响大脑更高水平的能力。其表现可以无症状，也可以引起严重症状，比如严重的癫痫，运动能力丧失，智力低下。
神经系统异常	HP:0002282	Heterotopia	#####	异位	#####

神经系统异常	HP:0002305	Athetosis	Athetosis (from the Greek word for &#39;changeable&#39; or &#39;unfixed&#39;) refers to an inability to sustain the muscles of the fingers, toes, tongue, or any other group of muscles in a fixed position. Instead, posture is interrupted by slow, purposeless involuntary movements.	手足徐动症	手足徐动症（来自希腊字为&#39;可变“或”不固定“）是指无法维持手指、脚趾、舌头或任何其他组的肌肉在固定位置。相反，姿势被缓慢、无目的的不自主运动中断。

神经系统异常	HP:0002346	Head tremor	An unintentional, oscillating to-and-fro muscle movement affecting head movement.	头部震颤	无意识的，影响头部运动的反复的肌肉振荡运动。

神经系统异常	HP:0002356	Writer&#39;s cramp	A focal dystonia of the fingers, hand, and/or forearm that appears when the affected person attempts to do a task that requires fine motor movements such as writing or playing a musical instrument.	书写痉挛	手指，手和/或前臂的局灶性肌张力障碍，在受影响的人试图完成需要精细动作的任务时出现，如书写或玩乐器的任务出。

神经系统异常	HP:0002375	Hypokinesia	Abnormally diminished motor activity. In contrast to paralysis, hypokinesia is not characterized by a lack of motor strength, but rather by a poverty of movement. The typical habitual movements (e.g., folding the arms, crossing the legs) are reduced in frequency.	少动	异常的运动减少。与瘫痪相比，运动迟缓并不是缺乏运动的力量，而是运动的贫乏。典型的习惯性动作（如交叉双臂，盘腿）的频率减低。

	HP:0002377	Paraganglioma-related cranial nerve palsy	A cranial nerve palsy associated with a paraganglioma of the head or neck.	副神经节瘤相关的颅神经麻痹	与头部或颈部的副神经节瘤相关的颅神经麻痹。

神经系统异常	HP:0002380	Fasciculations	Fasciculations are observed as small, local, involuntary muscle contractions (twitching) visible under the skin. Fasciculations result from increased irritability of an axon (which in turn is often a manifestation of disease of a motor neuron). This leads to sporadic discharges of all the muscle fibers controlled by the axon in isolation from other motor units.	肌束震颤	指在皮肤下观察到的细微、局部及不自主地肌肉收缩（抽搐），是由于轴索的兴奋性增高导致的（通常是运动神经元病的表现）。这导致了轴索支配的所有肌肉纤维独立于其他运动单位的自发性放电。

神经系统异常	HP:0002389	Cavum septum pellucidum	If the two laminae of the septum pellucidum are not fused then a fluid-filled space or cavum is present. The cavum septum pellucidum is present at birth but usually obliterates by the age of 3 to 6 months. It is up to 1cm in width and the walls are parallel. It is an enclosed space and is not part of the ventricular system or connected with the subarachnoid space.	第五脑室	如果透明隔的两个薄层未融合在一起，那么就会出现的一个充满液体的空间或空腔。透明隔间腔在出生时存在，但通常3-6个月时消失。它宽约1cm，壁是平行的。它是一个封闭的空间，不属于脑室系统的一部分，不与蛛网膜下腔相连。

神经系统异常	HP:0002403	Positive Romberg sign	The patient stands with the feet placed together and balance and is asked to close his or her eyes. A loss of balance upon eye closure is a positive Romberg sign and is interpreted as indicating a deficit in proprioception.	闭目难立征阳性	病人站立时并脚来保持平衡，然后被要求闭上眼睛。如果闭眼后失去平衡曾考虑为闭目难立征阳性，可能存在本体感觉的异常。

神经系统异常	HP:0002410	Aqueductal stenosis	Stenosis of the cerebral aqueduct (also known as the mesencephalic duct, aqueductus mesencephali, or aqueduct of Sylvius), which connects the third cerebral ventricle in the diencephalon to the fourth ventricle, which is between the pons and cerebellum.	中脑导水管狭窄	脑导水管狭窄（也被称为脑导管，中脑导水管，或西尔维于导水管），导水管连接间脑的第三脑室到第四脑室，位于脑桥和小脑之间。
神经系统异常	HP:0002411	Myokymia	Successive and rapid contractions of motor units associated with chronic nerve injury. The discharges arise from the peripheral aspects of regenerating nerves, and clinically impart a nearly continuous undulation of the body surface overlying the muscle.	肌纤维颤搐	慢性神经损伤相关的运动单位的连续，快速收缩。放电产生于再生神经的周边方面和临床上赋予身体表面覆盖在该肌肉的几乎连续的起伏
神经系统异常	HP:0002414	Spina bifida	Incomplete closure of the embryonic neural tube, whereby some vertebral arches remain unfused and open. The mildest form is spina bifida occulta, followed by meningocele and meningomyelocele.	脊柱裂	胚胎神经管不完全闭合，因此一些椎弓仍然未融合和开放。在最轻的形式是隐性脊柱裂，其次为脑脊髓膜膨出和脑脊髓脊膜膨出。
神经系统异常	HP:0002415	Leukodystrophy	Leukodystrophy refers to deterioration of white matter of the brain resulting from degeneration of myelin sheaths in the CNS. Their basic defect is directly related to the synthesis and maintenance of myelin membranes.	脑白质营养不良	脑白质营养不良是指源于中枢神经系统髓鞘变性的脑白质退变。它们的基本缺陷与髓鞘膜的合成和维持直接相关。

肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	HP:0002464	Spastic dysarthria	A type of dysarthria related to bilateral damage of the upper motor neuron tracts of the pyramidal and extra- pyramidal tracts. Speech of affected individuals is slow, effortful, and has a harsh vocal quality.	痉挛性构音障碍	一种与双侧上运动神经元的锥体束和锥体外束损伤相关的构音障碍。受累的个体的语言缓慢、费力而且音质刺耳。

神经系统异常	HP:0002492	Abnormality of the corticospinal tract	Abnormality of the corticospinal tract, which is the chief element of the pyramidal system (the principle motor tract) and is the only direct connection between the cerebrum and the spinal cord.	皮质脊髓束异常	皮质脊髓束的异常，其是锥体系统的主要组成部分，是大脑和脊髓之间唯一的直接连接。
神经系统异常	HP:0002493	Corticospinal tract dysfunction	A functional deficit of the tract that conveys nervous impulses from the motor cortex of the brain to the spinal cord. The corticospinal tract mediates discrete voluntary skilled movements.	皮质脊髓束功能障碍	从大脑运动皮层传递神经冲动到脊髓束的功能缺损。皮质脊髓束介导不相关联的自主技能运动。
神经系统异常	HP:0002494	Abnormal rapid eye movement (REM) sleep	Abnormality of REM sleep. Phases of REM sleep are characterized by desynchronized EEG patterns, increases in heart rate and blood pressure, sympathetic activation, and a profound loss of muscle tonus except for the eye and middle-ear muscles. There are then phases of rapid eye movements.	快速眼动睡眠异常	REM睡眠异常。 REM睡眠阶段的特点是脑电图模式去同步化，心率增快、血压升高，交感神经激活，除了眼睛和中耳肌肉之外的其它肌张力明显消失。其后跟随快速眼球运动阶段。
神经系统异常	HP:0002495	Impaired vibratory sensation	A decrease in the ability to perceive vibration. Clinically, this is usually tested with a tuning fork which vibrates at 128 Hz and is applied to bony prominences such as the malleoli at the ankles or the metacarpal-phalangeal joints. There is a slow decay of vibration from the tuning fork. The degree of vibratory sense loss can be crudely estimated by counting the number of seconds that the examiner can perceive the vibration longer than the patient.	振动觉障碍	感知振动的能力下降。临床上，通常使用128Hz的音叉放置于骨性突起，如踝尖或掌指关节。音叉的振动缓慢衰减。振动觉缺失的程度可以通过检查者感知振动长于患者的时间粗略计算。

神经系统异常	HP:0002508	Brainstem dysplasia	A developmental structural anomaly of the stalk-like part of the brain that comprises the midbrain (aka mesencephalon), the pons (aka pons Varolii), and the medulla oblongata, and connects the cerebral hemispheres with the cervical spinal cord.	脑干发育不良	大脑的茎样部分（脑干）的结构发育异常，包括中脑、脑桥和延髓，脑干连接大脑半球与颈部脊髓。

神经系统异常	HP:0002511	Alzheimer disease	A degenerative disease of the brain characterized by the insidious onset of dementia. Impairment of memory, judgment, attention span, and problem solving skills are followed by severe apraxia and a global loss of cognitive abilities. The condition primarily occurs after age 60, and is marked pathologically by severe cortical atrophy and the triad of senile plaques, neurofibrillary tangles, and neuropil threads.	阿尔茨海默病	一种脑部的退行性疾病，其特点是以隐袭性起病的痴呆。记忆、判断力、注意力和解决问题的能力受损，继之出现严重的失用和全面的认知能力损害。首发症状出现在60岁后，其病理学标记是严重的皮质萎缩和老年斑、神经元纤维缠结、神经毡细丝。

神经系统异常	HP:0002521	Hypsarrhythmia	Hypsarrhythmia is abnormal interictal high amplitude waves and a background of irregular spikes. There is continuous (during wakefulness), high-amplitude (&gt;200 Hz), generalized polymorphic slowing with no organized background and multifocal spikes demonstrated by electroencephalography (EEG).	高度失律	高度失律是发作间歇期异常的高波幅脑波和不规则的棘波背景活动。脑电图（EEG）显示持续的（清醒时），高波幅（&gt; 200赫兹），广泛的多形慢波，伴无组织的背景活动和多灶棘波。

消化系统异常	HP:0002570	Steatorrhea	Greater than normal amounts of fat in the feces. This is a result of malabsorption of lipids in the small intestine and results in frothy foul-smelling fecal matter that floats.	脂肪泻	粪便中脂肪含量高于正常。这是小肠脂肪吸收不良的结果，产生泡沫状、恶臭味的漂浮粪质。

心血管系统异常	HP:0002621	Atherosclerosis	A condition characterized by patchy atheromas or atherosclerotic plaques which develop in the walls of medium-sized and large arteries and can lead to arterial stenosis with reduced or blocked blood flow.	动脉粥样硬化	大、中型动脉壁形成片状斑块或粥样斑块，导致动脉狭窄，血流减小或阻断。
心血管系统异常	HP:0002622	Dissecting aortic aneurysm	Dissecting aortic aneurysm occurs when a tear in the tunica intima of the aorta causes blood to flow between the layers of the wall of the aorta, forcing the layers apart.	夹层主动脉瘤	动脉内膜撕裂导致的主动脉瘤，血液在主动脉壁内膜层之间流动，迫使内膜层之间分离。
心血管系统异常	HP:0002623	Overriding aorta	An overriding aorta is a congenital heart defect where the aorta is positioned directly over a ventricular septal defect, instead of over the left ventricle. The result is that the aorta receives some blood from the right ventricle, which reduces the amount of oxygen in the blood. It is one of the four conditions of the Tetralogy of Fallot. The aortic root can be displaced toward the front (anteriorly) or directly above the septal defect, but it is always abnormally located to the right of the root of the pulmonary artery. The degree of override is quite variable, with 5-95% of the valve being connected to the right ventricle.	主动脉骑跨	一种先天性心脏缺陷，指主动脉的位置直接跨过室间隔缺损而不是跨过左心室。其结果是主动脉接收一部分来自右心室的血液，导致血液中氧含量降低。这是法洛四联症的四种临床表现之一，主动脉根部不能位于前方，也不能在室间隔缺损的正上方。骑跨的角度有很多种，其中5-95%的瓣膜都连接右心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0002624	Venous abnormality	An anomaly of vein (FMA:50723).	静脉血管异常	静脉血管的异常（FMA:50723）。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0002625	Deep venous thrombosis	Formation of a blot clot in a deep vein. The clot often blocks blood flow, causing swelling and pain. The deep veins of the leg are most often affected.	深静脉血栓形成	血块在深静脉形成。血块通常阻断血流量，引起肿胀和疼痛。腿部深静脉最常受到影响。
心血管系统异常	HP:0002626	Venous varicosities of celiac and mesenteric vessels	Elongated and tortuous mesenteric veins, which comprise the inferior mesenteric vein(FMA:15391) and the superior mesenteric vein(FMA:14332).	腹腔及肠系膜静脉曲张	肠系膜静脉的扭曲、伸长，肠系膜静脉由肠系膜下静脉（FMA:15391）和肠系膜上静脉（FMA:14332）组成。
心血管系统异常	HP:0002627	Right aortic arch with mirror image branching	The aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus and not the left mainstem bronchus, but does not result in the creation of a vascular ring. The first branch is the left brachiocephalic artery which divides into the left carotid artery and left subclavian artery, the second branch is the right carotid artery, the third branch is the right subclavian artery.	右位主动脉弓伴镜像分支	主动脉弓穿过右主支气管而不是左主支气管，但是不导致血管环的产生。第一分支是分成左颈动脉和左锁骨下动脉的左头臂动脉，第二分支是右颈动脉，第三分支是右锁骨下动脉。

心血管系统异常	HP:0002635	Atheromatosis	An atheroma is an accumulation of degenerative material in the tunica intima (inner layer) of artery walls. The accumulated material forms a swelling in the artery wall, which may intrude into the channel of the artery, narrowing it and restricting blood flow.	动脉粥样化病	动脉壁内膜退行性物质的积累,引起动脉壁增厚。积累的物质在动脉壁上形成肿块，向内突入动脉腔，缩小动脉腔并且限制血液流动。

肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0002666	Pheochromocytoma	Pheochromocytomas (also known as chromaffin tumors) produce, store, and secrete catecholamines. Pheochromocytomas usually originate from the adrenal medulla but may also develop from chromaffin cells in or about sympathetic ganglia. A common symptom of pheochromocytoma is hypertension owing to release of catecholamines.	嗜铬细胞瘤	嗜铬细胞瘤（也称为嗜铬肿瘤）生产，储存，并分泌儿茶酚胺。嗜铬细胞瘤，通常从肾上腺髓质发起的，但也可以从在或约交感神经节铬细胞发展。嗜铬细胞瘤的常见症状是高血压，由于儿茶酚胺的释放。

肿瘤,神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0002668	Paraganglioma	A carotid body tumor (also called paraganglionoma or chemodectoma) is a tumor found in the upper neck at the branching of the carotid artery. They arise from the chemoreceptor organ (paraganglion) located in the adventitia of the carotid artery bifurcation.	副神经节瘤	颈动脉体瘤（也称为神经节细胞瘤或化学感受器瘤）是一种位于上颈部颈动脉分叉处的肿瘤。它们产生来自位于颈动脉分叉的外膜的化学感受器器官（副神经节）。

The typical symptoms of osteosarcoma comprise bone pain, fracture, limitation of motion, and tenderness or swelling at the site of the tumor.	骨肉瘤	一种通常见于青春期的恶性骨肿瘤，通常会累及包括胫骨，股骨，肱骨在内的长骨。骨肉瘤的典型症状包括骨痛，骨折，关节活动受限，压痛或肿瘤的部位肿胀。

The skull base is made up of five bones: the ethmoid, sphenoid, occipital, paired frontal, and paired parietal bones, and is subdivided into 3 regions: the anterior, middle, and posterior cranial fossae. The petro-occipital fissure subdivides the middle cranial fossa into 1 central component and 2 lateral components.	颅底异常	颅底的异常。颅底形成颅腔的底部，从而隔离脑部与其他面部结构。颅底由五块骨头（筛窦、蝶窦、枕骨、配对的额骨和配对的顶骨

Obstructive sleep apnea is related to a relaxation of muscle tone (which normally occurs during sleep) leading to partial collapse of the soft tissues in the airway with resultant obstruction of the air flow.	阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停	夜间睡眠过程中多次出现呼吸道梗阻而导致睡眠中呼吸暂停。阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停与肌肉张力松弛（通常是在睡眠时）导致气道内的软组织部分塌陷，从而引起气道阻塞有关。

Hyperventilation can result from increased frequency of breathing, an increased tidal volume, or both, and leads to an excess intake of oxygen and the blowing off of carbon dioxide.	过度通气	过度通气指肺通气速率快于所需要的气体交换率。过度通气可由呼吸频率增加、潮气量增加或两者都有的原因所致，可以引起氧摄取和二氧化碳呼出过量。

SGOT and SGPT are used clinically mainly as markers of liver damage.	肝脏转氨酶升高	血清中SGOT和SGPT水平升高。SGOT（血清谷草转氨酶）和SGPT（血清谷丙转氨酶）是主要发现于肝脏和心脏的转氨酶，当肝脏和心脏损伤时被释放到血液中。临床上SGOT和SGPT是肝损伤的主要标志物。

These terms are retained for historical reasons but for new annotations the precise glycosylation defect should be recorded.	血清转铁蛋白的等电位聚焦异常	糖基化转铁蛋白的浓度可作为N联糖基化保真度的标记物在血清中检测。在先天性糖基化缺陷病的传统命名法中，整个聚糖的缺失被命名为I型，一个或多个单糖的缺失被命名为II型。这些术语因历史原因被保留，但应记录新的注释作为对糖基化缺陷的精确注解。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003200	Ragged-red muscle fibers	An abnormal appearance of muscle fibers observed on muscle biopsy. Ragged red fibers can be visualized with Gomori trichrome staining as irregular and intensely red subsarcolemmal zones, whereas the normal myofibrils are green. The margins of affect fibers appear red and ragged. The ragged-red  is due to the accumulation of abnormal mitochondria below the plasma membrane of the muscle fiber, leading to the appearance of a red rim and speckled sarcoplasm.	破碎红纤维	肌肉活检可见肌纤维异常。粗糙的红肌纤维可与莫里三色染色不规则和强烈的红色肌膜区域进行可视化，而正常的肌原纤维是绿色的。影响纤维的边缘出现红色粗糙的形态，异常形态的原因是由于肌肉纤维的质膜以下异常线粒体的积累，导致了红色边缘和肌浆斑点的外观。

If this test is negative (i.e., no blue color is produced), then this indicates a defect in `superoxide-generating NADPH oxidase activity` (GO:0016175) with inability to efficiently kill phagocytized bacteria.	四氮唑蓝（NBT）还原试验阴性	在NBT法检测中，中性粒细胞使无色化合物NBT变成深蓝色。如果该测试阴性（即没有蓝色产生），提示&#39;可以生成超氧化物的NADPH氧化酶活性缺陷（GO:0016175），以及中性粒细胞不能有效地杀灭吞噬细菌。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0003337	Reduced prothrombin consumption	The prothrombin consumption test measures the formation of intrinsic thromboplastin by determining the residual serum prothrombin after blood clotting is complete. If there is a defect in the process, less prothrombin will be converted to thrombin than normal (less prothrombin is consumed). This test may be abnormal with conditions including deficiency of factors VIII or IX, with circulating anticoagulants, thrombocytopenia.	凝血酶原消耗减少	凝血酶原消耗测试通过确定血液凝固完成后残留血清凝血酶原浓度来测量内源性凝血酶的形成。如果此过程中存在缺陷，较少的凝血酶原被转化为凝血酶（较少的凝血酶原被消耗）。该测试结果异常可见于多种异常情况，包括VIII因子或IX因子缺乏，使用循环抗凝剂，血小板减少症。

神经系统异常	HP:0003376	Steppage gait	An abnormal gait pattern that arises from weakness of the pretibial and peroneal muscles due to a lower motor neuron lesion. Affected patients have footdrop and are unable to dorsiflex and evert the foot. The leg is lifted high on walking so that the toes clear the ground, and there may be a slapping noise when the foot strikes the ground again.	跨阈步态	一种由于胫前肌和腓骨肌下运动神经元病变导致肌无力而产生的异常步态。患者有足下垂，并且不能足不能背屈和外翻。行走时腿部高举以使脚趾离开地面，脚步落地时可能因为足部和地面碰撞而产生拍击声。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003403	EMG: decremental response of compound muscle action potential (CMAP) to repetitive nerve stimulation	A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to a greater than normal decrease in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.	肌电图:复合肌肉动作电位对神经重复刺激的递减反应	复合肌肉动作电位（CMAP）是肌电图（EMG）的一种类型。 CMAP是指由供给运动神经刺激引起同一部位的若干个肌肉纤维几乎同时的动作电位，被记录为一个多峰累加动作电位。这种异常在检查过程中呈现大于正常的减少幅度。

神经系统异常	HP:0003463	Increased extraneuronal autofluorescent lipopigment	Lipofuscin, a generic term applied to autofluorescent lipopigment, is a mixture of protein and lipid that accumulates in most aging cells, particularly those involved in high lipid turnover (e.g., the adrenal medulla) or phagocytosis of other cell types (e g., the retinal pigment epithelium or RPE; macrophage). This term pertains if there is an increase in the extraneuronal accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.	神经元外自体荧光脂褐素增加	脂褐素，自体荧光脂褐素的专业术语，是积聚在最衰老细胞的蛋白质和脂质混合物，尤其是涉及高脂质转换（例如，肾上腺髓质）或吞噬的其他类型细胞（例如视网膜色素上皮细胞或RPE；巨噬细胞）。此术语适用于神经元外脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。

神经系统异常	HP:0003470	Paralysis	Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Motor paralysis results from deficits of the upper motor neurons (corticospinal, corticobulbar, or subcorticospinal).	瘫痪	由于一组或多组从脑发出的支配肌肉的神经纤维受损后引起骨骼随意肌收缩功能的丧失，可以是肌力部分或完全的丧失，用paralysis或plegia来表示肌力完全或严重丧失，paresis表示部分或轻微的肌力丧失。运动性瘫痪由上运动神经元损伤（皮质脊髓束、皮质延髓、或皮质脊髓下）引起。
神经系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0003472	Hypocalcemic tetany	Hyperexcitability of the neuromuscular system related to abnormally low level of calcium in the blood, resulting in carpopedal or generalized spasms.	低钙搐搦	与血液中钙水平异常减低相关的神经肌肉统过度兴奋，导致手足搐搦或广泛痉挛。
肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	HP:0003473	Fatigable weakness	A type of weakness that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	疲劳性无力	肌肉运动后出现的无力感，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
神经系统异常	HP:0003474	Sensory impairment	An abnormality of the primary sensation that is mediated by peripheral nerves (pain, temperature, touch, vibration, joint position). The word hypoesthesia (or hyesthesia) refers to a reduction in cutaneous sensation to a specific type of testing.	感觉损害	初级感觉的异常是由末梢神经（疼痛，温度，触觉，振动，关节位置）介导的。感觉减退（或hyesthesia）是指在皮肤感觉测试中某一特定感觉类型的减退。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003482	EMG: axonal abnormality	Electromyographic (EMG) findings characteristic of axonal neuropathy, with normal or slightly decreased nerve conduction velocities, normal or slightly prolonged distal latencies, but significantly reduced motor potentials and sensory amplitudes. There may be spontaneous activity upon needle EMG studies, such as increased insertional activity, positive sharp waves and fibrillation potentials.	肌电图:轴索异常	肌电图（EMG）发现轴突性神经病变，神经传导速度正常或略有下降，远端潜伏期正常或稍长时间，但动作电位和感觉电位幅度显著降低。有可能是在肌电图中的自发活动，如增加插入性活动，正锐波和纤颤电位。

肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	HP:0003547	Shoulder girdle muscle weakness	The shoulder, or pectoral, girdle is composed of the clavicles and the scapulae. Shoulder-girdle weakness refers to lack of strength of the muscles attaching to these bones, that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the shoulders.	肩胛带肌肉无力	肩或胸部肢带由锁骨和肩胛骨构成。肩部肢带无力是指连接到这些骨头的肌肉无力，即肩膀肌肉的力量缺乏。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003548	Subsarcolemmal accumulations of abnormally shaped mitochondria	An abnormally increased number of mitochondria in the cytoplasma adjacent to the sarcolemma (muscle cell membrane), whereby the mitochondria also possess an abnormal morphology.	形状异常线粒体肌膜下沉积	细胞质中邻近肌纤维膜（肌细胞膜）的线粒体数量异常增加，线粒体形态也异常。
结缔组织异常	HP:0003549	Abnormality of connective tissue	Any abnormality of the soft tissues, including both connective tissue (tendons, ligaments, fascia, fibrous tissues, and fat).	结缔组织异常	软组织的任何异常，包括结缔组织（肌腱、韧带、筋膜、纤维组织）和脂肪。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003551	Difficulty climbing stairs	Reduced ability to climb stairs.	爬楼梯困难	爬楼梯能力下降。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003552	Muscle stiffness	A condition in which muscles cannot be moved quickly without accompanying pain or spasm.	肌肉僵硬	一种肌肉不能迅速移动的状态，不伴随疼痛或痉挛。
结缔组织异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0003553	Cellulitis due to immunodeficiency	The presence of cellulitis (a diffuse inflammation of connective tissue) on the basis of an immunodeficiency.	免疫缺陷性蜂窝织炎	由于免疫缺陷所致的蜂窝织炎（一种弥漫性结缔组织炎症）。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003554	Type 2 muscle fiber atrophy	Atrophy (wasting) affecting primary type 2 muscle fibers. This feature in general can only be observed on muscle biopsy.	2型肌纤维萎缩	萎缩（消瘦）主要影响2型肌肉纤维。一般该特征只能在肌肉活检中观察到。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003555	Muscle fiber splitting	Fiber splitting or branching is a common finding in human and rat skeletal muscle pathology. Fiber splitting refers to longitudinal halving of the complete fiber, while branching originates from a regenerating end of a necrotic fiber as invaginations of the sarcolemma. In fiber branching, one end of the fiber remains intact as a single entity, while the other end has several branches.	肌纤维分裂	纤维分裂或分叉是一种表现在人类和大鼠骨骼肌病理的常见现象。纤维分裂表现为完整纤维的纵向对分，而纤维分叉则是起源于坏死纤维再生末端由于肌纤维膜内陷所致。在纤维分叉中，纤维一端保持为单个整体，而另一端则有多个分叉。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003557	Increased variability in muscle fiber diameter	An abnormally high degree of muscle fiber size variation. This phenotypic feature can be observed upon muscle biopsy.	肌纤维直径变异性增大	异常高的程度的肌纤维大小的变化。此表型特征可根据肌肉活检观察。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003560	Muscular dystrophy	The term dystrophy means abnormal growth. However, muscular dystrophy is used to describe primary myopathies with a genetic basis and a progressive course characterized by progressive skeletal muscle weakness, defects in muscle proteins, and the apoptosis of muscle cells.	肌营养不良	术语营养不良是指生长异常。然而，肌营养不良是用来描述原发性肌肉疾病具有遗传基础及渐进的过程，其特征为进行性骨骼肌无力，肌蛋白的缺陷，以及肌细胞的凋亡。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0003653	Cellular metachromasia	Metachromasia (also known as metachromacy) is a characteristic color change which certain aniline dyes exhibit when bound to particular substances or when concentrated in solution. For example, the basic dye toluidine blue becomes distinctly pink when bound to cartilage matrix. In the sense used here, the metachromasia refers to a change in color not observed with normal tissues, anomalous staining with the cationic dyes toluidine blue O and Alcian blue resulting from excessive amounts of the polyanionic glycosaminoglycans.	细胞异染	异染（也称为异染色）是颜色发生的一种特异性改变，发生在某些苯胺染料与特定的物质结合或在液体中浓缩时。例如，当碱性染料甲苯胺蓝与软骨基质结合时，颜色变成明显的粉红色。在这里特指，异染是指在正常组织中无法观察到颜色的变化，却非常规的用阳离子染料甲苯胺蓝O和阿尔新蓝染色，由于阴离子糖胺多糖糖胺过量所致的颜色改变。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003710	Exercise-induced muscle cramps	Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles brought on by physical exertion.	运动引起的肌肉痉挛	一个或多个肌肉突然不自主的收缩导致体力消耗。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003712	Muscle hypertrophy	Hypertrophy (increase in size) of muscle cells (as opposed to hyperplasia, which refers to an increase in the number of muscle cells).	肌肥大	肌细胞肥大即肌细胞体积增大，不同于增生（即肌细胞数目增多）。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003713	Muscle fiber necrosis	Abnormal cell death involving muscle fibers usually associated with break in, or absence of, muscle surface fiber membrane and resulting in irreversible damage to muscle fibers.	肌纤维坏死	肌纤维细胞的异常凋亡通常表现为肌纤维细胞溶解或肌肉组织表面纤维膜的缺失，最终导致肌纤维不可逆性损害。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003715	Myofibrillar myopathy	Myofibrillar structural changes characterized by abnormal intracellular accumulation of the intermediate filament desmin and other proteins.	肌原纤维肌病	表现为肌原纤维结构的改变，以中间纤维结蛋白和其他蛋白细胞内异常聚集为特征。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003736	Autophagic vacuoles	The lysosomal-vacuolar pathway has a role in the controlled intracellular digestion of macromolecules such as protein complexes and organelles. This feature refers to the presence of an abnormally increased number of autophagic vacuoles in muscle tissue.	自噬空泡	溶酶体液泡通道具有控制细胞内消化大分子的作用，例如蛋白质复合物和细胞器。特征是肌肉组织中自噬小体数量增加。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0003737	Mitochondrial myopathy	A type of myopathy associated with mitochondrial disease and characterized by findings on biopsy such as ragged red muscle fibers.	线粒体肌病	一类与线粒体疾病有关的肌病，肌活检可见粗糙的红色肌纤维。

神经系统异常	HP:0003739	Myoclonic spasms	Marked by a sudden contraction of a muscle or muscle mass, resulting in sudden, rapid twitching of the face, trunk, or limbs.	肌阵挛性抽搐	表现为某个肌肉或肌群的突然收缩，引起面、躯干或肢体突然快速的抽动。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003798	Nemaline bodies	Nemaline rods are abnormal bodies that can occur in skeletal muscle fibers. The rods can be observed on histological analysis of muscle biopsy tissue or upon electron microscopy, where they appear either as extensions of sarcomeric Z-lines, in random array without obvious attachment to Z-lines (often in areas devoid of sarcomeres) or in large clusters localized at the sarcolemma or intermyofibrillar spaces.	杆状体	杆棒状线样体是一种异常小体，常发生于骨骼肌纤维。这种杆棒状结构可通过肌组织活检后病理光镜下或电镜下观察，表现为肌原纤维“Z”形或无规则形（常为肌小节缺乏区域），或发生于肌纤维膜或肌纤维内的大片成簇结构。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0003805	Rimmed vacuoles	Presence of abnormal vacuoles (membrane-bound organelles) in the sarcolemma. On histological staining with hematoxylin and eosin, rimmed vacuoles are popcorn-like clear vacuoles with a densely blue rim. The vacuoles are often associated with cytoplasmic and occasionally intranuclear eosinophilic inclusions.	镶边空泡	肌纤维膜存在异常细胞液泡（膜旁细胞器）。在组织染色与HE染色，镶边空泡是爆米花样有密集蓝色边缘的清亮空泡。液泡形成与细胞质和核内偶尔出现的嗜酸性夹杂物有关。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0004012	Premature fusion of the radial epiphyseal plates	A premature fusion of the epiphyseal plates of the radius. Epiphyseal plates are located at the distal and proximal ends of the long bones, in this case of the radius and premature fusion will have an effect on the growth of the radial bone, inhibiting or at least disturbing the normal growth and development of the bone.	桡骨骺板过早融合	桡骨骨骺板过早融合。骺板位于长骨的远端和近端，过早融合将会影响桡骨的生长，抑制或至少扰乱骨骼的正常生长和发育。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0004097	Deviation of finger	Deviated fingers is a term that should be used if one or more fingers of the hand are deviated from their normal position, either to the radial or ulnar side. A deviation of a finger can be caused by an abnormal form of one or more of the phalanges of the affected finger, or by a deviation or displacement of one or more phalanges.	手指偏离	手指偏离指手的一个或多个手指从其正常位置偏离，偏向桡侧或尺侧。手指的偏离可能由一个或多个病变手指的指骨形态异常导致，或由一个或多个指骨的偏差或位移导致。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0004099	Macrodactyly	Significant increase in the length and girth of most or all of a digit compared to its contralateral digit (if unaffected) or compared to what would be expected for age/body build. The increased girth is accompanied by an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension AND the lateral dimension of the digit.	巨指	相对于对侧手指（未累及的），或者相对于预期的年龄/体型，手指的大部分或全部的长度和周长显著增加。周长的增加伴随着背腹尺寸的增加和横向尺寸的增加。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0004302	Functional motor problems.	#####	运动功能障碍	#####
肌肉组织异常	HP:0004303	Abnormality of muscle fibers	Any abnormality of the `skeletal muscle cell` (FMA:9727). Muscle fibers are subdivided into two types. Type I fibers are fatigue-resistant and rich in oxidative enzymes (they stain light with the myosin ATPase reaction), and type II fibers are fast-contracting, fatigue-prone, and rich in glycolytic enzymes (these fibers stain darkly). Normal muscle tissue has a random distribution of type I and type II fibers.	肌纤维异常	“骨骼肌细胞”异常（FMA:9727）。肌纤维被细分为两种类型:I型纤维抗疲劳并富含氧化酶（与肌球蛋白ATP酶反应染色浅），II型纤维收缩快速，易疲劳，并富含糖解酶（染色深）。正常肌肉组织随机分布I型和II型纤维。
神经系统异常	HP:0004305	Involuntary movements	Involuntary contractions of muscle leading to involuntary movements of extremities, neck, trunk, or face.	不自主运动	肌肉的不自主地收缩，导致四肢，颈部，躯干，或面部不自主运动。

心血管系统异常	HP:0004307	Abnormal anatomic location of the heart	Normally,the heart is located in the thoracic cavity medial to the lungs and posterior to the sternum. Abnormal anatomic location of the heart is not located where it should be.	心脏解剖位置异常	正常情况下，心脏位于胸腔内两肺之间、胸骨后面。如果心脏位置不在此处，则为心脏解剖位置异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0004308	Ventricular arrhythmia	Ventricular arrhythmias is a common arrhythmia occur in ventricle, including Ventricular extrasystoles, ventricular tachycardia, ventricular fibrillation, etc.	室性心律失常	室性心律失常指起源于心室的心律紊乱，是常见的心律失常，包括室性早搏(室早)、室性心动过速(室速)、心室颤动(室颤)等。

生长异常	HP:0004322	Short stature	A height below that which is expected according to age and gender norms. Although there is no universally accepted definition of short stature, many refer to &quot;short stature&quot; as height more than 2 standard deviations below the mean for age and gender (or below the 3rd percentile for age and gender dependent norms).	身材矮小	身高低于该年龄性别预期身高的正常范围。虽然没有普遍接受的身材矮小的定义，许多 “身材矮小”的定义指身高低于该年龄同性别平均值超过2个标准差（或位于该年龄同性别身高第3百分位以下）。

The enteric nervous system functions to control gut movement, fluid exchange between the gut and its lumen, and local blood flow.	肠神经节异常	肠神经系统的异常；肠神经系统包括两种类型的神经节，肌间（Auerbach's）神经丛和粘膜下（Meissner's）神经丛。肠神经系统的功能是控制肠道运动、肠道与其内腔之间的液体交换与局部血流。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0004428	Elfin facies	This is a description previously used to describe a facial form characterized by a short, upturned nose, wide mouth, widely spaced eyes, and full cheeks. Because of the imprecision in this definition it is preferable to describe these features precisely. This term is retained because it was often used in the past, but it should not be used for new annotations.	小精灵脸	本词条此前用于描述如下的特殊脸形: 短而上翘的鼻子，宽嘴，间隔远的双眼，以及饱满的脸颊。因为这个定义并不精确，所以最好精确地描述这些特征。保留本词条是因为它在过去较常用，但在新注释中应避免使用。

消化系统异常	HP:0004448	Fulminant hepatic failure	Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as fulminant if there is onset of encephalopathy within 4 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.	暴发性肝衰竭	肝衰竭是指肝脏无法行使其正常的合成和代谢功能，这将导致既往健康个体的凝血异常及精神状态改变。若既往肝脏正常的病人在起病4周内出现脑病发作，则将肝衰竭定义为爆发性。

This anomaly is thought to result from disruption of the normal embryologic migration of the kidneys.	融合肾移向一侧	一种肾脏发育异常，肾脏融合到一起，位于中线一侧。这种异常被认为是胚胎期肾脏迁移异常造成的。

心血管系统异常	HP:0004749	Atrial flutter	A type of atrial arrhythmia characterized by atrial rates of between 240 and 400 beats per minute and some degree of atrioventricular node conduction block. Typically, the ventricular rate is half the atrial rate. In the EKG; atrial flutter waves are observed as sawtooth-like atrial activity. Pathophysiologically, atrial flutter is a form of atrial reentry in which there is a premature electrical impulse creates a self-propagating circuit.	心房扑动	一种240~400次/min 心跳的房性心律失常，一定程度的房室结传导阻滞。心室率通常是心房率的一半。心电图显示，心房扑动波呈现锯齿状的心房活动。病理生理学上，心房扑动是心房折返的一种。

心血管系统异常	HP:0004755	Supraventricular tachycardia	Supraventricular tachycardia (SVT) is an abnormally increased heart rate (over 100 beats per minute at rest) with origin above the level of the ventricles.	室上性心动过速	室上性心动过速（SVT）是一种与原正常心室率相比异常增加的心率（静息状态每分钟超过100次）。

心血管系统异常	HP:0004758	Effort-induced polymorphic ventricular tachycardias	Effort-induced polymorphic ventricular tachycardias，which is defined as a ventricular rhythm at a rate greater than 100 beats per minute with a continuously varying QRS complex morphology in any recorded electrocardiographic (ECG) lead.	劳力诱导型多形性室性心动过速	多形性室性心动过速是指在任何心电图记录导联上均显示室性心动过速伴连续变化的QRS波群,节律不规则,频率 100~250次/min。劳力诱导后产生的多形性室性心动过速即劳力诱导型多形性室性心动过速。

内分泌系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0004904	Maturity-onset diabetes of the young	The term Maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY) was initially used for patients diagnosed with fasting hyperglycemia that could be treated without insulin for more than two years, where the initial diagnosis was made at a young age (under 25 years). Thus, MODY combines characteristics of type 1 diabetes (young age at diagnosis) and type 2 diabetes (less insulin dependence than type 1 diabetes). The term MODY is now most often used to refer to a group of monogenic diseases with these characteristics. Here, the term is used to describe hyperglycemia diagnosed at a young age with no or minor insulin dependency, no evidence of insulin resistence, and lack of evidence of autoimmune destruction of the beta cells.	成年发病性青少年糖尿病	青少年的成年发病性糖尿病（MODY）最初是用于描述有空腹高血糖症，而且可以不用胰岛素治疗两年以上的病人，而对这些病人的最初诊断是在（低于25岁）较年轻的时候作出的。因此，MODY结合了1型糖尿病（诊断时年龄较年轻）和2型糖尿病（比1型糖尿病胰岛素依赖较少）的特点。术语MODY现在经常用来指一组具有如下特点的单基因疾病，即在年轻时确诊的高血糖症，没有胰岛素依赖或有轻微胰岛素依赖，没有胰岛素抵抗，并且缺乏β细胞自身免疫损伤的证据。

心血管系统异常	HP:0005155	Ventricular escape rhythms	When the impulse from sinoatrial node or intra-atrial can not transmitted on time, the lower level of pacemaker atrioventricular transition area, should make atrioventricular transition zone from cardiac to control the ventricular.  If atrioventricular transition zone is also affected by the same reason and do not escape beat, the ventricular pacemaker impulse to control the ventricular, means ventricular escape. Three or more consecutive ventricular escape is ventricular escape arrhythm.	室性逸搏心律	当窦房结或心房内的激动由于某些原因不能按时下传，则下一级的起搏点房室交接区，应发出房室交接区逸搏来控制心室。如果房室交接区也受到与窦房结等相同原因的影响，不能发出逸搏时，则心室起搏点即发出激动来控制心室，形成室性逸搏。连续3个或3个以上的室性逸搏，即构成室性逸搏心律。

RAP reflects the amount of blood returning to the heart and the ability of the heart to pump the blood into the arterial system.	右心房压力升高	心脏右心房血液压力异常升高。右心房压力反映的是心脏回流血液量以及心脏泵血进入动脉系统的能力。

消化系统异常	HP:0005212	Anal mucosal leukoplakia	Leukoplakia is a precancerous dermatosis of mucous membranes analogous Leukoplakia is basically a chronic inflammatory hypertrophy in which anaplasia and malignant dyskeratosis may develop and subsequently advance to an invasive squamous cell cancer. The clinical diagnosis of primary anal leukoplakia is indicated by single or multiple slightly raised,irregular, marginated, grayish-white keratinized&#39; patches in the anal canal. Tissue biopsy is necessary for confirmation.	肛门粘膜白斑	白斑是粘膜类似物的一种癌前皮肤病变。白斑本质上是一种慢性炎症性肥大，可能会发展为间变及恶性异常角化，随后进展至侵袭性鳞状细胞癌。位于肛管的单个或多个微微隆起、不规则、有边缘的、灰白色角化的白斑，可提示原发性肛门白斑的临床诊断。确认须进行组织活检。

骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0005446	Obtuse angle of mandible	Abnormally flat (obtuse) angle of the mandible. The angle of the mandibular, located at the junction between the body and the ramus of the mandible, is normally close to being a right angle. This terms describes an abnormal increase of this angle such that the mandible appears flatter than normal.	下颌钝角	下颌角异常平坦（钝角）。下颌角，位于下颌体和下颌支之间形成的角度，通常接近为一个直角。这个术语描述了下颌角异常增大，使得下颌表现得比正常更平坦。

This term refers to the situation in which the fontanelles close at an inappropriately early time point.	囟门过早闭合	通常情况下，后侧和外侧囟门在出生后约六个月闭合，前囟门大约第二年中间闭合。这个术语是指囟门不适当的过早闭合的情况。

骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0005495	Metopic suture patent to nasal root	The frontal suture divides the two halves of the frontal bone in infants and usually fuses by the age of six years. The suture runs from the bregma (the point on the skull at which the coronal suture is intersected perpendicularly by the sagittal suture) to the nasion or nasal root. This term applies if the suture is widely patent from bregma to nasal root.	额缝开放至鼻根	前额缝合在婴儿期分割成前额骨两半，通常到六岁时融合。缝线从前囟（在头盖骨上位于冠状缝和矢状缝垂直相交的点）到鼻根。本术语适用于从前囟到鼻根的颅缝开大。

肿瘤,血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0005506	Chronic myelogenous leukemia	A myeloproliferative disorder characterized by increased proliferation of the granulocytic cell line without the loss of their capacity to differentiate.	慢性骨髓细胞白血病	骨髓增生性疾病，其特点的粒细胞系增殖增加但仍有分化能力。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0005507	Hemoglobin Barts	Normal adult hemoglobin is composed of two chains each of alpha and beta globin. Hb Barts (Hemoglobin Barts) is a tetramer with four gamma globin chains, and is essentially pathognomonic for one or another form of alpha thalassemia. Hb Barts has an extremely high affinity for oxygen, resulting in almost no oxygen delivery to the tissues.	Barts 血红蛋白	正常成人血红蛋白由两个α球蛋白链和两个β球蛋白链构成。Barts血红蛋白是由四个γ球蛋白链形成的四聚体，是地中海贫血的另一种病理形式。Barts血红蛋白对氧具有非常高的亲和力，导致几乎没有氧气输送到组织。

肿瘤,血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0005550	Chronic lymphatic leukemia	A chronic lymphocytic/lymphatic/lymphoblastic leukemia (CLL) is a neoplastic disease characterized by proliferation and accumulation (blood, marrow and lymphoid organs) of morphologically mature but immunologically dysfunctional lymphocytes. A CLL is always a B-cell lymphocytic leukemia as there are no reports of cases of T-cell lymphocytic leukemias.	慢性淋巴性白血病	慢性淋巴细胞/淋巴性/成淋巴母细胞性白血病（CLL），是一种血液肿瘤性疾病。该疾病的特征是在血液中发现形态成熟但免疫功能失调的淋巴细胞，在骨髓和淋巴器官的增殖和积累。因为没有T细胞淋巴细胞白血病的病例报告，慢性淋巴性白血病是一个B细胞淋巴细胞性白血病。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0005556	Abnormality of the metopic suture	The frontal suture divides the two halves of the frontal bone of the skull in infants and children and generally undergoes fusion by the age of six. A persistent frontal suture is referred to as a &quot;metopic suture&quot;.	额缝异常	前额缝把婴儿和儿童头骨的额骨平分为两部分。这两半一般到六岁完全融合。持久性前额缝隙被称为“额骨缝”。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0005560	Imbalanced hemoglobin synthesis	Normal hemoglobin synthesis is characterized by production of equal amounts of alpha and beta globins. This term refers to a deviation from this pattern and is the main characteristic of the various forms of thalassemia.	血红蛋白合成失衡	正常血红蛋白合成的特点是产生等量的α和β球蛋白。这一术语指α和β球蛋白比例的失衡，是各种形式地中海贫血的主要特征。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006145	Central Y-shaped metacarpal	A central Y-shaped metacarpal is the result of a partial fusion of two central metacarpals (i.e., metacarpals 2-4) of the hand, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Central Y-shaped metacarpals may be seen as a result of a central polydactyly with partial fusion of the duplicated metacarpal.	中央Y形掌骨	中央Y形掌骨是人手的两个中央掌骨（即，掌骨2-4）部分融合，Y形的两个臂向远方伸展。中央Y形掌骨可以被看作是一个中央多趾合并重复的掌骨部分融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006146	Broad metacarpal epiphyses	Increased side-to-side width of the metacarpal epiphyses.	掌骨骨骺变宽	掌骨骨骺一侧到另一侧的宽度增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006147	Progressive fusion 2nd-5th pip joints	#####	进行性第2-5指间关节融合	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006149	Increased laxity of fingers	#####	手指过度松弛	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006150	Swan neck-like deformities of the fingers	A swan neck deformity describes a finger with a hyperextended PIP joint and a flexed DIP joint. The most common cause for a swan neck-like deformity is a disruption of the end of the extensor tendon. Conditions that loosen the PIP joint and allow it to hyperextend, for example conditions that weaken the volar plate, can produce a swan neck deformity of the finger. One example is rheumatoid arthritis. Another cause are conditions that tighten up the small (intrinsic) muscles of the hand and fingers, for example hand trauma or nerve disorders, such as cerebral palsy, Parkinson&#39;s disease, or stroke.	手指的天鹅颈样变形	天鹅颈样变形指手指PIP关节过度伸展和DIP关节弯曲。导致天鹅颈状变形最常见的原因是伸肌肌腱末端的损坏。PIP关节松弛使手指能够过伸，例如削弱掌板力量的因素都能可产生手指的天鹅颈变形。类风湿性关节炎就是一个例子。另一个原因是手和手指的小（内收）肌群挛缩，例如手外伤或神经疾病（如脑性麻痹、帕金森氏病或中风）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006152	Proximal symphalangism (hands)	The term proximal symphalangism refers to a bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the digits of the hand, in other words the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIJ) is missing which can be seen either on x-rays or as an absence of the proximal interphalangeal finger creases.	近端指间关节粘连	术语近侧指间关节粘连指手指中间和近端指骨的骨融合，即近端指间关节（PIJ）缺失，可以通过X射线检查看到缺乏近端的指间手指折痕。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006155	Long phalanx of finger	Increased length of multiple or a single `phalanx of finger` (FMA:23914).	指指骨长	多个或单个`手指指骨 `（FMA:23914）的长度增加。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0006193	Thimble-shaped middle phalanges of hand	The `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817) resembles a thimble, a small metal cap to protect the finger while sewing that has a broad (proximal) base and narrower top, whereby both base and top are flat.	手指顶中间指骨呈顶针形	手指中节指骨像顶针（缝纫时使用的一种小金属杯状物，它的开口较宽，顶部较窄，套在手指上用来保护手指，将针顶穿所缝制的物件）形状，而正常指骨的两端（底部和顶部）都是平的。

消化系统异常	HP:0006554	Acute hepatic failure	Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as acute if there is onset of encephalopathy within 8 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.	急性肝功能衰竭	肝功能衰竭是指肝脏无法行使其正常的合成和代谢功能，这将导致凝血病和正常个体的精神状态的改变。若原先肝脏为正常的病人在肝功能衰竭症状发生8周内脑病发作，则为急性肝功能衰竭。

消化系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0006579	Prolonged neonatal jaundice	Neonatal jaundice refers to a yellowing of the skin and other tissues of a newborn infant as a result of increased concentrations of bilirubin in the blood. Neonatal jaundice affects over half of all newborns to some extent in the first week of life. Prolonged neonatal jaundice is said to be present if the jaundice persists for longer than 14 days in term infants and 21 days in preterm infants.	新生儿黄疸期延长	新生儿黄疸是指新生儿由于血液中胆红素浓度升高而在皮肤或其他组织中出现黄染。新生儿黄疸影响超过一半的一周龄新生儿。如果黄疸在足月儿持续超过14天或在早产儿持续超过21天，则为新生儿黄疸期延长。

骨骼系统异常	HP:0006585	Congenital pseudarthrosis of the clavicle	The two portions of the clavicle (corresponding to the two primary ossification centers of the clavicle) are connected by a fibrous bridge that is contiguous with the periosteum, and a synovial membrane develops, resulting in a clavicle with a  bipartite appearance radiographically. Congenital pseudarthrosis of the clavicle generally presents as a painless mass or swelling over the clavicle.	先天性锁骨假关节病	锁骨（对应于锁骨的两个主骨化中心）的两部分都通过一个纤维桥邻接与骨膜相连，和一个滑膜发展，导致与二分外观X线一个锁骨。锁骨先天性假关节一般表现为无痛性肿块或肿胀锁骨。

乳房异常	HP:0006610	Wide intermamillary distance	A larger than usual distance between the left and right nipple.	乳头间距宽	左右乳头之间距离比通常远。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0006611	Decreased number of sternal ossification centers	A less than normal number of sternal ossification centers. The sternum is initially formed from bilateral sternal plates that chondrify and begin to fuse with ribs at 10 weeks gestational age. Ossification starts in the manubrium and upper part of the sternal body at the 6th month, in the middle of the sternal body at the 7th month, in the lower part of the body during the 1st postnatal year and in the xiphoid process between years 5 and 18. The number of ossification centers vary up to six, and it is the ossification centers that are visualized by prenatal ultrasound. This term describes a reduction in the number of ossification centers compared with age-related norms.	胸骨骨化中心数量减少	不到正常数量的胸骨骨化中心。胸骨开始从双边胸骨板软骨化，并在10周胎龄时开始与肋骨融合。骨化第6个月在胸骨柄与胸骨体上部开始，第7个月进行到胸骨体中间，出生一年后到胸骨体下部，5-18年后到见图。骨化中心的数量不等，小于六个，通过超声可见。这一属于描述骨化中心较年龄调整规范的下降。

心血管系统异常	HP:0006677	Prolonged QRS complex	Increased time for the complex comprised of the Q wave, R wave, and S wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).. In adults, normal values are 0.06 - 0.10 sec.	QRS波群延长	由心电图（EKG）测量所得的由Q波，R波和S波组成的复合波的时间过长，成年人的正常的数值是0.06 - 0.10秒。
心血管系统异常	HP:0006679	Granulomatous coronary arteritis	Inflammation of the coronary arteries involving a granulomatous response, i.e., a non-specific inflammatory response involving granulomas, defined as a compact organized collection of mature mononuclear phagocytes including epithelioid and giant cells.	肉芽肿性冠状动脉炎	涉及肉芽肿反应的冠状动脉炎症，即涉及肉芽肿的非特异性炎症反应，肉芽肿定义为包括上皮状的细胞和巨细胞的成熟单核吞噬细胞紧凑有机聚集。
心血管系统异常	HP:0006681	Absent atrioventricular node	Absence of atrioventricular node，which is a small nodular mass of specialized muscle fibers located in the interatrial septum near the opening of the coronary sinus. It gives rise to the atrioventricular bundle of the conduction system of the heart. a section of nodal tissue that lies on the right side of the partition that divides the atria, near the bottom of the right atrium.	房室结缺失	房室结是一小块结节性特化肌纤维，位于房间隔内，靠近冠状窦开口处，其功能是将心脏传导系统的冲动传给房室束。它的缺失即房室结缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0006682	Ventricular extrasystoles	Ventricular extrasystoles or premature ventricular contractions (PVC) are premature contractions of the heart that arise in response to an impulse in the ventricles rather than the normal impulse from the sinoatrial (SA) node.	室性期外收缩	室性期外收缩或室性早搏（PVC）是心脏响应了一个心室脉冲而不是从窦房（SA）结的正常脉冲从而提前收缩。

神经系统异常	HP:0006988	Alobar holoprosencephaly	A type of holoprosencephaly characterized by the presence of a single ventricle and no separation of the cerebral hemisphere. The single midline ventricle is often greatly enlarged.	无脑叶畸形	一种无脑叶畸形，其特征为单个脑室和大脑半球无分离的存在。单一中线脑室往往明显扩大。
神经系统异常	HP:0006989	Dysplastic corpus callosum	Dysplasia and dysgenesis of the corpus callosum are nonspecific descriptions that imply defective development of the corpus callosum. The term dysplasia is applied when the morphology of the corpus callosum is altered as a congenital trait. For instance, the corpus callosum may be hump-shaped, kinked, or a striped corpus callosum that lacks an anatomically distinct genu and splenium.	胼胝体发育不全	胼胝体发育不全是胼胝体发育不良的非特异性描述。胼胝体的形态为先天性因素所致时使用此术语。例如，胼胝体可以是驼峰形的，弯曲的，或有条纹但缺乏解剖学上截然不同的膝部和压部。

神经系统异常	HP:0007002	Motor axonal neuropathy	Progressive impairment of function of motor axons with muscle weakness, atrophy, and cramps. The deficits are length-dependent, meaning that muscles innervated by the longest nerves are affected first, so that for instance the arms are affected at a later age than the onset of deficits involving the lower leg.	运动轴索性神经病	进行性运动轴索功能障碍伴有肌无力、肌萎缩和痉挛。这种障碍是长度依赖性的，这意味着由最长的神经支配的肌肉首先受累，比如上肢的受累要晚于下肢。

神经系统异常	HP:0007018	Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder	Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) manifests at age 2-3 years or by first grade at the latest. The main symptoms are distractibility, impulsivity, hyperactivity, and often trouble organizing tasks and projects, difficulty going to sleep, and social problems from being aggressive, loud, or impatient.	注意力缺陷多动障碍	注意缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）临床表现出现在2 - 3岁，最晚出现在一年级。主要症状是注意力涣散、冲动、多动、经常扰乱组织任务和项目、难以入睡，并且由于其进攻性、嘈乱、或耐心不足导致社会问题。

神经系统异常	HP:0007165	Periventricular gray matter heterotopia	A form of gray matter heterotopia were the mislocalized gray matter is typically located periventricularly, also sometimes called subependymal heterotopia. Periventricular means beside the ventricles. This is by far the most common location for heterotopia. Subependymal heterotopia present in a wide array of variations. There can be a small single node or a large number of nodes, can exist on either or both sides of the brain at any point along the higher ventricle margins, can be small or large, single or multiple, and can form a small node or a large wavy or curved mass.	脑室周围灰质异位	灰质异位的一种形式是错位的灰质物质通常位于脑室周围，有时也被称为亚底膜异位症。脑室周围是指脑室旁边。这是迄今为止异位症最常见的地方。子宫内膜异位症存在着广泛的变异。可以有一个小的单节点或大量的节点，可以在脑的任一侧或两侧存在于沿着较高脑室边缘的任何点，可以是小的或大的，单个或多个，并且可以形成小节点或一个大的波浪或弯曲的质量。

神经系统异常	HP:0007376	Abnormality of the choroid plexus	An abnormality of the `choroid plexus` (FMA:61934), which is the area in the cerebral ventricles in which cerebrospinal fluid is produced by modified ependymal cells.	脉络丛异常	`脉络从`（FMA:61934）的异常。脉络丛是在脑室中产生脑脊液的部分，脑脊液由其中的室管膜细胞产生。
神经系统异常	HP:0007377	Abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials	An abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials (SSEP), i.e., of the electrical signals of sensation going from the body to the brain in response to a defined stimulus. Recording electrodes are placed over the scalp, spine, and peripheral nerves proximal to the stimulation site. Clinical studies generally use electrical stimulation of peripheral nerves to elicit potentials. SSEP testing determines whether peripheral sensory nerves are able to transmit sensory information like pain, temperature, and touch to the brain. Abnormal SSEPs can result from dysfunction at the level of the peripheral nerve, plexus, spinal root, spinal cord, brain stem, thalamocortical projections, or primary somatosensory cortex.	体感诱发电位异常	异常的体感诱发电位（SSEP），即躯体对特定刺激产生的传递到脑的电信号。记录电极放置在头皮、脊柱、和外周神经刺激部位的近端。临床研究一般采用外周神经电刺激引出电位波形。SSEP检测可以确定外周感觉神经是否能够向大脑传递感觉信息如疼痛、温度和触觉。SSEPs异常可定位于不同水平，如外周神经、神经丛、神经根、脊髓、脑干、丘脑皮层投射，或初级躯体感觉皮层。

In the subsequent months, erythema and blistering improves but patients go on to develop hyperkeratotic scaling that is especially prominent along the joint flexures, neck, hands and feet.	先天性大疱性鱼鳞病样红皮病	一种鱼鳞病样皮肤发育不良，表现为在出生时或出生后不久出现的广泛分布的红斑、水疱、糜烂和脱皮。在随后的几个月，红斑和水泡改善，但同时会出现角化过度性鳞屑，尤其是关节屈曲部位、颈部以及手足部位。

体壁的异常	HP:0007479	Congenital nonbullous ichthyosiform erythroderma	The term collodion baby applies to newborns who appear to have an extra layer of skin (known as a collodion membrane) that has a collodion-like quality. It is a descriptive term, not a specific diagnosis or disorder (as such, it is a syndrome). Affected babies are born in a collodion membrane, a shiny waxy outer layer to the skin. This is shed 10-14 days after birth, revealing the main symptom of the disease, extensive scaling of the skin caused by hyperkeratosis. With increasing age, the scaling tends to be concentrated around joints in areas such as the groin, the armpits, the inside of the elbow and the neck. The scales often tile the skin and may resemble fish scales.	鱼鳞病样红皮病(大疱型)、大疱性鱼鳞病样角化过度症、显性遗传性先天性鱼鳞病、表皮松解性角化过度鱼鳞病	火棉胶样婴儿指新生儿皮肤表层附着类火胶棉样物质（称火胶棉层），这只是一个描述性术语（如综合征），而非特异性的诊断或疾病。患儿出生时皮肤呈光泽蜡质外观，出生后10-14天皮肤表层大面积角化过度并发生脱落，是该病的一个特征。随着生长，皮肤脱屑主要发生在关节周围区域，如腹股沟、腋窝、肘窝、颈部。鳞屑如瓦片状覆盖皮肤，似鱼鳞样外观。

The lesions generally occur symmetrically along the top of the foot and on the legs, appearing more rarely on the arms, forearms, palms, and soles, and even on the oral mucosa.	持久性豆状角化过度病	持久性豆状角化过度病（HLP），又名Flegel病，是一种角化不良性疾病，主要特征为针头大小的红色丘疹，刮除表面可见点状出血，不伴其他症状。皮疹一般对称性发生在足背和小腿，较罕见于上肢、前肢和掌跖部位，口腔黏膜更少见。

Histologically, the cornea shows a uniform deposition of hyaline material.	颗粒状角膜营养不良	角膜的基质中央出现细小、白浊、粒状病变。这种类型的角膜营养不良通常是无症状的，开始于儿童期，进展缓慢。随着病变进展，角膜上皮和Bowman层可能被累及。组织学上，角膜出现透明质的均匀沉积。

Thus, the maximum distance between the fissures is offset from, and medial to, the center point.	杏仁状睑裂	上眼睑呈向下的拱形，下眼睑呈向上的拱形，偏向内侧眼角，这使眼睑的裂开轮廓呈一种杏仁形状。因此，裂缝间的最大距离是从中心点偏移至靠内侧。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0008321	Reduced factor X activity	Reduced activity of `coagulation factor X` (PR:000007294). The extrinsic and intrinsic pathways converge at factor X (fX). The extrinsic pathway activates fX by means of d factor VII with its cofactor, tissue factor. The intrinsic pathway activates fX by means of the tenase complex (Ca2+ and factors VIIIa, IXa and X) on the surface of activated platelets. Factor Xa in turn activates prothrombin (factor II) to thrombin (factor IIa).	#####	`凝血因子X`（PR:000007294）的活性下降。外源和内源途径在凝血因子X（FX）会合。外源性途径通过D- VII因子及其辅因子（组织因子）激活X因子。内源途径由活化的血小板的表面上的tenase复合物（Ca 2+和VIIIa，Ⅸa和X因子）的共同作用激活X因子。 Xa因子此后激活凝血酶原（II因子）生成凝血酶（IIa因子）。

The adherent platelets then release granules that lead to platelet activation and aggregation.	血小板粘附障碍	凝血细胞粘附的异常。通常在血管内皮下膜损伤数秒以内，血小板通过由糖蛋白Ⅰa和Ⅱa和GPVI构成的受体粘附于胶原蛋白，通过GPIb/ IX / V受体粘附于vWF因子。粘附的血小板然后释放颗粒，导致血小板激活和聚集。

耳部异常	HP:0008629	Pulsatile tinnitus	Pulsatile tinnitus is generally classified a kind of objective tinnitus, meaning that it is not only audible to the patient but also to the examiner on auscultation of the auditory canal and/or of surrounding structures with use of an auscultation tube or stethoscope. Usually, pulsatile tinnitus is heard as a lower pitched thumping or booming, a rougher blowing sound which is coincidental with respiration, or as a clicking, higher pitched rhythmic sensation. Pulsatile tinnitus may be associated with vascular abnormalities such as arterioevenous shunts or glomus tumors or the jugular vein, arterial bruits related to a high-riding carotid artery (close to the auditory areas) or carotid stenosis, or venous abnormalities such as a dehiscent jugular bulb or to hypertension. Finally, in some patients, mechanical abnormalities such a spatulous eustachian tubes, palatomyoclonus (small spasms of muscles in the soft palate area), or idiopathic stapedial muscle spasm may represent the underlying cause of pulsatile tinnitus.	搏动性耳鸣	搏动性耳鸣通常被分类为客观性耳鸣，意味着不仅是病人可听及耳鸣声音，检查者应用听诊管或听诊器对耳道和/或其周围结构进行听诊时亦可听及。搏动性耳鸣一般为低的重击声或者隆隆声，粗糙的与呼吸一致的吹风声，或者为较高音调的有节奏感的敲击声。搏动性耳鸣可能与血管异常相关，如动静脉分流、颈静脉球体瘤，高位颈动脉（近听觉区域）相关的动脉杂音或颈动脉狭窄，或静脉异常如颈静脉球开裂或高血压。最后，在一些患者中，机械异常如咽鼓管扩张、腭肌阵挛（软腭区域肌肉小痉挛）或特发性镫骨肌痉挛也可能是搏动性耳鸣的根本原因。

生长异常	HP:0008848	Moderately short stature	A moderate degree of short stature, more than -3 SD but not more than -4 SD from mean corrected for age and sex.	中度身材矮小	中等程度身材矮小，身高位于同年龄同性别平均身高下负3-4标准差之间。
生长异常	HP:0008850	Severe postnatal growth retardation	Severely slow or limited growth after birth, being four standard deviations or more below age- and sex-related norms.	严重的产后生长发育迟缓	严重的产后生长迟缓或受限，位于同年龄同性别标准下超过负4标准差。
生长异常	HP:0008855	Moderate postnatal growth retardation	A moderate degree of slow or limited growth after birth, being between three and four standard deviations below age- and sex-related norms.	中度产后发育迟缓	中等程度的产后生长迟缓或受限，位于同年龄同性别标准下负3-4标准差之间。

肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009185	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger	Proximal interphalangeal (PIP) flexion deformity of the little finger. That is, the PIP joint of a little finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	小手指的近端指间关节挛缩	小指近端指间（PIP）屈曲畸形。即，小指的PIP关节弯曲（挠曲），不能主动或被动地拉直。因此由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化阻遏正常运动，发生关节运动的慢性损失，。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009250	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger.	无名指的末节指骨骨骺缺失	无名指的末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009251	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	无名指末节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009252	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	无名指的末节指骨锥形骨骺	无名指的末节指骨无名指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端出现明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009253	Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	无名指末节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第4手指的末节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009256	Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger	Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	无名指末节指骨乳白色骨骺	无名指的末节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。

肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009276	Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger	Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. That is, the PIP joint of a fourth finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.	无名指的近端指间关节挛缩	由于在非骨组织结构变化第四手指的近端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失。即，第四手指的近端指指关节关节弯曲（屈曲），不能被主动或被动地伸直。由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化导致关节运动的慢性损失，阻遏正常运动。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009309	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 4th finger	Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 4th (ring) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	无名指三角形中节指骨	无名指的中节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009311	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger is affected.	子弹形的无名指近节指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果第四手指的近节指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的无名指近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009312	Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger.	第四手指的近节指骨的溶骨性缺陷	第四手指的近节指骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009313	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the fourth finger.	第四手指的近节指骨的斑片状硬化	无名指的近节指骨骨密度不均匀的（不规则）增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009314	Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger with another bone.	无名指的近节指关节粘连	无名指近端指骨与其他骨融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009315	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th finger	Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 4th (ring) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.	无名指三角形近节指骨	无名指的近节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009316	Abnormality of the phalanges of the 3rd finger	Abnormality of the phalanges of the 3rd (middle) finger.	中指指骨异常	中指的指骨异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009317	Deviation of the 3rd finger	Displacement of the 3rd finger from its normal position.	中指偏离	中指从正常位置偏移。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009318	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 3rd finger	A small/hypoplastic or absent/aplastic 3rd (middle) finger.	中指不发育或发育低下	中指小/发育不全或缺如/不发育。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009319	Joint contracture of the 3rd finger	Chronic loss of joint motion in the 3rd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 3rd finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.	中指关节挛缩	由于中指非骨性组织结构性的改变导致关节慢性功能丧失。如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响则称为先天性指屈曲用于。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009320	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger	Abnormality of one or all of the epiphyses of the proximal, middle, and distal phalanges of the 3rd finger.	中指骨骺异常	中指的近端、中间和远端指骨的一个或全部骨骺异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009321	Absent epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger.	中指中节指骨骨骺缺失	中指中节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009322	Bracket epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	中指中节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009323	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	中指中节指骨的锥形骨骺	中指的中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端出现明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009388	Ivory epiphyses of the 5th finger	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 5th finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	小手指乳白色骨骺	小指骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009389	Pseudoepiphyses of the 5th finger	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	第五手指假骺	假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的二次骨化中心。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009390	Small epiphyses of the 5th finger	Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.	小手指的小骨骺	小手指的骨骺尺寸相对于年龄异常减小。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009391	Stippling of the epiphyses of the 5th finger	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the 5th finger.	小指骨骺点状钙化	小指骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009392	Triangular epiphyses of the 5th finger	A triangular appearance of the epiphyses of the 5th finger of the hand.	小指三角形骨骺	小手指的骨骺呈三角形外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009393	Absent epiphyses of the 4th finger	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the 4th finger.	无名指骨骺缺失	无名指的一个或多个骨骺缺失。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009394	Bracket epiphyses of the 4th finger	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	第四手指括号型骨骺	支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端的异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009395	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the 4th finger	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the 4th finger of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	无名指的锥形骨骺	无名指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。

An abnormality of the hairline can refer to an unusually low or high border between areas of the scalp with and without hair or to abnormal projections of scalp hair.	发际线异常	发际线是指头发的轮廓边界。发际线的异常可以指在有无头发生长区域之间的边界不寻常的低或高，也可指头发异常生长。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009608	Complete duplication of proximal phalanx of the thumb	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的完全重复	拇指近节指骨的完全重复。 X射线显示两个独立的指骨分别出现在两侧。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009611	Bifid distal phalanx of the thumb	Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones.	拇指末节指骨部分重复	拇指末节指骨部分重复。根据不同的严重程度， X射线上可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合）到两个指骨的部分融合不等。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009612	Duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Complete or partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side.	拇指末节指骨重复	拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009613	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Complete or partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨重复	拇指近节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009614	Bifid proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is partially duplicated. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨不完全重复	该术语用于拇指近节指骨部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合）到两个指骨的部分融合不等。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009615	Complete duplication of the first metacarpal	Complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨完全重复	`第一掌骨`完全重复（FMA:23899）。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009618	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨畸形	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009622	Distally placed thumb	Insertion of thumb at a more distal location than normal.	拇指远置	拇指的发出位置比正常位置更远。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009623	Proximal placement of thumb	`Proximal mislocalization` (PATO:0002179) of the `thumb` (FMA:24938).	拇指近置	`拇指`（FMA:24938）的`近端错置`（PATO:0002179）。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009624	Contractures of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the carpometacarpal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is formed by the first metacarpal and the trapezial bone and is also called Articulatio carpometacarpalis pollicis, carpometacarpal articulation of thumb, carpometacarpal joint of thumb or first carpometacarpal articulation. Seldom referred to as thumb saddle joint.	拇指腕掌关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。腕掌关节由第一掌骨和大多角骨形成，也被称为Articulatio carpometacarpalis pollicis，拇指的腕掌关节，或第一腕掌关节。少部分情况指拇指鞍状关节。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009625	Contractures of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis.	拇指掌指关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。这关节也被称为Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009626	Contractures of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb	Chronic loss of joint motion of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. This joint is also called Articulatio interphalangealis pollicis.	拇指指间关节挛缩	由于非骨组织的结构变化导致拇指腕掌关节关节运动的慢性损失。这关节也被称为Articulatio metacarpophalangealis pollicis。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009629	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is either small/hypoplastic or absent. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨不发育或发育低下	该术语用于拇指近节指骨小/发育不全或缺如。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009630	Broad proximal phalanx of the thumb	Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨变宽	拇指近节指骨宽度增加。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009631	Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the thumb	Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is affected.	子弹形的近节拇指指骨	子弹形指骨是指指骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。如果拇指近端指骨受到影响则称为子弹形的近节拇指指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009632	Curved proximal phalanx of the thumb	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨弯曲	拇指近节指骨偏离正常直线形分布。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009633	Osteolytic defect of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨的溶骨性缺陷	拇指近节指骨骨组织的退化或溶解。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009634	Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	An uneven increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指近节指骨的斑片状硬化	拇指的近端指骨骨密度不均匀增加。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009663	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	This term applies if the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, which is located at the proximal end of the phalanx, does not appear in concordance with gender and age dependant norms as seen on x-rays. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺异常	本术语适用于拇指近节指骨骨骺在X光片上出现与性别和年龄依赖性标准不同的形态异常。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009664	Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺缺失	拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009665	Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.	拇指近节指骨括号型骨骺	骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009666	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨的锥形骨骺	拇指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指的近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009672	Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.	拇指近节指骨小骨骺	相对于年龄依赖的骨骺的大小标准，拇指近端指骨的近侧相骨骺异常小。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009673	Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化	拇指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009674	Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb	A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指近节指骨三角形骨骺	拇指近节指骨骨骺的呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，几乎是扁平的。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009675	Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb.	拇指末节指骨骨骺缺失	拇指末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009676	Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. 肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009677	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity &#39;angel-shaped&#39; epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.	拇指末节指骨锥形骨骺	拇指末节指骨锥形样骨骺，具有“球-窝&#39;样。这样的骨骺位于指骨的近端，接近扁平。与此相联的&#39;天使形“骨骺是指在指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺结合一个假骨骺。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009700	Synostosis involving bones of the fingers	An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the fingers. The synonymous term &quot;symphalangism of the hand&quot; may be translated as fusions of bones of varying digree, that involve at least one phalangeal bone of the hand. If bony fusions are revered to as &quot;Symphalangism&quot; the fusion occurs in a proximo-distal axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a radio-ulnar axis are refered to as &quot;bony&quot; Syndactyly.	手指骨骼的骨性融合	手指的骨骼或部分骨骼之间的不正常连合。同义词“手关节粘连”可被译为不同程度的骨性融合，至少要累及手的一个指骨。如果将骨性融合称为“关节粘连”，融合应该发生在近-远轴。发生在桡-尺轴的手指骨头融合称为并指。

In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2 to 5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨的骨性连合	第一掌骨与其他骨融合。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

They have been called &quot;retinal angiomas&quot; and &quot;retinal hemangiomas&quot; but hemangioblastoma is the preferred term since they are histologically identical to lesions found in the CNS.	视网膜血管母细胞瘤	视网膜血管母细胞瘤是视网膜良性血管瘤，没有任何瘤形成特性。他们被称为“视网膜血管瘤”和“视网膜血管瘤”，但血管母细胞瘤是首选的术语，因为它们在组织学上相同的病变在中枢神经系统中。

肿瘤,神经系统异常	HP:0009717	Cortical tubers	Cortical tubers in the brain are hamartomatous lesions typically located at the gray-white matter interface, commonly in the frontal and parietal lobes. Cortical tubers are composed of abnormal glial and neural cells, and the size, number, and location vary among patients.	皮质结节	大脑皮质结节是错构瘤性病变，典型病灶位于灰白质交界区，通常位于额叶和顶叶。皮质结节由异常的神经胶质和神经细胞组成，不同患者中皮质结节的大小，数量，和位置差异很大。
肿瘤,神经系统异常	HP:0009718	Subependymal giant-cell astrocytoma	A demarcated, largely intraventricular tumor in the region of the foramen of Monro composed of spindle to large plump or ganglion-like cells with eosinophilic to amphophilic cytoplasm and somewhat pleomorphic nuclei with occasional prominent nucleoli. These tumors are almost always associated with tuberous sclerosis.	室管膜下巨细胞星形细胞瘤	界限清楚的、主要位于脑室内Moron孔区的肿瘤，主要由纺锤形、大而饱满或神经节细胞样嗜酸性或嗜两性细胞质并且有少许多形核，偶见显著的核仁。这些肿瘤几乎总是与结节性硬化相关。

White ash leaf-shaped macules are considered to be characteristic of tuberous sclerosis.	色素脱失斑	色素脱失斑（“灰叶斑”）是由皮肤色素减退或脱失造成的白色或浅色的斑片，可发生于全身任何部位。灰白树叶形色素脱失斑是结节性硬化症的皮损特征。

Connective tissue naevi are uncommon skin lesions that occur when the deeper layers of the skin do not develop correctly or the components of these layers occur in the wrong proportion. Shagreen patches are oval-shaped and nevoid, skin-colored or occasionally pigmented, smooth or crinkled, The word shagreen refers to a type of roughened untanned leather.	鲨鱼皮样斑	结缔组织痣的特征性斑块。结缔组织痣是一种罕见皮损，由深层皮肤的不正常发育或者皮层构成错误比例所致。鲨鱼皮斑呈椭圆形痣样，可表现为正常肤色或偶见色素沉着，表面光滑或有皱纹，鲨鱼皮一词指一种粗糙未经加工的皮革。

Constrictive amniotic bands are the result of primary amniotic rupture, which can lead to entanglement of fetal tissue (especially limbs) in fibrous amniotic strands.	羊膜带狭窄环	缩窄的羊膜缠绕胎儿手指/脚趾、四肢或躯干，造成先天性缺陷（如宫内截肢）并与多种疾病相关。羊膜束带由部分羊膜脱落，纤维性羊膜带缠绕胎儿组织（尤其是四肢）造成。
