头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009796	Branchial cyst	A branchial cyst is a remnant of embryonic development resulting from a failure of obliteration of a branchial cleft and consists of a subcutaneous cystic mass. Cysts are located anterior or posterior to the ear or in the submandibular region.	鳃裂囊肿	鳃裂囊肿是由鳃裂闭合不成导致的胚胎发育残余，包括皮下囊性包块。囊肿位于耳朵或颌下区的前后。
肿瘤,耳部异常	HP:0009797	Cholesteatoma	Cholesteatoma is a benign but potentially destructive growth consisting of keratinizing epithelium located in the middle ear and/or mastoid process. In cholesteatoma, a skin cyst grows into the middle ear and mastoid. The cyst is not cancerous but can erode tissue and cause destruction of the ear.	胆脂瘤	胆脂瘤是一种位于中耳和/或乳突区含有角化上皮的良性但又有潜在破坏性生长的疾病。在胆脂瘤中，皮肤呈囊肿样长入中耳和乳突。囊肿不具有癌性，但能侵蚀组织，引起耳朵的破坏。

内分泌系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0009800	Maternal diabetes	Maternal diabetes can either be a gestational, mostly type 2 diabetes, or a type 1 diabetes. Essential is the resulting maternal hyperglycemia as a non-specific teratogen, imposing the same risk of congenital malformations to pregnant women with both type 1 and type2 diabetes.	母体糖尿病	母体糖尿病是妊娠期的1型或2型糖尿病，2型最常见。本质是母体高血糖症是一种非特异性的致畸因素，对于孕妇来说不管是1型还是2型糖尿病都产生同样的先天性畸形的风险。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009813	Upper limb phocomelia	Missing or malformed long bones of the upper limbs with the distal parts (the hands) connected to the variably shortened or even absent upper extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the whole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	上肢短肢畸形（海豹肢症）	上肢的长骨缺失或畸形，上肢远端长度不等甚至缺如，外观似海豹肢体，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，其他畸形表现为整个肢体缺如（无肢），或肢远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009814	Upper limb peromelia	`Peromelia` (HP:0009828) affecting only the upper limbs. That is, the distal parts of the arm are missing leading to stump formation.	上肢不全	肢体发育不全只累及上肢。手臂的远端部分缺失形成残肢。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009819	Lower limb phocomelia	`Phocomelia` (HP:0009829) affecting only the lower limbs.	下肢短肢畸形	`短肢畸形`（HP:0009829）只影响下肢。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009820	Lower limb peromelia	`Peromelia` (HP:0009828) affecting only the lower limbs.  That is, the distal parts of the leg are missing leading to stump formation.	下肢发育不全	`发育不全`（HP:0009828）只影响下肢。也就是说，下肢的远端部分缺失导致残端形成。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009821	Forearm undergrowth	Forearm shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the forearm.	前臂发育不良	由于前臂的一个或多个骨骼不发达而造成前臂缩短。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009825	aplasia involving bones of the extremities	#####	四肢骨不发育	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009826	Limb undergrowth	Limb shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the extremities.	肢体发育不全	由于末端的一个或多个骨骼不发达而导致肢体缩短。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009827	Amelia	Congenital absence (aplasia) of one or more limbs.	缺肢	一个或多个肢体的先天性缺如（不发育）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009828	Peromelia	The distal parts of the limbs are missing leading to a stump formation.	四肢不全	四肢的远端部分丢失导致残端形成。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009829	Phocomelia	Missing or malformed long bones of the extremities with the distal parts (such as hands and/or feet) connected to the variably shortened or even absent extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the hole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).	短肢畸形	肢体的长骨缺失或畸形，肢体远端长度不等甚至缺如，外观似海豹肢体，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，其他畸形表现为整个肢体缺失（无肢），或肢体远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。
神经系统异常	HP:0009830	Peripheral neuropathy	Peripheral neuropathy is a general term for any disorder of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903). The main clinical features used to classify peripheral neuropathy are distribution, type (mainly demyelinating versus mainly axonal), duration, and course.	周围神经病	周围神经病是外周神经系统疾病的总称，主要根据其临床特征包括分布、分型（主要累及髓鞘还是轴索）、持续时间、病程而分类的。
神经系统异常	HP:0009831	Mononeuropathy	A focal lesion of a single peripheral nerve. Damage to a sensory nerve is accompanied by sensory impairment of all modalities in the affected anatomic distribution.	单神经病	单一周围神经的局灶病变。损坏感觉神经则伴随受累解剖分布区域所有形式的感觉障碍。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009832	Abnormality of the distal phalanx of finger	Any anomaly of `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指末节指骨异常	手指末节指骨的任何异常。

神经系统异常	HP:0009878	Cerebellar ataxia associated with quadrupedal gait	The presence of cerebellar signs and symptoms such as lack of balance associated with quadrupedal gait (locomotion on all four extremities with a &#39;bear-like&#39; gait with the legs held straight).	小脑性共济失调与四足步态相关	出现小脑的症状和体征，如缺乏平衡与四足步态相关（所有四肢以“熊样”步态运动，腿部保持笔直）。
神经系统异常	HP:0009879	Cortical gyral simplification	An abnormal reduction of the number and complexity of the pattern of gyrations of the cerebral cortex.	皮质脑回简单化	大脑皮层的脑回数目和复杂性异常减少。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009880	Broad distal phalanges of all fingers	Abnormally wide (broad) `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) of all fingers.	所有手指远端指骨变宽	所有手指的`手指远端指骨`（FMA:75818）宽度（宽）异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009881	aplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand	#####	手末节指骨的不发育	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009882	Short distal phalanx of finger	Short distance from the end of the finger to the most distal interphalangeal crease or the distal interphalangeal joint flexion point. That is, hypoplasia of one or more of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).	手指短末节指骨	从手指的末端到最远端指间折痕或远端指间关节屈曲点的距离短。即 `一个或多个手指远节指骨`（FMA:75818）发育不全。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009883	Duplication of the distal phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	手末节指骨重复	如果手的一个或多个远端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或裂成两半的外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009884	Tapered distal phalanges of finger	A reduction in diameter of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) towards the distal end.	手指的远端指骨逐渐变小	手指末节指骨的直径向远端逐渐减小。
体壁的异常	HP:0009886	Trichorrhexis nodosa	Trichorrhexis nodosa is the formation of nodes along the hair shaft through which breakage readily occurs. It is thus a focal defect in the hair fiber that is characterized by thickening or weak points (nodes) that cause the hair to break off easily. The result is defective, abnormally fragile hair.	结节性脆发症	结节性脆发症是指沿着发干形成的容易断裂的节点。它是一种局限性毛发纤维性疾病，因某些增厚或者薄弱的结节部位较为容易折断，而表现出发育异常的脆发。
体壁的异常	HP:0009887	Abnormality of hair pigmentation	An abnormality of hair pigmentation (color).	毛发着色异常	毛发色素颜色的异常。
体壁的异常	HP:0009888	Abnormality of secondary sexual hair	Abnormality of the growth of secondary sexual hair, which normally ensues during puberty. In males, secondary sexual hair usually comprises body hair, including underarm, abdominal, chest, and pubic hair. In females, secondary sexual hair usually comprises a lesser degree of body hair, most prominently underarm and pubic hair.	第二性征毛发异常	第二性征毛发的异常生长，通常在青春期出现。男性第二性征毛发通常指体毛，包括腋下、腹部、胸部的体毛和阴毛。而女性，第二性征体毛的异常程度较轻，最显著的是腋下和阴毛。
体壁的异常	HP:0009889	Localized hirsutism	Abnormally increased hair growth with a localized distribution.	局部多毛症	局部毛发异常增多。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0009890	High anterior hairline	Distance between the hairline (trichion) and the glabella (the most prominent point on the frontal bone above the root of the nose), in the midline, more than two SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased distance between the hairline and the glabella.	前发际高	在中线处，发际线和眉间（上额骨上方鼻根的最突出点）之间的距离比平均值高两个标准差。也可以理解为发际线和眉间之间的距离显得较宽。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009891	Underdeveloped supraorbital ridges	Flatness of the supraorbital portion of the frontal bones.	眶上脊发育不良	额骨眼眶上部扁平。
耳部异常	HP:0009892	Anotia	Complete absence of any auricular structures.	无耳畸形	耳结构完全缺失。

骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	HP:0009895	Abnormality of the crus of the helix	An abnormality of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024), which is the horizontal piece of cartilage located outside the ear canal that divides the upper and lower parts of the ear.	耳轮脚异常	耳轮脚的一种异常，在外耳道水平软骨将耳朵分为上下两部。
耳部异常	HP:0009896	Abnormality of the antitragus	An abnormality of the antitragus, which is a small tubercle opposite to the tragus of the ear. The antitragus and the tragus are separated by the intertragic notch.	对耳屏异常	对耳屏异常，是指耳朵上出现一个小的相反的耳屏结节。对耳屏和耳屏是由耳屏间切迹分隔开的。
骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	HP:0009897	Horizontal crus of helix	An abnormal `horizontal` (PATO:0001855) axis orientation of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, the main axis of the crus of the helix is perpendicular to the medial longitudinal axis of the ear, instead of sloping inferoposteriorly.	耳轮脚横向	“耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)呈异常的“横向位轴”(PATO:0001855)，即耳轮脚的主轴垂直于耳朵纵轴，不是倾斜于后下方。
骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	HP:0009898	Underdeveloped crus of the helix	Developmental hypoplasia of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, flatter and/or shorter crus helix than average.	耳轮脚发育不良	“耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)的发育不全，即，较平均水平而言，耳轮脚变平及/或变短。
骨骼系统异常,耳部异常	HP:0009899	Prominent crus of helix	The presence of an abnormally `prominent` (PATO:0001482) of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, development of the crus helix to the same degree as an average antihelix stem or helix.	耳轮脚突出	耳轮脚（FMA:61024）存在异常突出（PATO:0001482），即耳轮脚的发育与对耳轮干或耳轮的平均程度相当。
耳部异常	HP:0009900	Unilateral deafness	A `unilateral` (PATO:0000634) `absence` (PATO:0000462) of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).	单侧耳聋	“单侧”（PATO: 0000634）“声音感知”（GO: 0007605）的“缺失”（PATO: 0000462）。
耳部异常	HP:0009901	Crumpled ear	Distortion of the course of the normal folds of the ear and the appearance of supernumerary crura and folds.	皱耳	外耳皱褶走向的异常性扭曲及额外皱褶的出现。
耳部异常	HP:0009902	Cleft helix	A `notched` (PATO:0001495) form of the `helix` (FMA:60992) of the ear. That is, a defect in the continuity of the helix, which may occur at any point along its length.	耳轮裂	具有“切迹”（PATO: 0001495）形态的“耳轮”(FMA:60992)。即耳轮在连续性上有缺失，可发生在耳轮全长中的任何一点上。

耳部异常	HP:0009908	Anterior creases of earlobe	Sharply demarcated, typically linear and approximately horizontal, indentations in the outer surface of the ear lobe.	耳垂前襞	在凹口耳垂的外表面边界清晰，典型的直线和近似水平线。
耳部异常	HP:0009909	Uplifted earlobe	An abnormal orientation of the earlobes such that they point out- and upward. That is, the lateral surface of ear lobe faces superiorly.	耳垂方向异常	耳垂走向异常性向外上方，使耳垂平面朝向发生改变。

骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009911	Abnormality of the temporal bone	Abnormality of the temporal bone of the skull, which is situated at the sides and base of the skull roughly underlying the region of the face known as the temple.	颞骨异常	颞骨（位于颅骨两侧并延至颅底称为“颞”的面部部位）的异常。

头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	HP:0009914	Cyclopia	Cyclopia is a congenital abnormality in which there is only one eye. That eye is centrally placed in the area normally occupied by the root of the nose.	独眼	独眼是只有一个眼睛的先天性异常。该眼位于正中通常由鼻根占据的区域。
眼部异常	HP:0009915	Corneal asymmetry	The presence of a size difference between the left and right cornea.	角膜不对称	左侧和右侧角膜大小不一。
眼部异常	HP:0009916	Anisocoria	Anisocoria, or unequal pupil size, may represent a benign physiologic variant or a manifestation of disease.	瞳孔不等	瞳孔不等，或瞳孔大小不等，可以是一种良性的生理异形或是一种疾病的表现。

肿瘤,眼部异常	HP:0009919	Retinoblastoma	A tumor of the eye originating from cells of the retina.	视网膜母细胞瘤	眼睛的视网膜细胞起源的肿瘤。
体壁的异常	HP:0009920	Nevus of Ota	A macular lesion on the side of the face, involving the conjunctiva and eyelids, as well as the adjacent facial skin, sclera, oculomotor muscles, and perisoteum. Histological features vary from those of a Mongoloian spot to those of a blue nevus.	上腭部褐青色痣、眼皮肤黑素细胞增生病	呈面部一侧的色素性损害，可累及结膜、眼睑以及邻近的皮肤、巩膜、眼球运动肌和鼻口腔的粘膜，组织学特征表现各异，可同蒙古斑到蓝痣不等。
眼部异常	HP:0009921	Duane anomaly	Duane anomaly is a congenital eye movement impairment with limitation of the ability to adduct or abduct the eye. When affected eyes are adducted (moved inwards towards the nose), the eyeball retracts and the palpebral fissure narrows.	Duane 异常	杜安异常是一种遗传性眼球运动障碍，表现为眼球内收受限。当患者的眼睛内收时（向鼻子方向内移），眼球后缩及睑裂变窄。
眼部异常	HP:0009922	Persistence of the hyaloid artery	Persistence of the hyaloid artery, which is the embryonic artery that runs from the optic disk to the posterior lens capsule may persist; the site of attachment may form an opacity. The hyaloid artery is a branch of the ophthalmic artery, and usually regresses completely before birth.	玻璃体动脉永存症	玻璃体动脉持续存在，这是一个从视盘至晶状体后囊的胚胎期动脉，该动脉是眼动脉的分支，通常在出生前完全消退。出生后若存在该动脉，连接部位可能不透明。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009924	aplasia/Hypoplasia involving the nose	Underdevelopment or absence of the nose or parts thereof.	鼻发育不全／未发育	发育不全或不存在的鼻子或其部分。
眼部异常	HP:0009926	Increased lacrimation	Abnormally increased lacrimation, that is, excessive tearing (watering eye).	泪液分泌增加	泪液分泌异常增加，即过度流泪（浇水眼）。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009927	aplasia of the nose	Complete absence of all nasal structures.	鼻发育不全	完全没有全部鼻结构。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009928	Thick nasal alae	Increase in bulk of the ala nasi.	鼻翼增厚	鼻翼的体积明显增加。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009930	Asymmetry of the nares	Asymmetry or size difference between the left and right nostril.	鼻孔不对称	左和右鼻孔之间不对称或大小不同。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009931	Enlarged naris	Increased aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).	鼻孔增大	鼻孔变大。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009933	Narrow naris	Slender, slit-like aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).	鼻孔狭窄	鼻孔开口细窄，像缝隙。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009934	Supernumerary naris	The presence of more than two nostrils.	鼻孔多余畸形	多于两个鼻孔的存在。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009935	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the nasal septum	Absence or underdevelopment of the nasal septum.	鼻中隔发育不全／未发育	没有或发育不全的鼻鼻中隔。

体壁的异常	HP:0009937	Facial hirsutism	Excess facial hair.	面部多毛症	面部毛发生长过多，超过正常生理范围。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009938	Sunken cheeks	Lack or loss of the soft tissues between the zygomata and mandible.	脸颊凹陷	颧骨和颌骨之间的软组织减少或缺失。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009939	Mandibular aplasia	Absence of the mandible.	下颌骨发育不全	没有下颌骨。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009940	Asymmetry of the mandible	Lack of symmetry between the left and right `mandible` (FMA:52748).	下颌骨不对称	左右下颌骨之间缺乏对称性。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0009941	Asymmetry of the mouth	The presence of an `asymmetric` (PATO:0000616) `mouth` (FMA:49184).	嘴不对称	有一个不对称的嘴。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009942	Duplication of thumb phalanx	Complete or partial duplication of the phalanges of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones (bifid), two separate bones appearing side to side, or completely duplicated phalanges (proximal and distal phalanx of the thumb and/or 1st metacarpal). In contrast to the phalanges of the digits 2-5 (proximal, middle and distal), the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	拇指重复	拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧，或者完全重复（近端和远端拇指指骨和/或第1掌骨）。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009943	Complete duplication of thumb phalanx	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	拇指指骨完全重复	拇指一个或以上指骨完全重复。相对于有不同融合程度的部分骨重复来说，完全重复指X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009944	Partial duplication of thumb phalanx	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	拇指指骨部分重复	部分重复根据病情轻重，可能导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响拇指的一个或多个指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009945	Duplication of phalanx of 2nd finger	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	食指指骨重复	该术语适用于一个或多个的食指指骨的部分重复或者完全重复，部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009946	Polydactyly affecting the 2nd finger	#####	第2指多指	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009947	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).	食指近节指骨重复	食指近节指骨`的&#39;部分或完全复制（FMA:23919）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009948	Duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).	食指末节指骨重复	`食指末节指骨`部分或全部重复(FMA:23946)。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009950	Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger	Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).	食指末节指骨的完全重复	`食指末节指骨`完全重复(FMA:23946)。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009952	Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	Complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).	食指中节指骨的完全重复	食指中节指骨的&#39;的完全重复。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009953	Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger	Partial duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第2手指中节指骨部分重复	`第2指末节指骨`部分重复在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23933)。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009956	Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	第2手指的指骨部分重复	第2手指的指骨部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双裂外观，影响一个第二手指的指骨或更多。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009957	Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	食指的指骨完全重复	完全重复影响一个或以上食指的指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009996	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger	Partial or complete duplication of the `fifth proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23922), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.	第五手指近节指骨部分重复	`第5指近节指骨`部分重复，在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23922)。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009997	Duplication of phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	指骨重复	如果一个或多个手指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009998	Complete duplication of phalanx of hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	指骨完全重复	手指指骨完全重复累及一个或以上手指指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0009999	Partial duplication of the phalanx of hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010000	Complete duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.	手近端指骨完全重复	手近端指骨完全重复影响一个或以上手近端指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010001	Complete duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand.	手末节指骨完全重复	手末节指骨完全重复累及一个或更多手远端指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010002	Complete duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	A complete duplication affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accessory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a pseudoepiphysis (see corresponding terms) sometimes also referred to as hyperphalangism.	手中节指骨完全重复	手中节指骨完全重复累及一个或以上手中节指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010003	Partial duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手近节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个近端指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010004	Partial duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手末节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个远端指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010005	Partial duplication of the middle phalanges of the hand	A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.	手中节指骨部分重复	部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响手的一个或多个中节指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010006	Duplication of the proximal phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	手近节指骨重复	该术语适用于如果一个或多个手近端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010008	Duplication of the middle phalanx of hand	This term applies if one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.	中节指骨重复	手的一个或多个中间指骨发生部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010009	Abnormality of the 1st metacarpal	A structural anomaly of the first metacarpal.	第一掌骨异常	第一掌骨的结构异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010010	Abnormality of the 2nd metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the second metacarpal bone.	第二掌骨异常	第二掌骨的结构或形态异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010011	Abnormality of the 3rd metacarpal	This term means any abnormal structure or form of the third metacarpal bone.	第三掌骨异常	第三掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010012	Abnormality of the 4th metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the fourth metacarpal bone.	第四掌骨异常	第四掌骨任何结构或形态异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010013	Abnormality of the 5th metacarpal	Any abnormal structure or form of the firth metacarpal bone.	第五掌骨异常	第五掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010014	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits). The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end (as seen in the proximal phalanges of the other digits), whereas the epiphyses of the other metacarpal bones are located at the distal end. This term applies if the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal is in any way abnormal, referring to age and gender depending norms, as seen on x-rays.	第一掌骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨）。第一掌骨骨骺位于掌骨近端（如同其它手指的近端指骨所见），而其他掌骨的骨骺位于远端。本术语适用于X光片上第一掌骨骨骺的任何形态异常，其形态标准因年龄和性别不同而异。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010015	Absent epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	#####	第一掌骨骨骺缺失	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010016	Bracket epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	An epiphysis that curves around from its transverse orientation to a longitudinal one from proximal to distal along one side of the phalanx, thus resembling the letter &#39;C&#39; and forming a bracket around the diaphysis. This results in a so called delta phalanx characterized by a triangular or trapezoidal shaped bone with a C-shaped epiphyseal plate.	第一掌骨括号型骨骺	骨骺曲线围绕指骨，从横向起始到沿着单侧从近端到远端的纵向围绕，类似字母“C”和形成围绕骨干的支架。形成delta指骨，以三角形或梯形形状的骨骼伴C形骺板为特征。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010017	Cone-shaped epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance.	第一掌骨锥形骨骺	第一掌骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝&#39;样外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010018	Enlarged epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	第一掌骨骨骺膨大	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺异常增大。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010019	Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal having multiple bony fragments.	第一掌骨骨骺碎裂	第一掌骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010020	Irregular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Uneven radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal.	第1掌骨不规则骨骺	第1掌骨骨骺影像学不透明度不均匀。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010021	Ivory epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	The epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.	第一掌骨乳白色骨骺	第1掌骨骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010022	Pseudoepiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone although an accessory epiphysis may be located at the distal end of the metacarpal.	第一掌骨假骺	第一掌骨骨骺在掌骨的近端，尽管额外骨骺可能位于掌骨的远端。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010023	Small epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	Abnormally small size of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.	第一掌骨小骨骺	相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺尺寸异常小。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010024	Epiphyseal stippling of the first metacarpal	The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).	第一掌骨骨骺点状钙化	第一掌骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010025	Triangular epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal	#####	第一掌骨三角形骨骺	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010026	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the 1st metacarpal	Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 1st metacarpal. In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits).	第一掌骨不发育或发育低下	第一掌骨发育或发育不全。跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌骨胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010027	Broad 1st metacarpal	Increased width of the 1st metacarapal. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨变宽	第一掌骨宽度增加。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010028	Bullet-shaped 1st metacarpal	The presence of short and wide 1st metacarpal which tapers distally (&quot;bullet shaped&quot;).	子弹形的第一掌骨	第一掌骨短而宽并逐渐向远端变小（“子弹形”）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010029	Curved 1st metacarpal	A deviation from the normal straight shape of the first metacarpal.	第一掌骨弯曲	第一掌骨偏离正常直线形分布。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010030	Osteolytic defects of the 1st metacarpal	Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨溶骨性缺陷	第一掌骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010031	Patchy sclerosis of the 1st metacarpal	Uneven increase in bone density within the 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨斑片状硬化	第一掌骨骨密度不均匀增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010033	Triangular shaped 1st metacarpal	This term applies to a triangular shaped 1st metacarpal.	第一掌骨呈三角形	第一掌骨呈三角形。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010034	Short 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第1掌骨短	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010035	aplasia of the 1st metacarpal	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	第一掌骨不发育	跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010049	Short metacarpal	Diminished length of one or more metacarpal bones in relation to the others of the same hand or to the contralateral metacarpal.	短掌骨	相对于相同手的其他掌骨或对侧手的掌骨，一个或多个掌骨的长度减少。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010051	Deviation/Displacement of the hallux	Displacement of the `big toe` (FMA:25047) from its normal position.	脚拇脚偏离/移位	&#39;大拇指`（FMA:25047），偏离正常位置。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010052	Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the big toe is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.	脚拇趾近节趾骨畸形	跟第2-5近端趾骨相比，拇趾的近端趾骨在胚胎学上相当于其脚趾的中间趾骨，而第一跖骨在胚胎学上源自于趾骨，相当于其它脚趾的近节趾骨。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010055	Broad hallux	Visible increase in width of the hallux without an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension.	脚拇趾变宽	拇趾宽度增加而背底尺寸不增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010056	Abnormality of the epiphyses of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾骨骺异常	#####

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010058	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾趾骨不发育或发育低下	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010059	Broad hallux phalanx	An increase in width in one or more phalanges of the big toe.	脚拇趾趾骨变宽	一个或者多个脚拇趾趾骨宽度增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010060	Bullet-shaped hallux phalanx	An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the big toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.	子弹形的脚拇趾趾骨	子弹形脚拇趾趾骨是指一个或者多个脚拇趾趾骨短而宽逐渐向远端变细异常形态。子弹形趾骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010061	Curved hallux phalanx	A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more phalanges of the big toe.	脚拇趾趾骨弯曲	一个或多个脚拇趾趾骨偏离正常的直线形态。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010062	Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the hallux	#####	脚拇趾骨溶骨性缺陷	#####
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010063	Patchy sclerosis of hallux phalanx	Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more phalanges of the big toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	脚拇趾趾骨斑片状硬化	一个或多个脚拇趾趾骨骨密度片状（不规则）增加。在X光片上根据严重程度和分布的不同可以看到多种形式。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010125	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metatarsal	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities of the epiphysis of the first metatarsal bone.	第一跖骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5跖骨相比，第一跖骨胚胎学上来源于趾骨，相当于第2-5趾指的近端趾骨，而拇趾的近端指骨相当于其它趾指的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010126	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux	In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities affecting the proximal phalanx of the hallux.	脚拇趾近节趾骨骨骺异常	跟第2-5跖骨相比，第一跖骨胚胎学上来源于趾骨，相当于第2-5趾指的近端趾骨，而拇趾的近端指骨相当于其它趾指的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。

肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010212	Flexion contracture of the hallux	One or more bent (flexed) joints of the first (big) toe that cannot be straightened actively or passively.	拇趾屈曲挛缩	大脚趾一个或多个关节弯曲，不能被主动或被动地伸直关节。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010213	Contracture of the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux	Chronic loss of joint motion in the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The tarsometatarsal joints of the feet are also called Lisfranc&#39;s joints.	脚拇趾跖跗关节挛缩	拇趾的跖跗关节由于非骨组织结构变化的关节运动慢性损失。脚的跗跖关节也叫Lisfranc关节。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010214	Contracture of the interphalangeal joint of the hallux	The interphalangeal joint of the big toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.	脚拇趾趾间关节挛缩	大脚趾的趾间关节不能主动或被动伸直。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常,结缔组织异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010215	Contractures of the metatarsophalangeal joint of the hallux	The joint between the first metatarsal and the proximal phalanx of the first (big) toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.	脚拇趾跖趾关节挛缩	第一跖骨和第一（大）趾的近端指骨之间的关节不能被主动或被动地伸直。
肢体异常	HP:0010219	Structural foot deformity	A foot deformity resulting due to an abnormality affecting the bones of the foot (as well as muscle and soft tissue). In contrast if only the muscle and soft tissue are affected the term positional foot deformity applies.	足结构性畸形	足部变畸形源自于某种影响了足的骨骼（以及肌肉和软组织）的异常。与此相反，如果仅是受肌肉和软组织影响，则使用足的位置性变形这个术语描述。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010220	Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 2nd metacarpal	Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the second metacarpal bone.	第二掌骨骨骺异常	第二掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010221	Pseudoepiphysis of the 2nd metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the second metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.	第二掌骨假骺	第二掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010227	Pseudoepiphysis of the 5th metacarpal	The normal epiphysis of the fifth metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. 肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010228	Absent epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Absence of one or more epiphyses of the phalanges fingers.	手指骨骨骺缺失	一个或多个手指骨骺缺失。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010229	Bracket epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.	手指骨括号型骨骺	括号骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有括号状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010230	Cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the fingers of the hand, producing a &#39;ball-in-a-socket&#39; appearance. The related entity angel-shaped epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.	手指骨锥形骨骺	手指骨骺呈锥形外观，产生一个“球窝&#39;的外观。在相关的实体&#39;天使形骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺在指骨的前端结合一个假骨骺。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010231	Enlarged epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers with respect to age-dependent norms.	指骨骨骺膨大	手指的指骨骨骺的相对于年龄相关的规范尺寸异常大。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010232	Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.	指骨骨骺碎裂	手指指骨的骨骺呈零散外观。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010233	Irregular epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.	手指骨骨骺不规则	手指的指骨的骨骺在放射线下呈现不透明性。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010234	Ivory epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	指骨乳白色骨骺	手指指骨的骨骺硬化，导致X射线下不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）的程度增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010235	Pseudoepiphyses of the phalanges of the hand	A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.	手指假骨骺	一个假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的次级骨化中心。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010281	Cleft lower lip	A gap in the lower lip.	下唇裂	下唇有间隙。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010282	Thin lower lip vermilion	Height of the vermilion of the medial part of the lower lip more than 2 SD below the mean. 心血管系统异常	HP:0010438	Abnormality of the ventricular septum	An abnormality of the `interventricular septum` (FMA:7133).	室间隔异常	心脏室间隔的异常（FMA:7133）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010440	Ectopic accesory toe-like appendage	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely &#39;normal&#39; digit) is either located postaxial (on the fibular side of the foot, next top the little toe), preaxial (on the tibial side of the foot, next to the big toe) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between big and little toe), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	异位性脚趾样附属物	多趾畸形具有多种形态，即多余的趾（可以是正常或者退化的趾）既可以是轴后位（足的腓骨侧，靠近小脚趾的顶端），轴前位（足的胫骨侧，靠近大脚趾）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大脚趾和小脚趾之间）。与此不同，多余的趾也可以是异位的，即除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010441	Ectopic accesory finger-like appendage	In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely &#39;normal&#39; digit) is either located postaxial (on the ulnar side of the hand, next to the little finger), preaxial (on the radial side of the hand, next to the thumb) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between thumb and little finger), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).	异位性手指样附属物	多指畸形具有多种形态，即多余的指（可以是正常或者退化的指）既可以是轴后位（手的尺侧，靠近小指），轴前位（手的桡侧，靠近大拇指）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大拇指和小指之间）。与此不同，多余的指也可以是异位的，也就是说除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010442	Polydactyly	A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of supernumerary fingers or toes.	多指（趾）畸形	以存在多余的手指或脚趾为特征的先天性畸形。

Might be associated with hip dysplasia on the affected side.	股骨骨裂	X射线上表现为股骨的骨裂或分叉形态（FMA:9611），可能出现大腿或多或少的严重弯曲，该表现可能与患侧髋关节发育不良有关。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010458	Female pseudohermaphroditism	Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In female pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is female (XX) and the gonads are ovaries, but the external genitalia are virilized.	女性假两性畸形	两性畸形是指性腺和外生殖器之间不吻合。女性假两性畸形指基因型是雌性（XX）和性腺是卵巢，但外生殖器男性化。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010459	True hermaphroditism	The presence of both ovarian and testicular tissues either in the same or in opposite gonads. Affected persons have ambiguous genitalia and may have 46,XX or 46,XY karyotypes or 46,XX/XY mosaicism.	真两性畸形	在个体的同一侧或对侧性腺里同时存在卵巢和睾丸组织。受累个体外生殖器不能辨别性别，染色体核型可能为46,XX、46,XY或46,XX/XY嵌合体。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010464	Streak ovary	A developmental disorder characterized by the progressive loss of primordial germ cells in the developing ovaries of an embryo, leading to hypoplastic ovaries composed of wavy connective tissue with occasional clumps of granulosa cells, and frequently mesonephric or hilar cells.	条索状卵巢	一种发育缺陷病，其特点是在胚胎期卵巢发育过程中原始生殖细胞逐渐丢失，导致卵巢发育不全，只有断断续续的（wavy）结缔组织，偶尔有颗粒细胞团块，常常见到中肾或卵巢门细胞（间质细胞）。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010472	Abnormality of the heme biosynthetic pathway	An abnormality in the synthesis or catabolism of heme. Heme is composed of ferrous iron and protoporphyrin IX and is an essential molecule as the prosthetic group of hemeproteins such as hemoglobin, myoglobin, mitochondrial and microsomal cytochromes.	血红素生物合成途径异常	血红素的合成或降解的异常。血红素是由亚铁和原卟啉IX组成的,作为血红素蛋白,例如血红蛋白，肌红蛋白，线粒体和微粒体细胞色素的辅基成分,是一个重要的组分分子。

内分泌系统异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010512	Adrenal calcification	Calcification within the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).	肾上腺钙化	肾上腺内的钙化
神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010513	Pituitary calcification	Deposition of calcium salts in the pituitary gland.	垂体钙化	脑垂体的钙盐沉积。
神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0010514	Hyperpituitarism	Hypersecretion of one or more pituitary hormones. This can occur in conditions in which deficiency in the target organ leads to decreased hormonal feedback, or as a primary condition most usually in connection with a pituitary adenoma.	垂体功能亢进症	一种或多种垂体激素分泌过多。这可能由于靶器官缺陷导致激素反馈减少，或者是由垂体腺瘤引起的垂体原发性病症。
内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0010515	Aplasia/hypoplasia of the thymus	Absence or underdevelopment of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).	胸腺发育缺陷/不全	胸腺不发育、发育缺陷或不全（FMA:9607）。
内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0010516	Thymus hyperplasia	Enlargement of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).	胸腺增生	胸腺的增生肿大（FMA:9607）。
内分泌系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0010517	Ectopic thymus tissue	The presence of ectopic "thymus" (FMA:9607) tissue. Normally, cells of the ventral bud of the third pharyngeal pouch detach and migrate in the eighth gestational week caudally and medially towards the location of the mature thyroid. They migrate further retrosternally into the superior mediastinum. There are two main ways ectopic thymus tissue can develop. Either cells detach along the descensus path and proliferate, thereby forming accessory thymus tissue, or the entire gland fails to descend.	异位胸腺组织	#####
内分泌系统异常	HP:0010518	Thyroglossal cyst	An "abnormality of the thyroid gland" (HP:0000820) owing to the presence of a fibrous "cyst" (MPATH:62) resulting from the persistence of the "thyroglossal duct" (FMA:77274).	甲状舌管囊肿	一种甲状腺（HP:0000820）的异常，由于甲状舌管不闭合导致的囊肿引起的。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010519	Increased fetal movement	An abnormal increase in quantity or strength of fetal movements.	胎动增加	胎动次数或强度异常增加。
神经系统异常	HP:0010521	Gait apraxia	Gait apraxia affecting the ability to make walking movements with the legs.	步态失用	步态失用指指挥腿行走的能力受损。
神经系统异常	HP:0010522	Dyslexia	A learning disorder characterized primarily by difficulties in learning to read and spell. Dyslectic children also exhibit a tendency to read words from right to left and to confuse letters such as b and d whose orientation is important for their identification. Children with dyslexia appear to be impaired in phonemic skills (the ability to associate visual symbols with the sounds they represent).	失读症	学习障碍的一种类型，主要表现为阅读和拼写困难。失读症的儿童还存在从右向左阅读单词的倾向，比如b和d的正确识别取决于阅读方向。并且可能存在音位能力受损（将视觉符号和其所代表的声音联系起来的能力）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010523	Alexia	An acquired type of sensory aphasia where damage to the brain leads to the loss of the ability to read.	失读症	获得性的感觉性失语的一种类型，由于大脑的损伤导致了阅读能力的丧失。
神经系统异常	HP:0010524	Agnosia	Inability to recognize objects not because of sensory deficit but because of the inability to combine components of sensory impressions into a complete pattern. Thus, agnosia is a neurological condition which results in an inability to know, to name, to identify, and to extract meaning from visual, auditory, or tactile impressions.	失认	没有认识物体、对象的能力，这种能力缺乏不是由于感觉障碍，而是因为无法把感官印象的组件组合成一个完整的模式。因此，失认是一种神经源性的没有能力理解、命名、识别、以及从视觉、听觉或触觉印象提取其意义的状态。
神经系统异常	HP:0010525	Finger agnosia	An inability or difficulty differentiating among the fingers of either hand as well as the hands of others.	手指失认	对自己或他人的手指辨别不能或困难。
神经系统异常	HP:0010526	Dysgraphia	A writing disability in the absence of motor or sensory deficits of the upper extremities, resulting in an impairment in the ability to write regardless of the ability to read and not due to intellectual impairment.	书写困难	双上肢无运动或感觉障碍时，存在的与阅读能力不匹配的书写困难，且与智力无关。
神经系统异常	HP:0010527	Astereognosia	Inability to recognize the form of objects by touch without visual input. That is, an impairment in the recognition of objects based only on based on the texture, size, weight and three-dimensional form of the object in the absence of any major somatosensory deficit.	实体觉缺失	在没有视觉输入的情况下不能通过触摸识别物体的形式。也就是说，在没有任何主要的体感缺陷情况下，仅基于物体的纹理、尺寸、重量和三维形状对物体的识别能力的损害。
神经系统异常	HP:0010528	Prosopagnosia	Inability to recognize faces of familair persons.	面孔失认症	不能识别家人的面孔。
神经系统异常	HP:0010529	Echolalia	The tendency to repeat vocalizations made by another person.	模仿性言语	有重复他人发声的倾向。
神经系统异常	HP:0010530	Palatal myoclonus	Palatal myoclonus is characterized by myoclonic (rhythmic involuntary jerky) movements of the soft palate.	腭肌阵挛	腭肌阵挛的特点是软腭的肌阵挛（节奏不自主跳动）动作。
神经系统异常	HP:0010531	Spinal myoclonus	Spinal myoclonus is generally due to a tumor, infection, injury, or degenerative process of the spinal cord, and is characterized by involuntary rhythmic muscle contractions, usually at a rate of more than one per second. Myoclonus occurs synchronously in several muscles and can be increased in severity and frequency by fatigue or stress, but is usually unaffected by sensory stimuli. Spinal myoclonus ceases during sleep or anesthesia.	脊髓性肌阵挛	脊肌阵挛通常是由于一个肿瘤，感染，损伤，或脊髓变性过程，其特征是节律不自主的肌肉收缩，通常在一个以上的每秒的速率。同步发生肌阵挛在几个肌肉和所用的严重程度和频率由疲劳或应力增加，但通常是不受感官刺激。睡眠或麻醉期间脊髓性肌阵挛停止。
耳部异常	HP:0010532	Paroxysmal vertigo	Paroxysmal episodes of vertigo.	发作性眩晕	#####
眼部异常	HP:0010533	Spasmus nutans	The combination of pendular nystagmus, head nodding, and torticollis.	点头状痉挛	#####
神经系统异常	HP:0010534	Transient global amnesia	A paroxysmal, transient loss of memory function with preservation of immediate recall and remote memory but with a severe impairment of memory for recent events and ability to retain new information.	短暂性全面性遗忘症	一种阵发性、短暂性记忆功能丧失，即时回忆和远期记忆保存，但是近事记忆和储存新信息的能力严重受损。
神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	HP:0010535	Sleep apnea	An intermittent cessation of airflow at the mouth and nose during sleep. Apneas of at least 10 seconds are considered important, but persons with sleep apnea may have apneas of 20 seconds to up to 2 or 3 minutes. Patients may have up to 15 events per hour of sleep.	睡眠呼吸暂停	睡眠时口鼻气流间歇性停止。呼吸暂停10秒以上的被认为是重要的，但睡眠呼吸暂停的人呼吸暂停可以有20秒以上甚至达到2或3分钟。患者每小时睡眠可能有高达15次呼吸暂停事件。
神经系统异常,呼吸系统异常	HP:0010536	Central sleep apnea	Sleep apnea resulting from a transient abolition of the central drive to the ventilatory muscles.	中枢性睡眠呼吸暂停	是由于控制呼吸通气肌肉的大脑中枢短暂功能失调导致的睡眠呼吸暂停。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010537	Wide cranial sutures	An abnormally increased width of the cranial sutures for age-related norms (generally resulting from delayed closure).	颅缝增宽	颅缝的距离增大，考虑到年龄-相关等因素（通常由颅缝延迟闭合所引起）。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010538	Small sella turcica	An abnormally small sella turcica.	小蝶鞍	异常小的蝶鞍。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010539	Thin calvarium	The presence of an abnormally thin calvarium.	颅骨过薄	颅骨异常的薄。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010540	Advanced pneumatization of cranial sinuses	A degree of pneumatization that is increased compared to age-related norms.	颅窦过度气化	气化程度比同龄正常值增加。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010541	Cutis gyrata of scalp	The presence of convoluted folds and furrows formed from thickened skin of the `scalp` (FMA:46494), resembling cerebriform pattern. The scalp has convoluted and elevated folds, 1 to 2 cm in thickness. The convolutions generally cannot be flattened by traction.	头皮回状纹	由于头皮增厚而形成的类似大脑沟回的复杂褶皱和回纹。头皮表现为复杂和升高的折叠，厚度为1〜2厘米。复杂折叠通常不能被牵引拉平。
神经系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0010542	Vestibular nystagmus	Nystagmus due to disturbance of the vestibular system; eye movements are rhythmic, with slow and fast components.	前庭眼球震颤	眼球震颤由于前庭系统的干扰;眼球运动的节奏，用慢速和快速的组件。
眼部异常	HP:0010543	Opsoclonus	Spontaneous, non-rhythmic, multi-directional, chaotic movements of the eyes, giving the appearance of agitation. There may be bursts of conjugate movement of the eyes in varying directions and of varying amplitude.	斜视眼阵挛	自发的，无节奏的，多方位的，混乱的眼神动作，呈现躁动的外观。可能出现不同方向和不同幅度的共轭眼球运动。
眼部异常	HP:0010544	Vertical nystagmus	Vertical nystagmus may present with either up-beating or down-beating eye movements or both. When present in the straight-ahead position of gaze it is referred to as upbeat nystagmus or downbeat nystagmus.	垂直眼球震颤	垂直眼球震颤可出现向上跳动或向下跳动或两者兼有的眼球运动。当出现在凝视的正前方位置它被称为向上震颤或向下眼球震颤。
眼部异常	HP:0010545	Downbeat nystagmus	Downbeat nystagmus is a type of fixation nystagmus with the fast phase beating in a downward direction. It generally increases when looking to the side and down and when lying prone.	下击型眼球震颤	下击型眼球震颤是指向下方的快相跳动的眼球震颤。向侧面看、向下看或躺下时症状加重。
神经系统异常	HP:0010546	Muscle fibrillation	Fine, rapid twitching of individual muscle fibers with little or no movement of the muscle as a whole. If a motor neuron or its axon is destroyed, the muscle fibers it innervates undergo denervation atrophy. This leads to hypersensitivity of individual muscle fibers to acetyl choline so that they may contract spontaneously. Isolated activity of individual muscle fibers is generally so fine it cannot be seen through the intact skin, although it can be recorded as a short-duration spike in the EMG.	肌纤维颤动	不会引起肌肉动作的单个肌纤维精细的、快速的抽动。如果一个运动神经元或轴突被损害，则它支配的肌纤维会出现去神经萎缩。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0010547	Muscle flaccidity	A type of paralysis in which a muscle becomes soft and yields to passive stretching, which results from loss of all or practically all peripheral motor nerves that innervated the muscle. Muscle tone is reduced and the affected muscles undergo extreme atrophy within months of the loss of innervation.	肌肉软弱无力	一种肌肉麻痹，表现为肌肉柔软松弛无法被动伸展，是由于部分或全部的支配肌肉的外周运动神经功能丧失所致。在丧失神经支配的数月内会出现肌张力减退和受累肌肉严重萎缩。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0010548	Percussion myotonia	A localized myotonic contraction in a muscle in reaction to percussion (tapping with the examiner&#39;s finger, a rubber percussion hammer, or a similar object).	敲击性肌强直	敲击肌肉时局限性强直性收缩反应（用检查者的手指、橡胶锤或类似的对象敲击）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010549	Weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction	Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Paralysis due to lesions of the principle motor tracts is related to a lesion in the corticospinal, corticobulbar or brainstem descending (subcorticospinal) neurons.	上运动神经元功能障碍导致的无力	自主肌肉的麻痹意味着由于从脑到肌肉纤维的一个或多个运动途径的中断而导致的收缩丧失。尽管词语“瘫痪”通常意味着完全或部分丧失肌肉力量，但对于全部或严重丧失肌肉力量的患者，常用“麻痹”描述，对肌肉力量轻微损失的患者，常用“局部麻痹”描述。主要运动区病变引起的麻痹与皮质脊髓，皮质支原体或脑干下降（下皮质脊髓）神经元中的病变有关。
神经系统异常	HP:0010550	Paraplegia	Severe or complete weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities.	截瘫	双下肢严重或完全瘫痪，上肢保留
神经系统异常	HP:0010551	Paraplegia/paraparesis	Weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities. Paraplegia refers to a severe or complete loss of strength, whereas paraparesis refers to a relatively mild loss of strength.	截瘫	上肢保留的双下肢严重或完全瘫痪为截瘫而力量相对保留的为轻瘫。
神经系统异常	HP:0010553	Oculogyric crisis	An acute dystonic reaction with blepharospasm, periorbital twitches, and protracted fixed staring episodes. There may be a maximal upward deviation of the eyes in the sustained fashion. Oculogyric crisis can be triggered by a number of factors including neuroleptic medications.	动眼神经危象	眼睑痉挛，眶周抽搐，和长期固定注视的一种急性肌张力障碍，可能伴有持续的眼球最大向上运动的偏差。动眼神经危象可被很多种因素包括镇静药物所诱发。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010554	Cutaneous finger syndactyly	A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal joint of the adjacent fingers.	手指皮性并指	在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向近端延伸，至少延伸到指间关节水平上；或在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向相邻手指的掌指关节的屈褶纹延伸。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010557	Overlapping fingers	A finger resting on the dorsal surface of an adjacent digit when the hand is at rest.	指交叠	当手处于静止状态时，一个手指处在相邻位手指的背侧面。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010558	Abnormality of the clivus	An abnormality of the clivus, which is the inclined bony region of the posterior cranial fossa located between the sella turcica and the foramen magnum.	斜坡异常	斜坡的异常。斜坡指位于蝶鞍和枕骨大孔的后颅窝的倾斜骨区域。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010559	Vertical clivus	An abnormal vertical orientation of the clivus (which normally forms a kind of slope from the sella turcica down to the region of the foramen magnum).	斜坡垂直	斜坡（通常从蝶鞍倾斜至枕骨大孔区）异常垂直。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010560	Undulate clavicles	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the clavicles.	波浪状锁骨	锁骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010561	Undulate ribs	An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the ribs.	波浪状肋骨	肋骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
结缔组织异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010562	Keloids	Presence of one or more keloids. A keloid is a sharply elevated, irregularly shaped, progressively enlarging scar resulting from formation of excessive amounts of collagen in the dermis during connective tissue repair.	瘢痕疙瘩	瘢痕疙瘩可单发或多发，具有高出皮面、形状不规则、持续增生等特点，是皮肤在结缔组织修复过程中，真皮层胶原蛋白过度合成所致。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010564	Bifid epiglottis	A midline anterior-posterior cleft of the `epiglottis` (FMA:55130) that involves at least two-thirds of the epiglottic leaf. It is a useful feature for clinical diagnosis because it appears to be very rare in syndromes other than Pallister-Hall-Syndrome and is also rare as an isolated malformation.	会厌分叉	`会厌`（55130 FMA）沿中线前后裂开累及至少前三分之二的会厌叶。这个定义对于临床诊断非常有帮助，因为它似乎在比帕里斯特-霍尔综合征中非常罕见，即使是作为一个孤立的畸形也非常罕见。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010565	aplasia/Hypoplasia of the Epiglottis	This term applies if the Epiglottis is absent or hypoplastic.	会厌的发育缺陷/不全	本术语指会厌缺失或发育不全。
肿瘤	HP:0010566	Hamartoma	A disordered proliferation of mature tissues that is native to the site of origin - eg, exostoses, nevi and soft tissue hamartomas. Although most hamartomas are benign, some histologic subtypes - eg, neuromuscular hamartoma, may proliferate aggressively such as mesenchymal cystic hamartoma, Sclerosing epithelial hamartoma, Sclerosing metanephric hamartoma.	错构瘤	错构瘤是&#39;起源于器官的正常成熟组织的无序增殖，例如，外生骨疣，痣和软组织错构瘤。虽然大多数错构瘤是良性的，但一些组织学亚型的错构瘤，如神经肌肉的错构瘤、间充质囊性错构瘤、硬化性上皮错构瘤、硬化性肾错构瘤，可产生侵袭性增殖。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010567	Y-shaped metatarsals	Y-shaped metatarsals are the result of a partial fusion of two metatarsal bones, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Y-shaped metatarsals may be seen in combination with polydactyly.	Y形跖骨	Y形跖骨是两个跖骨近端部分融合的结果，Y的两臂指向远端。 Y形跖骨可以与多趾伴随出现。
肿瘤,头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	HP:0010568	Hamartoma of the eye	A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) which can originate from any tissue of the eye.	眼部错构瘤	错构瘤（成熟组织的无序增殖），它可以从眼睛中的任何组织起源。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010569	Elevated 7-dehydrocholesterol	Elevated `7-dehydrocholesterol` (CHEBI:17759) levels.	7-脱氢胆固醇水平升高	高架`7 dehydrocholesterol`（CHEBI:17759）的水平。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010575	Dysplasia of the femoral head	The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `femoral head` (FMA:32851).	股骨头发育不良	股骨头存在发育不良。
神经系统异常	HP:0010576	Intracranial cystic lesion	A cystic lesion originating within the brain.	颅内囊性病变	起源于脑内的囊性病灶。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010577	Absent epiphyses	#####	骨骺缺失	#####
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010578	Bracket epiphyses	#####	括号型骨骺	#####
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010579	Cone-shaped epiphysis	Cone-shaped epiphyses (also known as coned epiphyses) are epiphyses that invaginate into cupped metaphyses. That is, the epiphysis has a cone-shaped distal extension resulting from increased growth of the central portion of the epiphysis relative to its periphery.	锥形骨骺	锥形骨骺（也称为锥骨骺）是内陷成杯状的干骺端。即，具有锥形远端延伸的骨骺，是相对于其周边骨骺的中心部分的增生的结果。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010580	Enlarged epiphyses	Increased size of epiphyses.	骨骺膨大	骨骺尺寸增大。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010582	Irregular epiphyses	An alteration of the normally smooth contour of the epiphysis leading to an irregular appearance.	不规则骨骺	导致通常轮廓光滑的骨骺的不规则外观的改变。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010583	Ivory epiphyses	Sclerosis of the epiphyses, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.	乳白色骨骺	骨骺硬化，导致的X射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）的程度增加。

骨骼系统异常	HP:0010588	Premature epimetaphyseal fusion	Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at each end of a long bone, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.	干骺端过早融合	长骨两端干骺端的骺板透明软骨板停止生长早于正常年龄，导致相应的骨生长停滞、缩短。

头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010605	Chalazion	A chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland. A chalazion or meibomian cyst appears as a painless tuberous swelling in the upper lid without loss of eyelashes.	睑板腺囊肿	由睑板腺堵塞发炎引起的慢性睑板腺上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症。 睑板腺囊肿也称霰粒肿，主要表现为上眼睑无痛性肿胀结节伴睫毛不脱落。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010606	Hordeolum	An acute purulent infection of the sebaceous glands of Zeis at the base of the eyelashes, of the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or the meibomian sebacious glands often caused by staphylococcus infections. Hordeola can either occur as Hordeola externa affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or as Hordeola interna affecting the meibomian sebacious glands. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	麦粒肿	在睫毛根部的蔡斯氏皮脂腺、莫尔氏大汗腺或睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。麦粒肿既可以是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的外麦粒肿，也可以是影响睑板皮脂腺的内麦粒肿。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010607	Hordeolum externum	Hordeola externa are acute purulent infections affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.	外麦粒肿	外麦粒肿是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010608	Hordeolum internum	Hordeola interna are acute purulent infections affecting the meibomian sebacious glands, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia (chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland), hordeola are extremely painfull and can cause extreme local swelling.	内麦粒肿	内麦粒肿是影响睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿（引起堵塞睑板腺发炎的睑板腺慢性上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症）而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
体壁的异常	HP:0010609	Skin tags	Cutaneous skin tags also known as acrochorda or fibroepithelial polyps are small benign tumours that may either form secondarily over time primarily in areas where the skin forms creases, such as the neck, armpit or groin or may also be present at birth, in which case they usually occur in the periauricular region.	皮赘	皮赘也被称为软垂疣或纤维上皮息肉，是较小的良性肿瘤，可继发于颈部、腋窝或腹股沟等易形成褶皱的部位，也可于出生就存在，通常发生于耳廓周围。

肢体异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010612	Plantar pits	The presence of multiple pits (small, pinpoint-large indentations on the surface of the skin) located on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).	跖部凹点	存在于足底皮肤的许多凹点（位于皮肤表面、针尖样大小的凹点）。
肿瘤	HP:0010614	Fibroma	Benign tumors that are composed of fibrous or connective tissue. They can grow in all organs, arising from mesenchyme tissue. The term &quot;fibroblastic&quot; or &quot;fibromatous&quot; is used to describe tumors of the fibrous connective tissue. When the term fibroma is used without modifier, it is usually considered benign, with the term fibrosarcoma reserved for malignant tumors.	纤维瘤	由纤维或结缔组织构成的良性肿瘤。它们是间质组织来源，可发生于机体的任何器官，术语“成纤维细胞”或“纤维瘤”用以描述纤维结缔组织肿瘤。通常 纤维瘤 一词指良性肿瘤，而纤维肉瘤一词是指恶性肿瘤。
肿瘤	HP:0010615	Angiofibromas	Angiofibroma consist of many often dilated vessels.	血管纤维瘤	血管纤维瘤由许多扩张的血管组成。
肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	HP:0010616	Lung fibroma	The presence of a lung fibroma, a benign neoplasm that can present as a mass causing airway obstruction, cough, and hemoptysis, or present without symptoms as a solitary pulmonary nodule.	肺纤维瘤	肺纤维瘤为一种良性的肿瘤，可表现为大块病变引起气道阻塞、咳嗽、咯血或没有症状的孤立性肺结节。

This can either be present in unilateral or bilateral form.	面部神经麻痹	面部神经麻痹是第VII颅神经（面神经）的机能障碍，可导致受累侧的面部肌肉无法控制，并伴有面部表情与闭眼肌肉无力。可出现在单侧或双侧。

骨骼系统异常	HP:0010657	Patchy reduction of bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) reduction in bone density. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	骨密度片状降低	骨密度片状（不规则）增加。这可能根据X射线上其严重性和分布许多形式而呈现多种形式。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010658	Patchy changes of bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density. These changes can either be patchy reduction or increase of mineral density as seen on x-rays. Depending on the pathomechanism and the underlying disease, these changes can either appear solely as reduction or increase or as a combination of both (patches of bone showing an increased density while others are affected by reduction of mineral density).	骨密度斑块样改变	骨密度片状（不规则）的变化。这些变化可以是X射线下的片状减少或矿物质密度的增加。根据不同的病理机制和潜在的疾病，这些减少或增加的变化可以出现单独出现或合并出现（一些骨表现出密度增加，而其他骨密度降低）。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010659	Patchy variation in bone mineral density	Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density with patches of bone showing an increased density side to side with patches that are affected by reduction of mineral density. This is sometimes referred to as a moth-eaten appearance on x-rays.	骨密度斑块样改变	骨密度斑块状改变，骨的密度增加，伴有密度下降的片状区域。这有时被称为X射线下的虫蚀样外观。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010689	Mirror image polydactyly	A hand or foot with more than five digits that has a recognizable A/P axis of symmetry. The axis can lie within a normally formed or partially duplicated digit resembling a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe, or hallux. Alternatively, the axis can be in an interdigital space with a flanking pair of digits that resemble a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe or hallux. The most lateral digits on each side of the hand typically resemble fifth fingers/toes.	镜像多趾	一只手或脚有多于五个的指或趾，在前后轴线上对称。轴线可以位于正常形成或者部分重复的、类似于中指，食指，拇指，脚趾，或者大脚趾的指或趾内。或者轴线位于一对类似于一个中指，食指，拇指，脚趾或大脚趾的指间或趾间内。在手上的每一侧的最外侧的趾通常类似于第五手指/脚趾。

头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010732	Nodular changes affecting the eyelids	Nodular changes affecting the eyelids may have many different causes such as cystic lesions (chalaziae, hordeolae), lipogranulomas, melanomas, infectious diseases (Molluscum contagiosum) and many more.	眼睑的结节样改变	眼睑的结节样改变可能有很多不同的原因，如囊性病变（霰粒肿，麦粒肿）、脂肪肉芽肿、黑素瘤以及感染性疾病（如传染性软疣）等。
心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010733	Naevus flammeus of the eyelid	`Naevus flammeus` (HP:0001052) localised in the skin of the eyelid.	眼睑鲜红斑痣	位于眼睑皮上的“鲜红斑痣”（HP:0001052）。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010734	Fibrous dysplasia of the bones	Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).	纤维性骨发育不良	瘤样生长包括更换髓骨纤维组织，造成骨所涉及的领域的扩大和弱化。特别是涉及颅骨或面部骨骼时，病变可引起外部可见的畸形。颅骨通常（但不绝对）受影响的，任何其它的骨也可能设计。纤维异常增殖症可以影响孤立的骨骼（单骨纤维结构发育异常），而且也泛指全身（多骨纤维性发育异常）的所有骨骼。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010735	Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in many bones throughout of the body. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is a cardinal feature of McCune-Albright syndrome.	多骨纤维异常增殖症	病变累及全身多块骨头的`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。多骨纤维异常增殖症是McCune - Albright综合征的一个重要特征。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010736	Monostotic fibrous dysplasia	`Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in only one bone.	单骨纤维异常增殖症	病变局限在一块骨`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010739	Osteopoikilosis	Osteopoikilosis is a benign, asymptomatic sclerotic dysplasia of the bones. It affects both male and female and may be seen at any age. Radiographically sclerotic circular or ovoid lesions are usually symmetrically distributed in a periarticular location. Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.	骨斑点症	骨斑点症是良性的，无症状的骨硬化发育不良。它影响男性和女性，可见于任何年龄。 放射影响可见硬化圆形或卵圆形病灶，通常对称地分布在关节周围的位置。病变可以在一系列X光片中增加或减少甚至消失，无放射性摄取增加。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010740	Osteopathia striata	A lamellar pattern visible on radiographs and mainly localized at the metaphyses of the long tubular bones. Pathologic-anatomical studies revealed that these benign signs on x-rays are the result of a juvenile metaphyseal bone necrosis. Calcifications in the necrotic marrow lead to this lamellar or lattice-like appearance.	纹状骨病	在X光片上可见层状结构，主要位于长管状骨的干骺端。病理解剖研究显示，这些在X射线上的良性征象是青少年干骺端骨坏死导致的。坏死骨髓中的钙化导致这种层状或格子状的外观出现。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010749	Blepharochalasis	Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads.	眼皮松弛	眼皮松弛的特征是复发性、非疼痛、非红肿的眼睑水肿发作。它被分成肥厚型和萎缩型。肥厚型反复水肿导致眼眶脂肪疝压迫穿透弱化的眶隔。大多数萎缩型眼皮松弛患者有萎缩的冗余眼睑皮肤和上鼻脂肪垫。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010750	Dermatochalasis	Loss of elasticity of the upper and lower eyelids causing the skin to sag and bulge.	眼皮松弛	上下眼睑缺乏弹性，进而导致皮肤下垂和隆起。
