体壁的异常	HP:0010815	Nevus sebaceous	A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.	皮脂腺痣	皮脂腺痣是先天性的表面光滑无毛发的隆起性斑块，由增生的表皮、皮脂腺、毛囊、汗腺腺体和结缔组织构成，是表皮痣的一个变种，常发生在头皮、面、颈部及前额。出生时，多为孤立光滑、无毛发的橙黄色斑点。在青春期，皮损更加明显，呈乳头瘤样、疣状或鳞片状。
体壁的异常	HP:0010816	Epidermal nevus	Epidermal naevi are due to an overgrowth of the epidermis and may be present at birth (50%) or develop during childhood.	表皮痣	表皮痣是因表皮过度增生所致，可在出生时即有（50%）或在幼儿期出现。
体壁的异常	HP:0010817	Linear nevus sebaceous	A type of `nevus sebaceous` (HP:0010815) with a linear form, raised borders and yellowish color.	线状皮脂腺痣	皮脂腺痣的一种，呈线型，外观淡黄色，边缘隆起。
神经系统异常	HP:0010818	Generalized tonic seizures	Generalized seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction lasting a few seconds to minutes.	全面性强直发作	全身性发作，肌肉收缩持续增强持续几秒钟到几分钟。
神经系统异常	HP:0010819	Atonic seizures	Seizures characterized by a sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone, which may be fragmentary, confined to a segment (limb, jaw, head), or massive, leading to a slumping to the ground .	失张力癫痫发作	一种癫痫发作，其特征在于突然丧失肌肉张力，可以是局部的张力减低，局限在一个节段（肢，颚，头），或块状，导致患者下滑到地面。
神经系统异常	HP:0010820	Dacrystic seizures	A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by crying or an outburst of crying as a major feature.	哭泣性癫痫	以哭或哭泣发作为特征的癫痫(HP:0001250)。
神经系统异常	HP:0010821	Gelastic seizures	A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by laughing or an outburst of laughing as a major feature.	痴笑发作	癫痫发作（0001250 HP）的一种类型，表现为大笑或主要特点是爆发性大笑。
眼部异常	HP:0010822	Scintillating scotoma	A scintillating scotoma is a common visual aura that can preced a migraine, whereby a spot of flickering light near the center of the visual fields occurs. The spot prevents vision, and is thus termed scotoma. The scotoma can extend into one or more shimmering arcs of white or colored flashing lights.	闪烁的暗点	闪烁的暗点是一种常见的视觉先兆，可以是偏头痛的先兆，其中闪烁的灯光在视野中心点附近出现。盲点可延伸进入白色或有色闪灯的一个或多个波光弧。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010823	Ridged cranial sutures	An overlap of the bony plates of the skull in an infant, with or without early closure.	脊颅缝	婴儿颅骨骨板的重叠，伴或不伴早闭。
神经系统异常	HP:0010824	Abnormality of the fifth cranial nerve	An abormality of the `fifth cranial nerve` (FMA:50866).	第五对颅神经异常	在`第五对颅神经`的异常（FMA:50866）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010825	Abnormality of the eleventh cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `eleventh cranial nerve` (FMA:6720).	第十一对颅神经异常	在&#39;十一对颅神经`异常（FMA:6720）。
神经系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0010826	Abnormality of the twelfth cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `twelfth cranial nerve` (FMA:50871).	第十二对颅神经异常	在&#39;第十二颅神经`异常（FMA:50871）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010827	Abnormality of the seventh cranial nerve	Abnormality of the `seventh cranial nerve` (FMA:50868) sometimes also referred to as the facial nerve.	第七对颅神经异常	在`第七颅神经`异常（FMA:50868），也被称为面神经。
神经系统异常	HP:0010828	Hemifacial spasm	A segmental myoclonus of muscles innervated by the facial nerve.	偏侧面肌痉挛	面神经支配肌肉的节段性肌阵挛。
神经系统异常	HP:0010829	Impaired temperature sensation	A reduced ability to discriminate between different temperatures.	温度觉障碍	辨别不同温度的能力下降。
神经系统异常	HP:0010830	Impaired tactile sensation	A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel&#39;s hair brush, by asking patients to say &#39;now&#39; each time they feel the stimulus.	触觉障碍	触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。
神经系统异常	HP:0010831	Impaired proprioception	A loss or impairment of the sensation of the relative position of parts of the body and joint position.	本体感觉障碍	身体相应的位置和关节位置感觉的损害或缺失。
神经系统异常	HP:0010832	Abnormality of pain sensation	Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. This term groups abnormalities in pain sensation presumed to result from abnormalities related to the specific nerve fibers that carry the pain impulses to the brain.	痛觉异常	疼痛是一种不愉快的感觉，其程度从轻微、局部的不适感、到痛苦，由此物理性的疼痛来源于神经刺激，并经常伴随情绪性因素。痛觉异常，推测是由于的向大脑传递痛觉冲动的特定神经纤维异常所导致的。
神经系统异常	HP:0010833	Spontaneous pain sensation	Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.	自发性疼痛感	自发痛是一种神经性疼痛其发生没有明确的诱发因素。
神经系统异常	HP:0010834	Trophic changes related to pain	Trophic changes is a term used to describe abnormalities in the area of pain that include primarily wasting away of the skin, tissues, or muscle, thinning of the bones, and changes in how the hair or nails grow, including thickening or thinning of hair or brittle nails.	与疼痛相关的营养改变	营养改变是用于描述疼痛区域的异常包括主要消瘦的皮肤、组织或肌肉，变薄的骨头，头发或指甲生长方式的改变，包括增稠或头发稀疏或指甲变脆。
神经系统异常	HP:0010835	Dissociated sensory loss	A pattern of sensory loss with selective loss of touch sensation and proprioception without loss of pain and temperature, or vice-versa.	分离性感觉缺失	一种感觉障碍，特点是选择性的触觉和本体感觉缺失，而痛温觉正常，反之亦然。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010836	Abnormality of copper homeostasis	An `abnormal` ( PATO:0000460) `concentration` (PATO:0000033) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694).	铜稳态平衡异常	`异常`（PATO:0000460）的`铜`（CHEBI:28694）`浓度`（0000033 PATO）。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010837	Decreased serum ceruloplasmin	A kind of `Abnormality of copper homeostasis` (HP:0010836) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	血清铜蓝蛋白降低	一种&#39;铜homeostasis`异常（HP:0010836）中的`blood`（FMA:9670）:对`ceruloplasmin`（000005794 PR）相关的`下降concentration`（0001163 PATO）。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010838	High nonceruloplasmin-bound serum copper	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of non `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) bound `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	高浓度非铜蓝蛋白结合型血清铜离子	非`ceruloplasmin`（PR:000005794）的约束`copper`（CHEBI:28694）在`blood`（FMA:9670）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010839	Increased urinary copper concentration	An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿液铜浓度增高	的`copper`（CHEBI:28694）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）在`urine`（FMA:12274）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010841	Multifocal epileptiform discharges	A abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).	多灶性痫样放电	由脑电图记录到的多灶的大脑异常放电活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0010843	EEG with focal slow activity	Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).	脑电图局灶性慢活动	局灶（局部）慢活动反映局灶脑功能障碍，而不是弥散脑功能障碍（即脑病）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010844	EEG with multifocal slow activity	Multifocal slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，多灶性慢活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的多灶性慢的脑电活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0010845	EEG with generalized slow activity	Diffuse slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，广泛性慢活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的弥漫性慢的脑电活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0010846	EEG with persistent abnormal rhythmic activity	The presence of abnormal persistent rhythmic activity in electroencephalogram	脑电图，异常的持续性节律活动	脑电图中出现异常的，持续性节律活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0010847	EEG with spike-wave complexes (&lt;2.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of slow spikes and slow waves (&lt;2.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，（慢）棘慢复合波（&lt;2.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（&lt;2.5赫兹）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010848	EEG with spike-wave complexes (2.5-3.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010849	EEG with spike-wave complexes (&gt;3.5 Hz)	The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (&gt;3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，（快）棘慢复合波（&gt; 3.5赫兹）	脑电图存在棘慢复合波（&gt; 3.5赫兹）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010850	EEG with spike-wave complexes	Complexes of spikes (&lt;70 ms) and sharp waves (70-200 ms), which are sharp transient waves that have a strong association with epilepsy, in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，棘慢复合波	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动:棘波（&lt;70毫秒）和尖波（70-200毫秒）的复合波，这是与癫痫密切相关的短暂尖波。
神经系统异常	HP:0010851	EEG with burst suppression	The burst suppression pattern in electroencephalography refers to a characteristic periodic pattern of low voltage (&lt;10 microvolts) suppressed background and a relatively shorter pattern of higher amplitude slow, sharp, and spiking complexes.	EEG伴爆发抑制	在脑电图中爆发抑制模式指的是低电压（&lt;10微伏）抑制背景和相对较短模式的较高波幅慢波，尖波，和棘波交替反复出现的波形。
神经系统异常	HP:0010852	EEG with photoparoxysmal response	EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.	脑电图，光阵发性反应	脑电图异常（癫痫样放电）由闪光刺激或黑色和白色条纹的图案诱发。
神经系统异常	HP:0010853	EEG with periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges	Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges (PLEDs)are periodic, lateralized, and epileptiform. PLEDs show a relatively constant interval between discharges (0.5 to 3 seconds).	脑电图，周期性一侧癫痫样放电	周期性一侧性癫痫样放电（PLEDs）是指癫痫样波在单侧周期性出现 PLEDs显示放电以相对恒定的时间间隔（0.5至3秒）出现。
神经系统异常	HP:0010854	EEG with generalized low amplitude activity	An abnormal generalized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，广泛性低波幅活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动，波幅普遍异常降低。
神经系统异常	HP:0010855	EEG with localized low amplitude activity	An abnormal localized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，局部低波幅活动	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的局部异常波幅降低脑电活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0010856	EEG with periodic complexes	Periodically occurring generalized periodic complexes.	脑电图，周期复合波	周期性出现的广泛性周期复合波。
神经系统异常	HP:0010857	EEG with periodic abnormalities	Periodically recurring abnormalities in the EEG.	脑电图，周期性异常	周期性重复的脑电图异常。
神经系统异常	HP:0010858	EEG with hyperventilation-induced epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010859	Frank breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are extended.	单臀先露	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿双髋关节屈曲,双膝关节直伸。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010860	Complete breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are flexed.	完全臀先露	“臀先露”的一种（HP:0001623），胎儿髋关节及膝关节均屈曲。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010861	Incomplete breech presentation	A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which one or both hips are extended and one or both of the fetus&#39; feet are pointing down and entering the birth canal.	不完全臀先露	“臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿单侧或双侧髋关节直伸，胎儿一足或双足向下先进入产道。
神经系统异常	HP:0010862	Delayed fine motor development	A type of `motor delay` (HP:0001270) characterized by an delay in acquiring the ability to control the fingers and hands.	精细动作发育迟缓	以习得控制手指和手的能力延迟为特点的运动发育迟缓（HP:0001270）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010863	Receptive language delay	A delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.	接受性语言发育迟缓	理解他人语言能力的发育迟缓
神经系统异常	HP:0010864	Intellectual disability, severe	Severe mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 20-34.	重度智力残疾	重度精神发育迟滞定义为智商（IQ）在20-34的范围内。
神经系统异常	HP:0010865	Oppositional defiant disorder	An enduring pattern of uncooperative, defiant, and hostile behavior toward authority figures that does not involve major antisocial violations, is not accounted for by the child&#39;s developmental stage, and results in significant functional impairment. A certain level of oppositional behavior is common in children and adolescents.	对立违抗性障碍	一种不合作，挑衅和敌对权威人物的持久的模式，但不包括严重的反社会行为。此行为不能被儿童的发育阶段所解释，可导致严重的功能受损。但在儿童和青少年中一定程度的反抗行为是正常。
消化系统异常	HP:0010866	Abdominal wall defect	An `incomplete closure` (PATO:0000609) of the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054).	腹壁缺损	腹壁的不完全闭合。
神经系统异常	HP:0010867	Dyssynergia	A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed. With dyssynergia, a voluntary movement appears broken down into its component parts.	协同失调	`共济失调`(HP:0001251)的一种，表现为按照适当的顺序和速度进行的随意运动能力受损。协调失调时，随意运动表现为它的组成部分的分解动作。
神经系统异常	HP:0010868	Ocular dyssynergia	A type of `dyssynergia` (HP:0010867) affecting eye movements and characterized by the inability to smoothly follow a visual target across the visual field.	眼协同失调	一种影响眼球运动的以无法流畅的在视野中追踪物体为特征的眼协同失调
神经系统异常	HP:0010869	Asynergia	A type of `dyssynergy` (HP:0010867) characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.	协调不能	一种类型的`协调障碍`（HP:0010867），特点是缺乏以适当的顺序和速度平稳进行随意运动的能力。
神经系统异常	HP:0010871	Sensory ataxia	Incoordination of movement caused by a deficit in the sensory nervous system. Sensory ataxia can be distinguished from cerebellar ataxia by asking the patient to close his or her eyes. Persons with cerebellar ataxia show only a minimal worsening of symptoms, whereas persons with sensory ataxia show a marked worsening of symptoms.	感觉性共济失调	由于感觉神经系统功能障碍导致的运动不协调。可以通过让患者闭眼区分感觉性共济失调和小脑性共济失调。小脑性共济失调的人只显示轻微的症状恶化，而感觉性共济失调的人显示出显著的症状恶化。
心血管系统异常	HP:0010872	EKG: T-wave inversion	An inversion of the T-wave (which is normally positive).	心电图:T波倒置	T波的倒置（通常是正的）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010873	Cervical spinal cord atrophy	Atrophy of the cervical segment of the spinal cord.	颈髓萎缩	脊髓的颈段萎缩。
骨骼系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0010874	Tendon xanthomatosis	The presence of xanthomas (intra-and extra-cellular accumulations of cholesterol) extensor tendons (typically over knuckles, Achilles tendon, knee, and elbows).	腱黄瘤病	在伸肌腱（通常在指关节、跟腱、膝和肘关节处皮肤）出现黄色瘤（胞内外的胆固醇聚集）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010875	Chaddock reflex	A diagnostic reflex elicited by stimulation of the skin over the surface of the lateral malleolus of the foot. The Chaddock reflex is present if there is extension of one or more or all of the toes with or without fanning of them when the external inframalleolar skin is stimulated. The Chaddock sign, similar to the Babinski sign, is taken to be an indication of disease of the spinocortical (pyramidal) tract.	查多克反射	刺激外踝下方足背外缘的皮肤引出的一种诊断性反射。如果刺激下踝外侧皮肤时出现一个、多个或所有脚趾背伸（伴或不伴扇形展开）为查多克反射阳性。查多克征与巴宾斯基征类似，被视为皮质脊髓（锥体）束受损的体征。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0010876	Abnormality of circulating protein level	An abnormal level of a circulating `protein` (CHEBI:16541) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	循环系统内的蛋白水平异常	`血液 `（FMA:9670）中循环`蛋白`(CHEBI:16541)的水平异常。
眼部异常	HP:0010877	Unilateral strabismus	A type of strabismus`(HP:0000486) in which only one eye is affected. Unilateral strabismus is to be distinguished from alternating strabismus, in which either of the eyes &#39;squints&#39; at different times.	单侧斜视	单眼斜视的一种，只有一只眼睛受到影响。单侧斜视需要与交替斜视区分开，后者为双眼在不同时间点交替发生“斜视”。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,头部和颈部的异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010878	Fetal cystic hygroma	The presence during the prenatal period of a cystic mass with multiple septa with multiple, asymmetric, thin-walled cysts near the posterior aspect of the neck. Fetal cystic hygroma can be defined as nuchal translucency with or without septations measuring greater than 3.0 mm.	胎儿囊状水瘤	产前期间出现，颈部后方附近的囊性包块，由多个隔片及多个不对称的薄壁包囊组成。胎囊状水瘤可以被定义为有或没有分隔的长度大于3毫米的颈部半透明物。

胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010881	Abnormality of the umbilical cord	An abnormality of the `umbilical cord` (FMA:85541), which is the cord connecting the developing embryo or fetus to the placenta.	脐带异常	胚胎或胎儿与胎盘间的纽带的异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0010882	Pulmonary valve atresia	A congenital disorder of the pulmonary valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.	肺动脉瓣闭锁	肺动脉瓣的先天疾病，其中该瓣膜的节流孔发育不良。
心血管系统异常	HP:0010883	Aortic valve atresia	A congenital disorder of the aortic valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.	主动脉瓣闭锁	主动脉瓣的先天性疾病，瓣膜口发育缺陷。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010884	Acromelia	Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.	肢端短缩	相对于肢体的其他节段，主要影响影响四肢远端部分（手和脚）的肢端短缩。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010885	Aseptic necrosis	A disease where there is cellular death (necrosis) of bone components due to interruption of the blood supply.	无菌性骨坏死	疾病处有由于血液供应中断引起的骨成分坏死。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010886	Osteochondrosis dissecans	A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.	骨软骨炎	由软骨下骨供血不足引起软骨下骨坏死引起的关节疾病，称为股骨头缺血性坏死。骨随后由身体再吸收，而使它支持的关节软骨容易损坏。其结果是软骨和骨碎片化，且这些骨软骨碎片在关节间隙内自由运动，引起疼痛和进一步的损害。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010888	Morbus Koehler	Morbus Koehler is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os naviculare pedis.	克勒病	克勒病是一种青少年型累及舟状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010889	Morbus Kienboeck	Morbus Kienboeck is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os lunatum.	金伯克病	金伯克病是一种青少年型累及月状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0010890	Morbus Osgood-Schlatter	Morbus Osgood-Schlatter is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Tuberositas tibiae.	奥斯古德 - 施拉特病	奥斯古德 - 施拉特是一种青少年型累及胫骨粗隆的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0010891	Morbus Scheuermann	A developmental growth retardation of the vertebral end plates that may lead to secondary destruction of the vertebral end plates and protrusion of the nucleus pulposus into the vertebral body (so called Schmorl&#39;s nodes as seen on x-rays).	脊椎驼背后凸症	椎骨端板可能导致椎骨端板的二次破坏和髓核到椎体的突起的发育生长迟缓（所以在X射线下称为Schmorl的节点）。

眼部异常	HP:0010921	Coralliform cataract	A &#39;coral-like&#39; pattern of opacity in the lens of the eye. That is, a cataract with an irregular, stellate form.	珊瑚状白内障	晶状体上“珊瑚状”的浑浊。即，具有不规则、星形浑浊的白内障。
眼部异常	HP:0010922	Membranous cataract	A form of cataract in which the lens substance has shrunk, leaving a collapsed, flattened capsule with little or no cortex or epithelium on the lens.	膜性白内障	一种特殊类型的白内障，晶体物质缩小，压平囊膜，晶体上很少或没有皮质或上皮细胞。

心血管系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010942	Echogenic intracardiac focus	A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.	心室强光点	心室强光点是因产前超声检查关注于胎儿超声回声增强而发现的。强光点可出现在一个或两个心室内。心室强光点是指胎儿心室内的、与邻近肋骨回声相似的超声现象，这种回声光点一般出现于一个或两个心室的乳突肌内。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010943	Echogenic fetal bowel	Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.	胎儿肠管回声增强	肠管回声增强是指胎儿肠管回声强度接近或高于其周围骨骼回声的强度。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010944	Abnormality of the renal pelvis	An abnormality of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂异常	肾盂的异常。
泌尿生殖系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010945	Fetal pyelectasis	Mild pyelectasis is defined as a hypoechoic spherical or elliptical space within the renal pelvis that measures at least 5mm and not more than 10 mm. The measurement is taken on a transverse section through the fetal renal pelvis using the maximum anterior-to-posterior measurement.	胎儿肾盂扩张	轻度肾盂扩张被定义为超声检查时低回声球形或椭圆形的肾盂扩大，起码是5毫米以上但不超过10毫米。测量时取横截面，通过胎儿肾盂，采集最大前后径。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010946	Dilatation of the renal pelvis	The presence of `dilatation` (MPATH:66) of the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).	肾盂扩张	肾盂呈扩张状态。
心血管系统异常	HP:0010947	Abnormality of ductus venosus blood flow	The abnormal velocity or direction of blood flow in the ductus venosus， which can reflect the fetus cardiac function and overall development.	静脉导管血流异常	静脉导管中血流的速度或方向异常，可反映胎儿心功能和胎儿的整体发育状况。

神经系统异常	HP:0010950	Abnormality of the fourth ventricle	An abnormality of the `fourth ventricle` (FMA:78469).	第四脑室异常	在`第四脑室`的异常（FMA:78469）。
神经系统异常	HP:0010951	Abnormality of the third ventricle	An abnormality of the `third ventricle` (FMA:78454 ).	第三脑室异常	在`第三脑室`的异常（FMA:78454）。
神经系统异常,胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010952	Mild fetal ventriculomegaly	A kind of `ventriculomegaly` (HP:0002119) occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (pmid:16100637).	轻度胎儿脑室扩大	发生于胎儿期的脑室扩大（HP:0002119）的一种类型，通常利用产前超声诊断。脑室扩大定义为是体径10mm以上。轻度脑室扩大（MVM）定义为10至15毫米之间。从丘脑核团水平的轴位完成测量，刚好低于测量BPD（PMID:16100637）的标准图像。
神经系统异常	HP:0010953	Noncommunicating hydrocephalus	A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) in which the flow of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) within the cerebral ventricular system or in the outlets of the CSF to the arachnoid space is obstructed.	非交通性脑积水	引流脑脊液的脑室系统或蛛网膜下腔阻塞后导致的一种脑积水。
心血管系统异常	HP:0010954	Hypoplastic right heart	Underdevelopment of the right-sided structures of the heart.	右心发育不全	心脏的右侧结构发育不全。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010955	Dilatation of the bladder	The presence of a `dilated` (PATO:0001571) `urinary bladder` .	膀胱扩张	膀胱呈扩张状态。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010956	Fetal megacystis	Fetal megacystis is an abnormally enlarged bladder identified at any gestational age.	胎儿巨膀胱症	胎儿巨大膀胱指在任何孕周呈现的膀胱异常增大。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010957	Congenital posterior urethral valve	A developmental defect resulting in an obstructing membrane in the posterior male urethra.	先天性后尿道瓣膜	一种发育异常，导致男性后尿道发生瓣膜状阻塞。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0010958	Bilateral renal agenesis	A `bilateral` (PATO:0000618) form of `agenesis` (MPATH:57) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).	双肾缺如	双侧肾缺如。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010959	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of the lung	Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (CCAM) can be diagnosed prenatally if ultrasound shows a cystic or solid lung tumor. A CCAM does not have systemic arterial blood supply (in contrast to bronchopulmonary sequenstration). It is a cystic area within the lung that originates from abnormal embryogenesis.	先天性肺囊性腺瘤样畸形	先天性囊性腺瘤样畸形（CCAM）可以在产前诊断，超声可显示囊性或实性肺癌。CCAM不具有系统性动脉血液供应（与支气管肺隔离症相反），它是源自胚胎发育畸形的肺内的囊性区域。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010960	Bronchopulmonary sequestration	The presence of microscopic cystic masses of nonfunctioning pulmonary tissue that lack an obvious communication with the tracheobronchial tree.	支气管肺隔离症	无功能肺组织的囊性肿块（显微镜下改变），与气管支气管树不相通。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010961	Intralobar sequestration	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is incorporated into the normal surrounding lung.	叶内型肺隔离症	与周围正常肺成为一体的一种支气管肺隔离症。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0010962	Extralobar sequestration	A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is completely discrete from the normal lung and is surrounded by separate pleura.	叶外型肺隔离症	支气管肺隔离症一种，它与正常的肺完全不连续，并被独立的胸膜包围。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0010963	Absence of stomach bubble on fetal sonography	By the 14th week of gestation it is nearly always possible to visualized the fluid-filled fetal stomach bubble on prenatal sonography. This term refers to the absence of a normal fetal stomach bubble on fetal ultrasonography performed at around 16 to 20 weeks&#39; gestation.	胎儿超声下胃泡缺如	孕14周产前超声可见充盈的胎儿胃泡。这个术语指的是孕16~20周超声下胎儿胃泡未显示。

遗传模式	HP:0010982	Polygenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of many (more than three) gene loci.	多基因遗传	#####
遗传模式	HP:0010983	Oligogenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of a few gene loci. It is recommended this term be used for traits governed by three loci, although it is noted that usage of this term in the literature is not uniform.	寡基因遗传	#####
遗传模式	HP:0010984	Digenic inheritance	A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of two gene loci.	双基因遗传	#####

骨骼系统异常	HP:0011001	Increased bone mineral density	An abnormal increase of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones which is often refered to as osteosclerosis. Osteosclerosis can be detected on radiological examination as an increased whiteness (density) of affected bones.	骨密度增加	骨密度（每立方厘米骨头的物质量）异常增加，通常称为骨硬化。骨硬化可以通过放射学检查，表现为受影响骨骼的白度增加（密度）。

心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0011137	Non-pruritic urticaria	Pale reddish slightly elevated papules and plaques of 0.5-3 cm in diameter and not accompanied by pruritus.	非瘙痒性荨麻疹	淡红色稍隆起的丘疹，直径0.5-3厘米，不伴有瘙痒。
体壁的异常	HP:0011138	Abnormality of skin adnexa	An abnormality of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.	皮肤附属器的异常	皮肤附属器（皮肤附件），是位于真皮和皮下脂肪组织的特殊皮肤结构，其异常包括三个不同的组织学结构的异常：（1）毛皮脂单位（毛囊和皮脂腺）；（2）小汗腺； （3）大汗腺。
消化系统异常	HP:0011139	Gastric duplication	Gastric duplication is a usually cystic malformation of gastrointestinal tract, usually attached to the greater curvature of the stomach and has no communication with the stomach.	胃重复	胃重复通常是胃肠道的囊状畸形，一般附着于胃的大弯侧，但与胃不相通。
消化系统异常	HP:0011140	Gastrointestinal duplication	A spherical hollow structure with a smooth muscle coat, lined by a mucous membrane, and attached to any part of the gastrointestinal tract, from the base of the tongue to the anus.	胃肠重复	一个具有平滑肌外壳的中空球形结构，通过粘膜连接到胃肠道的任何部位（从舌的基部到肛门）。
眼部异常	HP:0011141	Age-related cataract	A type of cataract (opacification of the lens) that forms during the course of aging.	年龄相关性白内障	白内障的一种，（晶状体的混浊）在老化的过程中形成。
眼部异常	HP:0011142	Age-related nuclear cataract	A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the nucleus of the lens.	年龄相关的核性白内障	年龄相关性白内障，主要是晶状体核的浑浊。
眼部异常	HP:0011143	Age-related cortical cataract	A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the cortex of the lens.	年龄相关性皮质白内障	一种年龄相关性白内障，主要影响晶状体的皮质。
眼部异常	HP:0011144	Age-related posterior subcapsular cataract	A type of age-related cataract consisting of granular opacities occurring mainly in the central posterior cortex just under the posterior capsule.	年龄相关后囊下型白内障	一种年龄相关性白内障，主要发生于中央后囊下的皮质颗粒混浊。
神经系统异常	HP:0011145	Symptomatic seizures	A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed.	症状性癫痫发作	在脑损伤（全身，有毒，或代谢）的基础上发生的癫痫发作，当去除潜在的病因或急性期过去后可能不会再发。
神经系统异常	HP:0011146	Dialeptic seizures	Seizures characterized by impaired consciousness.	呆滞性癫痫发作	以意识障碍为特征的癫痫发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011147	Typical absence seizures	Typical absences are brief for seconds generalized epileptic seizures of abrupt onset and abrupt termination with impairment of consciousness.	典型的失神发作	典型的失神是短至数秒的全面性癫痫发作，突发突止并伴意识受损。
神经系统异常	HP:0011148	Absence seizures with special features	Absence seizures that are characterized by additional motor phenomena such as eyelid myoclonias or myoclonic seizure of the upper limbs.	失神发作伴特定特征	伴随额外运动现象的失神发作，如眼睑肌阵挛或上肢肌阵挛发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011149	Absence seizures with eyelid myoclonia	Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by eyelid myoclonia.	失神发作伴眼睑肌阵挛	失神发作伴随眼睑肌阵挛。
神经系统异常	HP:0011150	Myoclonic absences	Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by rhythmic bilateral myoclonias of the arms and shoulders synchronous with EEG discharges, with additional tonic components of the arms.	肌阵挛性失神	具有双侧手臂和肩膀节律性肌阵挛可在脑电图记录到异常放电的失神发作，同时可伴有手臂强直发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011151	Obtundation status	Atypical absence lasting for more than 30 minutes.	迟钝状态	不典型失神持续超过30分钟。
神经系统异常	HP:0011152	Early onset absence seizures	Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.	早发性失神发作	4岁之前开始的典型失神发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011153	Focal motor seizures	Focal seizures involving musculature in any form.	局灶性运动性癫痫发作	任何形式累及肌肉组织的局灶性癫痫发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011154	Focal autonomic seizures	Focal seizures with an objectively documented and distinct alteration of autonomic nervous system function involving cardiovascular, pupillary, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregularity functions.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作	涉及心脑血管，瞳孔，胃肠道，泌汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能等自主神经系统功能特定改变的客观可记录到的局灶性发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011155	Focal autonomic seizures with altered responsiveness	An autonomic seizure with altered responsiveness.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作伴反应改变	自主神经发作伴反应的改变。
神经系统异常	HP:0011156	Focal autonomic seizures without altered responsiveness	An autonomic seizure without altered responsiveness.	局灶性自主神经癫痫发作不伴反应改变	植物神经发作不伴反应的改变。
神经系统异常	HP:0011157	Auras	Subjective ictal phenomena that, in a given patient, may precede observable seizures; if alone, constitute a if alone, constitute a simple partial seizure.	先兆	主观突发现象，在有些特定患者中，可能出现于可观察到的癫痫发作之前;如果单独出现，构成单纯部分性发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011158	Auditory auras	Auras with sensations of buzzing, drumming sounds or single tones.	听觉先兆	听到耳朵里有嗡嗡声、击鼓声或单一响声的感觉。
神经系统异常	HP:0011159	Epigastric auras	Auras with abdominal discomfort including nausea, emptiness, tightness, churning, butterflies, malaise, pain, and hunger; sensation may rise to chest or throat. Some phenomena may reflect ictal autonomic dysfunction.	上腹先兆	腹部不适的先兆，包括恶心、空虚、发紧、翻腾、翻动、不舒服、疼痛和饥饿；感觉可能上升到胸部或喉部。可能反应了发作性自主神经功能障碍的一些现象。
神经系统异常	HP:0011160	Gustatory auras	Auras with taste sensations including acidic, bitter, salty , sweet or metallic tastes.	味觉先兆	味觉的先兆，包括酸，苦，咸，甜或金属的味道。
神经系统异常	HP:0011161	Olfactory Auras	Auras with sensation of odor, usually disagreeable.	嗅觉先兆	伴有异常气味的、不愉快的先兆
神经系统异常	HP:0011162	Psychic auras	Auras with affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual phenomena including illusory or composite hallucinatory events.	精神性先兆	与情感，记忆或复合知觉现象，包括虚幻的或复合幻觉事件相关的先兆
神经系统异常	HP:0011163	Somatosensory auras	Auras with sensation of tingling, numbness, electric shock sensations, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move.	躯体感觉先兆	先兆伴随刺痛感，麻木，触电的感觉，疼痛，运动感，或想要活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011164	Vegetative auras	A sensation consistent with involvement of the autonomic nervous system, including cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregulatory functions.	植物神经性癫痫	一种与自主神经系统受累相一致的感觉，包括心血管，胃肠，排汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能。
神经系统异常	HP:0011165	Visual auras	Auras with sensation of flashing or flickering lights, spots, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis.	视觉先兆	先兆伴有与闪烁感或闪烁的灯光、点、单一相、暗点、或黑蒙。
神经系统异常	HP:0011166	Focal myoclonic seizures	Focal myoclonic seizures are a type of seizure. The clinical performance is a sudden contraction of the muscles or muscle caused  face, trunk or limbs suddenly fast twitch.	局灶肌阵挛发作	肌阵挛性发作是癫痫的一个临床发作类型。表现为某个肌肉或肌群的突然收缩，引起面、躯干或肢体突然快速的抽动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011167	Focal tonic seizures	Seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction in parts of the body lasting a few seconds to minutes.	局灶性强直发作	癫痫发作，身体局部肌肉收缩持续增强，持续几秒钟到几分钟。
神经系统异常	HP:0011168	Eyelid myoclonias	Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.	眼睑肌阵挛	表现为眼睑肌阵挛的局灶性癫痫发作，不是失神发作情况下的眼睑肌阵挛。
神经系统异常	HP:0011169	Generalized clonic seizures	Seizures with regularly repetitive myoclonus, involving the same muscle groups, at a frequency of about 2-3 c/sec.	全面性阵挛性发作	癫痫发作，表现为累及同一肌群的规律重复的肌阵挛，频率约为2-3次/秒。
神经系统异常	HP:0011170	Myoclonic atonic seizures	Seizures with sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone with a preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting one to two seconds or more, involving head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.	肌阵挛失张力发作	癫痫发作突然丢失或肌张力的缩小与前面的肌阵挛或强直性事件一至两秒以上，涉及头部，躯干，下颌或肢体肌肉组织。
神经系统异常	HP:0011171	Simple febrile seizures	Febrile seizures with generalized tonic-clonic semiology, duration less than 15 minutes, and without recurrence within the next 24 hours.	单纯型热性惊厥	热性惊厥表现为全身强直 - 阵挛症状，持续时间不超过15分钟，且接下来的24小时之内无复发。
神经系统异常	HP:0011172	Complex febrile seizures	Febrile seizures with focal semiology, duration of more than 15 minutes, or occurring in a cluster of 2 or more convulsions within 24 hours.	复杂性高热惊厥	有局灶性症状的高热惊厥，持续时间超过15分钟，或在24小时内连续惊厥发作2次以上。
神经系统异常	HP:0011173	Hypokinetic seizures	Seizures with a decrease in amplitude and/or rate or arrest of ongoing motor activity.	少动型癫痫发作	伴随正进行地活动停止和/或幅度减低的癫痫发作。
神经系统异常	HP:0011174	Hyperkinetic seizures	Seizures with increase in rate of ongoing movements or inappropriately rapid performance of a movement involving predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrashing, rocking movements.	多动性发作	持续的运动或不适当的快速运动加重的一种癫痫发作，主要累及近端肢体或中轴的肌肉产生不规则的序列的投射样运动，如蹬踏，骨盆抖动，摇摆样运动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011175	Versive seizures	Tonic seizures with a sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline.	旋转性癫痫	强直性发作伴持续的、强迫性眼部共轭运动，头部和/或躯干旋转或向一侧歪斜。
神经系统异常	HP:0011176	EEG with constitutional variants	An EEG with constitutional variants contains waves that are rare or unusual but not generally pathologic.	脑电图固有变异	脑电图固有变异指包含一些罕见或不寻常的波形，但通常不是病理性的。
神经系统异常	HP:0011177	EEG with 4-5/second background activity	EEG background activity at 4-5/second.	4-5次 /秒的脑电图背景活动	脑电图背景活动为4-5次 /秒。
神经系统异常	HP:0011178	Alpha-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse alpha-waves (8-13Hz).	α脑电波	弥漫性alpha波（8-13Hz）为主的脑电图。
神经系统异常	HP:0011179	Beta-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse beta-waves (&gt;13 Hz).	β脑电波	弥漫性β波（＞13Hz）为主导的脑电图。
神经系统异常	HP:0011180	Partial beta-EEG	EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (&gt;13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz).	部分β-脑电波	脑电图主要由弥漫性β波（＞13赫兹）与枕区α波（8-13赫兹）组成。
神经系统异常	HP:0011181	Low voltage EEG	Set definition of ID:0000013 to &quot;EEG with an amplitude less than 30 microvolts without observable occipital alpha rhythm (8-13 Hz).	低波幅脑电图	脑电图波幅低于30微伏且没有明显的枕区阿尔法节律（8-13赫兹）。
神经系统异常	HP:0011182	Epileptiform EEG discharges	Electroencephalographic patterns that resemble epileptogenic abnormalities.	癫痫样放电脑电图	显示癫痫源异常的脑电图模式。
神经系统异常	HP:0011183	EEG with hyperventilation-induced focal epileptiform discharges	Focal epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011184	EEG with hyperventilation-induced generalized epileptiform discharges	Generalized epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图，过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011185	EEG with focal epileptiform discharges	EEG discharges recorded in particular areas of the A localized (focal) abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).	脑电图局灶性癫痫样放电	通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动中，在一个局部（局灶）特定区域异的EEG放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011186	Focal epileptiform discharges with limited propagation to contralateral hemisphere	Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to contralateral hemisphere but without secondary generalization.	局灶性癫痫样放电，有限传播到对侧半球	局灶性癫痫样放电扩散到对侧大脑半球，但没有继发全面化。
神经系统异常	HP:0011187	Focal EEG discharges with propagation to ipsilateral hemisphere	Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to the hemisphere on the same side of the brain.	脑电图局灶性放电，传播到同侧半球	局灶性癫痫样放电，扩散到同一侧大脑半球。
神经系统异常	HP:0011188	Focal EEG discharges with secondary generalization	Focal EEG discharges that secondarily spread to both hemispheres and can then be recorded over the entire scalp.	局灶性脑放电继发泛化	脑电图局灶性放电，随后扩散至双侧大脑半球，可在整个头皮记录到。
神经系统异常	HP:0011189	Bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in both hemispheres.	双侧多灶性痫样放电	定位于两侧半球多个位置的癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011190	Uni- and bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges identified at multiple locations temporarily in both hemispheres and temporarily in one hemisphere.	单侧和双侧多灶性痫样放电	在一侧半球或两侧半球多个位置确定的癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011191	Unilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges	Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in one hemisphere.	单侧多灶性癫痫样放电	一个半球的多个部位出现癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011192	Polymorphic focal epileptiform discharges	Focal epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.	多态局灶性癫痫样放电	不同的形状和频率的焦点痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011193	EEG with focal spikes	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.	脑电图，局灶性棘波	脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011194	EEG with series of focal spikes	Focal spikes occurring for several seconds.	脑电图，成簇局灶棘波	几秒钟内出现的多个局灶棘波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011195	EEG with focal sharp slow waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，局灶性尖慢波	脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011196	EEG with focal sharp waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.	脑电图，局灶性尖波	脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间短暂局灶尖波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011197	EEG with focal spike waves	EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，局灶性棘慢波	脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011198	EEG with generalized epileptiform discharges	EEG discharges recorded on the entire scalp typically seen in persons with epilepsy.	脑电图，伴广泛性癫痫样放电	整个头皮脑电图记录到癫痫样放电，通常见于癫痫病人。
神经系统异常	HP:0011199	EEG with generalized sharp slow waves	EEG with generalized sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.	脑电图，伴广泛性尖慢波	脑电图，广泛性时限80至200毫秒的短暂尖波紧随一个慢波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011200	EEG with generalized polymorphic epileptiform discharges	Generalized epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.	脑电图，伴广泛性多态癫痫样放电	不同形状和频率的广泛性癫痫样放电。
神经系统异常	HP:0011201	EEG with changes in voltage	EEG with abnormal amplitude.	脑电图，电压变化	脑电图波幅异常。
神经系统异常	HP:0011202	EEG with diffuse acceleration	EEG frequency is abnormally increased.	脑电图弥漫性加快	脑电图频率异常增加。
神经系统异常	HP:0011203	EEG with abnormally slow frequencies	EEG with abnormally slow frequencies.	伴异常缓慢频率的脑电图	脑电图中伴有异常缓慢的频率。
神经系统异常	HP:0011204	EEG with continuous slow activity	EEG showing diffuse slowing without interruption.	脑电图持续慢活动	脑电图显示弥漫性不间断慢活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011205	EEG with intermittent slow activity	Non-continuous diffuse slowing of electroencephalographic patterns.	脑电图间歇性慢活动	非连续性弥漫性慢波的脑电图模式。
神经系统异常	HP:0011206	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 1	Slowing at frequencies between 7.5 and 8.5 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动1级	频率在7.5和8.5赫兹之间的慢活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011207	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 2	Generalized slowing of EEG activity at frequencies between 4-7 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动2级	脑电活动频率在4-7赫兹之间的广泛性慢活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011208	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 3	Generalized slowing of EEG activity at frequencies between 0.5-3 Hz.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动3级	脑电活动频率在0.5-3赫兹之间的广泛性慢活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011209	EEG with generalized slow activity grade 4	EEG without electrical activity.	脑电图，广泛性慢活动4级	脑电图无脑电活动。
神经系统异常	HP:0011210	EEG with occipital slowing	Slowing in occipital areas of the scalp EEG.	脑电图，枕部慢波	头皮脑电图枕区慢波。
神经系统异常	HP:0011211	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade I	Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应I级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕部区域。
神经系统异常	HP:0011212	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade II	Occurence of epileptiform discharges in occipital and central regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应 II级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区和中央区。
神经系统异常	HP:0011213	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade III	Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital, central, temporal and parietal regions during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应III级	闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区、中央区、颞区和顶区。
神经系统异常	HP:0011214	EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade IV	Occurrence of generalized epileptiform discharges during photic stimulation.	脑电图，光阵发性反应Ⅳ级	闪光刺激过程中出现全面性癫痫样放电。

生长异常	HP:0011408	Moderate intrauterine growth retardation	Intrauterine growth retardation that is at least 3 standard deviations (SD) below average, but not as low as 4 SD, corrected for sex and gestational age.	中度胎儿宫内发育迟缓	宫内发育迟缓程度大于同性别同胎龄至少3个标准偏差，但不到4个标准差。

胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011412	Ventouse delivery	Delivery of newborn by means of a ventouse, a vacuum device used to assist the delivery of a baby when the second stage of labour has not progressed adequately.	胎吸分娩	当第二产程进展延长时，应用一个真空设备的吸引装置辅助胎儿分娩。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011413	Shoulder dystocia	Shoulder dystocia occurs when the fetal anterior shoulder impacts against the maternal symphysis following delivery of the vertex.	肩难产	胎头娩出后，胎儿前肩被嵌顿在耻骨联合上方，用常规助产方法不能娩出胎儿双肩。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011414	Hydropic placenta	An abnormality of the placenta in which there are numerous cystic spaces within the placenta as well as placental enlargement.	胎盘水肿	胎盘异常的一种，胎盘内有众多囊腔合并胎盘增大。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011415	Calcified placenta	Calcification placenta refers to the placenta with calcium deposits on .	胎盘钙化	胎盘钙化指胎盘上存在钙质沉积。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011416	Placental infarction	Placental infarcts are macroscopically-evident focal parenchymal lesions in which microscopy shows necrosis and approximation of villi. The pathogenesis are that the infarctions are to be attributed to spastic or organic obliteration of the spiral arteries. Placental infarctions are significantly associated with fetal mortality, dysmaturity, and fetal distress.	胎盘梗死	胎盘梗死是肉眼可见的局灶性损伤，显微镜下表现为绒毛膜坏死样病变，病因为绒毛膜螺旋动脉痉挛或物理性梗阻。胎盘梗死与死胎。胎儿窘迫和成熟障碍有明确关系。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011417	Long umbilical cord	Increased length of the `umbilical cord` (FMA:85541).	长脐带	脐带长度增加。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011418	Abnormal insertion of umbilical cord	#####	脐带插入点异常	#####
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011419	Placental abruption	Placental abruption is a serious condition in which the separation of the placenta from its site of implatation after 20 weeks of gestain or during the delivery before birth	胎盘早剥	胎盘早剥是指妊娠20周后或分娩期，正常位置的胎盘在胎儿娩出前从子宫壁剥离，是一种妊娠期重症。

死亡/衰老	HP:0011421	Death in adolescence	Death during adolescence, the period between childhood and adulthood (roughly between the ages of 10 and 19 years).	青春期死亡	#####
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0011422	Abnormality of chloride homeostasis	An abnormality of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996 homeostasis or concentration in the body.	氯稳态平衡异常	体内`氯`(CHEBI:17996) 平衡稳态或或浓度的异常。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0011423	Hyperchloremia	An abnormally increased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.	高氯血症	异常增加`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0011424	Increased serum zinc	An increased consentration of zinc in the `blood` (FMA:9670).	血清锌含量增高	锌在`blood`增加consentration（FMA:9670）。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011425	Fetal ultrasound soft marker	An finding upon obstetric ultrasound examination performed at around 16 to 20 weeks of gestation that is abnormal but not clearly identifiable as a  fetal anatomic malformation or growth restriction. Such findings are known as soft markers since they are associated with increased risk for fetal aneuploidy or other disorders.	胎儿超声软指标	在大约16〜20周妊娠是不正常的，但不能清楚地标识为胎儿解剖畸形或发育迟缓的表现后，产科超声检查的发现。这些发现被称为软标记物，因为它们是与风险为胎儿非整倍或其他病症的增加有关。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011426	Fetal choroid plexus cysts	Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts (3 mm or more) found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (pmid:16100637).	胎儿脉络丛囊肿	胎脉络丛囊肿是发育中的胎儿的侧脑室的脉络丛中发现的内超声离散的小囊肿（3mm以上），一般出现于14至24周妊娠。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的成像需要在胎头的横向平面，在检测侧脑室相同的水平。应双边检查脉络丛是否有包囊的存在。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的大小与临床无关（PMID:16100637）。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011427	Enlarged fetal cisterna magna	The cisterna magna is measured on a transaxial view of the fetal head angled 15 degrees caudal to the canthomeatal line. The anterior/posterior diameter is taken between the inferior/posterior surface of the vemis of the cerebellum to the inner surface of the cranium. An enlarged cisternal magna is defined by an anterior/posterior diameter of 10 mm or more (pmid:16100637).	胎儿小脑延髓池扩大	小脑延髓池测量胎头角度15度尾椎canthomeatal线的横断视图。的前/后直径取小脑vemis的劣/后表面之间的颅骨的内表面上。的放大脑池蚤是由10mm以上（:16100637 PMID）前/后面直径限定。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011428	Short fetal femur length	A short femur length is defined as either a measurement below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or a measurement that is less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The femur should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿股骨短小	胎儿股骨短小定义为股骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时股骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011429	Short fetal humerus length	A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).	胎儿肱骨短小	胎儿肱骨短小定义为肱骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时肱骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011430	Hypoplasia of fetal nasal bone	On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (pmid:16100637).	胎儿鼻骨发育不良	产前超声，鼻骨是胎儿鼻梁内的薄回声带。胎儿面部面对探头，成像面在颜面部正中矢状切面，超声声束与鼻骨长轴成90°，测量两端鼻骨边界的距离。鼻骨缺失，或其长度小于同孕周正常值的第2.5百分位数是有显著差异的。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011431	Fetal fifth finger clinodactyly	Fifth finger clinodactyly is defined by a hypoplastic or absent mid-phalanx of the fifth digit. Ultrasound identification of the fetal hand must first be undertaken and then appropriate magnification accomplished. The evaluation requires stretching of the 5 fingers. The diagnosis is established when the middle phalanx of the fifth finger is markedly smaller than normal or absent, which often causes the finger to be curved inward  (pmid:16100637).	胎儿第五指屈指畸形	第五手指五指由发育不全或不存在中间指骨的第五位的定义。超声波鉴定胎儿的手必须首先进行，然后适当的放大倍率来实现。这种评价需要伸缩5个手指的。 （:16100637 PMID）当第五手指的中间指骨明显高于正常或不存在，这往往使手指被向内弯曲越小诊断确立。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011432	High maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein	An abnormally high concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度增高	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011433	High maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	An abnormally high concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度增高	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011434	Low maternal serum chorionic gonadotropin	An abnormally low concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度降低	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011435	Low maternal serum PAPP-A	An abnormally low concentration of serum PAPP-A (pregnancy associated plasma protein A), as compared to normal values for gestational-age.	母体血清PAPP-A浓度降低	与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清PAPP-A浓度（妊娠相关血浆蛋白A）。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011436	Abnormal maternal serum screening	An abnormally elevated or decreased level of a maternal serum marker analytes used in screening for aneuploidy.	母血清筛查异常	非整倍体筛查中，母体血清学标记物水平异常增高或降低。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011437	Maternal autoimmune disease	Maternal autoimmune diseases are associated with increased rates of fetal wastage.The most common maternal autoimmune diseases are systemic lupus erythematosus(SLE),rheumatoid arthritis,and a host of vasculitis syndromes and so on.	母体自身免疫性疾病	孕妇自身免疫性疾病与胎儿流产及胎死宫内相关。常见的病种包括系统性红斑狼疮，类风湿关节炎，以及血管炎综合征等。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0011438	Maternal teratogenic exposure	Matenal has been exposured  to  teratogenic substance for example drugs、 chemicals、 source of infection and other physical factors,during pregnancy,which  may cause fetal morphological abnormalities、neurological abnormalities or death.	孕期致畸暴露	孕期母体接触过可能对胎儿发育有影响的药物、化学制剂、感染源、物理因子等,可能会导致胎儿形体和/或神经系统发育异常，甚至死亡。

耳部异常	HP:0011476	Profound sensorineural hearing impairment	Complete loss of hearing related to a sensorineural defect.	极重度感音神经性听力损失	与神经性缺陷相关的听力完全丧失。
眼部异常	HP:0011477	Upbeat nystagmus	In primary position the Upbeat nystagmus beats upward. The associated oscillopsias are often very irritating, but the symptoms are usually transient.	上跳性眼球震颤	此型眼球震颤呈眼球跳动上升。震动幻视通常非常严重，但是症状通常是短暂的。
头部和颈部的异常,眼部异常	HP:0011478	True anophthalmia	Absence of globe, optic nerve, chiasm and optic tracts.  No evidence of ocular tissue on MRI scan or examination.	无眼畸形	眼球、视神经、视交叉及视束缺失。 MRI扫描或体格检查眼部无内容物。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0011479	Abnormality of the lacrimal punctum	An abnormality of the `lacrimal punctum` (FMA:59365), an opening on the eyelid close to the medial canthus that drains tears from the conjunctival sac into the lacrimal duct in the same eyelid.	泪点异常	在泪点的异常（FMA:59365），泪点在下眼睑靠近内侧眼角部位，主要作用是吸收结膜囊中的泪液，引流到泪道中。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0011482	Abnormality of the lacrimal gland	Abnormality of the `lacrimal gland` (FMA:59101), i.e., of the almond-shaped gland that secretes the aqueous layer of the tear film for each eye.	泪腺异常	在泪腺上的异常（FMA:59101）泪腺是杏核状的腺体，分泌的液体是泪膜的水层。
眼部异常	HP:0011483	Anterior synechiae of the anterior chamber	Adhesions between the iris and the cornea.	前房粘连	虹膜和角膜之间的粘连。

眼部异常	HP:0011493	Central opacification of the cornea	Reduced transparency of the central portion of the corneal stroma.	角膜的中央混浊	角膜基质层中央部位的透明度下降。

眼部异常	HP:0011495	Abnormality of corneal epithelium	Abnormality of the `corneal epithelium` (FMA:58263), that is of the epithelial tissue that covers the front of the cornea.	角膜上皮异常	角膜上皮的异常（FMA:58263），角膜上皮是指覆盖在角膜前部的上皮组织。
眼部异常	HP:0011496	Corneal neovascularization	Ingrowth of new blood vessels into the cornea.	角膜新生血管	新生血管向内生长进入角膜。

眼部异常	HP:0011508	Macular hole	A macular hole is a small break in the macula, located in the center of the retina.	黄斑裂孔	黄斑裂孔是黄斑区的小孔，位于视网膜的中央。
眼部异常	HP:0011509	Macular hyperpigmentation	Increased amount of pigmentation in the `macula lutea` (FMA:58637).	黄斑色素沉着	黄斑中心凹（FMA:58637）的色素沉着增加。
眼部异常	HP:0011510	Drusen	Drusen (singular, &#39;druse&#39;) are tiny yellow or white accumulations of extracellular material (lipofuscin) that build up in Bruch&#39;s membrane of the eye.	玻璃膜疣	玻璃膜疣是细胞外物质（脂褐素）在眼睛Bruch膜上聚集形成的细小黄色或白色物质沉积。
眼部异常	HP:0011511	Macular schisis	Splitting of the retina in the macular region.	黄斑劈裂	黄斑区的视网膜劈裂。
