心血管系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0011513	Retinal cavernous angioma	A benign tumor of the retina that appears as a grouping of blood-filled saccules within the inner retinal layers or on the surface of the optic disc. Retinal cavernous angioma are described as having a &#39;cluster of grapes&#39; appearance.	视网膜海绵状血管瘤	显示为血液填充的视网膜内层内或视盘的表面上的一种视网膜良性肿瘤。视网膜海绵状血管瘤被描述为具有“葡萄串状”外观。
眼部异常	HP:0011514	Abnormality of binocular vision	An abnormality of binocular vision, that is of the ability to synthesize the visual inputs from both eyes to a single image with perception of depth.	双眼单视功能异常	双眼视觉的异常。双眼视觉是指双眼看到的景物合成为一个单一的图像，并有感知深度的能力。
眼部异常	HP:0011515	Abnormal stereopsis	Inability to make fine depth discriminations from parallax provided by the two eyes&#39; different positions on the head.	立体视觉异常	立体视觉异常。立体视觉是指双眼观察景物时能通过双眼视察和头的不同位置，分辨物体远近距离的能力。
眼部异常	HP:0011516	Rod monochromacy	A condition where the retina contains no functional cone cells, so that in addition to the absence of color discrimination, vision in lights of normal intensity is difficult.	全色盲	视网膜包含无功能的视锥细胞，所以，除了没有颜色辨别能力，正常光照下视力很差。
眼部异常	HP:0011517	Cone monochromacy	The condition of having both rods and cones, but only a single kind of cone.  Affected individuals have good pattern vision in daylight, but cannot distinguish between colors.	锥细胞单色视	具有视杆和视锥细胞，但只有单一种类的视锥。患者在明亮的日光下视力好，但无法区分颜色。
眼部异常	HP:0011518	Dichromacy	Individuals affected by dichromacy possess only two types of cones, instead of three.	双色盲	患者只有两种类型的视锥细胞，而不是通常的三种。
眼部异常	HP:0011519	Anomalous trichromacy	Individuals with anomalous trichromacy possess three types of cones, but one of the three types of cones has an abnormal spectral sensitivity compared to normal cones.	三色视异常	三色视异常的患者具有三种类型的视锥细胞，但三种视锥细胞中的一种相对于正常视锥细胞光谱灵敏度异常。
眼部异常	HP:0011520	Deuteranomoly	A type of anomalous trichromacy associated with abnormal M photopigment, such that the absorption spectrum is shifted toward L wavelengths. Affected individuals have difficulties distinguishing between red and green.	绿色弱	异常三色视的一种，M波长感光色素异常，使得吸收光谱移向L波长，患者的红绿色觉异常。
眼部异常	HP:0011521	Deuteranopia	Complete lack of the M photopigment, which is replaced with the L photopigment.  Affected individuals tend to confuse red and green.	绿色盲	完全缺乏M波长感光色素，由L感光色素替代。患者分辨不出红色和绿色。
眼部异常	HP:0011522	Protanopia	Blue and green cones only; no functional red cones.	红色盲	只有蓝色和绿色锥体;无功能性红色视锥细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0011523	Iris cyst	An iris cyst is composed of a single cell layer of epithelium and is filled with fluid.	虹膜囊肿	虹膜囊肿由单层的上皮细胞组成，且其中充满液体。
肿瘤,眼部异常	HP:0011524	Iris melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes affecting the iris.	虹膜黑色素瘤	虹膜黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
眼部异常	HP:0011525	Iris nevus	A benign brown pigmented area over the iris representing proliferation of melanocyte cells in the stromal layer of the iris. An iris nevus can be flat or occasionally slightly elevated.	虹膜痣	虹膜上良性的褐色色素沉着，由虹膜的基质层黑色素细胞增殖形成。虹膜痣可以是扁平的或偶有轻度升高。
眼部异常	HP:0011526	Abnormality of lens shape	An abnormal shape of the `lens` (FMA:58241).	晶状体形状异常	晶状体的形态异常（FMA:58241）。
眼部异常	HP:0011527	Lentiglobus	Exaggerated curvature of the lens of the eye, producing an anterior or posterior spherical bulging.	球形晶状体	晶状体的曲率增大，导致前或后球形膨出。
眼部异常	HP:0011528	Single isolated congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital found in around 3-5% of the population and of no functional significance.	视网膜色素上皮孤立性先天性肥厚	RPE细胞上出现的界限清晰的色素沉着过多，是先天性疾病，在人群中发病率为3-5％，没有功能障碍。
眼部异常	HP:0011529	Multiple bilateral congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium	Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital.	视网膜色素上皮多重双边先天性肥厚	界限清晰的先天性色素沉着过多。
眼部异常	HP:0011530	Retinal hole	A small break in the retina.	视网膜裂孔	视网膜内的裂孔。
眼部异常	HP:0011531	Vitreitis	Inflammation of the vitreous body.	玻璃体炎	玻璃体的炎症。
眼部异常	HP:0011532	Subretinal exudate	A type of retinal exudate located in the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.	视网膜下渗出	位于神经视网膜和视网膜色素上皮细胞之间的视网膜下腔内的视网膜渗出。
眼部异常	HP:0011533	Snowflake retinal degeneration	The appearance of yellow/white crystalline-like (hence the name) spots in the retina and thickening of the peripheral part of the vitreous.	雪花状视网膜变性	玻璃体和视网膜周边部的黄/白色结晶状（因此而得名）斑点的变性。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011534	Abnormal spatial orientation of the cardiac segments	An abnormality of the cardiac segments locations in space.	心脏节段空间排布异常	心脏不同节段在空间位置上的排布异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011535	Abnormal atrial arrangement	Abnormality of the spatial relationship of the atria to other components of the heart.	心房排布异常	心房与心脏其它部位间空间关系的异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011536	Right atrial isomerism	Right atrial isomerism is characterized by bilateral triangular, morphologically right atrial, appendages, both joining the atrial chamber along a broad front with internal terminal crest.	右心房异构	右心房异构的特征是有双三角瓣，右心房样形态，有附属物，连接心房腔前部和顶部终端。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011537	Left atrial isomerism	In left atrial isomerism there is a bilateral small finger-shaped morphologically left atrial appendage joining the atrial chamber along a narrow front without an internal terminal crest.	左心房异构	两侧心房均为形态学左心房的先天性心脏异常，常伴多脾征，双侧肺均为两叶。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011538	Atrial situs inversus	Mirror image atrial arrangement, with morphologic right atrium on the left hand side and morphologic left atrium on the right hand side.	心房左右转位	形态学右心房在左手边，形态学左心房在右手边的镜像心房排列。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011539	Atrial situs ambiguous	Common atrium without defining morphologic features.	心房不定位	没有固定形态学特征的心房。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011540	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries	The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.	先天矫正型大动脉转位	病变的本质为房室以及房室动脉的连接不协调。因此，形态学右心房跨二尖瓣连接到形态左心室，然后左心室连接到肺动脉。形态学左心房跨三尖瓣连接到形态右心室，形态右心室连接到主动脉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011541	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves	Crossing of the inflow streams of the two ventricles, due to an apparent twisting of the heart about its long axis.	十字形房室瓣	由于心脏长轴的明显扭曲，导致双心室的流入流的交叉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011542	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves with superior-inferior ventricles	Criss-cross atrioventricular valves occurs with superior-inferior ventricles.	十字形房室瓣伴上下排列心室	伴随上下心室排列的十字型房室瓣。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011543	Superior-inferior ventricles without criss-cross atrioventricular valves	A type of superior-inferior ventricles which presents no criss-cross atrioventricular valves.	无十字房室瓣型上下排列心室	一种心室呈上下排列样疾病，但无十字型房室瓣。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011544	L-looping of the right ventricle	The right ventricle is abnormally positioned on the left side of the left ventricle.	右心室左袢	右心室异常地位于左心室的左侧，即右心室左袢。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011545	Abnormal connection of the cardiac segments	Abnormal connection between the cardiac segments，leading to abnormal  myocardial movement.	心脏节段连接异常	心脏节段间连接异常，导致心肌运动异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011546	Abnormal atrioventricular connection	An abnormality of the circulatory connection between atria and ventricles.	房室连接异常	心房与心室之间循环连接的异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011547	Absent left sided atrioventricular connection	Absence of left sided atrioventricular connection.	左侧房室接连缺失	左侧房室连接的缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011548	Absent right sided atrioventricular connection	Absence of right sided atrioventricular connection.	右侧房室连接缺失	右侧房室连接的缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011549	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection	Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection.	左房室连接缺失致单心室心脏	左房室连接缺失导致的单心室心脏。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011550	Biventricular heart with straddling right sided atrioventricular valve and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	A heart with two ventricles while the tension apparatus of its right sided atrioventricular valve is attached to both sides of the ventricular septum, and the left sided atrioventricular valve is absent.	双心室心脏伴右房室瓣骑跨及左房室连接缺失	心脏有双心室但右侧房室瓣膜的张力部位与室间隔的左右两侧均相连，同时左侧房室瓣缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011551	Right sided atrium to left ventricle and absent left sided atrioventricular connection	#####	右房左室连接伴左房室连接缺失。	#####
心血管系统异常	HP:0011552	Ambiguous atrioventricular connection	With left or right cardiac isomerism in a biventricular, the atrioventricular connections are perforce ambiguous, in that one of the connections is concordant (e.g., right-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic right ventricle) and one of the connections is discordant (e.g., left-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a  morphologic left ventricle).	房室连接不明	心脏异构形成左或右双心室，房室连接呈现分歧，其中一个的连接是一致的（例如，右侧的形态学右心房连接到形态学右心室）及一个的连接是不一致的（例如，左侧的形态学右心房连接到形态左心室）。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011553	Discordant atrioventricular connection	Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.	房室连接不协调	双心室心脏中右心房连接左心室或左心房连接右心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011554	Double inlet atrioventricular connection	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	双入口型房室连接	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接同一个心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011555	Double inlet left ventricle	The condition in which both atria are joined to the left ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually there is a hypoplastic right ventricle, which may be on the opposite side of the heart as usual.	左室双入口	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接左心室，通常心脏另一侧的右心室发育不良。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011556	Double inlet right ventricle	The condition in which both atria are joined to the right ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually, the left ventricle is hypoplastic.	右室双入口	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接右心室，通常心脏另一侧的左心室发育不良。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011557	Double inlet to single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. The morphology of this ventricle does not allow one to determine if it corresponds to the left or right ventricle.	#####	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室，该心室形态不足以确定是左心室或右心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011558	Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by common atrioventricular orifice.	单室双入口伴共同房室口	两个心房通过同一个房室口连接至同一个心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011559	Double inlet to single ventricle with two atrioventricular valves	The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.	单室双入口伴双房室瓣	两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011560	Mitral atresia	A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.	二尖瓣闭锁	一种先天性缺陷，二尖瓣口不能打开。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011561	Overriding atrioventricular valve	An atrioventricular valve that empties into both ventricles. The valve overrides the interventricular septum above a ventricular septum defect.	房室瓣骑跨	房室瓣汇入到两个心室。瓣膜骑跨于缺损的室间隔上。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011562	Straddling atrioventricular valve	Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.	跨界房室瓣	腱索和乳头肌异常插入室间隔缺损的对侧心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011563	Abnormal ventriculo-arterial connection	Abnormality of the connection of ventriculo and arterial.	脑室动脉连接异常	脑室与动脉之间的连接出现异常
心血管系统异常	HP:0011564	Mitral valve arcade	Anomalous mitral valve arcade is diagnosed b ased on the following features (1) An adequately sized mitral valve orifice; (2) short, thick, and poorly differentiated chordae with direct union of the papillary muscles to the anterior leaflet; (3) narrow or nearly nonexistent spaces between the abnormal chordae; and (4) greater differentiation of the chordae attached to the posterior papillary muscle.	二尖瓣弓形	二尖瓣弓形异常诊断基于以下特点（1）足够大的二尖瓣口; （2）短、厚、低分化腱索与乳头肌的前叶直接结合; （3）异常腱索之间的空间狭窄或几乎不存在的空间（4）较大的分化腱索附连到后乳头肌。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011565	Common atrium	Complete absence of the interatrial septum with common atrioventricular valve and two atrioventricular connections.	共同心房	房间隔缺损，同时房室瓣和两个房室连接正常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011566	Cor triatriatum dexter	A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.	右侧三房心	由于静脉窦右阀持续性存在导致右心房先天性被分隔，形成三个心房。通常，畸形的胎儿咽鼓管和冠状窦瓣在心房下部形成一个不完成的隔膜，引起右心房分区。这种隔膜既有网状组织也有实体组织。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011567	Sinus venosus atrial septal defect	An interatrial communication caused by a deficiency of the common wall between the superior vena cava (SVC) and the right-sided pulmonary veins. SVASD is commonly associated with anomalous pulmonary venous connection (APVC) of some or all of the pulmonary veins, which produces additional left-to-right shunting.	静脉窦型房间隔缺损	一个由上腔静脉（SVC）和右肺静脉之间的公共壁的缺陷导致的心房间通讯。静脉窦型房间隔缺损通常与一些全部或部分肺静脉异常连接有关，产生额外的左向右分流。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011568	Double orifice mitral valve	The left atrio-ventricular connection consists of two anatomically distinct orifices separated by accessory fibrous tissue.	双孔二尖瓣	左房室连接的部分主要附属纤维组织分开的两个不同的解剖口。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011569	Cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet	Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.	二尖瓣前叶裂	二尖瓣前叶裂与房室管缺陷无关。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011570	Congenital mitral stenosis	Mitral stenosis with congenital onset.	先天性二尖瓣狭窄	先天性的二尖瓣狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011571	Parachute mitral valve	Abnormality of the mitral valve apparatus, whereby chordae attach to a single papillary muscle or hypoplastic papillary muscles.	降落伞型二尖瓣	异常的二尖瓣结构，腱索连接到单一的乳头肌或发育不全的乳头肌上。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011572	Supramitral ring	A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.	二尖瓣上环	一种二尖瓣先天性狭窄，二尖瓣上部有环状组织。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011573	Hypoplastic tricuspid valve	Congenital defect characterized by underdevelopment of the tricuspid valve.	三尖瓣发育不全	三尖瓣先天性发育不全。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011574	Imperforate atrioventricular valve	An atrioventricular valve that has failed to open (atretic).	房室瓣闭锁	房室瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011575	Imperforate tricuspid valve	An tricuspid valve that has failed to open (atretic).	三尖瓣闭锁	三尖瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011576	Intermediate atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and inlet ventricular defect. There is one valve annulus and two valve orifices.	中间型房室管缺损	一种心脏缺陷，包括第一房间隔缺损，二尖瓣前叶裂口，心室入口缺损。患者有一个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011577	Partial atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects including a primum atrial septal defect and cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet. There is not an inlet ventricular septal defect present. There are two valve annuluses and two valve orifices.	部分房室管缺损	心脏缺陷的特定组合，包括第一房间隔缺损和二尖瓣前叶裂口。不存在心室入口缺损。患者有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011578	Transitional atrioventricular canal defect	A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and an inlet ventricular septal defect. There are two valve annuli and two valve orifices.	过渡型房室管缺损	一个原发孔房间隔缺损伴随裂二尖瓣前瓣叶和入口室间隔缺损的一种特殊组合的心脏缺陷，有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣膜孔存在。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011579	Unbalanced atrioventricular canal defect	Anatomic features of unbalanced atrioventricular septal defect (AVSD) include varying amounts of ventricular hypoplasia, as well as malalignment of the atrioventricular junction.	不平衡型房室管缺损	不平衡型房室管缺损（AVSD）解剖学特征包括不同等级的的心室发育不全，以及房室结的排列不齐。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011580	Short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve	Abnormally short `chordae tendineae` (FMA:76527) of the mitral valve.	二尖瓣短腱索	二尖瓣腱索的异常短小。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011581	Double outlet left ventricle	A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.	左室双出口	一种先天性心脏发育缺陷，特点是肺动脉和主动脉均从左心室发出。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011582	Abdominal ectopia cordis	Displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and into the abdomen.	腹型异位心	心脏在胸腔之外，异常地位于腹腔。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011583	Cervical ectopia cordis	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region and withouta defect of the sternum.	颈部异位心	一种颈部心脏异位，而无胸骨受损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011584	Thoracocervical ectopia cordis	A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.	胸颈异位心	一种的心脏异位，心脏部分位于颈部区域，同时胸骨上部异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011585	Thoracic ectopia cordis	Congenital malformation of the thoracic wall with partial or total displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity. This feature is associated with sternal cleft or absence of the sternum.	胸廓异位心	胸腔壁的先天畸形，心脏部分或全部置换到胸腔外。患者伴有胸骨裂或胸骨缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011586	Thoracoabdominal ectopia cordis	Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and displacement partially into the abdominal cavity.	胸腹异位心	腹壁先天性畸形，心脏的部分或全部胸腔外并部分进入腹腔。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011587	Abnormal branching pattern of the aortic arch	A deviance from the norm of the origin or course of the right brachiocephalic artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery or the  proximal vertebral arteries.	主动脉弓分支异常	右头臂动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉或近端椎动脉的起源异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011588	Cervical aortic arch	The aortic arch extends into the soft tissues of the neck before turning down into to become the descending aorta.	颈型主动脉弓	主动脉弓延伸到颈部软组织内，再转成降主动脉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011589	Common origin of the right brachiocephalic artery and left common carotid artery	The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.	右头臂干及左颈总动脉共同起源	左颈总动脉与无名动脉有一个共同的起源。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011590	Double aortic arch	A conenital abnormality of the aortic arch in which the two embryonic aortc arches form a vascular ring that surrounds the trachea or esophagus and then join to form the descending aorta. Double aortic arch can cause symptoms because of compression of the esophagus (dysphagia, cyanosis while eating) or trachea (stridor).	双主动脉弓	一种先天性的主动脉弓异常，双主动脉弓形成血管环围绕气管或食管形成降主动脉。双主动脉弓由于压迫食管和气管会引起相应症状，包括吞咽困难，紫绀，哮喘。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011591	Left aortic arch with cervical origin of the right subclavian artery	The aortic arch crosses the left main bronchus while the right subclavian artery originates abnormally high from the common carotid artery close to the bifurcation of the internal and external carotid arteries.	左位主动脉弓伴颈总动脉源型右锁骨下动脉	主动脉弓跨过左主支气管。右锁骨下动脉异常起源于颈总动脉上靠近颈内和颈外动脉分叉处。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011592	Left aortic arch with isolated subclavian artery	The subclavian artery arises from ductus arteriosus. While the ductus arteriosus is patent its blood supply comes from the ductus, hence from the pulmonary artery. After it closes, the blood supply is retrogradely from the vertebral artery via the circle of Willis.	左位主动脉弓伴孤立型锁骨下动脉	锁骨下动脉起源于动脉导管。当动脉导管未闭，血液来自动脉导管，因此也来自肺动脉。当它关闭后，血供应从椎动脉通过Willis循环逆行。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011593	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	A patent ductus arteriosus or ductal ligament completes the ring.	左位主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室	动脉导管未闭或导管韧带成环。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011594	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell	Aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus. The left carotid artery is the first branch,  right carotid artery the second branch and right subclavian artery as the third branch.	右主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室	主动脉弓跨越右主支气管。左侧颈动脉是第一分支，右颈总动脉第二分支和右锁骨下动脉是第三分支。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011595	Left aortic arch with retroesophageal right subclavian artery	Aortic arch crosses the left mainstem bronchus. The first branch is the right carotid artery, the second branch is the left carotid artery, the third branch is the subclavian artery, the fourth branch is the right subclavian artery arising from the posteromedial aspect of the distal aortic arch and continuing posterior to the esophagus to the right hand side of the body.	左位主动脉弓伴食管后右锁骨下动脉	主动脉弓跨左主支气管。第一分支是右颈动脉，第二分支是左侧颈动脉中，第三分支是锁骨下动脉，第四分支是右锁骨下动脉，起于远侧主动脉弓的后中方位接着经食道到达身体的右手侧。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011596	Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus	The aortic arch is positioned on the left side of oesophagus and trachea, and continued behind oesophagus to form the descending aorta. The two parts are connected by the ductal ligament and form a ring, which may cause trachea or oesophagus compression symptoms.	左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右动脉导管未闭	主动脉弓位于食管和气管的左侧，绕经食管后方向脊柱右侧延续为降主动脉，经动脉导管连接形成血管环，产生对气管、食管的压迫症状。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011597	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus	右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭	右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011598	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉	右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011599	Mesocardia	Mesocardia is a abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.	中位心	中位心是一种心脏位置异常，心脏位于身体中线位置且心脏的纵轴位于正中矢状面。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011600	Abnormal direction of ventricular apex	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex. Left sided is normal.	心室尖部指向异常	心脏从基部到顶点所指方向的异常。心尖向左是正常的。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011601	Rightward direction of ventricular apex	#####	心室尖向右	#####
心血管系统异常	HP:0011602	Midline direction of ventricular apex	Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex in the midline. Left sided is normal.	心室尖向中	从心脏基底部到尖部的指向异常地朝向中线方向。正常应该朝左。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011603	Congenital malformation of the great arteries	A developmental malformation of the great arteries with congenital onset.	先天性大动脉畸形	先天性发病的大动脉畸形。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011604	Aortopulmonary window	A congenital anomaly with an abnormal connection between the aorta and the main pulmonary artery resulting in an aortopulmonary shunt.	主肺动脉窗	主动脉与主肺动脉之间先天性的异常连接，导致主-肺动脉分流。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011605	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries occurs with ventricular septal defect.	先天矫正型大动脉转位伴室间隔缺损	与室间隔缺损并发的先天性矫正型大动脉转位。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011606	Transposition of the great arteries with intact ventricular septum	Transposition of the great arteries without ventricular septal defects	室间隔完整型大动脉转位	大动脉转位不伴有室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011607	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect	室间隔缺损型大动脉转位	室间隔缺损型大动脉转位。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011608	Type II truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.	II型动脉干	II型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉）两支肺动脉与分别从它的前后侧起源。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011609	Type III truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby one of the two pulmonary artery branched does not arise from the common pulmonary trunk, but instead from the ductus arteriosus or directly from the aorta.	III型动脉干	III型永存动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），其中的一个个肺动脉分支不是从常见的肺动脉主干发出而是是从动脉管或直接从主动脉发出。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011610	Type IV truncus arteriosus	Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby the aortic arch is hypoplastic or interrupted, and a large patent ductus arteriosus is present.	IV型动脉干	IV型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），由此主动脉弓发育不良或被受阻，出现一个大型动脉导管未闭。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011611	Interrupted aortic arch	Non-continuity of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768) with an atretic point or absent segment.	主动脉弓断离	非连续性“动脉弓”（FMA:3768），呈点状或节段性缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011612	Interrupted aortic arch type A	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment at the level of the isthmus.	A型主动脉弓断离	主动脉弓峡部出现的点状或节段性缺失，引起非连续性“动脉弓”。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011613	Interrupted aortic arch type B	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the left carotid and subclavian arteries.	B型主动脉弓断离	左侧颈动脉和锁骨下动脉之间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011614	Interrupted aortic arch type C	Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the innominate and left carotid arteries.	C型主动脉弓断离	无名动脉和左颈动脉间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011615	Abnormality of pulmonary situs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, which is defined by characteristics such as the number of lobes per lung and the relationship of the pulmonary arteries to their bronchi.	肺异常	肺异常，例如左右肺的分叶异常，由每侧肺的分叶数量、及肺动脉与其所属支气管的对应关系异常等确定。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011616	Pulmonary situs inversus	Mirror image arrangement of the mainstem bronchi with the right pulmonary artery posterior to the right upper lobe bronchus and the left pulmonary artery anterior to the left upper lobe bronchus.	肺脏位置逆转	主支气管的位置镜像，右肺动脉位于右上叶支气管后方，左肺动脉位于左侧上叶支气管前方。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011617	Pulmonary situs ambiguus	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which the morphology of both left and right lungs is the same.	肺脏定位模糊	肺形态定位的异常，如左右肺单侧性形态异常，体现为左侧和右侧肺有着相同的形态。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011618	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic right lungs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a right lungs.	肺脏双侧形态似右肺	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为右肺。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0011619	Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic left lungs	An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.	肺脏双侧形态似左肺	肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为左肺。
生长异常,消化系统异常	HP:0011620	Abnormality of abdominal situs	An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomin and its organs.	腹部位置异常	腹部位置的异常，即，腹部及其脏器的边界异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011621	Gerbode ventricular septal defect	A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.	Gerbode室间隔缺损	一类直接连通左心室和右心房之间的室间隔缺损。这在解剖学上可能是因为正常的三尖瓣比二尖瓣顶部移位更多。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011622	Inlet ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that involves the inlet of the right ventricular septum immediately inferior to the AV valve apparatus.	入口型室间隔缺损	位于房室瓣膜下的右室间隔入口处发生的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011623	Muscular ventricular septal defect	The trabecular septum is the largest part of the interventricular septum. It extends from the membranous septum to the apex and superiorly to the infundibular septum. A defect in the trabecular septum is called muscular VSD if the defect is completely rimmed by muscle.	肌部型室间隔缺损	小梁隔膜是室间隔最大的部分。从膜隔到尖部伸展优于到漏斗隔膜。小梁隔的缺陷如果完全由肌肉镶边被称为肌部室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011624	Apical muscular ventricular septal defect	A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.	心尖肌部型室间隔缺损	一种位于心脏顶端的肌部室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011625	Multiple muscular ventricular septal defects	The presence of more than one VSD in the muscular septum, with or without other VSD located in the peri-membranous or outlet septum, with or without associated intra-cardiac or extra-cardiac malformations.	多发肌部型室间隔缺损	室间隔肌部出现多处缺损可伴／不伴有其他部位室间隔缺损或心内／心外畸形。
心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	HP:0011626	Scimitar anomaly	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by partial anomalous pulmonary venous return from the right lung to the inferior vena cava which leads to the creation of a left-to-right shunt.	弯刀异常	部分血液从右肺动脉异常回流至下腔静脉从而导致左向右分流的一种罕见先天性心脏缺陷。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011627	Aorto-ventricular tunnel	Aorto-ventricular tunnel is a congenital, extracardiac channel which connects the ascending aorta above the sinutubular junction to the cavity of the left, or (less commonly) right ventricle.	主动脉-心室隧道	主动脉-左室隧道是一种先天性的心外通道，将升主动脉与左心室（少量右心室）腔连接。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011628	Congenital defect of the pericardium	A developmental defect of the `pericardium` (FMA:9869) with congenital onset.	先天性心包缺陷	先天性发病的心包发育缺陷。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011629	Total absence of the pericardium	No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.	完全型心包膜缺失	心脏周围没有心包膜，是先天性缺陷的一种，而不是由心包切除术所致。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011630	Complete diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	No pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	完全型膈面心包缺失	隔面心包完全缺失。它是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包在心脏的其他部分正常存在。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011631	Complete right sided absence of pericardium	No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.	完全型右侧心包缺失	心脏右侧心包完全缺失，属于先天性无心包而非心包切除术的结果。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011632	Partial right sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the righthand side of the heart.	部分型右侧心包缺失	右侧心包部分缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011633	Complete left sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with complete lack of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	完全型左侧心包缺失	心脏左侧心包的先天性完全缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011634	Partial left sided absence of pericardium	A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.	部分型左侧心包缺失	左侧心包部分缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011635	Partial diaphragmatic absence of pericardium	Lack of a part of the pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.	部分型膈面心包缺失	心脏膈面的部分心包缺失。是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包存在于心脏的其他部分。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011636	Abnormal origin of the coronary arteries	Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.	冠状动脉起源异常	单纯的冠状动脉起源异常。这可能与其它心脏结构畸形有关，但并不是复杂的心脏结构畸形导致的冠状动脉走行异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011637	Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.	肺动脉源性冠状动脉起源异常	冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011638	Anomalous origin of left coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	Left main coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the left cusp of the aortic valve.	肺动脉源性左冠状动脉起源异常	左冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011639	Anomalous origin of right coronary artery from the pulmonary artery	Right coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the right cusp of the aortic valve.	肺动脉源性右冠状动脉起源异常	右冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011640	Single coronary artery origin	The presence of a single coronary artery ostium from which both coronary arteries arise.	单一冠状动脉起源	两个冠状动脉发出位置只有单个冠状动脉孔的存在。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011641	Coronary artery fistula	A congenital malformation with abnormal connection between one of the coronary arteries and a heart chamber or another blood vessel.	冠状动脉瘘	冠状动脉与心腔或其他血管之间的先天性连接异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011642	Abnormality of the coronary sinus	An abnormality of the `coronary sinus` (FMA:4706). The coronary sinus is formed by the union of the great cardiac vein and the left marginal vein and terminates in the right atrium.	冠状窦异常	冠状窦的异常。冠状窦是由心大静脉和左缘静脉汇合而成并终止在右心房的大血管样结构。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011643	Coronary sinus atrial septal defect	An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.	冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损	伴随冠状静脉窦与左心房连接的组织缺损的房间隔缺损。这将导致冠状窦的部分或全部去顶，引起通过冠状窦的左向右分流（左心房流向冠状动脉窦然后到右心房（RA））。由于血流量增大，窦孔逐渐变大。右心房的缺损主要存在于冠状窦口，也包括窦口周围的心房组织缺损。左心房缺损的大小依赖于冠状窦去顶的程度。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011644	Coronary sinus diverticulum	A venous pouch within the left ventricular wall, with a neck opening into the coronary sinus.	冠状窦憩室	左心室壁内的静脉袋，具有一颈口进入冠状静脉窦。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011645	Sinus of Valsalva aneurysm	The dilatation of the aortic wall behind each of the cusps of the aortic valve.	主动脉窦瘤	主动脉瓣尖后的主动脉壁扩张。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011646	Juxtaductal coarctation of the aorta	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized at the insertion of the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `juxtaductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3778).	导管旁主动脉缩窄	位于动脉导管接入处（如主动脉弓管旁区，FMA:3778）的主动脉缩窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011647	Postductal coarctation of the aorta	Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized distal to the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `postductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3776).	导管后主动脉缩窄	动脉导管远端的主动脉狭窄或缩窄（FMA:3776）。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011648	Patent ductus arteriosus after birth at term	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus in postnatal life when birth was at 37 completed weeks of gestation or greater.	足月儿动脉导管未闭	足月出生（妊娠37周或更长时间）的婴儿，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011649	Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth	Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.	早产儿动脉导管未闭	婴儿在少于完整的37周妊娠期出生时，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011650	Bilateral ductus arteriosus	The presence of both a left and a right ductus arteriosus.	双侧动脉导管	含有左、右两个动脉导管。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011651	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。双交通室间隔缺损（double committed ventricular septal defect）:此型缺损在右心室双出口罕见，约占3%～4%。两大动脉多为并列关系。由于此缺损位于室间隔上方和漏斗隔严重发育不全或缺如，所以缺损则位于两大动脉环的下方。两大动脉瓣环为缺损后上缘，缺损的前下缘为隔缘束的上支，后下缘为隔缘束下支。往往无主动脉下圆锥或仅在室间隔缺损和两大动脉瓣环之间有一窄条肌肉束，可伴有主动脉与二尖瓣或肺动脉与三尖瓣纤维连续。心脏传导束离开缺损边缘较远，很少因手术产生心脏传导阻滞。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011652	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011653	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。非交通型室间隔缺损（noncommitted或remote ventricular septal defect）:此缺损比较少见，在右心室双出口中占5%～8%。两大动脉多呈并列关系，右侧大动脉异位少见。远离两大动脉室间隔缺损合并Rastelli的C型完全性房室隔缺损比较多见，往往有脾脏异常、单心房或内脏异位。不合并完全性房室隔缺损者，两大动脉开口与室间隔缺损之间有3～5个三尖瓣乳头肌及其腱索，缺损位于隔瓣后，属于流入部室间隔缺损，房室结位置正常，希氏束和左束支走行于缺损后上缘室间隔左心室面；缺损位于三尖瓣前瓣和隔瓣之间，属于围膜部缺损，心脏传导束走行于缺损后下缘室间隔左心室面。此型室间隔缺损可有心房反位或合并左心室发育不全。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011654	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011655	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011656	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011657	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。肺动脉下室间隔缺损（subpulmonary ventricular septal defect）:右心室双出口伴有肺动脉下室间隔缺损又称Taussig-Bing心脏畸形（Taussig-Bing malformation）。右心室双出口中占20%～30%，多为两大动脉并列，占73%。在此心脏畸形中，均有漏斗隔对位异常。室间隔缺损位于室间隔前上方。如有肺动脉下圆锥，圆锥肌肉构成室间隔缺损上缘，其后下缘可延伸至三尖瓣环；如无肺动脉下圆锥，则缺损侧位于肺动脉瓣环下方。根据肺动脉横跨程度，缺损后上缘为肺动脉瓣与二尖瓣或三尖瓣纤维连续或肺动脉瓣环，其后下缘为肌肉室间隔。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011658	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄	右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011659	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent pulmonary valve	Features of tetralogy of Fallot with either rudimentary ridges or the complete absence of pulmonic valve tissue.	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣缺失	以脊部发育不全或完全没有肺动脉瓣组织为特点的法洛四联症。
心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	HP:0011660	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from the ascending aorta with the contralateral pulmonary artery arising from the right ventricle.	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉，而对侧肺动脉起源于右心室。
心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常	HP:0011661	Anomalous origin of left pulmonary artery from ascending aorta	The left pulmonary artery originates from the ascending aorta in the presence of a pulmonary valve and main pulmonary artery.	左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉	在肺动脉瓣和肺主动脉存在的情况下，左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011662	Tricuspid atresia	Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.	三尖瓣闭锁	三尖瓣发育障碍导致右心房和右心室之间无法正常连接。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011663	Right ventricular cardiomyopathy	Right ventricular dysfunction (global or regional) with functional and morphological right ventricular abnormalities, with or without left ventricular disease.	右室心肌病	右心功能不全（全部或部分）与功能和形态右心室发育异常，伴或不伴有左心室疾病。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011664	Left ventricular noncompaction cardiomyopathy	Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.	左室致密化不全心肌病	左室致密化不全性心肌病（LVNC）的特征是有显着的左心室小梁和深间小梁壁凹。心肌壁往往增厚，伴随薄且致密的心外膜层和增厚的心内膜层。在一些患者中，LVNC与左心室扩张和收缩功能障碍有关，在新生儿种可能只是瞬时的现象。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011665	Takotsubo cardiomyopathy	takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation.	应激性心肌病	应激性心肌病的特征是通过血管造影术并未发现冠脉阻滞症状但却出现了涉及左心室心尖和/或中心室的短暂局部收缩功能障碍。患者表现为突发性的胸绞痛和弥漫性T波倒置，有时会有ST段抬高和轻度心肌酶升高。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011666	Absent right superior vena cava	Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.	右上腔静脉缺失	右上腔静脉（RSVC）的缺失。右上腔静脉的缺失常与永存左上腔静脉（PLSVC）有关。胎儿正常发育过程中，左侧前静脉离开冠状窦（CS）和Marshall韧带后，系统性退化。左侧前静脉的关闭不全导致右上腔静脉的缺失。在一般情况下，PLSVC与右上腔静脉（RSVC）连接，通过扩张的CS汇入RA。在较早阶段发育停滞时，CS缺失，PLSVC汇入进入左心房。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011667	Bilateral superior vena cava with bridging vein	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava and bridging vein.	双侧上腔静脉伴桥静脉	双侧上腔静脉与桥静脉同时存在。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011668	Bilateral superior vena cava with no bridging vein	The presence of bilateral superior vena cava without bridging vein.	双侧上腔静脉不伴桥静脉	只存在双侧上腔静脉，不含有桥静脉。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011669	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium	左上腔静脉接左心房	左上腔静脉直接将血液输送至左心房，正常应该至右心房。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011670	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus	左上腔静脉接冠状窦	左上腔静脉引流至冠状窦，正常应该至右心房。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011671	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation	Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation is the result of connection failure between the right subcardinal vein and the right vitelline vein. Consequently, venous blood from the caudal part of the body reaches the heart via the azygous vein and superior vena cava.	下腔静脉中断伴奇静脉延续	中断下腔静脉伴奇静脉延续是右下主静脉和右卵黄静脉之间的连接失败的结果。因此，从机体的尾部静脉血液经由奇静脉和上腔静脉到达心脏。
肿瘤,心血管系统异常	HP:0011672	Cardiac myxoma	A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.	心脏粘液瘤	心脏的粘液瘤（原生结缔组织肿瘤）。心脏粘液瘤由存在于粘液样基质中的星形、丰满的、表面光滑的细胞构成。心脏粘液瘤是由心内膜起源，由心内膜扩散到心腔。
肿瘤,心血管系统异常	HP:0011673	Cardiac hemangioma	Abnormal proliferation of blood vessels within the cardiac cavities attached to the endocardium.	心脏血管瘤	连接心腔与心内膜血管的异常增生。
肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常,心血管系统异常	HP:0011674	Cardiac teratoma	A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.	心脏畸胎瘤	在心脏内的畸胎瘤，一般，存在于与肺动脉和主动脉相连的心包腔内，直径大约2至9厘米，已报道的最大肿瘤15cm。心内的肿瘤起源于心房或心室壁的结节状肿块，扩散到心腔。由于其异质性以及包裹性囊性肿块，心脏和心包中的畸胎瘤很容易通过胎儿和新生儿的二维超声心动图检测到。组织学上，心脏畸胎瘤包含多个组分，包括上皮细胞、神经胶质组织、甲状腺、胰腺、平滑肌、横纹肌、软骨和骨。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011675	Arrhythmia	Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.	心律失常	非正常窦性心律的其他心律。这样的心律可能是窦或异位的起源，有的规律有的不规律。心律失常由心脏搏动的起源或传导紊乱引起。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011676	Tetralogy of Fallot with absent subarterial conus	A form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by no subarterial conus.	法洛四联症伴瓣下圆锥缺失	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为瓣下圆锥的缺失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011677	Tetralogy of Fallot with atrioventricular canal defect	An form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by defect of atrioventricular canal.	法洛四联症伴房室管缺陷	法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为房室管存在缺陷。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011678	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries	A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).	法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁及主肺动脉侧支动脉	法洛四联症合并肺动脉闭锁的一种，患者肺部的血液主要从体肺侧支动脉（MAPCA）流入。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011679	Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary stenosis	The commonest form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy, without pulmonary atresia, absent pulmonary valve, atrioventricular canal defect or absent subarterial conus.	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄	法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄是法洛四联症的一种最常见的形式，主要特征为肺动脉狭窄，主动脉骑跨，室间隔缺损，右心室肥大，无肺动脉闭锁，肺动脉瓣缺如，房室管缺陷或缺失下动脉圆锥。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011680	Single ventricle of indeterminate morphology	A rare congenital heart defect characterized by one ventricle with indeterminate morphology and receiving both tricuspid and mitral valves or a common AV valve with indeterminate morphology.	不定形单心室	一种罕见的先天性心脏畸形，人体只有一个形态不确定的心室，同时具有三尖瓣和二尖瓣，或一个形态不确定的共同房室瓣。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011681	Subarterial ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that lies beneath the semilunar valve(s) in the conal or outlet septum.	动脉下室间隔缺损	动脉下室间隔缺损是一种在半月瓣之下或隔膜外发生的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011682	Perimembranous ventricular septal defect	A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.	膜周型室间隔缺损	膜周型室间隔缺损是与膜性中隔汇合、涉及膜性中隔、以房室瓣为界、不包括3型房室间隔缺损的一类房室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011683	Restrictive ventricular septal defect	Ventricular septal defect (VSD) that is small enough to restrict flow across it such that a pressure gradient exists between the two sides of the VSD.	限制型室间隔缺损	室间隔缺损（VSD），是室间隔太小使得两侧之间存在压力梯度，限制了通过的血流量。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011684	Non-restrictive ventricular septal defect	Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.	非限制型室间隔缺损	不限制血流经过，但足以在室间隔两侧产生压力梯度的室间隔缺损。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011685	Infra-aortic superior vena cava	The superior vena cava passes below the aortic arch.	主动脉下上腔静脉	上腔静脉从主动脉弓下方通过。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011686	Abnormal coronary artery course	An abnormal path of a coronary artery.	冠状动脉走行异常	冠状动脉血管走向的异常。

心血管系统异常	HP:0011699	Atrial reentry tachycardia	Atrial tachycardia (IART) is a kind of atrial tachycardia caused by reentry mechanism.	心房折返性心动过速	心房折返性心动过速是由于折返机制引起的一种房性心动过速。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011700	Automatic atrial tachycardia	Automatic atrial tachycardia refers to a kind of tachycardia ，because of the automaticity intensity of ectopic pacemaker in atrial increased，speed up the frequency of excited release.	自律性房性心动过速	自律性房性心动过速（AAT）是指心房内异位起搏点自律性强度增高，发放激动的频率加快所引起的房性心动过速。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011701	Multifocal atrial tachycardia	A type of tachycardia,which is resulted from alternating impulse origined from multiple ectopic pacemaker in the atrial.	多灶性房性心动过速	是由于心房内多个异位起搏点交替发放冲动形成的房性心动过速。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011702	Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin	An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.	窦房结源性电生理异常	位于右心房的窦房结（SA）的异常。窦房结起着心脏起搏器的作用。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011703	Sinus tachycardia	A simple tachycardia with origin in the sinus node with gradual onset and termination.	窦性心动过速	一种单纯的心动过速，起源于窦房结，启动和终止都比较缓慢。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011704	Sick sinus syndrome	Dysfunction of the sinoatrial node manifested by persistent sinus bradycardia,sinus arrest,sinoatrial exit block,chronic atrial fibrillation and inability of the heart to resume sinus rhythm following cardioversion for atrial fibrillation.	病窦综合征	窦房结功能障碍表现为持续性窦性心律过缓，窦性停搏，窦房输出阻滞，慢性房颤和房颤电复律后心动无力。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011705	First degree atrioventricular block	Delay of conduction through the atrioventricular node, which is manifested as prolongation of the PR interval in the electrocardiogram (EKG). All atrial impulses reach the ventricles.	一度房室传导阻滞	通过房室结点的传导迟滞，这表现为在心电图（EKG）中的PR间隔延长。所有的心房冲动到达心室。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011706	Second degree atrioventricular block	An intermittent  atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.	二度房室传导阻滞	一种脉冲不能正常的从心房传导至心室的间歇性房室传导阻滞，也就是说，有一些但不是所有的心房冲动能通过房室结传导进而触发心室收缩。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011707	Mobitz I atrioventricular block	Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).	默比茨I型房室传导阻滞	心电图表现为PR间期逐渐延长直至QRS波群脱落（P波不能下传），RR间期逐渐缩短直至一个P波不能下传，包含受阻P波在内的RR间期小于正常窦性PP间期的两倍。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011708	Mobitz II atrioventricular block	A type of second degree atrioventricular (AV) block characterized by sudden failure to conduct an impulse through the AV node without a preceding change in the PR interval.	默比茨II型房室传导阻滞	心电图表现为PR间期固定，每隔一个或数个心动周期出现一个或数个心室漏搏，下传心动周期的PR间期可正常或延长。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011709	Atrioventricular dissociation	Atrioventricular (AV) dissociation is present if the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers.  AV dissociation can occur is the absence of a primary AV conduction disturbance.	房室分离	房室（AV）分离是指心房和心室分别由两个单独的起搏器的控制，一般由一级房室传导受阻导致。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011710	Bundle branch block	Block of conduction of electrical impulses along the Bundle of His or along one of its bundle branches.	束支传导阻滞	房室束或其分支的电流传导阻滞。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011711	Left anterior fascicular block	Conduction block in the anterior division of the left bundle branch of the bundle of His.	左前分支传导阻滞	在希氏束左束支的前分支传导阻滞。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011712	Right bundle branch block	A conduction block of the right branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a prolongation of the QRS complex (greater than 0.12 s) with delayed activation of the right ventricle and terminal delay on the EKG.	右束支传导阻滞	希氏束的右支的传导阻滞。这表现为QRS波群（大于0.12s）的延长同时伴有右心室激活延迟和EKG的终端延迟。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011713	Left bundle branch block	A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.	左束支传导阻滞	希氏束左支传导阻滞。这表现为心电图上QRS波形态受到广泛干扰。
心血管系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0011714	Libman-Sacks lesions	Libman-Sacks valvular lesions are sterile fibrofibrinous vegetations that favor the left-sided heart valves and usually form on the ventricular surface of the mitral valve.	利布曼－萨克斯病变	利布曼-萨克斯瓣膜病变是非细菌性纤维素赘生物，好发于左侧心脏瓣膜，通常在二尖瓣的心室表面形成。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011715	Trifascicular block	Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.	三支传导阻滞	心室内传导组织的三个分支全部异常传导。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011716	Junctional ectopic tachycardia	A tachycardia arising in the conduction tissues surrounding the atrioventricular node. It usually occurs during myocardial infarction,after heart surgery,or in digitalis intoxication. The rate may range from 140 to 250 beats per minute.	交界性异位心动过速	起源于房室结附近传导组织的心动过速。通常发生于心脏手术后或洋地黄中度引起的心肌梗死。心率可能在140-250/分。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011717	AV nodal reentry tachycardia	An unusually fast heart rate caused by an extra electrical connection that forms through the AV node	房室结折返性心动过速	房室结处形成的额外电连接，引起异常的心动过速。

心血管系统异常	HP:0011725	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia	Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia is a kind of rare and unique atrial arrhythmia.	紊乱性多源性房性心动过速	紊乱性房性心动过速是一种少见的独特的房性心律失常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0011726	Persistent fetal circulation	A syndrome of persistent pulmonary hypertension in the newborn infant,without demonstrable cardiac disease. It is characterized by cyanosis and acidosis,severe pulmonary vasoconstriction, hypertrophy of pulmonary arterial muscle,and elevated pulmonary vascular resistance,with resultant right-to-left shunting of blood through a patent ductus arteriosus and at times a patent foramen ovale.	持续性胎儿循环	指出生时动脉导管和卵圆孔未闭,当肺动脉压及肺血管阻力升高,导致右向左分流而引起新生儿青紫。
肌肉组织异常,肢体异常	HP:0011727	Peroneal muscle weakness	Weakness of the peroneal muscles.	腓骨肌无力	无力的腓骨肌。
神经系统异常	HP:0011728	Elbow clonus	Clonus at the elbow joint, i.e., an  exaggerated phasic stretch reflex characterized by repetitive, rhythmic contractions at the elbow, generated by rapid passive stretch at the elbow joint.	肘部阵挛	在肘关节发生的阵挛，例如出现夸张的牵张反射，表现为肘部重复的，有节奏的收缩，通常是快速的被动牵拉肘关节产生的。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0011729	Abnormality of joint mobility	An abnormality in the range and ease of motion of joints across their normal range.	关节活动异常	关节活动范围和灵活度的异常。
神经系统异常	HP:0011730	Abnormality of central sensory function	An abnormality of cortical sensation. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function usually indicates a lesion of a parietal cortex or of the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex.	中央感觉功能异	皮质性感觉的异常。假设初级感觉形态完好，且患者处于觉醒和协作状态，感觉功能异常的存在通常表明的丘脑突起到顶叶皮质的病变。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011731	Abnormality of circulating cortisol level	An abnormality of the concentration of "cortisol" (CHEBI:17650) in the blood.	血皮质醇水平异常	血液循环中皮质醇浓度异常。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011732	Abnormality of adrenal morphology	Any structural anomaly of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).	肾上腺形态异常	肾上腺的任何结构异常。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011733	Abnormality of adrenal physiology	A functional abnormality of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).	肾上腺生理异常	肾上腺的功能异常（FMA:9604）。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011734	Central adrenal insufficiency	A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.	中枢性肾上腺功能不全	由于促肾上腺皮质激素缺乏, 导致皮质醇产生减少引起的肾上腺功能不全。醛固酮的产生通常不受影响。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011735	Adrenocorticotropin (ACTH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in ACTH production.	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）缺乏性肾上腺功能不全	促肾上腺皮质激素的产生缺陷导致的肾上腺功能不全。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011736	Primary hyperaldosteronism	A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by a defect within the adrenal gland.	原发性醛固酮增多症	由于肾上腺缺陷而引起的醛固酮过多症。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011737	Corticotropin-releasing hormone (CRH) deficient adrenal insufficiency	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）缺陷引起的肾上腺功能不全	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素产生缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0011738	Corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor (CRHR) defect	Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in the corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor.	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体（CRHR）缺陷	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。

内分泌系统异常	HP:0011740	Glucocorticoid-insensitive primary hyperaldosteronism	A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone cannot be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone or similar glucocorticoids.	糖皮质激素不敏感的原发性醛固酮增多症	原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，其醛固酮的过量产生无法用地塞米松或类似的糖皮质激素抑制。

神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0011754	Pituicytoma	A solid, low grade, spindle cell, glial neoplasm of adults that originates in the neurohypophysis or infundibulum. Clinical signs and symptoms include visual disturbance, headache and features of hypopituitarism. Pituicytomas are well-circumscribed, solid masses that can measure up to several centimeters. Histologically, they show a compact architecture consisting of elongate, bipolar spindle cells arranged in interlacing fascicles or assuming a storiform pattern.	垂体细胞瘤	成人的一种实体性的，低分级的，梭形细胞神经胶质肿瘤，起源于神经垂体或垂体漏斗部。临床症状包括视力障碍，头痛和垂体功能低下的特点。 垂体细胞瘤是边界清楚的实体性肿块，直径可达数厘米。组织学上表现为拉长的双极梭形细胞以交错束状或席纹状图案排列的紧凑结构。
神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0011755	Ectopic posterior pituitary	An abnormal anatomical location of the posterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628). The posterior pituitary is normally present in the dorsal portion of the sella turcica, but when ectopic is usually near the median eminence. This defect is likely to be due to abnormal migration during embryogenesis.	垂体后叶异位	垂体后叶，即神经垂体的解剖位置异常。垂体后叶通常位于蝶鞍背部，但是发生异位时通常接近正中隆起。这种缺陷可能是由于胚胎发育过程中的异常迁移。

The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.	三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症	一种肾脏移植手术后出现的甲状旁腺功能亢进症。肾移植可以缓解继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进，大多数病人的血钙和甲状旁腺激素会趋向正常化，如果仍持续存在高血钙和甲状旁腺功能亢进则称为三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进。

This can be tested by using special calipers whose points can be set from 2mm to several centimeters apart.	两点辨别觉障碍	区别相互靠近的两点触觉的能力下降。测验使用特殊的卡尺，其两点可设置为2毫米到几厘米。
神经系统异常	HP:0011811	Impaired touch localization	A reduced ability to identify precisely the site of a touch. This test is usually carried out by asking a patient, whose eyes are closed or covered, to touch the same site with a fingertip.	定位障碍	准确地识别触摸部位的能力下降。测试要求病人闭眼或盖住眼睛，用指尖触摸同一部位。
神经系统异常	HP:0011812	Agraphesthesia	Impaired ability to recognize letters or numbers drawn by an examiner&#39;s fingertip on the patient&#39;s skin (the patients eyes are closed or covered throughout this examination).	图写感丧失	辨认病检查者用指尖在病人皮肤上绘制的字母或数字的能力的损坏（检查过程中患者闭眼或视线被阻挡）。
神经系统异常	HP:0011813	Increased cerebral lipofuscin	Lipofuscin (age pigment) is a brown-yellow, electron-dense, autofluorescent material that accumulates progressively over time in lysosomes of postmitotic cells, such as neurons and cardiac myocytes.  This term pertains if there is an increase in the accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.	脑脂褐素增加	脂褐素（老年斑）是一种棕黄色的，电子致密的，自体荧光材料，随着时间推移逐步沉积于有丝分裂后细胞的溶酶体，如神经元和心肌细胞。此术语适用于脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0011814	Increased urinary hypoxanthine	An increased level of `hypoxanthine` (CHEBI:17368) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).	尿次黄嘌呤增高	在`urine`（FMA:12274）的`hypoxanthine`水平升高（17368 CHEBI）。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0011815	Cephalocele	A congenital defect in the skull, whereby there is a protrusion of part of the cranial contents through a congenital defect in the cranium, usually covered with skin or mucous membrane. The term encephalocele refers to a subclass of these lesions in which brain tissue protrudes through the defect.	脑膨出	部分颅内容物通过颅骨先天性畸形从颅骨突起的颅骨先天性缺陷，通常有皮肤或粘膜覆盖。该术语指这些病变中脑组织通过缺陷而突出的亚类。
神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0011816	Parietal encephalocele	An encephalocele located between bregma and lambda.	顶叶脑膨出	位于前囟和人字缝与矢状缝交界处之间的脑膨出。
神经系统异常,骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0011817	Basal encephalocele	Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.	基底脑膨出	基底脑膨出是发生沿筛板或通过蝶骨的膨出。膨出物质可能会出现在鼻腔，鼻咽，鼻旁咽，蝶窦，后眼眶，或翼腭窝。与其他类型的重要区别是除了巨大的膨出物压迫至使从嘴巴或鼻孔突出的罕见情况，没有外部肿块可见。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011903	Hemoglobin H	Hemoglobin H (HbH) contains four beta-globin chains. It is normally not present at all in blood, but may make up about 1-40 percent of all hemoglobin in HbH disease, a subform of alpha thalassemia.	血红蛋白H	血红蛋白H（血红蛋白H）包含四个β球蛋白链。正常情况下不会出现，但在血红蛋白H病中（α-地中海贫血的一种亚型）可达约1-40％。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011904	Persistence of hemoglobin F	Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine  development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobiin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.	胎儿血红蛋白F持续存在	血红蛋白F（HbF）含有两条α链球蛋白和两条γ链球蛋白。HbF是胎儿血红蛋白的主要形式，存在于子宫内发育的最后七个月至出生后的半年。在成人中，通常它少于总血红蛋白的百分之一。此术语指HbF的增加超过1%的情况。在重型β地中海贫血中，它可能总占血红蛋白的90％以上；在轻型地中海贫血中，HbF通常在0.5%-4％之间。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011905	Reduced hemoglobin A	Hemoglobin A (HbA) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin beta chains. HbA is normally the main adult hemoglobin, representing about 96-98 percent of all hemoglobin. This term represents a decreased in the proportion of HbA below this limit, and can be seen in various forms of thalassemia.	血红蛋白A降低	血红蛋白（HbA）包含两条α链珠蛋白和两条β链珠蛋白。HbA通常是成人血红蛋白的主要成分，约占所有血红蛋白的96-98％左右。这个术语表示的HbA的比例低于96%，常见于各种形式地中海贫血。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011906	Reduced beta/alpha synthesis ratio	A reduction in the ratio of production of beta globin to that of alpha globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of beta thalassemia.	β/α合成比降低	β/α球蛋白合成比例减少。这是在各种形式的β地中海的主要异常。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011907	Reduced alpha/beta synthesis ratio	A reduction in the ratio of production of alpha globin to that of beta globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of alpha thalassemia.	α/β合成比降低	α球蛋白的产生少于β球蛋白。这是在各种形式的α地中海贫血的主要异常表型。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,呼吸系统异常	HP:0011920	Transudative pleural effusion	A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light&#39;s criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	漏出性胸腔积液	漏出性胸腔积液（具有低蛋白含量和低比重特点）。根据light标准，可将胸腔积液分为漏出液和渗出液，符合以下一项或多项为渗出液:（1）胸水蛋白与血清蛋白的比率大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）与血清LDH比率大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于三分之二的正常血清LDH的上限。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡,呼吸系统异常	HP:0011921	Exudative pleural effusion	A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light&#39;s criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.	渗出性胸腔积液	一种具有渗出液的胸膜腔积液，渗出液为组织或其毛细血管因损伤或炎症而渗出的血管外液。胸腔积液分类基于Light标准，依据该标准，渗出液应符合以下至少一条:（1）胸水白蛋白/血清白蛋白的比值大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）/血清LDH比值大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于正常血清LDH上的限三分之二。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0011945	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia	Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (BOOP) is and interstitial lung abnormalitiy characterized  histopathologically by plugs of granulation tissue lying within small airways, alveolar ducts, and alveoli and by chronic inflammatory cell infiltration in alveolar walls. Patients with BOOP generally present with subacute illness, including shortness of breath, fever, malaise, and weight loss.	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎	闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎（BOOP）是肺间质疾病的一种，组织病理学特征为肉芽组织阻塞小气道、肺泡管、肺泡，同时伴有肺泡壁的慢性炎细胞浸润。BOOP患者一般表现为亚急性起病，包括呼吸急促、发烧、全身乏力、体重减轻等。

消化系统异常	HP:0011954	Nodular regenerative hyperplasia of liver	Diffuse benign transformation of the hepatic parenchyma into small regenerative nodules with minimal or no fibrosis.	肝脏结节性再生性增生	肝实质向小的再生性结节的弥漫性良性转化，伴随细微的纤维化或无纤维化。
消化系统异常,血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0011955	Hepatic granulomatosis	The presence of multiple granulomas in the liver as based on pathological examination. Granulomas are small 0.5 to 2 mm collections of modified macrophages called epithelioid cells usually surrounded by lymphocytes.	肝肉芽肿	基于病理检测的肝脏中多个肉芽肿的存在。肉芽肿大小为0.5-2毫米，上皮样细胞（修饰后的巨噬细胞）聚集形成，周围是淋巴细胞。
消化系统异常	HP:0011956	Intestinal lymphoid nodular  hyperplasia	A lymphoproliferative abnormality of the intestine characterized by numerous visible mucosal nodules measuring up to, and rarely exceeding, 0.5 cm in diameter Histologically, hyperplastic lymphoid follicles with large germinal centres are seen in the lamina propria and superficial submucosa. There is enlargement of the mucosal B cell follicles caused by hyperplasia of the follicle centres; surrounded by a normal appearing mantle zone. Disease may involve the stomach, the entire small intestine, and the large intestine.	肠道淋巴组织样结节性增生	肠淋巴组织异常增生，其特征为大量可见的粘膜结节，直径可达或偶尔超过0.5cm。在组织学上，在固有层和粘膜下层浅层可见增生的淋巴滤泡伴有大的生发中心。滤泡中心增生引起粘膜B细胞滤泡增大，由表观正常的套区围绕。该病可累及胃、整个小肠和大肠。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0011957	Abnormality of the pectoral muscle	An abnormality of the `pectoral muscle` (FMA:37349), comprising the pectoralis major, a thick, fan-shaped muscle of the anterior chest and the pectoralis minor, a thin, triangular muscle situated underneath the pectoralis major.	胸肌异常	胸肌异常，包括胸大肌（前胸部厚且呈扇形的肌肉）和胸小肌（薄且呈三角的肌肉，位于胸大肌的下面）异常。
眼部异常	HP:0011958	Retinal perforation	A small hole through the whole thickness of the retina.	视网膜穿孔	穿过视网膜全层的小孔。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0011959	Unilateral hypoplasia of pectoralis major muscle	Hypoplasia (underdevelopment) of the `pectoralis major` (FMA:13109) on only one side of the chest.	单侧胸大肌发育不全	只有一侧胸大肌发育不全。
神经系统异常	HP:0011960	Substantia nigra gliosis	The presence of `gliosis` (MPATH:182) in the `substantia nigra` (FMA:67947).	黑质神经胶质增生	存在于黑质内的（FMA:67947）神经胶质增生（MPATH:182）。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0011961	Non-obstructive azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from a defect in the production of spermatozoa in the testes. Can be differentiated from obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	非梗阻性无精症	由于睾丸生成精子缺陷导致病人精液中没有任何可测水平的精子，睾丸活检可以将之与梗阻性无精症相鉴别。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0011962	Obstructive azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from post-testicular obstruction or retrograde ejaculation. Can be differentiated from non-obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.	梗阻性无精症	由于睾丸后梗阻或逆行性射精造成病人精液中没有任何可测水平的精子。睾丸活检可将之与非梗阻性无精症相鉴别。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0011963	Pretesticular azoospermia	Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, due to a hypothalamic or pituitary abnormality diagnosed with hypo-gonadotropic-hypogonadism. The diagnosis is made on the basis of low LH and FSH levels and low or normal testosterone levels.	睾丸前无精症	由于下丘脑或垂体异常导致的低促性腺-性腺功能减退，使精液中缺乏任何可测水平的精子。根据LH和FSH水平低、睾酮水平低（或正常）即可作出该项诊断。
神经系统异常	HP:0011964	Intermittent painful muscle spasms	History of repeated intermittent involuntary muscle contractions that were painful.	间歇性痛性肌痉挛	反复、间歇性、伴疼痛的、不自主的肌肉收缩的病史。

心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0011971	Dermatographic urticaria	An exaggerated wealing tendency when the skin is stroked, that is, formation of red, itchy bumps and lines on the skin as a result of pressure on the skin (for instance, stroking the skin with a pen or tongue depressor).	皮肤划痕症	搔抓或用钝器（笔或压舌板）划过皮肤后出现明显的红色条状隆起，伴瘙痒。

消化系统异常	HP:0011983	Brown pigment gallstones	A type of pigment gallstone that is brown, containing calcium fatty acids. These stones are softer than black pigment gallstones.	褐色素胆结石	一种有色素的胆结石，结石为棕色，含有脂肪酸钙。该结石硬度较黑色胆结石软。

心血管系统异常	HP:0011995	Atrial septal aneurysm	A bulging of  the `interatrial septum` (FMA:7108) towards one side. IN adults, atrial septal aneurysm can be defined as a protrusion of the aneurysm of &gt;10 mm beyond the plane of the atrial septum as measured by transesophageal echocardiography.	房间隔动脉瘤	向一侧凸起的房间隔。在成人中，通过食道超声心动图，房间隔动脉瘤可以定义为突出房间隔平面10毫米以上的动脉瘤凸起。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0011996	Elevated factor V activity	Increased activity of coagulation factor V, Factor V, which is activated to factor Va by means of minute amounts of thrombin (and inactivated by larger amounts of thrombin). Activated factor V (fVa)  is a cofactor in the formation of the prothrombinase complex.	V因子活性升高	凝血因子V活性增加。凝血因子V由微量的凝血酶激活后形成因子Va，（然后由较大量的凝血酶灭活）。活化的V因子（FVA）是凝血酶原酶复合物形成的辅因子。

神经系统异常	HP:0012002	Experiential auras	Affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual auras with subjective qualities similar to those experienced in life but are recognized by the subject as occurring outside of actual context.	体验先兆	情感，记忆或复合感性的先兆，与曾经经历的生活类似（似曾相识），但主体能认识到发生在现实环境之外的主观感受。
神经系统异常	HP:0012003	Affective auras	Affective auras with subjective qualities similar to those experienced in life but are recognized by the subject as occurring outside of actual context.	情感光环	情感的光环与主观品质相似经历的生活，但被拍摄对象的实际发生的背景之外认可。
神经系统异常	HP:0012004	Mnemonic auras	Auras which reflect ictal dysmnesia such as: feelings as familiarity (d??j??-vu) and unfamiliarity (jamais-vu).	记忆先兆	反映发作性记忆障碍的先兆，如:熟悉感（似曾相识）和不熟悉感（似不相识）。
神经系统异常	HP:0012005	Deja vu	A subjective feeling that an experience which is occurring for the first time has been experienced before.	似曾相识的感觉	这是一个主观感觉，首次发生的体验，好像之前已经经历过。
神经系统异常	HP:0012006	Jamais vu	A subjective feeling that an experience which has occurred before is being experienced for the first time.	似不相识	第一次感受到之前已发生的体验的一种主观感觉。
神经系统异常	HP:0012007	Hallucinatory auras	Auras with creation of composite perceptions without corresponding external stimuli involving visual, auditory, somatosensory, olfactory and/or gustatory phenomena.	幻觉先兆	不具有相应外界刺激的复合感觉先兆，涉及视觉，听觉，体感，嗅觉和/或味觉的现象。
神经系统异常	HP:0012008	Illusory auras	Auras with an alteration of actual percepts involving the visual, auditory, somatosensory, olfactory or gustatory systems.	错觉先兆	伴随真实感觉改变的先兆，涉及视觉，听觉，体感，嗅觉或味觉系统。

心血管系统异常	HP:0012021	Persistent patent ductus venosus	Persistence of blood flow through the ductus venosus for longer than the normal time after birth.	持续性静脉导管未闭	出生后血流持续通过静脉导管，血流流经时间比正常时间长。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012022	Congenital portosystemic venous shunt	A congenital defect of the vasculature such that there is a shunt (by-pass) of blood directly from the portal vein to the vena cava (i.e., the blood from the portal vein is not filtered through the liver).	先天性静脉门体分流	血管的先天畸形，血液由门静脉直接注入下腔静脉（即门静脉的血液不经肝脏过滤）。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0012035	Steatocystoma multiplex	Multiple, localized or widespread, asymptomatic or inflammatory dermal cysts involving the pilosebaceous units. Lesions can appear anywhere on the body, but steatocystoma multiplex is more commonly involved with those areas of the skin with a high density of developed pilosebaceous units (e.g., the axilla, groin, neck, and proximal extremities).	多发性皮脂腺囊瘤	发生于毛囊皮脂腺的多发性、无症状或炎症性皮肤囊肿，局部或广泛分布。皮损可出现在身体的任何部位，但在毛囊皮脂腺分布密集的部位（如腋窝，腹股沟，颈部和四肢近端）更为常见。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0012037	Pectoralis amyotrophy	Wasting of the pectoral muscles, i.e., of the pectoralis major and pectoralis minor.	胸肌萎缩	胸肌的萎缩，如胸大肌和胸小肌。
眼部异常	HP:0012038	Corneal guttata	Corneal guttata are droplet-like accumulations of non-banded collagen on the posterior surface of Descemet&#39;s membrane. The presence of focal thickenings of Descemet&#39;s membrane histologically named guttae. Cornea guttata can be easily diagnosed in vivo and ex vivo by means of specular microscopy as it gives dark areas where no endothelial cells are visible.	角膜点状变性	角膜Descemet膜后表面出现的非带状胶原的微滴状沉积。后弹力膜局灶性增厚，组织学上称为角膜点状变性。角膜点状变性很容易通过体内和离体显微镜装置诊断，因为它的出现使局部内皮细胞缺失呈现暗区。
眼部异常	HP:0012039	Descemet Membrane Folds	Presence of folds in the Descement membrane, which is the basement membrane of the endothelial (inner) cell layer of the cornea. Descement membrane folds are generally a manifestation of inflammation or edema of the cornea.	后弹力膜皱褶	Descement膜出现皱褶。Descement膜是角膜内皮的基底膜， Descement膜褶皱一般是角膜炎症或水肿的表现。

眼部异常	HP:0012043	Pendular nystagmus	Rhythmic, involuntary sinusoidal oscillations of one or both eyes. The waveform of pendular nystagmus may occur in any direction.	钟摆样眼球震颤	一个或两个眼睛有节奏的，不自主的正弦振荡。摆动性眼球震颤的波形可能发生在任何方向。
眼部异常	HP:0012044	Seesaw nystagmus	Seesaw nystagmus is a type of pendular nystagmus where a half cycle consists of the elevation and intorsion of one eye, concurrently with the depression and extortion of the fellow eye. In the other half cycle, there is an inversion of the ocular movements.	跷跷板眼球震颤	跷跷板眼球震颤是一种摆动眼球震颤，其中一半周期表现为一只眼睛的升高和内旋，同时另一只眼睛下降和外展。在另一半周期中，眼运动反转。
眼部异常	HP:0012045	Retinal flecks	Presence of multiple yellowish-white lesions of various size and configuration on the retina not related to vascular lesions.	视网膜斑点	视网膜上存在多种尺寸和构象的多个黄白色病变，与血管病变无关。

眼部异常	HP:0012047	Hemeralopia	A visual defect characterized by the inability to see as clearly in bright light as in dim light. The word hemeralopia literally means day blindness.	昼盲	视觉缺陷的特点是在光线明亮的地方视力下降，而夜间视力不受到影响，昼盲的字面意思是白天盲。
神经系统异常	HP:0012048	Oromandibular dystonia	A kind of focal dystonia characterized by forceful contractions of the face, jaw, and/or tongue causing difficulty in opening and closing the mouth and often affecting chewing and speech.	口下颌肌张力障碍	一种局限性肌张力障碍，表现为脸，下颌，和/或舌的有力的收缩导致难以打开和关闭嘴部和经常影响咀嚼和讲话。
神经系统异常,声音异常	HP:0012049	Laryngeal dystonia	A form of focal dystonia that affects the vocal cords, associated with involuntary contractions of the vocal cords causing interruptions of speech and affecting the voice quality and often leading to patterned, repeated breaks in speech.	喉肌张力障碍	一种影响声带的局灶肌张力障碍类型，声带不自主的收缩导致言语中断，影响声音质量，常常导致模式化的反复言语中断。

肿瘤,眼部异常	HP:0012054	Choroidal melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the choroid. The classic appearance of choroidal melanoma is a pigmented dome-shaped or collar button-shaped tumor with an associated exudative retinal detachment. Choroidal melanoma is usually pigmented, but can be variably pigmented and even amelanotic (non-pigmented).	脉络膜黑色素瘤	脉络膜黑素细胞的恶性肿瘤。脉络膜黑色素瘤经典的外观是一种着色的圆顶形或套环，按钮形状的肿瘤与相应的渗出性视网膜脱离。脉络膜黑色素瘤通常是着色的，但也可以是其他色素着色和甚至无黑色素着色（无色素沉着）。
肿瘤,眼部异常	HP:0012055	Ciliary body melanoma	Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the ciliary body.	睫状体黑色素瘤	睫状体黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0012057	Superficial spreading melanoma	A type of melanoma that is flat and irregular in shape and color, with different shades of black and brown.	浅表扩散性黑素瘤	黑素瘤的一种，主要表现为黑棕色深浅不一的不规则扁平状肿物。
肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0012058	Nodular melanoma	A type of melanoma that starts as a raised area that is usually dark blackish-blue or bluish-red but may not have any color.	结节性黑素瘤	黑素瘤的一种，初起为淡黑蓝或淡蓝红色的隆起皮损，一般无其他颜色。
肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0012059	Lentigo maligna melanoma	A subtype of melanoma in situ that typically develops on sun-damaged skin. The lesion is typically a large, irregularly pigmented macule that has developed from an ordinary lentigo (a small pigmented spot on the skin with a clearly-defined edge). Change to a malignant lentigo typically takes place over 20 years or more, and many patients accept the change as a consequence of aging.	恶性雀斑样黑色素瘤	是黑色素瘤的一种亚型，常发生于日晒后受损的皮肤，开始表现为普通的雀斑（边界清楚的小色素斑 ），之后渐渐发展为较大不规则色素斑。发展成恶性常需20年以上，多数患者以为是皮肤衰老的表现。
肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0012060	Acral lentiginous melanoma	A type of cutaneous melanoma localized to the palm, sole, or beneath the nail (subungual melanoma). Acral lentiginous melanoma starts as a slowly-enlarging flat patch of discoloured skin and usually displays a size above 6 mm and often several centimetres or more in diameter upon diagnosis and variable pigmentation with a mixture of colors including brown, and blue-grey, black and red. The surface of the lesion is initially smooth but later in the course may become thicker and irregular, and may ulcerate or bleed.	肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤	一种位于掌跖或甲下（甲下黑色素瘤）的皮肤黑色素瘤。肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤往往初起为一褪色扁平斑点，之后缓慢扩大至直径超过6毫米甚至数厘米，此外，包括棕色、蓝灰色、黑色和红色的混合性色素沉着也是特征之一。皮损起初表面光滑，之后慢慢变得粗糙且不规则，甚至可能出现溃疡和出血。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0012061	Urinary excretion of sialylated oligosaccharides	Excretion of `oligosaccharides` (CHEBI:50699) conjugated to `sialic acid` (CHEBI:26667) in the urine.	唾液酸化寡聚糖的尿排泄	的`oligosaccharides`排泄（CHEBI:50699）共轭`唾液酸acid`（CHEBI:26667）在尿液中。

神经系统异常	HP:0012075	Personality disorder	An abnormality of mental functioning affecting the personality and behavioural tendencies of an individual and characterized by a rigid and unhealthy pattern of thinking and behavior. The definition of a personal disorder implies that the abnormality is not the result of damage or insult to the brain or from another psychiatric disorder.	人格障碍	影响个体人格和行为异常的精神类疾病，主要表现为思考和行为方式不正常。人格疾病的定义主要为异常的原因不是大脑损害导致的。
神经系统异常	HP:0012076	Borderline personality disorder	A personality disorder characterized by impulsive behavior and unpredictable and capricious mood. Affected individuals show a liability to outbursts of emotion and an incapacity to control the behavioural explosions.	边缘性人格障碍	主要以冲动行为、不可预测和反复无常的情绪为特征的人格障碍。患者表现为易于情绪爆发并且不能控制行为爆发。
神经系统异常	HP:0012077	Histrionic personality disorder	A personality disorder characterized by shallow and labile affectivity, self-dramatization, theatricality, exaggerated expression of emotions, suggestibility, egocentricity, self-indulgence, lack of consideration for others, easily hurt feelings, and continuous seeking for appreciation, excitement and attention.	表演型人格障碍	是一种以情感肤浅易变，戏剧化的自我表现，夸张，过度表达情绪，易受暗示，自我中心，任性，不考虑他人，感情易受伤害，持续追求欣赏、兴奋和关注为特点的人格障碍。

神经系统异常	HP:0012097	Intracranial dermoid cyst	A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from the inclusion of ectodermally committed cells at the time of neural tube closure (3rd-5th week of embryogenesis). The capsule of dermoid cysts consists of simple epithelium supported by collagen. In thicker parts, the lining is supplemented with dermis containing hair follicles, sebaceous glands, and apocrine glands.	颅内皮样囊肿	先天性包涵囊肿，源于神经管闭合时（胚胎发育的第3-5周）外胚层干细胞的封入。皮样囊肿的囊是由胶原支撑的单层上皮细胞组成。在较厚的部分，内壁辅以含有毛囊，皮脂腺，汗腺的真皮。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0012119	Methemoglobinemia	Abnormally increased levels of Methemoglobinemia in the blood. In this form of hemoglobin, there is an oxidized ferric iron (Fe +3) rather than the reduced ferrous form (Fe 2+) that is normally found in hemoglobin. Methemoglobin has a reduced affinity for oxygen, resulting in a reduced ability to release oxygen to tissues.	高铁血红蛋白血症	高铁血红蛋白在血液中异常增高的。这种形式的血红蛋白，含有三价铁（Fe 3），而不是在正常血红蛋白中存在的亚铁形式（Fe 2+）。高铁血红蛋白对氧亲和力低，导致释放氧气到组织的能力降低。

A plasma is termed &#39;APC resistant&#39; when the addition of exogenous APC fails to prolong its clotting time in an activated partial thromboplastin time assay.	活化蛋白C抵抗	对活化C蛋白的抗凝效果反应不佳。&#39;当在活化部分凝血酶时间测定法中加入外源性的APC未能延长凝血时间的血浆，被称为“APC耐受”血浆。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0012196	Cheyne-Stokes respiration	An abnormal pattern of respiration characterized by cycles of respiration that are increasingly deeper then shallower with possible periods of apnea. Affected patients may display a 10 to 20 second episode of hypoventilation or apnea, followed by respiration of increased depth and frequency over the course of about one minute. The cycle repeats every 45 seconds to 3 minutes.	潮式呼吸	呼吸运动的一种异常模式，其特点是呼吸越来越深而后逐渐变浅，并可能有间停。患者在1分钟左右的时间内可能有10到20秒低通气或窒息发作，继而出现呼吸深度与频率的增加。这种循环每45秒至3分钟重复1次。

心血管系统异常	HP:0012249	Abnormal ST segment	An electrocardiographic anomaly of the ST segment, which is the segment that connects the QRS complex and the T wave. The ST segment normally has a duration of 80 to 120 ms, is flat and at the same level (isoelectric) as the PR and TP segment.	ST段异常	心电图ST段异常， ST段是指连接QRS复合波和T波的一段。 ST段通常持续80至120毫秒平坦且与PR和TP段在同一等电水平。

This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.	内、外动力蛋白臂缺如	呼吸运动纤毛的动力蛋白臂完全缺失，即内、外动力蛋白臂（通常是位于内部和运动纤毛的外周微管外）缺失。这一特点常通过电子显微镜发现。

神经系统异常	HP:0012407	Scissor gait	A form of gait abnormality characterized by hypertonia and flexion in the legs, hips and pelvis accompanied by extreme adduction leading to the knees and thighs hitting, or sometimes even crossing, in a scissors-like movement. The opposing muscles (abductors) become comparatively weak from lack of use.	剪刀步态	步态异常的一种形式，以腿，臀部和骨盆肌张力增高和屈曲伴极度收导致双侧膝盖和大腿互相碰撞，或有时甚至互相交叉，形成剪刀样运动。拮抗肌肉（外展肌）由于废用而变得相对无力。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0012466	Chronic respiratory acidosis	Longstanding impairment in ventilation such that the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) is elevated above the upper limit of the reference range (more than 45 mm Hg), with a normal or near-normal pH secondary to renal compensation and an elevated serum bicarbonate levels (more than30 mEq/L).	慢性呼吸性酸中毒	长期的通气损害，使二氧化碳的分压（PaCO2）升高超过参考范围（大于45毫米汞柱）的正常上限，继发于肾补偿和血清碳酸氢盐水平（高于30毫当量/升），pH值正常或接近正常。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0012467	Acute respiratory acidosis	Sudden onset of impairment in ventilation such that the removal of carbon dioxide by the respiratory system is less than the production of carbon dioxide in the tissues, leading to an elevation of the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) above the normal limits (more than 45 mm Hg) with an accompanying acidemia (pH less than 7.35).	急性呼吸性酸中毒	突然发作的通气障碍，使呼吸系统移除的二氧化碳少于组织中产生的二氧化碳在，导致二氧化碳（PaCO2的）分压高于正常值范围（超过45毫米汞柱），并伴发血症（pH值小于7.35）。

In this condition, the eyes appear driven downward, the sclera may be seen between the upper eyelid and the iris, and part of the lower pupil may be covered by the lower eyelid.	夕阳眼现象	儿童向上凝视麻痹所致的眼现象。在这种情况下，眼睛向下方移动，上眼睑和虹膜间可见巩膜，下部瞳孔可能被下眼睑覆盖。

Vocal tremor results in low frequency modulations of voice frequency or amplitude and intermittent voice instability.	声音震颤	一个摇摆不定、不稳定的声音，反映喉肌的运动单位不自主的正弦振荡。声音震颤导致声音频率或幅度的低频调制和间歇性的声音不稳定。
