骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0012479	Temporomandibular joint crepitus	Noises from the temporomandibular joint during mandibular movement (e.g., chewing). Temporomandibular joint crepitus is often described as a clicking,  popping, grating sound.	颞下颌关节弹响	颞下颌关节在下颌运动（如:咀嚼）所发出的响声。颞下颌关节弹响常常被描述为“卡嗒声”、“砰地一声”或“吱吱声”。
神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	HP:0012480	Abnormality of cerebral veins	An anomaly of `cerebral veins` (FMA:70861).	脑静脉畸形	`脑静脉`异常（FMA:70861）。
神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	HP:0012481	Cerebral venous angioma	A congenital malformation of veins which drain normal brain characterized by a caput medusae or an umbrellalike convergence of multiple venules on a single, or occasionally multiple, enlarged parenchymal or medullary vein, like the trunk of a tree or the shank of an umbrella. This dilated terminal vein penetrates the cortex to drain either (a) superficially to cortical veins or sinuses, (b) deeply to subependymal veins of the lateral ventricle and then into the galenic system, (c) to the fourth ventricle and then to the pontomesencephalic vein, or (d) to the precentral cerebellar vein and into the galenic system.	脑静脉血管瘤	先天性畸形的静脉为正常的脑组织提供静脉引流的特征是“水母头”、多个小静脉伞样汇聚成一个静脉或偶见多发髓静脉实质部分扩张，就像树干或伞柄一样。这种扩张的终末静脉穿透皮层引流至（a）浅表型至皮质静脉或窦，（b）深部型至侧脑室室管膜下静脉，然后进入galen’s静脉系统，（c）至第四脑室，然后到脑桥中脑静脉，或（d）到小脑中央前静脉并进入galen’s静脉系统。

神经系统异常,心血管系统异常	HP:0012520	Perivascular spaces	Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.	血管周围间隙	Virchow-Robin spaces（又称为血管周围间隙）是指小血管从蛛网膜下腔发起时从脑实质穿过时在血管壁周围形成的腔隙。血管周围间隙多为显微镜下的，一般不能通过传统的神经影像学发现。这条术语是指这些腔隙变大可以从神经影像学上观察到（多为核磁共振），多为包含一条动脉的规则的空腔。

心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0012522	Spider hemangioma	A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.	蜘蛛痣	毛细血管扩张的一种类型，以针尖样隆起的红点为中心，，周围辐射性分布较多小动脉，形似蜘蛛腿。典型的特征为按压中央动脉导致整个病变区域发白且松开后又迅速恢复。

神经系统异常	HP:0012534	Dysesthesia	Abnormal sensations with no apparent physical cause that are painful or unpleasant.	感觉异常	没有明显物理原因而存在异常的疼痛或不愉快的感觉。
神经系统异常	HP:0012535	Abnormal synaptic transmission	An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of `neurotransmitter metabolic process` (GO:0042133).	突触传递异常	从神经元跨突触到目标靶点联络异常。在这个四步骤的过程中包括:（i）合成和储存神经递质; （ⅱ）神经递质释放; （ⅲ）通过神经递质激活突触后受体;和（iv）神经递质的失活。因此，该术语被定义为&#39;神经递质代谢过程`（GO:0042133）的异常。

泌尿生殖系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0012621	Persistent cloaca	Developmental anomaly in which the vagina, bladder, and rectum fuse resulting in a common channel.	泄殖腔遗存	一种发育异常，阴道、膀胱和直肠融合形成公共通道。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012622	Chronic kidney disease	Functional anomaly of the kidney persisting for at least three months.	慢性肾病	肾脏功能异常持续至少三个月。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012623	Stage 1 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with normal or increased glomerular filtration rate (GFR at least 90 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病1期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率（GFR）正常或增加（GFR至少达到90毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012624	Stage 2 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with mildly reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 60-89 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病2期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率轻度减少（GFR降到 60-89毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012625	Stage 3 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with moderately reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 30-59 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病3期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率中度减少（GFR降到 30-59毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012626	Stage 4 chronic kidney disease	A type of chronic kidney disease with severely reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 15-29 mL/min/1.73 m2).	慢性肾病4期	一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率重度减少（GFR降到 15-29毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
眼部异常	HP:0012627	Pseudoexfoliation	Deposition of fibrillar material that can be found on all anterior segment structures bathed by aqueous humor.	假性剥脱	纤维状物质在任何浸泡在前房房水中的结构上发生沉积。
眼部异常	HP:0012628	Abnormality of the suspensory ligament of lens	An anomaly of the `suspensory ligament of lens` (FMA:58838), also known as the ciliary zonule. These ligaments represent a series of fibers connecting the ciliary body and lens of the eye, holding the lens in place.	晶状体悬韧带异常	晶状体悬韧带的异常（FMA:58838），晶状体悬韧带也被称为睫状小带。这些韧带是连接睫状体和晶状体的纤维，使晶状体维持在适当位置。
眼部异常	HP:0012629	Phacodonesis	Tremulousness (trembling) of the lens of the eye.	晶体摇动	眼睛晶状体的震颤（颤抖）。
眼部异常	HP:0012630	Abnormality of the trabecular meshwork	An anomaly of the trabecular meshwork, which is the porelike structure surrounding the entire circumference of the anterior chamber at the base of the cornea and near the ciliary body. The trabecular mesh work is responsible for draining the aqueous humor into the canal of Schlemm.	小梁网异常	小梁网异常。小梁网是前房周边部的角膜和睫状体间的网眼状结构，负责将房水排入Schlemm管。
眼部异常	HP:0012631	Pigment deposition in the trabecular meshwork	Accumulation of abnormal amounts of pigment within the trabecular meshwork.	小梁网色素沉积	小梁网内发生的异常色素沉积。
眼部异常	HP:0012632	Abnormal intraocular pressure	An anomaly in the amount of force per unit area exerted by the intraocular fluid within the eye.	眼内压异常	眼内压的异常。眼内压是指眼内流体向单位面积施加的力的大小。
眼部异常	HP:0012633	Asymmetry of intraocular pressure	A difference in the amount of intraocular pressure in the right and left eye.	眼压不对称	右眼和左眼的眼内压不同。
眼部异常	HP:0012634	Iris pigment dispersion	Shedding of the pigment granules that normally adhere to the back of the iris into the aqueous humor.	虹膜色素播散	正常情况下粘附在虹膜后侧的色素颗粒脱落进入房水。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012646	Retractile testis	A testis that is located at the upper scrotum or lower inguinal canal and that can be made to descend completely into the scrotum without resistance by manual reduction but returns to its original position by the cremasteric reflex.	睾丸回缩	睾丸位于阴囊上部或腹股沟管下部，通过手法可以无阻力地将其完全回纳入阴囊内，但通过提睾反射又返回到原来位置。
免疫系统异常	HP:0012647	Abnormal inflammatory response	Any anomaly of the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954), a response to injury or infection characterized by local vasodilation, extravasation of plasma into intercellular spaces and accumulation of white blood cells and macrophages.	异常炎性反应	任何`炎症反应`（GO:0006954）的异常。炎症反应指损伤或感染后引起局部血管扩张，血浆外渗进入细胞间隙，以及白血细胞和巨噬细胞积聚的反应。

神经系统异常	HP:0012657	Abnormal brain positron emission tomography	A functional brain anomaly detectable by positron emission tomography (PET). PET scanning is a method for functional brain imaging, and its measurements reflect the amount of brain activity in the various regions of the brain.	脑部正电子发射断层扫描异常	通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）检测的脑功能性异常。 PET扫描为脑功能成像的方法，其测量结果反映在大脑的不同区域的大脑活跃程度。
神经系统异常	HP:0012658	Abnormal brain FDG positron emission tomography	An anomaly detectable in [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) positron emission tomography (PET) brain scans. Glucose uptake measured with FDG-PET is a marker of neuronal metabolic activity.	脑FDG正电子发射断层扫描异常	[18F]氟脱氧葡萄糖正电子发射断层（PET）脑部扫描。通过检测葡萄糖摄取反映神经代谢活性。
神经系统异常	HP:0012659	Prefrontal hypometabolism in FDG PET	Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the prefrontal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.	FDG PET前额叶代谢减少	如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] –脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在前额皮质的摄取。

心血管系统异常	HP:0012663	Mildly reduced ejection fraction	A small reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a mild reduction is defined as 45-54 percent.	射血分数轻度降低	每个心动周期血液从左心室泵送分数轻微的降低。正常成人范围至少55％，轻微减少在45-54％左右。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012664	Reduced ejection fraction	A diminution of the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle with each cardiac cycle.	射血分数降低	心室在每个心动周期内的射血体积分数的缩减。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012665	Moderately reduced ejection fraction	A medium reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as 30-44 percent.	射血分数中度降低	每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液分数中度降低。正常成人范围为至少55％，中度减少定义为30-44％左右。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012666	Severely reduced ejection fraction	A large reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as less than 30 percent.	射血分数严重降低	在每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液的分数大大减少。正常范围的成人为至少55％，射血分数减少被定义为不到30％。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012667	Regional left ventricular wall motion abnormality	An abnormal motion of a segment of the left ventricle during the cardiac cycle.	区域性左室壁运动异常	部分左心室在心动周期中的异常运动。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012668	Vasovagal syncope	Loss of consciousness due to a reduction in blood pressure that is associated with an increase in vagal tone and peripheral vasodilation.	血管迷走神经性晕厥	由于血压降低伴随的迷走神经张力和周围血管扩张增加从而导致的意识丧失。
心血管系统异常	HP:0012669	Carotid sinus syncope	An exaggerated response to carotid sinus baroreceptor stimulation resulting in syncope from transient diminished cerebral perfusion.	颈动脉窦性晕厥	对颈动脉窦压力感受器的过度反应，导致脑灌注暂时减少，引起晕厥。

神经系统异常,内分泌系统异常	HP:0012689	Abnormal pineal melatonin secretion	An anomaly in the amount or timing of melatonin secretion by the pineal gland. Note that melatonin is also synthesized by multiple tissues outside of the pineal gland.	松果体褪黑素分泌异常	松果体分泌的褪黑素的数量或时机的异常。注意，褪黑素也由除松果体外的多个组织合成。
神经系统异常	HP:0012690	T2 hypointense thalamus	A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire thalamus.	T2低信号丘脑	丘脑在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个丘脑的漫低信号。
神经系统异常	HP:0012691	Focal T2 hypointense thalamic lesion	A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hypointensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.	丘脑局灶性T2低信号病变	在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更低的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部低信号。
神经系统异常	HP:0012692	Focal T2 hyperintense thalamic lesion	A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.	丘脑局灶性T2高信号病变	在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部高信号。

Focal emphysema can develop because of airway narrowing, and the thoracic duct may be obliterated.	肺淋巴管肌瘤病	平滑肌细胞样细胞在淋巴管以及肺部（胸膜，肺泡隔，支气管，肺血管和淋巴管，以及淋巴结，特别是在后纵隔和腹腔后膜）浸润。局灶性肺气肿可能由于气道狭窄而不断增生，甚至胸导管可能会被擦掉。

临床调节因素	HP:0012823	Clinical modifier	This subontology is designed to provide terms to characterize and specify the phenotypic abnormalities defined in the Phenotypic abnormality subontology, with respect to severity, laterality, age of onset, and other aspects.	临床调节因素	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012824	Severity	The intensity or degree of a manifestation.	严重程度	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012825	Mild	Having a relatively minor degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between two and three standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	轻度	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012826	Moderate	Having a medium degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between three and four standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	中度	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012827	Borderline	Having a minor degree of severity that is considered to be on the boundary between the normal and the abnormal ranges. For quantitative traits, a deviation of that is less than two standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	正常范围分界限	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012828	Severe	Having a high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between four and five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	重度	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012829	Profound	Having an extremely high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of more than five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.	非常严重	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012830	Position	The anatomical localization of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	位置	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012831	Laterality	The localization with respect to the side of the body of the specified phenotypic abnormality.	偏侧性	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012832	Bilateral	Being present on both sides of the body.	双侧	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012833	Unilateral	Being present on only the left or only the right side of the body.	单侧	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012834	Right	Being located on the right side of the body.	右侧	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012835	Left	Being located on the left side of the body.	左侧	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012836	Spatial pattern	The pattern by which a phenotype affects one or more regions of the body.	疾病表现的肢体分部	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012837	Generalized	Affecting all regions without specificity of distribution.	全身性	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012838	Localized	Being confined or restricted to a particular location.	局部性	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012839	Distal	Localized away from the central point of the body.	远端	#####
临床调节因素	HP:0012840	Proximal	Localized close to the central point of the body.	近端	#####

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012869	Acephalic spermatozoa	Spermatozoa with very small cranial ends devoid of any nuclear material, that is, lacking a typical sperm head.	无头精子	精子缺乏典型的头部结构，只有非常小的头部、没有任何核酸物质。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012870	Vanishing testis	A condition which is considered to be due to the subsequent atrophy and disappearance in fetal life of an initially normal testis. In the presence of spermatic cord structures is evidence of the presence of the testis in early intrauterine life. When associated with a blind-ending spermatic cord, this entity is named as his absence of a testis in an otherwise normal 46,XY male is usually unilateral and is assumed to be a consequence of intrauterine or perinatal torsion or infarction.	睾丸消失	胎儿期起初正常的睾丸而在期发生萎缩而消失的一种病况。存在精索结构是胎儿早期睾丸存在的证据。当存在盲端精索时，表明这个46,XY男性发生了睾丸缺失，而其他方面都正常。睾丸消失一般为单侧，估计是宫内或围产期发生了扭转或梗塞的结果。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0012871	Varicocele	A varicocele is a widening of the veins along the spermatic cord, leading to enlarged, twisted veins in the scrotum, and manifested clinically by a painless testicle lump, scrotal swelling, or bulge in the scrotum.	精索静脉曲张	精索静脉曲张是沿精索发生静脉扩张，导致阴囊内静脉增大、扭曲，临床表现为睾丸无痛性肿块、阴囊肿胀或阴囊内有凸出物。

心血管系统异常	HP:0020038	Vertebrobasilar dolichoectasia	Elongation, dilatation, and/or tortuosity of the vertebrobasilar segment. The definition of VBD includes: (i) diameter of basilar or vertebral artery over 4.5 mm; or (ii) deviation of any portion more than 10 mm from the shortest expected course; and (iii) length of basilar artery over 29.5 mm or length of intracranial vertebral artery over 23.5 mm.	椎基底动脉扩张延长症	基底动脉的异常迂曲、扩张和延长：VBD的定义包括：（1）基底动脉直径≥4.5 mm；（2）椎动脉任意一支偏离超过椎动脉颅内入口到基底动脉起始点之间连线 超过10 mm； （3）基底动脉长度＞29.5 mm，椎动脉颅内段长度＞23.5 mm。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0025021	Abnormal erythrocyte sedimentation rate	A deviation from normal range of the erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.	红细胞沉降率异常	#####

The ESR is a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.	红细胞沉降率下降	#####

The dermal or subcutaneous bone formation presents as stony hard nodules. The osteomata appear as irregular, hardened small nodules that are well circumscribed and generally of the same color as the skin.	皮肤骨瘤	皮肤骨瘤是指在表皮和真皮内部异常出现的骨化(骨形成)，真皮或皮下骨形成主要表现为石样硬结 。骨瘤是不规则的硬化小结节，通常界限较清，与皮肤颜色一致。

神经系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0025030	Enteric neuronal degeneration	Deterioration of enteric neurons with impairment of enteric neuronal structure. Typical neuropathological findings include qualitative (e.g., neuronal swelling, intranuclear inclusions, axonal degeneration) and quantitative (e.g., reduction in the number of neurons) abnormalities of the enteric neurons.	肠神经元变性	肠神经元退变伴肠神经元结构异常。典型的神经病理所见包括肠神经元的质（如神经元水肿、细胞核内包涵体、轴突退变）和量（如神经元数量减少）的异常。

This cell is CD71-positive, has both a nucleus and a nucleolus, and lacks hematopoeitic lineage markers.	原红细胞形态异常	成红细胞的异常形式，即在红细胞形成过程中在红系祖细胞形成之后的不成熟、有核的红细胞。该细胞是CD71阳性的，具有核和核仁，并且缺乏造血谱系标记。

心血管系统异常	HP:0025070	Abnormal U wave	An anomaly of the U wave of the electrocardiogram (EKG). The U wave is a small (0.5 mm) deflection immediately following the T wave, usually in the same direction as the T wave. It is best seen in leads V2 and V3.	异常U波	心电图中出现的异常的U波，U波是紧跟在T波之后的一个小的峰（0.5mm），通常与T波方向相同。在V2和V3导联中较为明显

心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0025081	Darier's sign	A skin change elicited by briskly rubbing the skin lesion in urticaria pigmentosa (UP), whereby the area begins to itch and becomes raised and surrounded by erythema. Unlike other forms of dermatographism, Darier's sign refers to urtication that is limited to the UP involved areas and, as in this case, spares the skin unaffected by UP. 体壁的异常	HP:0025104	Capillary malformation	A capillary malformation is a flat, sharply defined vascular stain of the skin. It may cover a large surface area or it may be scattered and appear as little islands of color. In a cpillary maformation, the predominant vessels are small, slow-flow vessels (i.e., arterioles and postcapillary venules).	毛细血管畸形	毛细血管畸形局部扁平，由于血管性着色，边界清晰。可能覆盖大的表面区域，也可能分散成着色的小岛状。毛细血管畸形中，小而流速缓慢的血管（即小动脉和毛细血管后微静脉）是优势血管。
体壁的异常	HP:0025105	Nevus anemicus	A congenital skin lesion characterized by irregular hypopigmented macules that coalesce to form plaques and occur particularly on the chest. It is generally present at birth or develops in the first days of life. It is more common in females. Diagnosis is confirmed by applying gentle friction to the lesion and the surrounding skin and checking that the erythema produced in the healthy skin does not appear in the hypopigmented lesion. This pale macule becomes more conspicuous when the lesion and its surroundings are rubbed. The margin of the naevus is ill-defined and consists of an archipelago of small anaemic spots/	贫血痣	先天性皮肤病变，以不规则色素减退性斑块为特征，聚集形成斑块，好发于胸部。 它通常在出生后或不久发生，女性更常见。 该病的诊断是通过对病变部位和周围皮肤施加轻微摩擦并检查健康皮肤中产生的红斑不出现在色素减退病变中来证实。 当在病变及其周围部位磨擦时，苍白的斑点变得更加明显。 痣的边缘不清晰，由小型贫血斑点群组成
体壁的异常	HP:0025106	Nevus roseus	A variant of port-wine stain characterized by a pale red or even pink tone, in contrast to the darker hue of the port-wine stain. By analogy with the term port-wine stain, this variant rose-wine stain, or nevus roseus. Nevus roseus, however, cannot be definitely diagnosed until adulthood as port-wine stains are sometimes pink in children. While the natural history of port-wine stains includes hypertrophy, darkening, and nodularity, nevus roseus remains unchanged for life.	玫瑰痣	与葡萄酒色斑的深色色相对比，以淡红色或甚至粉红色为特征的葡萄酒色斑的变体。 通过类似术语葡萄酒色斑，这种变体玫瑰酒色斑或玫瑰痣。 然而玫瑰痣直到成年后才能确诊，因为葡萄酒色斑在儿童时期有时会变成粉红色。 虽然葡萄酒色斑的自然进程包括肥厚，变黑和结节，但玫瑰痣始终保持不变。
体壁的异常	HP:0025107	Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita	A congenital vascular malformation that presents as localized or generalized erythematous-telangiectatic lesions with a reticular pattern; the lesions are almost always present at birth or develop in the first days of life. Cutis marmorata telangiectatica congenita (CMTC) appears as marble-like pattern (mottling) on the surface of the skin. In contrast to cutis marmorata, the marbling is more severe and always visible.	先天性毛细血管扩张性大理石样皮肤	先天性血管畸形，表现为局限性或全身性红斑 - 毛细血管扩张性病变伴网状模式; 这些病变几乎总是在出生时出现，或者在出生后第一天发生。 先天性毛细血管扩张性大理石样皮肤（CMTC）在皮肤表面上表现为大理石状图案（斑点）。 与大理石样皮肤相比，大理石纹更加严重并且始终可见。
体壁的异常	HP:0025108	Angioma serpentinum	Angioma serpiginosum consists of punctate, tightly packed telangiectatic lesions. Characteristic histopathological features are dilated and tortuous capillaries involving the uppermost part of the dermis.	蛇纹石血管瘤	蛇纹石血管瘤由点状，紧密堆积的毛细血管扩张性病变组成。 特征性组织病理学特征是包含真皮最上部分的扩张和弯曲的毛细血管。
血液和造血组织异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0025109	Reduced red cell pyruvate kinase activity	Decrease in the activity of pyruvate kinase (PK) within erythrocytes. PK catalyzes the reaction: ATP + pyruvate = ADP + phosphoenolpyruvate.	红细胞丙酮酸激酶活性降低	红细胞丙酮酸激酶（PK）活性降低。丙酮酸激酶参与下列催化反应：ATP + 丙酮酸 = ADP + 磷酸烯醇式丙酮酸。

神经系统异常	HP:0025113	Misophonia	['An adverse response (dislike) to sound no matter what volume the sound is, characterized by a strong negative reaction to soft sounds that can sometimes be further triggered by seeing the source of the offending sound.']	恐音症	对无论任何音量的声音感到厌恶。表现为对于轻微声音的强烈负面反应，有时因看到声音来源而进一步触发。
体壁的异常	HP:0025114	Hypergranulosis	['Hypergranulosis is an increased thickness of the stratum granulosum.']	颗粒层增厚	颗粒层增厚是表皮的颗粒细胞层增厚
体壁的异常	HP:0025115	Civatte bodies	Eosinophilic hyaline ovoid bodies which are often found in the subepidermal papillary regions or sometimes in the epidermis. Civatte bodies (CBs) are seen as rounded, homogenous, eosinophilic masses on routine H and E staining lying in the deeper parts of epidermis/epithelium and more frequently in dermis/connective tissue. They are known as CBs (in epithelium/epidermis), colloid bodies, or hyaline bodies (in connective tissue). They are 10-25 micrometers in diameter and situated mostly within or above the inflammatory cell infiltrate. In lichen planus, the number of necrotic keratinocytes may be so large that they are seen lying in clusters in the uppermost dermis. These bodies show a positive periodic acid Schiff reaction and are diastase resistant	胶样小体	嗜酸性透明的卵形体通常位于表皮下乳头区域或表皮中。 在常规H和E染色中，Civatte小体（CB）呈圆形，均匀状，嗜酸性的团块，位于表皮/上皮的较深部分，更常见于真皮/结缔组织。 它们被称为CBs（上皮/表皮中），胶体或透明体（结缔组织中）。 其直径为10-25微米，并且主要位于炎性细胞浸润物之内或之上。 在扁平苔藓中，坏死性角质形成细胞非常多，呈簇状排列于真皮层上。 这些小体过碘酸席夫反应及抗淀粉酶的呈阳性。
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0025116	Fetal distress	['An intrauterine state characterized by suboptimal values in the fetal heart rate, oxygenation of fetal blood, or other parameters indicative of compromise of the fetus. Signs of fetal distress include repetitive variable decelerations, fetal tachycardia or bradycardia, late decelerations, or low biophysical profile.']	胎儿窘迫	以胎儿心率、血液氧合或其他胎儿指标性参数未达最优值为特征的一种胎儿宫内状态。胎儿窘迫的表现包括胎儿反复可变性心率减慢，胎儿心动过速或心动过缓，晚期减速或胎儿生物物理评分低。
体壁的异常	HP:0025117	Rete ridge flattening	Ret pegs (or ridges) are the epithelial extensions that project into the underlying connective tissue in both skin and mucous membranes. Rete ridge flattening refers to the loss of these projections so that the skin epithelium acquires a relatively flat appearance.	网脊扁平化	钉（或脊）是伸入皮肤和粘膜下面结缔组织的上皮延伸部分，网脊扁平化是由于这些钉或脊的缺如使得表皮外观上呈现出相对平坦的外观。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025119	Violet lip discoloration	An alteration of the color of the lip to take on a violet color. This term does not include cyanosis.	嘴唇发紫	嘴唇呈现紫色，但不是紫绀
神经系统异常	HP:0025121	Simple partial occipital seizures	A type of focal seizure (i.e., affecting initially only one hemisphere of the brain) that is simple (not resulting in alteration of consciousness) that originates in the occipital lobe. Visual hallucinations are the hallmark of occipital seizures, but are not invariably present. Hallucinations typically commence in the visual field contralateral to the affected visual cortex and then spread to involve the entire visual field. Elementary visual seizures are characterized by fleeting visual manifestations which may be either positive (flashes, phosphenes) or, less commonly, negative (scotoma, hemianopia, amaurosis). Positive phenomena are usually flashes of colour or light, which are simple in shape and may be static or mobile.	单纯性部分性枕部癫痫发作	起源于枕叶的一种典型的单纯性（不导致意识的改变）、局灶性发作（即最初只影响一侧大脑半球）。幻视是枕部癫痫发作的特征，但并非总是存在。幻视通常在受影响的视皮层的对侧视野开始，然后蔓延到整个视野。常见发作特征是短暂的视觉表象，可能是亮光（闪光，光幻视），或偶尔为暗视（盲点、偏盲、黑蒙）。常见亮光幻视通常是颜色或光的闪光，形状简单，可以是静态或移动的。
体壁的异常	HP:0025122	Sawtooth acanthosis	A type of epidermal acanthosis characterized by a jagged (sawtooth) appearance of the rete ridges of the epidermis.	锯齿棘皮症	一种表皮棘皮病，其特征在于表皮前缘的锯齿状（锯齿状）外观

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025125	White lesion of the oral mucosa	['White lesions of the oral mucosa are generally caused by a condition that increases the thickness of the epithelium. This increases the distance to the vascular bed and thereby tends to change the usual reddish color of the oral mucosa to white. Common causes include hyperkeratosis (thickening of the keratin layer), acanthosis (thickening of the spinous cell layer), increased edema in the epithelium (leukoedema), and reduced vascularity of the underlying lamina propria. Additionally, fibrin caps of surface ulcerations and collapsed bullae can appear white.']	口腔黏膜白色病变。	(口腔黏膜的白色病变通常是由上皮增厚引起导致与血管床距离的增加，从而使口腔黏膜由通常的红色变为白色。常见的原因包括角化过度(角蛋白层增厚)、棘层增厚(棘细胞层增厚)、上皮水肿(白斑水肿)增加、固有层血管减少。此外，表面溃疡的纤维蛋白帽和塌陷的大泡也会出现白色。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0025127	Actinic keratosis	['A scaly, crusty lesion caused by damage from the ultraviolet radiation of the sun, with typical location on sun-exposed areas of the skin. Actinic keratosis lesions are often elevated, rough, and wartlike, and may be red, or occasionally tan, pink, or flesh-toned in color.']	光化性角化病	由于太阳紫外线照射或电离辐射引起的表皮过度鳞状化、硬皮病变，多见于皮肤暴露区域。 光化性角化病的病变通常可略高出皮肤形成隆起，表面粗糙、呈疣状，颜色可呈红色、棕褐色、粉红色或肉色。

消化系统异常	HP:0025129	Abnormal small intestinal mucosa morphology	['A structural anomaly of the mucous lining of the small intestine.']	小肠粘膜形态异常	小肠粘膜的结构异常
消化系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0025130	Decreased small intestinal mucosa lactase activity	['Lactase is produced in the small intestine in humans, Lactase is a member of the beta-galactosidase family of enzymes, and hydrolyzes D-lactose to form D-galactose and D-glucose, which can be absorbed by the small intestine. There are many ways of assessing lactase activity. In one test, an endoscopic biopsy from the postbulbar duodenum is incubated with lactose on a test plate, and a color reaction develops within 20 min as a result of hydrolyzed lactose (a positive result) in patients with normolactasia, whereas no reaction (a negative result) develops in patients with severe hypolactasia. Other, less direct, tests include the hydrogen breath test, and blood tests following lactose challenges.']	小肠粘膜乳糖酶活性降低	乳糖酶存在于人体小肠粘膜，是β-半乳糖苷酶家族成员之一，可水解D -乳糖生成D-半乳糖和D-葡萄糖，从而被小肠吸收。乳糖酶活性的检测方法很多，其中一种方法小肠粘膜活检法，通过在内镜下取十二指肠球部粘膜组织，然后将其与乳糖在培养皿中共孵育，若20min内呈现颜色变化则认为发生了乳糖分解反应（阳性结果），即该患者的乳糖分解正常；若无颜色变化（阴性结果）则表明该患者为严重的乳糖不耐受患者。另外，还有一些间接的检测方法，如：氢呼气试验和乳糖耐受试验。

Temper tantrums are normal in toddlers and young children and usually happen between the ages of one to three years. Temper tantrums may be considered abnormal if they occur at an unusually high frequency, are of unusual severity, or occur at an old age than usual.']	异常发脾气	发脾气通常是由挫折感引起的情绪爆发反应，表现为抱怨和哭泣、尖叫、踢、打、屏气。发脾气是婴幼儿正常行为特征，通常发生在一至三岁之间；如果发生频率过高、过度严重，或者在非常规年龄出现可认为是异常的。

肿瘤,神经系统异常	HP:0025171	Rosette-forming glioneuronal tumor	A tumor of the central nervous system that has components of both neurocytic and glial areas, whereby usually the glial component of the tumour predominates. Rossette-forming glioneuronal tumors (RGNT) have biphasic cytoarchitecture with two elements; neurocytic rosettes resembling Homer-Wright rosettes, and astrocytic component resembling a pilocytic astrocytoma. RGNTs are low-grade tumors that lack histopathological signs of malignancy.	玫瑰花形神经胶质瘤	中枢神经系统的一种肿瘤，包含神经细胞和神经胶质区域的组成部分，通常是肿瘤的胶质成分占主导地位。玫瑰花形的神经胶质细胞瘤(RGNT)具有两相细胞结构：类似于Homer-Wright玫瑰花的神经细胞和类似于纤维状细胞的星形胶质细胞。RGNTs是低级别肿瘤，缺乏恶性肿瘤的组织病理学特征。

The peribronchovascular interstitium extends from the level of the pulmonary hila into the peripheral lung. This feature may be ascertained on high-resolution computer tomography.']	支气管周围血管间质增厚	围绕中央支气管和肺动脉的结缔组织鞘增厚，即支气管周围血管间质增厚。支气管周围血管间质从肺门水平延伸至肺脏末梢。这一特征可以经高分辨率计算机断层扫描确定。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0025180	Centrilobular ground-glass opacification on pulmonary HRCT	['A hazy area of increased attenuation in centrilobular areas of the lung with preserved bronchial and vascular markings seen on a computer tomography scan. 消化系统异常	HP:0025181	Abdominal aseptic abscess	An abscess-like lesion located within the abdomen. The lesions are localized in the spleen, liver, abdominal lymph nodes. The lesions represent visceral sterile collections of mature neutrophils that do not respond to antibiotics but regress quickly when treated with corticosteroids, but relapses occur frequently.	腹腔无菌性脓肿	腹腔内脓肿样病变，可以位于脾脏、肝脏、腹腔淋巴结。病变表现为内脏组织无菌性成熟中性粒细胞聚集，对抗生素不敏感，皮质激素使用后迅速消退，但通常迅速复发
体壁的异常	HP:0025182	Localized area of pendulous skin	['A confined region of lax skin that hangs below the level of the surrounding skin. Histopatholigically, there is a loss of elastic fibers in the dermis of the affected region.']	局限性皮肤松弛	局部的皮肤相较于周围更为松弛，组织病理显示病损区域皮肤真皮层弹性纤维缺如。
眼部异常	HP:0025186	Marcus Gunn jaw winking synkinesis	Unilateral ptosis with associated upper eyelid contraction and contraction of either the external or the internal pterygoid muscle. It is thought to occur because of congenital miswiring of a branch of the fifth cranial nerve into the branch of the third cranial nerve supplying the levator muscle. In Marcus Gunn jaw winking synkinesis, elevation and even retraction of the affected eyelid is triggered by chewing, suction, lateral mandible movement, smiling, sternocleidomastoid contraction, protruding tongue, Valsalva manoeuvre and even by breathing.	Marcus-Gunn下颌眼睑联动综合征	单侧上睑下垂，伴有上睑收缩和翼状胬肉内肌的收缩，是由于第五脑神经的一个分支进入支配上睑提肌的第三脑神经的分支所致。对于Marcus-Gunn下颌眼睑联动综合征患者而言，咀嚼、吸气、下颌侧移、微笑、胸锁乳突收缩、伸舌、Valsalva动作甚至呼吸都会触发受影响眼睑的抬高甚至收缩。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0025196	Increased total iron binding capacity	An elevation in the total-iron binding capacity, which measures how much serum iron is bound if an excess of radioactive iron is added. A high TIBC corresponds to a high transferrin concentration. The latent (or free) iron binding capacity is the difference between the TIBC and the measured serum iron, corresponding to the transferrin not bound to iron, i.e., free iron binding capacity.	总铁结合力增高	总铁结合力增高。可通过加入过量的放射性铁后，检测血清中结合铁的含量。总铁结合力增高表明转铁蛋白水平增高。未饱和（自由）铁结合力不同于总铁结合力和血清铁，指的是未与铁结合的转铁蛋白，也就是自由铁结合力。
肿瘤	HP:0025197	Inclusion body fibromatosis	A benign tumor made up of mostly myofibroblasts that appears almost exclusively on the digits of the hands and feet, rarely involving the thumb or big toe. The lesion displays a proliferation of bland intradermal spindle cells arranged in whorls, fascicles, or a storiform pattern in a collagenous background of varying degrees. Also usually present are perpendicular tumor cell fascicles that extend to the epidermis. The small intracytoplasmic inclusions are said to appear similar to red blood cells. The inclusion bodies have been shown to be made up of densely packed vimentin and actin filaments. The tumor often causes a dome-shaped elevation of the overlying structures, forming a protuberant or polypoid nodule. The overlying epidermis can display a host of changes, including acanthosis, hyperkeratosis, parakeratosis, rete ridge flattening, entrapment of adnexal structures, and, rarely, ulceration.	包涵体纤维瘤病	一种良性肿瘤，主要由肌成纤维细胞组成，几乎只出现在手指和脚趾上，但很少累及拇指或大脚趾。病损显示在不同程度的胶原生成的背景下，皮内梭形细胞的增生，排列成轮状、束状或席纹状。通常也有垂直的肿瘤细胞束延伸到表皮。小的胞浆内包含体据说与红血球相似。包涵体由密集的波形蛋白和肌动蛋白丝组成。肿瘤常引起覆盖结构的穹状隆起，形成突起或息肉样结节。覆盖的表皮可显示许多变化，包括棘皮、角化、角化、脊状变平、附件结构的残留，以及很少的溃疡。
肿瘤,消化系统异常	HP:0025198	Inflammatory cap polyp	['A non-malignant sessile or pedunculated polyp in the colon and rectum that displays a cap of inflammatory granulation tissue with fibrinopurulent exudate that covers the polyp.']	炎性帽状息肉	一种位于直肠和结肠的非恶性的无蒂或带蒂息肉，息肉上面覆盖含纤维素性即脓性渗出物的炎性肉芽组织

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0025202	Elevated apolipoprotein A-IV level	['An increased concentration in blood of apolipoprotein A-IV, a major component of HDL and chylomicrons that has a role in VLDL secretion and catabolism and is required for efficient activation of lipoprotein lipase by ApoC-II.']	载脂蛋白A-IV水平增高	血液中载脂蛋白A-IV浓度增高。载脂蛋白A-IV是HDL和乳糜微粒的重要组成成分，参与VLDL的分泌和分解代谢过程，同时促使Apo CII激活脂蛋白脂肪酶。
心血管系统异常,体壁的异常	HP:0025203	Caput medusae	Distended and engorged umbilical veins which are seen radiating from the umbilicus across the abdomen to join systemic veins.	脐周静脉曲张	脐静脉膨胀充盈，脐静脉由脐带穿过腹部与体静脉相连

神经系统异常	HP:0025233	Sleep paralysis	An inability to move the body at sleep onset or upon awakening from sleep lasting seconds to a few minutes.	睡眠瘫痪	睡眠起始阶段或觉醒过程中,意识清楚但是身体不能自主活动，可持续数秒或者几分钟时间。
神经系统异常	HP:0025234	Parasomnia	An undesirable physical event or experience that occur during entry into sleep, during sleep, or during arousal from sleep.	异态睡眠	在睡眠、睡眠或觉醒期间发生的异常表现或经历
神经系统异常	HP:0025235	Non-rapid eye movement parasomnia	A parasomnia that occurs in non-rapid eye movement (NREM) sleep. This refers to a disorder of arousal that occurs during during slow-wave sleep (ie, NREM stage 3 sleep).	非快动眼异态睡眠	非快动眼睡眠阶段发生的异态睡眠。指在慢波睡眠期（NREM睡眠3期）发生的异常觉醒行为。
神经系统异常	HP:0025236	Somnambulism	Ambulation or other complex motor behaviors after getting out of bed in a sleep-like state. During sleepwalking episodes, the sonambulating individual appears confused or dazed, the eyes are usually open, and he or she might mumble or give inappropriate answers to questions, or occasionally appear agitated.	梦游症	睡眠状态下发生的离床或者离床后复杂活动。在梦游过程中显示出困惑或茫然，眼睛通常是睁开的，他/她可能会咕哝或不恰当地回答问题，偶尔出现焦虑表现。
神经系统异常	HP:0025237	Confusional arousal	A nocturnal episode characterized by disorientation, grogginess, and, at times, substantial agitation upon awakening from slow-wave sleep or following forced awakenings. These characteristics might present as agitation, crying or moaning, disorientation, and particularly slow mentation on arousal from sleep (i.e., sleep inertia). The duration of episodes is typically 5 to 15 min but they might last up to several hours.	觉醒障碍	一种夜间发作，其特征是方向迷失、昏昏沉沉；在缓慢波睡眠期觉醒或强迫觉醒后有时出现强烈的兴奋反应。其特征可能表现为激动、哭泣或呻吟、迷失方向、特别缓慢的睡眠觉醒过程（即睡眠惯性）。发作持续时间一般为5至15分钟，但也可能持续数小时。
眼部异常	HP:0025239	Subhyaloid hemorrhage	A localized detachment of the vitreous from the retina due to the accumulation of blood. When localized in the macular area, it results in sudden profound loss of vision. Subhyaloid premacular hemorrhage is typically characterized by a circumscribed, round or dumb-bell shaped, bright red mound of blood beneath the internal limiting membrane (ILM) or between the ILM and hyaloid face, in or near to the central macular area.	玻璃体下出血	部分性后玻璃体脱离可导致积血。当脱离发生于黄斑区，会引起视力突然丧失。黄斑部视网膜前眼底出血典型特征是，在内界膜下方或在内界膜与玻璃体表面之间或者在靠近黄斑中心区有血液局部性聚积，呈圆形或哑铃状鲜红色小丘。
眼部异常	HP:0025240	Preretinal hemorrhage	An accumulation of blood between the neurosensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) arising from the choroidal or retinal circulation.	视网膜前出血	起始于脉络膜或视网膜循环出血，血液聚积在视网膜神经感觉层和视网膜色素上皮层之间。
心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025241	Flame-shaped retinal hemorrhage	['A type of retinal hemorrhage that is located within the nerve fiber layer (NFL) of the retina and that exhibits a characteristic flame shape which results from constraints by the structure of the NFL (axons of the ganglion cells).']	火焰状视网膜出血	一种视网膜神经纤维层的出血，出血以呈火焰状为特点，是由神经纤维层结构（神经节细胞轴突）限制造成的
心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025242	Dot-and-blot retinal hemorrhage	["Accumulation of blood located in the retina's inner nuclear and outer plexiform layers, and having a dot-like or blot-like shape. THe shape results from intraretinal compression, restricting the hemorrhages within a specific location."]	斑点状视网膜出血	位于视网膜内核细胞层和外丛状层的血液积累，呈点状或斑点状。这种出血是由视网膜内的挤压造成的，使出血限定在了特定的位置。
心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025243	Subretinal hemorrhage	['Accumulation of blood located beneath the neurosensory retina in the space between the neurosensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.']	视网膜下出血	血液聚积在视网膜神经感觉层下，处于视网膜神经感觉层与视网膜上皮细胞层之间。
心血管系统异常,眼部异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025244	Subretinal pigment epithelium hemorrhage	["An accumulation of blood located between the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) and Bruch's membrane."]	视网膜色素上皮下出血	血液聚积在视网膜色素上皮和 Bruch膜之间。
体壁的异常	HP:0025245	Cutaneous cyst	['A hollow mass located in the skin that is surrounded by an epithelium-lined wall and is well demarcated from the adjacent tissue. Cysts are often said to be sac-like and may contain serous liquid or semisolid material.']	皮肤囊肿	位于皮肤中内衬上皮壁的中空病变，其与相邻组织分界清楚。囊肿常描述为囊样改变，内含液体或半固体。
体壁的异常	HP:0025246	Trichilemmal cyst	['Nontender, round and firm, but slightly compressible, intradermal or subcutaneous cyst measuring 0.5-5 cm in diameter. Trichilemmal cysts are acquired rather than congenital, and tend to appear on the scalp rather than the face, and to be intradermal rather than subcutaneous.']	毛鞘囊肿	无痛，圆形且坚硬，但可轻微压缩，皮内或皮下囊肿直径测量0.5-5厘米。毛鞘囊肿是获得性的而不是先天性的，并且倾向于出现在头皮而不是脸上，倾向于出现在皮内而不是皮下。
体壁的异常	HP:0025247	Dermoid cyst	['A congenital subcutaneous cyst that arises from entrapment of skin along the lines of embryonic fusion. In contrast to epidermal cysts, dermoid cysts tend to contain various adnexal structures such as hair, sebaceous, eccrine or apocrine glands. Dermoid cysts are present at birth, and are indolent, firm, deep, subcutaneous nodules. They are often located on the head and neck, and rarely in the anogenital area. Dermoid cysts are\nslowly progressive and can grow to a size of 1 to 4 cm.']	皮样囊肿	先天性皮下囊肿，由沿着胚胎融合线包裹皮肤而产生。 与表皮囊肿相比，皮样囊肿倾向于包含各种附件结构，例如头发，皮脂腺，外分泌腺或顶分泌腺。 出生时皮样囊肿存在，并且是无痛的，坚实的，深的皮下结节。 它们通常位于头部和颈部，很少位于肛门生殖器区域。 皮样囊肿是渐进性的，可以长到1至4厘米的大小。
体壁的异常	HP:0025248	Eruptive vellus hair cyst	['A cutaneous cyst that is small (one or two millimeters in diameter) and painless, presenting as a follicular papule that usually is skin colored but may have a reddish or\nbrownish tinge.']	发疹性毛发囊肿	小的皮肤囊肿（直径1毫米或2毫米），无痛，表现为滤泡丘疹，通常为皮肤色，但可能有红色或黑色。
体壁的异常	HP:0025249	Comedo	['A clogged cutaneous sebaceous follicle, which is a cutaneous gland that secretes sebum (usually into a hair follicle).']	粉刺	毛囊内分泌皮脂的腺体阻塞，形成粉刺。
体壁的异常	HP:0025250	Closed comedo	['A comedo in which the top of the pore is not stretched open and thus does not expose the clogged portion (which would appear black), hence the name whitehead.']	闭合性粉刺	粉刺的一种；该种粉刺位于毛孔顶层。一般不会暴露出粉刺的内容物，呈白色。
体壁的异常	HP:0025251	Open comedo	['A comedo in which the part of the pore at the surface of the skin is stretched and open, exposing the contents of the comedo, which appear black.']	开放性粉刺	粉刺的一种；该种粉刺位于皮肤表面的部分毛孔被拉伸或打开，暴露出粉刺的内容物，呈黑色。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025252	Geographic tongue	['An anomaly of the tongue characterized by loss (atrophy) of filiform papillae of the tongue, leaving areas of erythema (redness), surrounded by a serpiginous, white, hyperkeratotic border. The name geographic tongue refers to an appearance that is said to be similar to a map.']	地图舌	['一种舌的异常，其特征是舌的丝状乳头丧失(萎缩)，留下红斑(发红)的区域，周围有锯齿状、白色、角化过度的边缘。“地图舌”指的就是它的外观与地图一样。

临床调节因素	HP:0025254	Ameliorated by	['An ameliorating factor is defined as an external factor that leads to the manifestation of a sign or symptom in a person improving or becoming more bearable.']	因……而改善的	改善因素是指外在因素，使一个人的体征或症状得到改善或变得可以忍受。

临床调节因素	HP:0025256	Ameliorated by heat	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is improved or made more bearable by heat (including fever).']	因热而改善	一种体征或症状，会因发热(包括发烧)而获得改善或使其更能忍受。
临床调节因素	HP:0025257	Ameliorated by carbohydrate ingestion	['Applies to a sign or symptom that is improved or made more bearable by eating or drinking carbohydrates including glucose (sugar).']	因食用碳水化合物而改善	一种体征或症状，通过食用或饮用包括葡萄糖(蔗糖)在内的碳水化合物而获得改善或使其更易承受。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025258	Stiff neck	['A sensation of tightness in the neck when attempting to move it, especially after a period of inactivity. Neck stiffness often involves soreness and difficulty moving the neck, especially when trying to turn the head to the side.']	颈部僵硬	试图活动颈部时有紧绷感，尤以静止一段时间后活动时更为明显。颈部僵硬通常包括疼痛和颈部活动困难，尤其是当头部转向一侧时。

神经系统异常	HP:0025268	Stuttering	['Disruptions in the production of speech sounds, with involuntary repetitions of words or parts of words, prolongations of speech sounds, or complete blockage of speech production for several seconds.']	口吃	在语音产生过程中不自觉地重复单词或词组、延长语音、或完全言语中断数秒。
神经系统异常	HP:0025269	Panic attack	['A sudden episode of intense fear in a situation in which there is no danger or apparent cause. The panic attack is accompanied by symptoms such as palpitations, sweating and chills or hot flushes. There may be a sensation of dyspnea (being out of breath), chest pain, or abdominal distress. Some indiviudals with panic attacks may experience depersonalization, a fear of going crazy, or a fear of dying.']	惊恐发作（急性焦虑发作）	在没有危险或明显原因的情况下突然出现强烈的恐惧感。惊恐发作伴有心悸、出汗、寒战或潮热等症状。可能有呼吸困难（气喘）、胸痛或腹痛的感觉。一些恐慌症的发作伴发人格解体、发疯感或者濒死感。

心血管系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0025319	Rubeosis iridis	Formation of new blood vessels on the iris. The new vessels do not display the typical radially symmertic growth pattern of normal iris blood vessels, but rather appear disorganized. Rubeosis usually starts from the pupillary border with tiny tufts of dilated capillaries or red spots that can only be appreciated with high magnification.	虹膜新生血管	即虹膜上新的血管的形成。新血管不显示正常虹膜血管典型的放射状生长模式，而是表现为无组织。红斑通常从瞳孔边缘开始，有小簇的扩张毛细血管或只有高倍放大才能观察到的红斑。

神经系统异常	HP:0025373	Interictal EEG abnormality	Interictal refers to a period of time between epileptic seizures. Electroencephalographic (EEG) patterns are important in the differential diagnosis of epilepsy, and the EEG is almost always abnormal during a seizure. Some persons with seizures may show EEG abnormalities between seizures, while others do not. In some cases, multiple interictal EEGs must be recorded before an abnormality is observed. In most cases the electrographic pattern of seizure onset is completely different from the activity recorded during interictal discharge.	发作间期脑电图异常	发作间期指癫痫发作之间的一段时间。脑电图(EEG)模式在癫痫鉴别诊断中具有重要意义，癫痫发作时EEG几乎总是异常的。部分患者会出现两次癫痫发作之间的EEG异常。在某些情况下，记录多个发作间期EEGs可观察到一次异常放电。但大多数情况下，癫痫发作期的EEG模式完全不同于发作间期的放电活动。

内分泌系统异常	HP:0025388	Thyroid nodule	['A nodular lesion that develops in the thyroid gland. The term "thyroid nodule" refers to any abnormal growth that forms a lump in the thyroid gland.']	甲状腺结节	甲状腺的结节样病变，是指甲状腺内异常生长的肿块
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025389	Pulmonary interstitial high-resolution computed tomography abnormality	High-resolution computed tomography (HRCT) can distinguish findings that characterize characterise interstitial lung diseases in a way not possible with other modalities.	肺间质高分辨率计算机断层扫描异常 	高分辨率计算机断层扫描（HRCT）可以发现其他方式不能发现的特征性间质性肺部病征。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025390	Reticular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	On pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography, reticular pattern is characterised by innumerable interlacing shadows suggesting a mesh.	HRCT可见肺部网状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，网状结构特征表现为无数交错的阴影组成的网格。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025391	Crazy paving pattern on pulmonary HRCT	The so-called crazy paving pattern is characterised on HRCT by the presence of thickened interlobular septae and intralobular lines superimposed on a background of ground-glass opacity, resembling irregularly shaped paving stones.	HRCT可见肺部铺石路状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，铺石路状结构特征表现为肺小叶和小叶间隔增厚，排列于毛玻璃样模糊背景上，类似不规则形状的铺路石。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025392	Nodular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern is characterised on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography by the presence of numerous rounded opacities that range from 2 mm to 1 cm in diameter, with micronodules defined as smaller than 3 mm in diameter.	HRCT可见肺部结节状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，结节状结构特征表现为存在许多直径为2毫米至1厘米之间的圆形阴影，若直径小于3毫米则称为微结节。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025393	Reticulonodular pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Co-occurrence of reticular and micronodular patterns on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部网状结节状结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中网状和微结节结构图像共存。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025394	Cystic pattern on pulmonary HRCT	On pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography, the cystic pattern is composed by well-defined, round and circumscribed air-containing parenchymal spaces with a well-defined wall and interface with normal lung. The wall of the cysts may be uniform or varied in thickness, but usually is thin (less than 2 mm) and occurs without associated emphysema.	HRCT可见肺部囊状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中，囊状结构由含空气的实质空间组成，有明显的外壁，一般呈圆形，与正常的肺组织有清晰的边界。囊状结构的壁厚度可均匀或不均匀，但通常小于2毫米，且不伴肺气肿。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025395	Combined cystic and ground-glass pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Co-occurrence of the cystic pattern and the ground-glass pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography,	HRCT可见肺部囊状与毛玻璃样结构	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中囊状和毛玻璃样结构图像共存。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025396	Decreased attenuation pattern on pulmonary HRCT	Areas of low density corresponding to parenchymal destruction and reduced perfusion, and attenuation of the pulmonary vasculature, as visualized on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部信号衰减减弱	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见低密度区，代表肺实质破坏和灌注减少，以及肺脉管系统稀疏。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025397	Mosaic attenuation pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A patchwork of intermingled areas of increased and decreased attenuation visualized on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography.	HRCT可见肺部镶嵌衰减模式 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见信号衰减增加及减弱相混杂的区域。 
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025398	Nodular-perilymphatic pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography that has a perilymphatic distribution.	HRCT可见肺部淋巴管周围结节状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见结节状结构分布于淋巴管周围。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0025399	Nodular-centrilobular with tree-in-bud pattern on pulmonary HRCT	A nodular pattern on pulmonary high-resolution computed tomography that displays a tree-in-bud pattern, representing centrilobular branching structures that resemble a budding tree.	HRCT可见肺部结节状小叶中心树芽状结构 	在肺部高分辨率计算机断层扫描中可见结节状小叶中心呈树芽状结构，即由小叶中心向周围延伸，类似于发芽的树枝。

心血管系统异常,呼吸系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025420	Diffuse alveolar hemorrhage	A type of of pulmonary hemorrhage that originates from the pulmonary microcirculation, including the alveolar capillaries, arterioles, and venules. It presents with hemoptysis, anemia, diffuse lung infiltration, and acute respiratory failure. The diagnosis is confirmed by the observation of the accumulation of red blood cells, fibrin, or hemosiderin-laden macrophage in the alveolar space on pathologic biopsy. Hemosiderin, a product of hemoglobin degradation, appears at least 48-72 hours after bleeding and is helpful in distinguishing diffuse alveolar hemorrhage from surgical trauma. Mild interstitial thickening, organizing pneumonia, or diffuse alveolar damage can also be seen.	弥漫性肺泡出血	是一种源于肺微循环的肺出血，包括肺泡毛细血管、小动脉和小静脉。它表现为咯血、贫血、肺弥漫性浸润和急性呼吸衰竭等症状。可通过病理活检观察肺泡腔内红细胞、纤维蛋白或含血铁蛋白巨噬细胞的积累来确诊。血铁血黄素是血红蛋白降解的产物，在出血后至少48-72小时出现，有助于区分弥漫性肺泡出血和手术创伤。同时也可能出现轻度间质增厚、组织性肺炎或弥漫性肺泡损害等症状

肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0025451	Testicular adrenal rest tumor	Testicular adrenal rest tumor (TART) isa abenign tumor of the testis. TART generally occurs multiply and bilaterally within the rete testis. Histologically, TART resemble adrenocortical tissue, which led to the name. The tumous are not encapsulated and consist of sheets or confluent cords of large polygonal cells with abundant eosinophilic cytoplasm.	睾丸肾上腺残余肿瘤	睾丸肾上腺残余肿瘤(TART) 是一种睾丸的良性肿瘤。睾丸肿瘤好发于睾丸网，病灶形态多样且多呈双侧发病。组织学检查显示睾丸肿瘤类似于肾上腺皮质，因此而得名。肿瘤与周围组织分界清楚，睾丸组织呈片状或条索状分布，由大的多角形细胞组成，瘤细胞胞质丰富红染。
体壁的异常	HP:0025452	Pyoderma gangrenosum	A deep skin ulcer with a well defined border, which is usually violet or blue. The ulcer edge is often undermined (worn and damaged) and the surrounding skin is erythematous and indurated. The ulcer often starts as a small papule or collection of papules, which break down to form small ulcers with a so called cat's paw appearance. These coalesce and the central area then undergoes necrosis to form a single ulcer.	坏疽性脓皮病	有明确的边界的深层皮肤溃疡，通常为紫色或蓝色。溃疡边缘经常被破坏（磨损和损坏），周围的皮肤是红斑性和硬化性的。溃疡通常以小丘疹或丘疹的集合开始，这些丘疹会分解成小溃疡，并被称为猫爪的外观。这些合并和中心区域然后发生坏死形成一个单一的溃疡。
内分泌系统异常,生长异常	HP:0025453	Delayed adrenarche	Occurence of adrenarche at a later than normal age. Adrenarche normally occurs between six and eight years of age with increased adrenal androgen secretion; its exact biologic role is not well understood. It is accompanied by changes in pilosebaceous units, a transient growth spurt and the appearance of axillary and pubic hair in some children, but no sexual development.	肾上腺始动延迟	肾上腺始动的发生较正常年龄晚。肾上腺性动通常发生在6-8岁之间;它在生物学上的确切作用尚不清楚。伴有毛囊皮脂腺单元的变化，一些男童出现短暂的生长突增、出现腋毛和阴毛，但没有性发育。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025546	Abnormal mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['A deviation from the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell). A reduced mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH) may indicate a hypochromic anemia, but the MCH may be normal if both the total hemoglobin and the red blood cell count are reduced.']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量异常	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量降低（正常范围27-31pg/个）。平均血红蛋白量的降低提示低色素性贫血，但是如果总血红蛋白量及红细胞计数都降低，平均血红蛋白量也可表现为正常，
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025547	Decreased mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['A reduction from the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell). A reduced mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH) may indicate a hypochromic anemia, but the MCH may be normal if both the total hemoglobin and the red blood cell count are reduced.']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量降低	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量降低（正常范围27-31pg/个）。平均血红蛋白量的降低提示低色素性贫血，但是如果总血红蛋白量及红细胞计数都降低，平均血红蛋白量也可表现为正常。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0025548	Increased mean corpuscular hemoglobin	['An eklevation over the normal range of the average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell (27 to 31 picograms/cell).']	红细胞平均血红蛋白量增加	每个红细胞的平均血红蛋白量较正常范围增加（正常范围27-31pg/个）。
眼部异常	HP:0025549	Eccentric visual fixation	A uniocular condition in which there is fixation of an object by a point other than the fovea. This point adopts the principal visual direction. The degree of the eccentric fixation is defined by its distance from the fovea in degrees.	偏心注视	一种单眼状态，物体被中央凹以外的一点所成像。注视点由主视觉眼别决定。偏心注视的程度由其与中央凹的距离(以度数表示)决定。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025552	Periorbital purpura	['Multiple red/purple spots on the skin that surrounds the eyes that do not blanch (whiten) upon pressure. Purpura is caused by subcutaneous bleeding.']	眶周紫癜	眼周皮肤上多个红色/紫色斑点，压迫后不会变白。紫癜是由皮下出血引起的。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025553	Periorbital ecchymosis with tarsal plate sparing	Subcutaneous bleeding with a diamter greater than 1 cm (ecchymosis). The bleeding does not extend into the tarsal plate (the comparatively thick, elongated plates of dense connective tissue within the eyelid) due to an anatomic structure called the orbital septum, which limits extravasation of blood beyond the tarsal plate.	不累及睑板的眶周瘀斑	皮下出血，直径大于1厘米(瘀斑)。出血不会延伸到睑板(眼睑内相对较厚、细长的致密结缔组织板)，原因是一种称为眶隔的解剖结构，它限制了睑板以外的血液渗出。
体壁的异常	HP:0025554	Yellow nodule	A type of skin nodule (a lesions that is greater than either 10mm in both width and depth, and most frequently centered in the dermis or subcutaneous fat) with a yellowish coloration (that reflects a high lipid content of the lesion).	黄色结节	一种皮肤结节（宽度和深度任一大于10毫米的病变，常集中在真皮或皮下脂肪），呈黄色（反映了病灶处的高脂质含量）。

眼部异常	HP:0025558	Lamellar cataract with riders	Lamellar cataracts with associated linear lens opacities radially extending towards the periphery of the lens.	板层白内障（绕核白内障）	板层白内障伴有线性形晶状体混浊，并呈放射状向晶状体周边延伸。
眼部异常	HP:0025559	Coronary cataract	A type of cataract characterised by club-shaped and dot opacities distributed radially in the deep cortex. These lens opacities surround the nucleus in an appearance that is though to resemble a crown.	冠状白内障	一种白内障类型，特征表现为晶状体深层皮质出现棒状或点状呈放射状分布的混浊。 这些晶状体混浊物包绕着核，形似花冠。
眼部异常	HP:0025560	Anterior chamber cells	Tiny deposits corresponding to cells floating in the anterior chamber of the eye. This appearance is typically associated with intraocular inflammation leading to breakdown of the blood-aqueous barrier and resulting in an increase in the number of cells and in the aqueous humor. Grading (SUN Working Group) is performed by estimating the number of cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞	漂浮在眼前房中类似于细胞的微小沉积物。这种现象通常与眼内炎症有关，血-房水屏障被破坏并导致房水中细胞数量的增加。运用裂隙灯显微镜，采用适当的光强度和放大倍率，通过估计1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中的细胞数目来进行分级（葡萄膜炎的国际标准命名）。
眼部异常	HP:0025561	Anterior chamber cells grade 1+	Anterior chamber cells with 6-15 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级1+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到6-15个前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025562	Anterior chamber cells grade 0.5+	Anterior chamber cells with 1-5 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级0.5+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到1-5个前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025563	Anterior chamber cells grade 0	Anterior chamber cells with less than one cell in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级0	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中没有观察到前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025564	Anterior chamber cells grade 2+	Anterior chamber cells with 16-25 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级2+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到16-25个前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025565	Anterior chamber cells grade 3+	['Anterior chamber cells with 26-50 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.']	前房细胞等级3+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到26-50个前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025566	Anterior chamber cells grade 4+	Anterior chamber cells with more than 50 cells in a 1 mm by 1 mm slit beam field, employing adequate light intensity and magnification on a slit lamp.	前房细胞等级4+	裂隙灯显微镜使用适当的光强度和放大倍率，在1mm×1mm裂隙光束场中有观察到超过50个前房细胞。
眼部异常	HP:0025567	Central serous chorioretinopathy	An anomaly of the retina with serous detachment of the neurosensory retina secondary to one or more focal lesions of the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE), and associated with blurred vision, usually in one eye only and perceived typically by the patient as a dark spot in the centre of the visual field with associated micropsia and metamorphopsia. Normal vision often recurs spontaneously within a few months.	中心性浆液性脉络膜视网膜病变	视网膜异常，即继发于视网膜色素上皮细胞（RPE）的一个或多个局灶性病变的视网膜感觉层严重脱离，与视力模糊有关，通常单眼受累，典型患者在视野中央感到与视物显小症和视物变形症有关的黑斑。正常视力往往在几个月内自行恢复。
眼部异常	HP:0025568	Abnormal morphology of the choroidal vasculature		脉络膜血管形态异常	
眼部异常	HP:0025569	Polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy	The presence of aneurysmal polypoidal lesions in the choroidal vasculature. The aneurysmal dilatations, also known as polyps, may be found at subfoveal, juxtafoveal, extrafoveal, peripapillary or even peripheral regions. These polypoidal dilatations may be visible as reddish-orange subretinal nodules during ophthalmoscopic examination. The polypoidal lesions are best detected on indocyanine green angiography (ICGA) and might be associated with a branching vascular network (BVN) of neovascularization.	息肉样脉络膜血管病变	脉络膜血管系统中存在动脉瘤样息肉样变。 动脉瘤样扩张的血管亦称为息肉，可见于黄斑中央凹、旁中央、中央凹外、视乳头甚至周边区域。 这些息肉样病变可在检眼镜下以视网膜下橘红色结节的形式出现。 息肉样脉络膜血管病变的检测金标准是吲哚菁绿血管造影（ICGA），其成因可能与分支血管网（BVN）的新血管形成有关。
眼部异常	HP:0025570	Choroidal vascular hyperpermeability	Increased tendency of choiroidal blood vessels to allow fluids to leak characterized by multifocal choroidal hyperfluorescence on indocyanine green angiography (ICGA).	脉络膜血管高通透状态	脉络膜血管易渗漏，以在吲哚菁绿血管造影术（ICGA）中呈现广泛脉络膜强荧光为特征。

眼部异常	HP:0025583	Tapetal-like fundal reflex	["Golden, scintillating, particulate reflection noted on fundus examination (typically in the macula and sparing the fovea). The term tapetal is used to describe this 'metallic' sheen appearance as it is thought to be similar to the 'tapetal' reflex seen in the eyes of certain animals."]	绒毡层样眼底反射	"眼底检查中观察到的金色的、闪烁的微粒反射（典型的是在黄斑而中心凹少见）。术语绒毡层样是用于描述这种'金属'光泽外观，与某些动物的眼中的明毯反光类似 。"
眼部异常	HP:0025584	Hypotropia	A form of manifest strabismus (heterotropia) in which one eye is deviated downwards when both eyes are open.	下斜视	一种显性斜视（显斜），在两眼睁开时，一眼偏移向下看。

眼部异常	HP:0025588	Hypodeviation	A type of strabismus in which the visual axis of one eye is higher than that of the other.	下斜视	斜视眼视轴低于另一眼的一类斜视。
眼部异常	HP:0025589	Cyclodeviation	Cyclodeviation is defined as the rotation of an eyeball along the anteroposterior axis and cyclotropia as a misalignment of cyclodeviation between the two eyes.	旋转隐斜	旋转斜视是一眼围绕其前后轴旋转倾斜，使双眼视线不平行。
眼部异常	HP:0025590	Abnormal extraocular muscle physiology	['A functional anomaly of the muscles of the eye.']	异常眼外肌生理	眼部肌肉功能异常。
眼部异常	HP:0025591	Abnormal superior oblique muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the superior oblique muscle, a fusiform muscle that originates in the upper, medial side of the orbit. The superior oblique muscle abducts, depresses and internally rotates the eye, and is the only extraocular muscle innervated by the fourth cranial nerve.	上斜肌生理异常	上斜肌的功能性异常，上斜肌是起源于眼眶上内侧的梭形肌，可外转、下转和内旋眼球，是第四颅神经支配的唯一眼外肌。
眼部异常	HP:0025592	Superior oblique muscle weakness	['Decreased strength of the superior oblique muscle.']	上斜肌无力	上斜肌肌力下降。
眼部异常	HP:0025593	Superior oblique muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the superior oblique muscle.	上斜肌受限	上斜肌运动范围的机械性限制。
眼部异常	HP:0025594	Superior oblique muscle overaction	An ocular motility abnormality characterized by an overacting superior oblique muscle resulting to vertical incomitance of the eyes in lateral gaze. On examination, this is commonly seen as a downshoot of the adducting eye occuring when gaze is directed into the field of action of the inferior oblique muscle, producing a greater downward excursion of the adducted eye than of the abducted eye.	上斜肌过伸	一种眼球运动异常，其特征是由上斜肌过度活动而导致侧向凝视时双眼垂直方向不协调。在检查中，当眼球运动在上斜肌作用范围内，常可见内旋眼球向下偏移，且比外展的眼球偏移量更大。
眼部异常	HP:0025595	Superior oblique muscle underaction	Reduced ocular movement of the superior oblique muscle which improves on testing ductions, typically associated with neurogenic palsy.	上斜肌功能不全	上斜肌的运动减少可提高测试结果，通常与神经源性麻痹有关。
眼部异常	HP:0025596	Abnormal inferior oblique muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the inferior oblique muscle, an extraocular muscle that has its origin on the maxillary bone just posterior to the inferior medial orbital rim and lateral to the nasolacrimal canal and that is innervated by the inferior branch of the oculomotor nerve.	下斜肌生理异常	下斜肌的功能性异常，下斜肌起源于上颌骨下方内侧眶缘和鼻泪管外侧，是由动眼神经分支支配的眼外肌。
眼部异常	HP:0025597	Inferior oblique muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the inferior oblique muscle.	下斜肌受限	下斜肌运动范围的机械限制。
眼部异常	HP:0025598	Inferior oblique muscle weakness	Decreased strength of the inferior oblique muscle.	下斜肌无力	下斜肌力量下降。
眼部异常	HP:0025599	Inferior oblique muscle overaction	A common ocular motility disorder characterized by vertical incomitance of the eyes in lateral gaze. In primary inferior oblique muscle overaction, an upshoot of the adducting eye occurs when gaze is directed into the field of action of the inferior oblique muscle, producing a greater upward excursion of the adducted eye than of the abducted eye.	下斜肌过伸	一种常见的眼部运动障碍，其特征是在侧向凝视时双眼垂直方向不协调。 在原发性下斜肌功能亢进时，当眼球运动在下斜肌作用范围时，内收的眼别会向上偏移，且上移量比外展眼别的更大。
眼部异常	HP:0025600	Abnormal inferior rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the inferior rectus muscle, which is innervated by the inferior division of oculomotor nerve and functions in the depression, adduction, and lateral rotation (extortion) of the eye.	下直肌生理异常	下直肌的功能性异常，下直肌由动眼神经下支支配，并起下转、内转和内旋的作用。
眼部异常	HP:0025601	Inferior rectus muscle weakness	Decreased strength of the inferior rectus muscle.	下直肌无力	下直肌强度下降。
眼部异常	HP:0025602	Inferior rectus muscle restriction	Mechanical limitation of the range of movement of the inferior rectus muscle.	下直肌受限	下直肌运动范围的机械限制。
眼部异常	HP:0025603	Abnormal superior rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the superior rectus muscle, an extraocular muscle that is innervated by the superior division of the oculomotor nerve, and whose primary function is the elevation of the globe.	上直肌生理异常	上直肌的功能性异常，上直肌由动眼神经上分支支配，其主要功能是使眼球的上转。
肿瘤,眼部异常	HP:0025604	Orbital schwannoma	['A schwannoma (benign, usually encapsulated slow growing tumor composed of Schwann cells) located in the orbit.']	眼眶神经鞘瘤	眼眶内的一种神经鞘瘤(通常是由Schwann细胞组成的缓慢生长的良性肿瘤。
眼部异常	HP:0025605	Lid lag on downgaze	Delayed descent of the upper eyelid on downgaze. Also described by some authors as von Graefe sign.	上睑闭合延迟	上睑闭合时上睑下降延迟。 也被部分人认为是von Graefe标志。
眼部异常	HP:0025606	Abnormal medial rectus muscle physiology	A functional anomaly of the medial rectus muscle, an extraocular muscle that is innervated by the inferior division of the oculomotor nerve and whose sole action is the adduction of the eyeball.	内直肌生理异常	内直肌的功能性异常，内直肌由动眼神经下支支配，其唯一作用是使眼球内收。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025607	Upper eyelid entropion	An inward turning (inversion) of the margin of the upper eyelid.	上眼睑内翻	上眼睑边缘向内翻(倒转)。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0025608	Cicatricial ectropion	An outward turning (eversion) or rotation of the eyelid margin (i.e., ectropion) caused by shortening or contraction of the anterior or middle lamellae related to scarring.	瘢痕性睑外翻	眼睑边缘向外翻转(外翻)或旋转(即眼睑外翻)，由于瘢痕导致前板或中板的缩短或收缩引起。

This abnormality can be associated with a spectrum of appearances ranging from meibomian seborrhoea (foaming meibomian gland secretions) and meibomianitis (inflamed meibomian glands), to chalazia.	后部睑缘炎	发生在睑板腺及其腺孔的一种睑缘炎。 这种异常可表现为睑板腺皮脂溢（泡沫状睑板腺分泌物）、睑板腺炎（睑板腺炎症）以及睑板腺囊肿。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030092	Reduced muscle fiber merosin	A reduced amount of merosin in muscle fibers. This feature is usually assessed by immunohistochemical examination of muscle biopsy tissue.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2减少	肌纤维中分层蛋白表达量减少。这种特征经常出现于肌肉活检组织的免疫组化检查中。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030093	Abnormal muscle fiber laminin beta 1	A deviation from normal of the amount of laminin beta 1 in muscle fiber tissue. Laminin 2 is a major component of the basal lamina of skeletal muscle cells. It is a heterotrimer composed of 3 chains: merosin (laminin alpha 2 chain), beta 1, and gamma 1.	肌纤维层粘连蛋白β1异常	肌纤维组织中层粘连蛋白β1表达量偏差。层粘连蛋白2是一种骨骼肌细胞基膜中主要的组成成分。它是一个异三聚体，由分层蛋白（层粘连蛋白α2链），β1和γ1组成。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030098	Reduced muscle dystrophin expression	A decreased amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue.	抗肌萎缩蛋白表达减少	肌纤维组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达减少。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030099	Reduced muscle fiber alpha dystroglycan	Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced alpha dystroglycan protein in the muscle biopsy. Alpha-dystroglycan is a heavily glycosylated peripheral-membrane component of the dystrophin-associated glycoprotein complex (DAPC), which, in addition to laminin alpha2, binds perlecan and agrin in the extracellular matrix, whereas beta-dystroglycan, derived from the same gene, is a transmembrane protein that links to dystrophin intracellularly.	肌纤维α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖减少	免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中α-肌营养不良蛋白减少。α-肌营养不良蛋白是一个重要的外周膜组成成分，由肌营养不良蛋白-糖蛋白的复合体组成，它与β-肌营养不良聚糖来自相同基因，在细胞内与肌营养不良蛋白结合成跨膜蛋白。除了层粘连蛋白α2、基底膜聚糖和细胞外基质中的聚集蛋白。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030100	Abnormal muscle fiber alpha sarcoglycan	Deviation from normal in the amount of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.	肌纤维α-肌聚糖异常	肌肉中α肌糖聚糖表达量与正常值有偏差。 α，β，γ和δ聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030112	Abnormal muscle fiber alpha dystroglycan	A deviation from normal of muscle alpha-dystroglcan expression. Alpha-dystroglycan is a heavily glycosylated peripheral-membrane component of the dystrophin-associated glycoprotein complex (DAPC), which, in addition to laminin alpha2, binds perlecan and agrin in the extracellular matrix, whereas beta-dystroglycan, derived from the same gene, is a transmembrane protein that links to dystrophin intracellularly.	肌纤维α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖异常	肌肉组织中α-肌营养不良聚糖的表达异于常值。α-肌营养不良蛋白是一个重要的外周膜组成成分，由肌营养不良蛋白-糖蛋白的复合体组成，它与β-肌营养不良聚糖来自相同基因，在细胞内与肌营养不良蛋白结合成跨膜蛋白。除了层粘连蛋白α2、基底膜聚糖和细胞外基质中的聚集蛋白。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030118	Reduced muscle fiber emerin	Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced emerin protein in the muscle biopsy.	肌肉纤维emerin蛋白减少	免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中emerin蛋白减少。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030119	Abnormal muscle fiber calpain-3	A deviation from normal in the amount of calpain-3 in muscle tissue. Calpains are intracellular nonlysosomal cysteine proteases modulated by calcium ions. A typical calpain is a heterodimer composed of two distinct subunits, one large (over 80 kDa) and the other small (30 kDa). While only one gene encoding the small subunit has been demonstrated, there are many genes for the large one. CAPN3 is similar to ubiquitous Calpain 1 and 2 (m-calpain and micro-calpain), but contains specific insertion sequences (NS, IS1 and IS2). Calpains cleave target proteins to modify their properties, rather than breaking down the substrates.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3异常	肌肉组织中钙蛋白酶-3表达量异常。钙蛋白酶是由钙离子调节的细胞内非溶酶体半胱氨酸蛋白酶。 典型的钙蛋白酶是由两个不同亚基组成的异源二聚体，一个大的（超过80kDa）和另一个小的（30kDa）。 虽然只有一个编码小亚基的基因已经被证实，但是大亚基有许多基因。 钙蛋白酶-3类似于普遍存在的钙蛋白酶1和2（m-钙蛋白酶和微钙蛋白酶），但包含特定的插入序列（NS，IS1和IS2）。 钙蛋白酶切割靶蛋白以修饰其性质，而不是分解底物。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030120	Absent muscle fiber calpain-3	Western blot shows complete lack of calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3缺失	肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3缺失。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030121	Reduced muscle fiber calpain-3	Western blot reveals reduced calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.	肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3减少	肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3减少。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030122	Reduced muscle fiber perlecan	Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced perlecan protein in the muscle biopsy. Perlecan is a basement membrane-specific heparan sulfate proteoglycan core protein (HSPG) also known as heparan sulfate proteoglycan 2 (HSPG2).	肌肉纤维perlecan聚糖减少	免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中串珠蛋白聚糖减少。基底膜聚糖是基底膜特异性硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖的核心蛋白（HSPG），也称为硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖2（HSPG2）。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030123	Abnormal muscle fiber lamin A/C	A deviation from the normal amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. The LMNA gene gives rise to at least three splicing isoforms including the two main isoforms, lamin A and lamin C. These are constitutive components of the fibrous nuclear lamina and have different roles, ranging from mechanical nuclear membrane maintenance to gene regulation.	肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 异常	肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量异常。LMNA基因调控产生至少3个剪接连接酶，包括2个主要的核纤层蛋白A和C。它们是纤维性核层的重要组成成分且具有不同的功能，从机械核膜修护到基因调控。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030124	Reduced muscle fiber lamin A/C	A decreased amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. This feature can be shown by immunohistochemistry of Western blotting of muscle tissue.	肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 减少	肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量减少。肌肉组织的蛋白质印迹法免疫组化检查中可显示这种特征。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0030125	Sacralization of the fifth lumbar vertebra	A congenital anomaly, in which the transverse process of the last lumbar vertebra (L5) fuses to the sacrum on one side or both, or to ilium, or both.	第5腰椎骶椎化	一种先天性异常，最后一个腰椎单侧或双侧的横突与骶椎或髂骨或两者融合。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030129	Impaired ristocetin cofactor assay activity	Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of ristocetin to platelet-poor plasma.	瑞斯托辅因子测定活性降低	对瑞斯托菌素的异常反应，表现为向血小板缺乏的血浆中瑞斯托辅因子后，血小板聚集降低或缺乏。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030130	Impaired von Willibrand factor collagen binding activity	Reduced ability of von Willibrand factor (vWF) to bind collagen. Abnormal response to collagen as manifested by reduced or lacking ability of plasma von WIllebrand Factor to bind collagen. An ELISA-based assay is typically used; the test is sensitive to loss of von Willebrand Factor high molecular weight multimers.	血管性血友病因子胶原结合活性降低	 von Willibrand因子（vWF）结合胶原蛋白的能力降低。 对胶原蛋白的异常反应表现为血浆von WIlelerand因子结合胶原蛋白的能力降低或缺乏。 通常使用基于ELISA的测定法; 该测试对von Willebrand因子高分子量多聚体的损失敏感。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030131	Abnormal von Willebrand Factor multimer distribution	Deviation from the normal von Willebrand Factor multimer pattern.	血管性血友病因子多聚体分布异常	偏离正常von Willebrand因子多聚体模式。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030132	Absence of large von Willibrand factor multimers	Absence of large von Willebrand Factor multimers on gel electrophoresis.	大型血管性血友病因子多聚体缺失	凝胶电泳上缺少大型von Willebrand因子多聚体
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030133	Abnormal presence of ultra-large von Willebrand Factor multimers	Detection of abnormal ultra-large von Willebrand factor multimers.	超大型血管性血友病因子多聚体异常存在	检测到异常的超大型von Willebrand因子多聚体。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030134	Total absence von Willebrand Factor multimers	Complete bsence of all von Willebrand factor multimers.	血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失	所有血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失

肿瘤,消化系统异常	HP:0030153	Cholangiocarcinoma	Cholangiocarcinoma is a primary cancer originating in the biliary epithelium i.e., the cholangiocytes, of the extrahepatic and intrahepatic biliary ducts. It is extremely invasive, develops rapidly, often metastasizes, and has a very poor prognosis. They are slow growing tumors which spread longitudinally along the bile ducts with neural, perineural and subepithelial extension.	胆管癌	胆管癌是起源于肝外或肝内胆管的胆管上皮（即胆管细胞）的原发癌。通常生长缓慢，延胆管纵向扩展，伴有神经、神经周围及上皮下扩散。

神经系统异常	HP:0030182	Tetraplegia/tetraparesis	Loss of strength in all four limbs. Tetraplegia refers to a complete loss of strength, whereas Tetraparesis refers to an incomplete loss of strength.	四肢瘫痪/四肢轻瘫	四肢丧失力量。四肢瘫痪指完全丧失力量，而四肢轻瘫指的是不完全的力量丧失。
耳部异常	HP:0030183	Impaired visually enhanced vestibulo-ocular reflex	The vestibulo-ocular reflex is responsible for the stabilization of the retinal image during movement. The visual vestibular ocular reflex (VVOR) or visual enhanced VOR, maintains ocular stability during head motion by generating compensatory eye movement opposite to head movement, and is a major component of visual vestibularninteraction. This feature is an impairment of this reflex, manifested as the combined impairment of the three compensatory eye movement reflexes, namely the vestibulo-ocular reflex (VOR), smooth pursuit (SP) and optokinetic reflex (OKR).	受损的视觉增强的前庭眼反射	运动过程中视网膜图像的稳定依靠前庭眼反射。视觉VOR或视觉增强VOR是视觉和前庭相互作用的主要组成部分，通过与头部运动相反的代偿性的眼运动来维持眼部的稳定性。疾病特点为该反射受损，表现为三种代偿性的眼运动反射受损，分别是前庭-眼反射（VOR），平稳追踪（SP)和视动反射（OKR）。
神经系统异常	HP:0030185	Isometric tremor	An isometric tremor occurs with muscle contraction against a rigid stationary object (e.g., when making a fist).	等轴性震颤	对于刚性静止物体（如拳头），肌肉收缩时发生等轴震颤。
神经系统异常	HP:0030186	Kinetic tremor	Tremor that occurs during any voluntary movement. It may include visually or non-visually guided movements. Tremor during target directed movement is called intention tremor.	活动性震颤	在任何随意运动中发生的震颤。它可以包括视觉或非视觉指导的运动。随意运动期间的震颤称为意图震颤。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030190	Oral motor hypotonia	Reduced muscle tone of oral musculature. In infants, this feature may be associated with difficulties in breast feeding, and may affetc the latch, jaw motions, tongue placement, lip seal, suck/swallow/breathe pattern and overall feeding behavior.	口腔运动肌张力减退	口腔肌肉的肌张力减小。 在婴儿期，该特征可能与母乳喂养困难相关，并且可能影响闩锁、颌运动、舌放置、闭唇、吸吮/吞咽/呼吸模式和总体喂养行为。

肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	HP:0030192	Fatigable weakness of bulbar muscles	A type of weakness of the bulbar muscles (muscles of the mouth and throat responsible for speech and swallowing) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	口咽部肌肉疲劳性无力	一种肌群活动之后发生的延髓肌无力（负责言语和吞咽的口腔和喉部肌肉），休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。

That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	颈部肌肉疲劳性无力	一种通常发生在肌群运动后的颈部骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	HP:0030200	Fatiguable weakness of proximal limb muscles	A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle of proximal part of a limb that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.	近端肢体肌肉疲劳性无力	一种通常发生在肌群运动后的近端肢体骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
神经系统异常	HP:0030201	Response to drugs acting on neuromuscular transmission	Specific drugs interfere selectively with the different cellular mechanisms involved in neuromuscular transmission (synthesis, storage, release, action and inactivation of transmitter). The response of a patient to a specific drug can therefore be useful information for the differential diagnosis.	对作用于神经肌肉传递过程的药物的反应	特定药物选择性地干扰神经肌肉传播（神经递质的合成，储存，释放，作用和失活）中涉及的不同细胞机制。因此，患者对特定药物反应的信息可用于鉴别诊断。
神经系统异常	HP:0030202	Favorable response of weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors	Improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.	肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应好	乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的使用能提升肌肉力量。
神经系统异常	HP:0030203	Unfavorable response of muscle weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors	Lack of improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.	肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应不佳	使用乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂无法有效提升肌肉力量。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030205	Increased jitter at single fibre EMG	The variation in the time interval between the two action potentials of the same motor unit is called jitter. This term therefore applies to increased variability in the interval between successive action potentials of the same motor unit, which is measured by electromyography (EMG).	单纤维肌电图时抖动增加	同一运动单位的两个动作电位之间的时间间隔变化被称为抖动。因此，该术语适用于通过肌电图（EMG）测量的相同运动单位的连续动作电位之间的时间间隔的变异增加时。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0030206	EMG: incremental response of compound muscle action potential to repetitive nerve stimulation	A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to an abnormal increase in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.	肌电图: 复合肌肉动作电位对于重复神经刺激的反应递增	复合肌肉动作电位（CMAP）是肌电图（EMG）的一种。 CMAP是指一组来自同一区域的几种肌肉纤维，由运动神经刺激诱发的几乎同时发生的动作电位，并且记录为一个多重加和的总动作电位。这种异常是指在研究过程中振幅的异常增加。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0030207	Paradoxical respiration	Breathing movements in which the chest wall moves in on inspiration and out on expiration, in reverse of the normal movements. It may be seen in children with respiratory distress of any cause, which leads to indrawing of the intercostal spaces during inspiration. Patients with chronic airways obstruction also show indrawing of the lower ribs during inspiration, due to the distorted action of a depressed and flattened diaphragm. Crush injuries of the chest, with fractured ribs and sternum, can lead to a severe degree of paradoxical breathing.	反常呼吸运动	呼吸运动时胸壁在正常的吸气和呼气运动中反向移动。该现象可在任何原因导致的呼吸困难的儿童中出现，从而导致在启发过程中排空肋间。慢性气道阻塞的患者由于受压和扁平隔膜的扭曲作用，在吸气期间也显示出下肋骨的牵引力。粉碎胸部受伤，肋骨骨折和胸骨骨折，可导致严重程度的反常呼吸运动。

神经系统异常	HP:0030223	Perseveration	Perseveration can be defined as the contextually inappropriate and unintentional repetition of a response or behavioral unit. In other words, the observed repetitiveness does not meet the demands of the situation, is not the product of deliberation, and may even unfold despite counterintention. Perseveration can therefore be differentiated from goal-directed and intentional forms of repetition, such as linguistic redundancies designed to enhance communicative or poetic impact.	持续症现象	持续症现象可以被定义为反应或行为单位的上下文不适当和无意的重复。换句话说，观察到的行为重复性不适用于当时情况，不是思维或意识的产物。因此，持续症现象可以区别于目标导向和故意的重复，如旨在增强表达或增加诗意而产生的语言冗余。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0030230	Central core regions in muscle fibers	The presence of disorganized areas called cores in the center of muscle fibers. There is a typical appearance of the biopsy on light microscopy, where the muscle cells have cores that are devoid of mitochondria and specific enzymes. Cores are typically well demarcated and centrally located, but may occasionally be multiple and of eccentric.	肌肉纤维中央轴空	存在的分裂区域也称为轴空区在肌肉纤维中心。在光学显微镜下存在活检的典型外观，其中肌肉细胞具有缺乏线粒体和特异性酶的核心。轴空区通常被良好地划定并且位于中心，但偶尔也是多重的和偏中心的。

肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	HP:0030357	Small cell lung carcinoma	Small cell lung cancer (SCLC) is a type of highly malignant lung cancer that is composed of small ovoid cells. In the past, SCLC was called oat cell carcinoma because the microscopic appearance of the cells was felt to resemble oats. SLCLC usually originates near the bronchi and in many cases may grow and metastasize quickly.	小细胞肺癌	小细胞肺癌（SCLC）是一种高度恶性的肺癌，由小卵圆形细胞组成。在过去，SCLC被称为燕麦细胞癌，因为细胞的微观外观被认为类似于燕麦。 SCLC通常起源于支气管附近，并且在许多情况下可能快速生长和转移。

肿瘤,呼吸系统异常	HP:0030360	Large cell lung carcinoma	A type of non-small cell lung carcinoma that is derived from undifferentiated malignant neoplasms originating from transformed epithelial cells in the lung, and which is differentiate from small-cell lung carcinoma by the larger size of the anaplastic cells, a higher cytoplasmic-to-nuclear size ratio, and a lack of salt-and-pepper appearance of the chromatin.	大细胞肺癌	是一种非小细胞肺癌，是来源于肺中转化上皮细胞的未分化恶性肿瘤，其分化程度较高，细胞质量较大，浆核比较大，染色质缺乏盐和胡椒的外观。

Hyperphalangy of the index finger results from an accessory ossification center at the metacarpophalangeal joint, resulting in radial deviation of the index finger. Note that this term refers only to this type of hyperphalangy.	食指多指	存在与其他指骨线性排列的食指附加指骨。附加指骨是由掌指关节额外骨化中心形成的，位于正常食指指骨的桡侧。注意，该术语仅特指这种类型的多指。

Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.	初始B 细胞计数降低	原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数比正常值降低。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。
血液和造血组织异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0030373	Abnormal memory B cell count	A deviation from the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).	记忆 B 细胞计数异常	循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）比正常计数有偏差。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。

神经系统异常	HP:0030391	Spoken Word Recognition Deficit	Reduced ability of lexical discrimination, which refers to the process of distinguishing a stimulus word from other phonologically similar words. Lexical discrimination can be defined as the process of correctly identifying words in the mental lexicon to match the phonological input of a stimulus.	口语词汇识别能力降低	词义辨析的能力降低，指的是将刺激词与其他语音相似的词区分开来。词义辨析可以定义为正确识别精神词汇中的单词以匹配刺激的语音输入的过程。
肿瘤,神经系统异常	HP:0030392	Choroid plexus carcinoma	Intraventricular papillary neoplasm derived from choroid plexus epithelium. Plexus tumors are most common in the lateral and fourth ventricles; while 80% of lateral ventricle tumors present in children, fourth ventricle tumors are evenly distributed in all age groups. Clinically, choroid plexus tumors tend to cause hydrocephalus and increased intracranial pressure. Histologically, choroid plexus papillomas correspond to WHO grade I, choroid plexus carcinomas to WHO grade III.	脉络丛癌	脑室内乳头状肿瘤，源自脉络丛上皮。丛状肿瘤最常见于外侧和第四脑室；而80％的侧脑室肿瘤存在于儿童中，第四脑室肿瘤均匀分布于所有年龄组。临床上，脉络丛肿瘤倾向于引起脑积水和颅内压升高。组织学上，脉络丛乳头状瘤为WHO I级，脉络丛癌为WHO III级。

The endolymphatic duct emerges from the posterior wall of the saccule (of the inner ear) and ends in a blind pouch, the endolymphatic sac. Endolymphatic sac tumors (ELSTs) are known under different names in the literature (Heffner tumor, aggressive papillary middle ear tumor, and low-grade adenocarcinoma of endolymphatic sac origin).	内淋巴囊肿瘤	具有缓慢生长模式的低级别乳头状上皮肿瘤（腺癌）。内淋巴管从囊内（内耳）的后壁出现，并以盲囊（即内淋巴囊）结束。内淋巴囊肿瘤（ELST）也可被称为Heffner肿瘤、侵袭性乳头状中耳肿瘤、内淋巴囊起源的低度腺癌。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030396	Abnormal platelet granule secretion	Platelets are replete with secretory granules, which are critical to normal platelet function. Among the three types of platelet secretory granules - alpha-granules, dense granules, and lysosomes - the alpha-granule is the most abundant. Granule contents must be released from their intracellular repository in order to achieve their physiologic function, and this term refers to a functional defect in granule secretion.	血小板颗粒分泌异常	血小板充满分泌颗粒，对正常血小板功能至关重要。 在三种类型的血小板分泌颗粒--α-颗粒，致密颗粒和溶酶体中，α-颗粒是最丰富的。 颗粒内容物必须从其细胞内储存库中释放，以达到其生理功能，而该术语是指颗粒分泌的功能缺陷。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0030436	Fibrofolliculoma	Fibrofolliculoma is a clinically asymptomatic, 2-4 mm, skin-colored, dome-shaped smooth papule. It usually arises in the form of multiple lesions in adults in different areas such as the scalp, forehead, face, and neck. According to histology, the lesion is a fibrotic hamartoma characterized by infundibular epithelial proliferation and perifollicular fibrous proliferation.	纤维毛囊瘤	纤维肉芽肿是一种临床上无症状的2-4毫米大小、皮肤色、圆顶形的平滑丘疹。它通常以不同区域的成人多灶病变的形式出现，如头皮，前额，面部和颈部。根据组织学，病变是一种纤维性错构瘤，其特征在于漏斗状上皮细胞增生和纤维周围纤维增生。

Most patients present with rapidly growing, painless, firm, non-tender, dome-shaped red, occasionally ulcerated skin nodules, which have a red or bluish color, measuring up to several centimeters, on predominantly sun-exposed areas of the body. The overlying skin is smooth and shiny, sometimes exhibiting ulcerative, acneiform or telangiectatic features.	默克尔细胞皮肤癌	发生于老年人的恶性皮肤肿瘤，以具有区域淋巴结转移和远端转移的复发性侵袭性过程为特征。大多数患者呈现快速生长、无痛、坚固、不嫩、红色圆顶状，偶尔溃疡的皮肤结节，在身体的主要阳光下暴露的区域，其红色或蓝色的颜色可达数厘米。上覆皮肤光滑光亮，有时表现为溃疡性，粉刺型或毛细血管扩张性。
