肌肉组织异常,消化系统异常	HP:0030664	Beevor&#39;s sign	Weakness of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, which is ascertained clinically as follows. When a patient sits up or raises the head from a recumbent position, the umbilicus is displaced toward the head. This is the result of paralysis of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, so that the upper fibres predominate pulling upwards the umbilicus.	比佛氏征	腹直肌下段的无力，临床上按如下方式确认：当病人自卧位坐起或抬头时，脐部向头侧移动。这是腹直肌下部麻痹的结果，使得上部肌纤维占主导地位、向上牵引脐部。
神经系统异常	HP:0030665	Rubral tremor	Rubral tremor is characterized by a slow coarse tremor at rest that is exacerbated by postural adjustments and by guided voluntary movements.	红核震颤	红核震颤的特征是休息时缓慢的粗糙震颤，姿势调整和自主运动会导致震颤加剧。
心血管系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0030666	Retinal neovascularization	In wound repair, neovascularization (NV) involves the sprouting of new vessels from pre-existent vessels to repair or replace damaged vessels. In the retina, NV is a response to ischemia. The NV adheres to the inner surface of the retina and outer surface of the vitreous. NV are deficient in tight junctions and hence leak plasma into surrounding tissue including the vitreous. Plasma causes the vitreous gel to degenerate, contract, and eventually collapse which pulls on the retina. Since retinal NV is adherent to both retina and vitreous, as the vitreous contracts the NV may be sheared resulting in vitreous hemorrhage or the NV may remain intact and pull the retina with the vitreous resulting in retinal elevation referred to as traction retinal detachment.	视网膜新生血管形成	在伤口修复中，新血管形成（NV）包括从先前存在的血管发出新血管，以修复或替换损坏的血管。在视网膜中，NV是对局部缺血的反应。NV附着在视网膜的内表面和玻璃体的外表面上。NV缺乏紧密连接，因此将血浆泄漏到包括玻璃体的周围组织中。血浆导致玻璃体凝胶退化，收缩，并最终崩溃，拉动视网膜。由于视网膜NV附着在视网膜和玻璃体上，因为玻璃体收缩，NV可能被剪切，导致玻璃体出血，或NV可能保持完整，并且通过玻璃体拉动视网膜，导致视网膜抬高，称为牵引性视网膜脱离。
心血管系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0030667	Peripheral retinal neovascularization	A type of retinal neovascularization that affects the periphery of the retina.	周边视网膜新生血管形成	一种视网膜新生血管形成，影响视网膜外周。

Thus, ectopic liver refers to autonomous islands of normal liver parenchyma located outside the liver. The term ectopic liver is also used, to include liver appendices attached to the native liver by a thin stalk although being fully separated from the latter.	异位肝	异位肝是一种罕见的发育异常，肝组织位于肝脏之外。因此，异位肝指位于肝脏之外的独立岛状的正常肝实质。异位肝亦包括与肝脏完全分离但仍以细蒂附着于正常肝脏的“阑尾肝”。

神经系统异常	HP:0030725	Neurenteric cyst	The neurenteric cyst is a rare lesion composed of heterotopic endodermal tissue. During the third week of human embryogenesis, the neurenteric canal unites the yolk sac and the amniotic cavity as it traverses the primitive notochordal plate. Persistence of the normally transient neurenteric canal prevents appropriate separation of endoderm and notochord. This results in a variable degree of communication between neural and enteric epithelium.	神经管原肠囊肿	神经性囊肿是由异位内胚层组织组成的罕见病变。在人类胚胎发生的第三个星期，当神经肠管穿过原始脊髓板时，神经肠管和羊膜腔结合。持续存在正常的神经管可防止内胚层和脊索的适当分离。这导致神经和肠上皮之间的可变程度的交流。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0030728	Meromelia	Partial absence of a free limb (excluding girdle). It can refer to the proximal, middle or distal segment of the upper or lower limb. The deficiency may be transverse or longitudinal. Thus, meromelia is a lack of a part, but not all, of one or more limbs with the presence of a hand or foot.	残肢畸形	自由肢(不含肢带骨)的部分缺如。它可以指上下肢近端、中间或远端部分。缺如可以是横向或纵向。因此，残肢畸形是缺少单个或多个肢体的一部分，但不是全部，因此仍然具有手脚。

Carcinomas that arise from glandular epithelium are called adenocarcinomas, those that arise from squamous epithelium are called squamous cell carcinomas, and those that arise from transitional epithelium are called transitional cell carcinomas (NCI Thesaurus).	癌	由上皮细胞发展而来的恶性肿瘤。由腺体上皮引起的癌称为腺癌，由鳞状上皮引起的癌称为鳞状细胞癌，而由过渡性上皮引起的癌称为过渡性细胞癌（NCI词典）。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030733	Vesicoallantoic abdominal wall defect	An abdominal wall defected related to a developmental anomaly of the allantois, which is an embryonic structure that develops as a diverticulum off the yolk sac at about 16 days post fertilization. During further development, the allantois becomes incorporated into the body of the embryo, connecting the ventral aspect of the urogenital sinus (which will develop into the upper pole of the urinary bladder) to the external portion of the umbilicus. Upon further development, the lumen of the allantois becomes obliterated and forms a thick fibrous cord called the urachus, which connects the apex of the bladder to the umbilicus. In adults, the urachus is known as the median umbilical ligament. Failure of the allantoic cavity to obliterate can result of one of four conditions: 1) congenital patent urachus (a completely open connection between bladder and umbilicus); 2) vesicourachal diverticulum (a diverticulum off the bladder but not communicating with the umbilicus); umbilical cyst and sinus (not communicating with the bladder); and 4) alternating urachal sinus. An abdominal wall defect can be associated with a urachal cyst.	膀胱尿囊腹壁缺损	腹壁的缺损，与尿囊的发育异常有关，尿囊是一个胚胎结构，大约受精后16天由卵黄囊发展成的一个憩室。在进一步发育过程中，尿囊与胚胎合并形成一体，连接着腹侧的泌尿生殖窦(发展成膀胱的上部)与脐的外部。进一步发展后，尿囊腔闭塞形成一个粗大的纤维索即脐尿管，连接的膀胱顶点和脐。到成年，脐尿管被称为脐正中韧带。尿囊腔若不能消退，导致四个后果之一：1)先天性脐尿管开放(膀胱与脐之间的一个完全开放的通道)；2)膀胱脐尿管憩室(膀胱的一个憩室，但不与脐相通)；3)脐带囊肿和窦(与膀胱不相通)；4)脐尿管窦。腹壁缺陷可以伴脐尿管囊肿。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030735	Ureterovesical junction obstruction	Blockage at the level of the bladder and the ureter caused by stenosis of the ureteral valves or failure of a narrow juxtavesical ureteral segment to dilate due to segmented fibrosis or localized absence of muscle.	膀胱输尿管交界处梗阻	于膀胱和输尿管水平发生的堵塞，由以下两种因素引起：输尿管瓣膜的狭窄或由于节段性纤维化或局部缺乏肌肉导致的接近膀胱的输尿管段不能舒张。

眼部异常	HP:0030742	Glial remnants posterior to lens	This anomaly, also known as Mittendorf dot, is a benign, nonprogressive recognizable lesion that does not cause visual impairment. However, it can resemble a pathological congenital or acquired cataract lesion which may enlarge and cause visual impairment. The dot appears as a black speck that ranges in size from the dot made by a sharp pencil point to the size of a poppy seed. It is usually well defined, although occasionally there may be irregular, fine lines radiating outward from the dot.	晶状体后方胶质残余	这种异常又称Mittendorf点，是一种良性、非进展性、可识别的病变，不引起视力损伤。但它类似一种先天性病理性或获得性的白内障病变，导致视力损伤出现和加重。点呈现黑色斑点状，大小从尖锐的铅笔点到罂粟籽不等。通常界限清晰，偶有不规则的放射状线条从点向外辐射。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030754	Allantoic cyst	A swelling formed at the base of umbilicus associated with a patent urachus which results from an allantoic remnant. The urachus is a fibrous remnant of the allantois which communicates from the apex of the urinary bladder to the umbilicus. Failed obliteration of the urachus can lead to various abnormalities: urachal cyst, urachal diverticulum, sinus or patent urachus - the most common type. Allantoic cysts in infants with patent urachus can be formed due to the drainage of urine into the umbilical cord, or in uncommon situations, after leakage of hypo-osmotic urine into the Wharton&#39;s jelly.	尿囊囊肿	尿囊囊肿是脐[此条以下进行了修改，但没有存入。以上还有需要修改的。待开放之后再说。]的底部的肿胀和开放性脐尿管（它缘于尿囊遗迹）。脐尿管是尿囊的纤维状残余，尿囊沟通膀胱的顶点与脐。脐尿管闭合失败可导致许多种异常:脐尿管囊肿、脐尿管憩室、窦或开放性脐尿管，后者是最常见的类型。由于将尿液引入脐带，或在罕见情况下,将低渗的尿液泄漏到华通氏胶，婴儿会形成尿囊囊肿伴开放性脐尿管。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030762	Mesangiolysis	Dissolution or attenuation of mesangial matrix and degeneration of mesangial cells. In essence, mesangiolysis is an injurious process which affects the glomerular mesangium without causing obvious damage to the capillary basement membranes. The matrix swells, loosens, and eventually dissolves; the mesangial cells may show only edema and vacuolization, or may undergo severe degeneration and necrosis.	系膜溶解	肾小球系膜基质分解或衰减及系膜细胞的退化。从本质上讲,肾小球系膜的溶解是一个有害的过程，影响了肾小球系膜，但没有造成明显的毛细血管基底膜损害。基质膨胀、松懈,最终溶解,系膜细胞可能只显示出水肿和液泡化,也可能经历严重的变性和坏死。

体壁的异常	HP:0030764	Ochronosis	Brown or blue-gray discoloration of the skin that can present on the axillary and inguinal areas, face, palms or soles. In addition, blue-black discoloration can be apparent on skin overlying cartilage in which the pigment is deposited, such as the ears. This is a characteristic manifestation of alkaptonuria, which is an autosomal recessively inherited deficiency of homogentisic acid oxidase that results in accumulation of homogentisic acid in collagenous structures. The sclerae are also typically involved.	褐黄病	发生在腋窝、腹股沟、面部以及掌跖部位的皮肤褐色或灰色样变。此外，在软骨区域，如耳朵，可出现皮肤深蓝色样变。这是黑尿酸尿症的特征表现，这是一种常染色体隐性遗传缺陷导致的尿黑酸氧化酶的尿黑酸胶原结构的沉积。巩膜也可累及。

骨骼系统异常	HP:0030776	Modic type I vertebral endplate changes	An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a low signal on T1-weighted sequences and high signal on T2-weighted sequences. Modic type I changes are thought to represent bone marrow edema and inflammation.	Modic I 型椎体终板改变	椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列上的低信号和T2加权序列上的高信号。Modic I型改变被认为代表骨髓水肿和炎症。

血液和造血组织异常	HP:0030780	Abnormality of the protein C anticoagulant pathway	An anomaly of the protein C anticoagulant pathway, which serves as a major system for controlling thrombosis, limiting inflammatory responses, and potentially decreasing endothelial cell apoptosis in response to inflammatory cytokines and ischemia. A natural anticoagulant system denoted the protein C pathway exerts its anticoagulant effect by regulating the activity of FVIIIa and FVa. The vitamin K-dependent protein C is the key component of the pathway. Activated protein C (APC) cleaves and inhibits coagulation cofactors FVIIIa and FVa, which result in downregulation of the activity of the coagulation system. The endothelial protein C receptor stimulates the T-TM-mediated activation of protein C on the endothelial cell surface. The two cofactors, protein S and the intact form of FV, enhance the anticoagulant activity of APC.	蛋白 C 抗凝途径异常	蛋白C抗凝血途径的异常，其作为控制血栓形成的主要系统，限制炎症反应，以及潜在地减少内皮细胞凋亡以响应炎性细胞因子和缺血。 表示蛋白C途径的天然抗凝剂体系通过调节FVIIIa和FVa的活性来发挥其抗凝血作用。 维生素K依赖蛋白C是途径的关键组成部分。 活化蛋白C（APC）切割并抑制凝血辅助因子FVIIIa和FVa，这导致凝血系统活性的下调。 内皮蛋白C受体刺激T-TM介导的蛋白C在内皮细胞表面的活化。 两种辅因子蛋白S和完整形式的FV增强了APC的抗凝血活性。

神经系统异常	HP:0030784	Anomia	An inability to name people and objects that are correctly perceived. The individual is able to describe the object in question, but cannot provide the name.	命名性失语症	无法命名正确感知的人物和物体。个人能够描述有问题的对象，但不能提供名称。
肿瘤,免疫系统异常	HP:0030785	Mediastinal cystic lymphangioma	A lymphangioma (congenital malformation consisting of focal proliferations of well-differentiated lymphatic tissue in multi cystic or sponge like structures) located within the mediastinum, i.e., the central compartment of the thoracic cavity that is surrounded by loose connective tissue. Mediastinal lymphangioma is a slow growing mass with benign features, and accounts for 1% of all mediastinal tumors.	纵隔囊性淋巴管瘤	淋巴管瘤（先天性畸形，由多囊性或海绵状结构中的分化良好的淋巴组织的局限性增生组成）位于纵隔内，即由松散结缔组织包围的胸腔的中央隔室。纵隔淋巴管瘤是一种缓慢生长的肿块，具有良性特征，占纵隔肿瘤的1％。
眼部异常	HP:0030786	Photopsia	Perceived flashes of light.	闪光感	感觉闪光存在。
耳部异常	HP:0030787	Cerumen abnormality	Any anomaly of the cerumen (ear wax), the yellowish waxy substance secreted in the ear canal.	耵聍异常	耵聍（耳垢）的任何异常，耵聍是耳道分泌的黄色腊样物质。
耳部异常	HP:0030788	Impacted cerumen	Blockage of the external auditory canal by a buildup of earwax.	耵聍栓塞	外耳道由于耵聍堆积发生堵塞。

耳部异常	HP:0030790	Abnormal cerumen color	An anomolous earwax color. Earwax (cerumen) is usually light to dark brown or orange in color.	耵聍颜色异常	耳垢颜色异常。耳垢（耵聍）通常为浅棕色到深棕色，或为橘黄色。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0030791	Abnormal jaw morphology	A structural anomaly of the jaw, the bony structure of the mouth that consists of the mandible and the maxilla.	颌部形态异常	颌部结构异常，其骨性结构包括上颌骨和下颌骨。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0030794	Abnormal C-peptide level	An anomolous circulating concentration of the connecting (C) peptide, which links the insulin A and B chains in proinsulin, providing thereby a means to promote their efficient folding and assembly in the endoplasmic reticulum during insulin biosynthesis. After cleavage of proinsulin, C-peptide is stored with insulin in the soluble phase of the secretory granules and is subsequently released in equimolar amounts with insulin, providing a useful independent indicator of insulin secretion.	C-肽水平异常	#####
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0030795	Reduced C-peptide level	A decreased concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with reduced insulin secretion.	C-肽水平降低	#####
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0030796	Increased C-peptide level	An elevated concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with increased insulin secretion.	C-肽水平增高	#####
神经系统异常	HP:0030797	Reduced volume of central subdivision of bed nucleus of stria terminalis	A diminished volume of the central part of the bed nucleus of the stria terminalis.	终纹床核中央区体积减少	终纹床核中央区体积的减少。
神经系统异常	HP:0030798	Abnormality of the bed nucleus of stria terminalis	The stria terminalis is a slender, compact fiber bundle that connects the amygdala (amygdaloid body) with the hypothalamus and other basal forebrain regions. The bed nucleus of the stria terminalis is a limbic forebrain structure that receives heavy projections from, among other areas, the basolateral amygdala, and projects in turn to hypothalamic and brainstem target areas that mediate many of the autonomic and behavioral responses to aversive or threatening stimuli. This term refers to an anomaly of the bed nucleus.	终纹床核异常	终纹是细长的，紧密的纤维束，将杏仁核（杏仁体）与下丘脑和其他基底前脑区域连接起来。终纹的床核是一种边缘前脑结构，从其他区域接受基底外侧杏仁核的重度突出，并依次向下丘脑和脑干目标区域进行调节，这些区域介导了对厌恶或威胁性刺激的许多自主和行为反应。这个术语是指床核的异常。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0030799	Scaphocephaly	Scaphocephaly is a subtype of dolichocephaly where the anterior and posterior aspects of the cranial vault are pointed (boat-shaped). Scaphocephaly is caused by a precocious fusion of sagittal suture without other associated synostosis.	舟状头	舟状头是头颅的一个亚型，其颅顶的前部和后部是尖的（船形）。 舟状头是由矢状缝合的过早融合而其他颅缝未闭合引起的。
眼部异常	HP:0030800	Abnormal visual accommodation	An anomaly in the process of visual accommodation, which is the process of adjustment of the eye to enable sharp vision of objects at different distances. Accommodation is mediated by contraction of the ciliary muscles, which alter the convexity of the lens and, consequently, its refractive power.	视觉调节异常	视觉调节功能异常，调节功能使人们看不同距离的物体均有清晰的图像。调节通过睫状肌的收缩进行调控，从而改变晶状体的凸度和折射能力。
眼部异常	HP:0030801	Reduced visual accommodation	A decreased ability of the eye to adjust and thereby enable sharp vision of objects at different distances.	视觉调节能力下降	视觉调节能力下降

体壁的异常	HP:0030808	Ragged cuticle	The cuticle (properly known as the eponychium, or the medial nail fold or the proximal nail fold), is the thickened layer of skin surrounding fingernails and toenails. Its function is to protect the area between the nail and epidermis from exposure to bacteria. This term refers to the presence of and irregular edge or outline of the cuticle.	粗糙的甲上皮	甲表皮(称为甲上皮或内侧甲襞或近端甲襞),是指（趾）甲周围的厚层皮肤。它的功能是保护甲和表皮之间区域，避免接触细菌。这个术语是指甲表皮的不规则的边缘或轮廓。

眼部异常	HP:0030824	Mizuo phenomenon	Change in the color of the fundus from red in the dark-adapted state to golden immediately or shortly after the onset of the light. The color of the fundus reflex in the light adapted state has also been described as golden-yellow, gray-white, and yellow-white. This reflex can appear either homogeneous or in streaks in the fundus. The retinal vessels appear to be protruding in contrast to the radiant background. Dark adaptation leads to disappearance of the unusual fundus coloration [Digital Journal of Ophthalmology 2008; Volume 14, Number 14].	水尾现象	指眼底颜色的变化，黑暗中为红色，光照后迅速变为金黄色。光照后的眼底颜色被描述为金黄色，灰白色和黄白色。这一反射可以在眼底中均匀出现或者成条排列。相较于辐射状的背景，视网膜血管相对突出。暗适应使得异常的眼底颜色消失。
眼部异常	HP:0030825	Absent foveal reflex	Lack of the foveal reflex, which normally occurs as a result of the reflection of light from the ophthalmoscope in the foveal pit upon examination. The foveal reflex is a bright pinpoint of light that is observed to move sideways or up and down in response to movement of the opthalmoscope.	黄斑中心凹反射缺失	黄斑中心凹反光缺失，这一反射通常是检眼镜对中心凹进行检查中出现。中心凹反射是一个明亮的光点，可以根据检眼镜的移动向侧边或者上下移动。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0030843	Cardiac amyloidosis	Extracellular deposition in cardiac tissue of a proteinaceous material that, when stained with Congo red, demonstrates apple-green birefringence under polarized light and that has a distinct color when stained with sulfated Alcian blue. Viewed with electron microscopy, the amyloid deposits are seen to be composed of a beta-sheet fibrillar material. These nonbranching fibrils have a diameter of 7.5 to 10 nm and are the result of protein misfolding.	心脏淀粉样变性	#####

心血管系统异常	HP:0030846	Abnormality of venous physiology	An anomaly of venous function.	静脉生理异常	静脉生理异常。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030847	Abnormal jugular venous pressure	An anomaly of the jugular venous pressure. The internal jugular veins, being continuous with the superior vena cava, provide a visible measure of the degree to which the systemic venous reservoir is filled. The vertical height above the right atrium to which they are distended and above which they are in a collapsed state provides an imperfect reflection of the right atrial pressure.	颈静脉压异常	颈静脉压力异常。与上腔静脉连续的颈内静脉提供了系统性静脉血管充填程度的测量方法。在右心房扩张并且高于被测折叠部位的垂直高度，提供了右心房压力的不完全反映。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030848	Elevated jugular venous pressure	Increased jugular venous pressure.	颈静脉压升高	颈静脉压升高。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030849	Hepatojugular reflux	The examiner applies firm but persistent pressure over the liver for 10 seconds while observing the mean jugular venous pressure. Normally there is either no rise or only a transient (i.e., 2 to 3 sec) rise in mean jugular venous pressure. A sustained increase in the mean venous pressure until abdominal compression is released is abnormal and indicates impaired right heart function. This abnormal response is called hepatojugular reflux.	肝颈静脉返流	检查者在观察平均颈静脉压力的同时对肝脏施加坚固但持续的压力10秒。通常情况下，平均静脉压平均值不会上升或仅有暂时性（即2〜3秒）升高。直到腹部压迫释放的平均静脉压持续增加是异常，表明右心功能受损。这种异常反应称为肝炎回流。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030850	Abnormal pulse pressure	An anomaly of the pulse pressure, which is defined as the systolic pressured minus the diastolic pressure.	脉压异常	脉压的异常。脉压被定义为收缩压减去舒张压。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030851	Low pulse pressure	Reduced amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).	脉压低	脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）降低。
心血管系统异常	HP:0030852	High pulse pressure	Increased amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).	脉压高	脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）升高。

神经系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0030857	Eye movement-induced pain	An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the eye that is worse in certain directions of gaze and during prolonged gaze holding.	眼动诱发疼痛	一种令人不愉快的感觉，其特征在于局限于眼睛的某些方向的凝视和长时间注视持续期间的身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）。
神经系统异常	HP:0030858	Addictive behavior	A recurrent pattern of behavior that is characeterized by the failure to resist an impulse, drive, or temptation to perform an act that is harmful to the person or to others. The repetitive engagement in these behaviors ultimately interferes with functioning in other domains.	成瘾行为	一种反复的行为模式，由于没有抵制冲动、驱动或诱惑来执行对人或其他人有害的行为。这些行为的重复参与最终会干扰其他领域的运作。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0030863	Nasal flaring	Widening of the nostrils upon inhalation as a manifestation of respiratory distress.	鼻翼煽动	吸气时鼻孔扩大，是呼吸窘迫的表现。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0030864	Intercostal retractions	A pulling inward of the soft tissues between the ribs upon inhalation. This is a sign of increased use of the chest muscles for breathing and is a manifestation of respiratory distress.	肋间隙回缩	吸气时在肋骨之间向内拉动软组织。 这是增加胸部肌肉用于呼的迹象，并且是呼吸窘迫的表现。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0030883	Femoroacetabular Impingement	Femoroacetabular impingement (FAI) results from one or more bony abnormalities that lead to abnormal contact between the acetabulum and the femoral head or neck. The femoral abnormality is proposed to cause compression and shear stresses in the region between the labrum and cartilage, anterosuperiorly. These stresses cause a separation between the labrum and cartilage as the labrum is pushed outwards and the cartilage is pushed centrally. This eventually leads to articular degeneration and eventually global hip osteoarthritis.	股骨髋臼撞击症	股骨髋臼撞击症由于一个或多个骨异常，导致髋臼和股骨头或股骨颈之间的异常联系所致。股骨的异常可能会导致在上唇和软骨之间产生前上的压缩和剪切力。这些压力导致与上唇唇状组织和软骨外推分离，软骨被挤压一起。这导致关节退化,最终导致全髋关节的骨关节炎。

呼吸系统异常	HP:0030893	Abnormal response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator	Pulmonary vasodilator testing is performed during right-heart catheterization and involves a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide. The current definition of a normal (positive) response is a drop in mean pulmonary artery pressure of at least 10 mm Hg (or 20 percent) to below 40 mm Hg.	对短效肺血管扩张剂反应异常	肺血管扩张剂测试在右心导管术期间进行，并且涉及短效血管活性剂如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入的一氧化氮。 正常（正）反应的当前定义是平均肺动脉压至少出现10 mm Hg（或20％）至绝对值小于40 mm Hg的下降。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0030894	Insufficient response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator	No fall in mean pulmonary arterial pressure (mPAP) falls by at least 10 mmHg to an absolute value less than 40 mmHg without a degradation in cardiac output (CO) in response to a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide.	对短效肺血管扩张剂反应不足	平均肺动脉压（mPAP）的下降至少为10mmHg至绝对值小于40mmHg，而对于短效血管活性剂（如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入一氧化氮），心输出量（CO）没有降低。

体壁的异常	HP:0030898	Pruritis on abdomen	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the abdomen.	腹部瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是腹部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。

体壁的异常	HP:0030901	Pruritis on breast	Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the breast.	乳房瘙痒	瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是乳房皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
神经系统异常	HP:0030902	Palmomental reflex	A type of primitive reflex characterized by an involuntary contraction of the mentalis muscle of the chin caused by stimulation of the thenar eminence of the palm.	掌颌反射	一种原始反射，其特征在于通过刺激手掌的尖锐隆隆而引起的下巴的精神肌肉的不自主收缩。
神经系统异常	HP:0030903	Grasp reflex	A type of primitive reflex that can be elicated when the hand of the examiner is gently inserted into the palm of the patient&#39;s hand. The palmar surface is stroked or simply touched. The flexor surfaces of the fingers may be stimulated also by the examiner&#39;s fingers. The stimulus should be in a distal direction. With a positive response, the patient grasps the examiner&#39;s hand with variable strength and continues to grasp as the examiner&#39;s hand is moved. Ability to release the grip voluntarily depends on the activity of the reflex; some patients can do so readily, while others can even be lifted off the bed, since the grasp has such power [NCBI Books:NBK395].	抓握反射/握持反射	当检查者的手轻轻插入患者手掌时，可以引发一种原始反射。手掌表面被抚摸或简单地触动。手指的屈肌表面也可以由检查者的手指刺激。刺激应在远端方向。有了积极的回应，患者抓住检查员手中的力量不变，并随着检查者的手移动而继续掌握。自主释放的能力取决于反射的活动；有些患者可以这样做，而有些甚至可以从床上抬起，因为抓握有这样的力量[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
神经系统异常	HP:0030904	Glabellar reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by repetitive tapping on the forehead. Normal subjects usually blink in response to the first several taps, but if blinking persists, the response is abnormal and considered to be a sign of frontal release. Persistent blinking is also known as Myerson&#39;s sign.	眉心反射	通过重复敲击前额引起的一种原始反射。正常情况下通常会在前几次敲击中眨眼，但如果持续眨眼，则是异常的标志。持续眨眼也被称为Myerson&#39;s标志。
神经系统异常	HP:0030905	Snout reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by tapping the upper lip lightly. The contraction of the muscles causes the mouth to resemble a snout [NCBI Books:NBK395].	撅嘴反射	通过轻轻敲击上唇引起的一种原始反射。肌肉收缩导致噘嘴反射[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
神经系统异常	HP:0030906	Suck reflex	A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by lightly touching or tapping on the lips with an object such as a tongue blade, reflex hammer, or the examiner&#39;s finger. At times the reflex is obtained merely by approaching the lips with an object. A positive suck reflex consists of sucking movements by the lips when they are stroked or touched [NCBI Books:NBK395].	吸吮反射	一种原始反射，通过用诸如压舌板，反射锤或检查者的手指的物体轻轻地触摸或敲击嘴唇而引起。有时只能通过用物体接近嘴唇来获得反射。阳性吸反射包括嘴唇吸吮或抚摸时的动作[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
神经系统异常	HP:0030907	Thunderclap headache	Severe head pain with sudden onset, reaching its maximum intensity in less than one minute and lasting from one hour to ten days.	霹雳性头痛	严重头痛突然发作，在不到一分钟内达到最大强度，持续1小时至10天。
免疫系统异常	HP:0030908	Liver kidney microsome type 1 antibody positivity	The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against P450 2D6, a cytochrome P450 mono-oxygenase. Anti-LKM-1 antibodies are considered to be a diagnostic marker of autoimmune hepatitis type 2 (AIH2).	肝肾微粒体1型抗体阳性	在与P450 2D6（细胞色素P450单加氧酶）反应的血清中存在自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）。 抗LKM-1抗体被认为是自身免疫性肝炎2型（AIH2）的诊断标志物。

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0030947	Conjunctival follicles	['Small, dome-shaped nodules without a prominent central vessel located on the conjunctiva. The lymphoid follicles are located in the subendothelial region of the conjunctiva. They consist of a germinal center that contains immature, proliferating lymphocytes, as well as a corona that contains mature lymphocytes and plasma cells.']	结膜囊	['结膜上的突出的中心有血管的小圆顶状结节。淋巴滤泡位于结膜的下内皮区。它们包括一个有含未成熟的、正在增殖的淋巴细胞的萌发中心，以及一个包含成熟淋巴细胞和浆细胞的冠。

眼部异常	HP:0030952	Birdshot choroidal lesions	['Multiple cream-yellow colored hypopigmented choroidal anomalies whose size is approximately one quarter to one half of that of the optic disc, and whose location tends to cluster around the optic nerve radiating towards the periphery. 心血管系统异常	HP:0030962	Abnormal morphology of the great vessels	['A structural anomaly affecting a blood vessel involved in the circulation of the heart, i.e., the superior or inferior vena cava, the pulmonary arteries, the pulmonary veins, and the aorta.']	大血管畸形	即上、下腔静脉、肺动脉、肺静脉和主动脉等可以影响心脏循环的大的血管的结构异常
心血管系统异常	HP:0030964	Abnormal aortic physiology		主动脉异常生理学	
心血管系统异常	HP:0030965	Aortic stiffness	The elastic properties of the aorta allow the aorta to store half of the cardiac ejected blood volume per beat, whereby aortic recoil during diastole pushes the remaining stored volume forward into the peripheral circulation, a phenomenon known as the Windkessel function. Aortic stiffness occurs as the elastic fibers within the arterial wall become disrupted due to mechanical stress (with age or due to other factors). Aortic stiffness refers to a reduction in the elasticity of the aorta, which is associated with an elevated pulse pressure, increased wave reflection, and often hypertension.	主动脉僵硬	"主动脉的弹性特性允许主动脉存储每搏输出的一半心脏射血量，由此主动脉在心脏舒张期间的反冲将剩余的储存体积向前推入外周循环，这种现象称为Windkessel功能。 当动脉壁内的弹性纤维由于机械应力（随着年龄或由于其他因素）而被破坏时发生主动脉僵硬。 主动脉僵硬是指主动脉弹性降低，这与脉压升高，波反射增加和高血压有关。"

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030974	Cryptozoospermia	A type of low sperm count where ejaculated semen contains less than 100,000 spermatozoa per ml. With cryptozoospermia, the sperm count may fluctuate and a zero sperm count in the ejaculate may be initially measured. If sperm are observed in a second semen sample following centrifugation, the diagnosis of cryptozoospermia can be made (and azoospermia can be ruled out).	隐匿精子症	少精是指精液中每毫升精液中含有精子数量少于10万个。隐匿精子症指精子数量可出现波动，在初次射精时精子数量为0，在第二次精液复查中若离心后可发现精子，隐匿精子症即可诊断（无精症除外）。

Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.']	VIII因子活性异常	凝血因子VIII活性异常，FVIII是内源性凝血途径的辅助因子，在极少量凝血酶存在的情况下可被激活为FVIIIa，FVIIIa作为FIXa 和FX的受体。

Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.	VIII因子活性增强	凝血因子VIII活性增强，FVIII是内源性凝血途径的辅助因子，在极少量凝血酶存在的情况下可被激活为FVIIIa，FVIIIa作为FIXa 和FX的受体。

神经系统异常	HP:0030981	Abnormal CSF/serum albumin ratio	A deviation from the normal range of the ratio of the albumin concentration in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) to the concentration in serum (which may be defined as 3.2-9.0). This is an index of blood-brain barrier (BBB) integrity, adjusted for the serum albumin concentration, and an increased ratio is taken as a sign of a loss of integretiy of the BBB with leakage of albumin into the CSF.	异常脑脊液/血清白蛋白比率	脑脊液白蛋白浓度与血清白蛋白浓度之比偏离正常范围（正常范围在3.2-9.0）。这是血脑屏障完整性的指标，调整血清白蛋白浓度，白蛋白渗漏进入脑脊液会导致脑脊液白蛋白浓度与血清白蛋白浓度之比增高，提示血脑屏障丧失完整性。
肿瘤,泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0030983	Ovarian thecoma	A sex cord-stromal tumor of the ovary. Thecomas range from small tumors to large solid or solid-cystic masses of up to 15 cm. They are unilateral in over 90 percent of cases and are rarely malignant. Thecomas are stromal tumors made up of cells that resemble theca cells, lutein cells and fibroblasts. They are traditionally classified within the sex cord-stromal tumor category of ovarian tumor types.	卵泡膜细胞瘤	一种卵巢性索间质细胞肿瘤。卵泡膜细胞瘤范围从可小肿瘤到大的实性或囊实性的肿瘤，最大可达15cm。近90%的肿瘤多为单侧发病且多为良性肿瘤。卵泡膜细胞瘤由是类似膜细胞、黄体细胞、成纤维细胞组成的由间质瘤。属于卵巢肿瘤传统意义分类的性索间质肿瘤。

免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0030987	Suppurative cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by the presence of numerous polymorphonuclear cells around and within the wall as well as within the lumen of the ducts. This may involve ducts of any size and is occasionally associated with abscess formation (cholangitic abscess).	化脓性胆管炎	以管壁周、管壁内以及管腔内存在大量的多形核细胞为特征的胆管炎类型。累及任何尺寸的导管，偶尔伴有脓肿形成（胆管炎脓肿）。
免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0030988	Granulomatous cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by the accumulation of granulomas. Granulomas are aggregates of modified macrophages (epithelioid cells) and other inflammatory cells that accumulate after chronic exposure to antigens. The underlying trigger may be exposure to noxious agents that cannot be biochemically degraded or to immune dysfunction. The ultimate result is a release of a variety cytokines that stimulate mononuclear cells that fuse to form multinucleated giant cells with a surrounding rim of lymphocytes and fibroblasts.	肉芽肿性胆管炎	以肉芽肿积聚为特征的胆管炎。肉芽肿是修饰的巨噬细胞（上皮样细胞）和抗原长期暴露累积的炎症细胞的聚集物。难以生化降解的有害药物或免疫功能缺陷可能是其触发因素。最终结果是释放多种细胞因子，刺激单个核细胞融合形成多核巨细胞，并围以淋巴细胞和成纤维细胞。
免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0030989	Lymphoid cholangitis	Cholangitis characterized by a close association between duct branches, usually interlobular bile ducts, and lymphocytic aggregates, which may show a follicular arrangement.	淋巴性胆管炎	以分支胆管（通常为小叶间胆管）和淋巴细胞的聚集存在密切联系的胆管炎，呈滤泡样排列。

消化系统异常	HP:0030994	Pancreas divisum	A congenital anomaly of the pancreas that results from failed fusion of the dorsal and ventral ducts during embyological development. Three variants have been described: type 1 or classical divisum in which there is total failure of fusion; type 2 in which dorsal drainage is dominant in the absence of the duct of Wirsung; and type 3 or incomplete divisum where a small communicating branch is present.	胰腺分裂	在胚胎发育过程中，由于主胰管和副胰管融合异常导致的胰腺先天发育异常，包括：I型或经典型为完全未融合型；II型主胰管无法引流，以副胰管引流为主；III型或不完全型分裂是指主副胰管有细小的交通支但无法充分引流。

心血管系统异常	HP:0031012	Thin-cap fibroatheroma	Thin-cap fibroatheroma is characterized by a relatively large necrotic core with an overlying thin fibrous cap measuring <65 ¦Ìm typically containing numerous macrophages, and is considered to be the precursor lesion of plaque rupture which is the most common cause of coronary thrombosis	薄纤维帽粥样瘤	薄纤维帽粥样瘤的特征是一个相对较大的坏死区域覆盖的纤维帽厚度<65μm，通常含有大量巨噬细胞，被认为是斑块破裂的前病变，是冠状动脉血栓形成的最常见病因
骨骼系统异常	HP:0031013	Ankylosis	['A reduction of joint mobility resulting from changes involving the articular surfaces.']	关节僵硬	由于关节面变化等导致关节活动范围受限。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031014	Arteria lusoria	Usually, three large arteries arise from the arch of the aorta: the brachiocephalic trunk (divided into the right common carotid artery and the right subclavian artery), the left common carotid artery, and the left subclavian artery. However, when aberrant right subclavian artery variant is present, the brachiocephalic trunk is absent and four large arteries arise from the arch of the aorta: the right common carotid artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery, and the final one with the most distal left sided origin, the right subclavian artery, also called the arteria lusoria.	压迫性动脉	"通常，主动脉弓有三条大动脉：头臂干(分为右侧颈总动脉和右侧锁骨下动脉)、左颈总动脉、左锁骨下动脉， 然而，当右锁骨下动脉异常时，头臂干不存在，主动脉弓出现四条大动脉：右颈总动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉和最后一条最远端的左侧起源，右锁骨下动脉，也称为压迫性动脉。"
消化系统异常,心血管系统异常	HP:0031015	Intrahepatic portal vein sclerosis	Sclerosis of the intrahepatic portal veins of the liver and generally accompanied by non-cirrhotic portal hypertension, features of which may include splenomegaly and varices.	肝内门静脉硬化	肝内门静脉硬化的特征可能包括脾肿大和静脉曲张，同时还会伴有非肝硬化性门静脉高压。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0031018	Eccrine syringofibroadenoma	Eccrine syringofibroadenoma (ESFA) is a benign adnexal tumor arising most often on the extremities of elderly individuals characterized by anastomosing cords of cuboidal epithelial cells surrounded by a fibrovascular stroma containing plasma cells and ductal structures. ESFA stains positively with epithelial membrane antigen (EMA) and carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA).	小汗腺汗管纤维腺瘤	小汗腺汗管纤维腺瘤（ESFA）是一种皮肤附件良性肿瘤，常发生在老年人的四肢部位，其特征在于由包含浆细胞和导管结构的纤维血管基质围绕的立方形上皮细胞。 ESFA与上皮膜抗原（EMA）和癌胚抗原（CEA）呈阳性染色。

Histologically, the lesions may demonstrate dermal proliferation of well-demarcated nerve bundles associated with abundant mucin and surrounded by a distinct perineural sheath.	多发性粘膜神经瘤	口腔黏膜上多发性疼痛、穹隆状、半透明粉红色到肤色的丘疹。由于丰富的粘蛋白被神经鞘包绕，组织学上病损可表现为分界清晰的神经束膜增殖。

代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031028	Lactescent serum	Serum sample with a grossly white (milk-like, i.e., lactescent) appearance. This feature is indicative of an extremely elevated serum triglyceride level.	乳状血清	血清样本外观呈乳白色（牛奶样或乳汁状），表明血清甘油三酯水平显著增高。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031029	Elevated carcinoembryonic antigen level	An increased blood concentration of the carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA). CEA is a member of the immunoglobulin supergene family. The human CEA gene family is clustered on chromosome 19q and comprises 29 genes. CEA is highly expressed in embryonic tissue and in some cancers, and is a widely used tumor marker.	癌胚抗原水平增高	血液中癌胚抗原（CEA)浓度增高。CEA是免疫球蛋白超基因家族成员之一。人类CEA基因家族定位于染色体19q，包含29个基因。CEA在胚胎组织和某些肿瘤中呈现高表达，因此被广泛用作肿瘤标志物。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031030	Elevated carcinoma antigen 125 level	An increased blood concentration of carcinoma antigen 125 (CA-125). CA-125, also known as mucin 16, can exhibit increased blood levels in certain types of cancer.	癌抗原CA125水平增高	血液中癌抗原125(CA125）浓度增高。CA125也称为黏蛋白16，在某些类型的肿瘤患者血液中表现为CA125水平增高。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031031	Abnormal retinol-binding protein level	A deviation from normal blood concentration of retinol-binding protein (RBP). The most commonly used indicator of vitamin A status is the serum retinol concentration (retinol is one of the several compounds known as vitamin A). The serum RBP concentration is used as a surrogate measure for serum retinol.	视黄醇结合蛋白水平异常	血液中视黄醇结合蛋白（RBP）浓度不在正常范围内。血清视黄醇浓度通常用于预测体内维生素A的状态（视黄醇是维生素A的一种化合物）。血清RBP浓度测定可作为血清视黄醇的替代检测方法。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031032	Decreased retinol-binding protein level	A reduced blood concentration of retinol-binding protein. This finding predicts vitamin A deficiency with high sensitivity and specificity.	视黄醇结合蛋白水平降低	血液中视黄醇结合蛋白浓度降低，这一指标对于预测维生素A缺乏具有较高的灵敏度和特异度。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031033	Impaired urinary acidification	The kidney contributes towards acid-base homeostasis by excreting H+ ions and retaining bicarbonate. This process is known as acidification of the urine. The pH of urine ranges normally from 4.5 to 8. The inability to reduce the pH of the urine in a situation where it would be otherwise expected is known as an acidification defect.	尿酸化受损	肾脏通过排出H+离子和维持碳酸氢盐来促进酸碱平衡，这个过程被称为尿液的酸化。尿液PH的范围从4.5-8.0。在某种情况下，尿液的PH值无法降低，被称为尿液的酸化缺陷。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031034	Abnormal insulin like growth factor binding protein acid labile subunit level	A deviation from the normal blood concentration of the insulin like growth factor binding protein acid labile subunit (IGFALS; Entrez Gene ID 3483). The acid-labile subunit (IGFALS) acts in the insulin-like growth (IGF) system by binding circulating IGF1 in a ternary complex with binding protein (IGFBP)-3 to prevent IGF1 from crossing the endothelial barrier.	胰岛素样生长因子结合蛋白酸不稳定亚单位的水平异常	血液中胰岛素样生长因子结合蛋白酸不稳定亚单位(IGFALS; Entrez Gene ID 3483)浓度不在正常范围内。在胰岛素样生长因子系统中，酸不稳定亚单位（IGFALS）与IGF1和IGFBP-3形成三元复合物，阻止IGF1通过内皮屏障。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031038	Spermatogenesis maturation arrest	Maturation arrest (MA) is defined as germ cells that fail to complete maturation. Uniform MA is characterized by spermatogenic arrest at the same stage of spermatogenesis throughout the seminiferous tubules. MA is subcategorized into early MA, in which only spermatogonia or spermatocytes are found, and late MA, in which spermatids are detected without spermatozoa.	生精成熟阻滞	生殖细胞成熟障碍是指受精卵不能完全成熟。均一性生殖细胞成熟障碍以生精小管在精子形成时期精子形成阻滞为特点。生殖细胞成熟障碍可分为生精过程常阻滞于精母细胞或精原细胞阶段的早期生精阻滞以及生精过程常阻滞于精子细胞阶段而非精子的晚期生精阻滞。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031039	Early spermatogenesis maturation arrest	A type of maturation arrest in which only spermatogonia or spermatocytes are found.	早期生精阻滞	生精过程常阻滞于精母细胞或精原细胞阶段时期。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031040	Late spermatogenesis maturation arrest	A type of maturation arrest in which spermatids are detected without spermatozoa.	晚期生精阻滞	生精过程常阻滞于精子细胞阶段而非精子形成。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031041	Obstruction of the superior vena cava	['Blockage of blood flow through the superior vena cava (SVC). Because the venous drainage from the upper extremities, upper thorax and head is obstructed, SVC obstruction presents with symptoms related to engorgement of these areas. Both the degree of SVC compromise and the extent of collateral veins determine the varied clinical presentation, which can be as mild as slight facial and upper extremity edema or as dire as intracranial swelling, seizures, hemodynamic instability and tracheal obstruction.']	上腔静脉梗阻	阻塞血流通过上腔静脉（SVC)。来自上肢、上胸和头部的静脉引流受阻，SVC梗阻可表现出这些区域充血的相关症状。SVC的梗阻程度和侧支静脉大小的不同可导致多种不同的临床表现，轻型主要表现为轻度的面部和上肢水肿，严重者可引发颅内压升高、癫痫发作、血流动力学不稳定和气道阻塞等。

This term applies if the amount of femoral torsion exceeds this range.']	股骨扭转增加	股骨扭转，也称为股骨旋转，是指股骨在横平面上的近端和远端部分之间的扭转。新生儿股骨前倾角平均为30-40度，成人为8～14度。该术语用于描述股骨的扭转角度超出该范围。

This term applies if the amount of femoral torsion deviates from this range.']	股骨异常扭转	股骨扭转，又称为股骨旋转或股骨反转，是指股骨近端和远端的横平面之间的扭曲。新生儿股骨前倾角平均约为30-40度，成人为8～14度。该术语适用于股骨扭转角度偏离超过上述范围。

内分泌系统异常	HP:0031074	Abnormal response to ACTH stimulation test	['An anomolous response to stimulation by adminstration of the adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH). ACTH stimulation normally stimulates the adrenal glands to release cortisol and adrenaline.']	ACTH刺激试验反应异常	促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）给药刺激后出现的异常反应。ACTH刺激给药通常刺激肾上腺释放皮质醇和肾上腺素。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031075	Abnormal response to insulin tolerance test	['An anomalous response to the insulin tolerance test (ITT), in which insulin is administered intravenously and blood glucose and potentially other compounds are measred at intervals. Insulin administration is intended to induce extreme hypoglycemia (bloodgluoce below 40 mg/dl), which in turn induces release of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) and growth hormone (GH). ACTH induces the adrenal gland to release cortisol, which together with GH opposes the action of insulin on the blood glucose level.']	胰岛素耐量试验反应异常	对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）的异常反应。胰岛素静脉给药后，间隔测量血糖和潜在的其他化合物。胰岛素给药旨在诱导极低血糖（血糖低于40mg / dl），从而诱导促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）和生长激素（GH）的释放。 ACTH诱导肾上腺释放皮质醇，皮质醇可与GH一起拮抗胰岛素对血糖水平的影响。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031076	Impaired cortisol response to insulin stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the insulin tolerance test (ITT).']	皮质醇对胰岛素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）作出充分响应（增加）
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031077	Abnormal response to corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test	['An anomalous response to the corticotropin releasing hormone (CRH) stimulation test. Normally,CRH is released by the hypothalamus to induce adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) release by the anterior pituitary. In the stimulation test, CRH is administered intravenously and ACTH and cortisol are measured at intervals.']	促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验反应异常	对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）刺激试验的异常反应。正常情况下，CRH由下丘脑释放以诱导垂体前叶释放促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）。在刺激试验中，静脉注射CRH后，间隔测量ACTH和皮质醇。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031078	Impaired cortisol response to corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the corticotropin releasing hormone stimulation test.']	皮质醇对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031079	Impaired growth-hormone response to insulin stimulation test	['Failure of growth hormone levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the insulin tolerance test (ITT).']	生长激素对胰岛素刺激试验的反应受损	生长激素水平未能对胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）作出充分响应（增加）
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031080	Abnormal response to glucagon stimulation test	['An anomalous response to the glucagon stimulation test, which like the insulin tolerance test (ITT) stimulates the release of both adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH) and growth hormone (GH).']	胰高血糖素刺激试验反应异常	对胰高血糖素刺激试验产生异常反应，如胰岛素耐量试验（ITT）刺激促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）和生长激素（GH）的释放。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031081	Impaired cortisol response to glucagon stimulation test	['Failure of cortisol levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the glucagon stimulation test.']	皮质醇对胰高血糖素刺激试验的反应受损	皮质醇水平未能对胰高血糖素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031082	Impaired growth-hormone response to glucagon stimulation test	['Failure of growth hormone levels to respond adequately (by increasing) to the glucagon stimulation test.']	生长激素对胰高血糖素刺激试验的反应受损	生长激素水平未能对胰高血糖素刺激试验作出充分响应（增加）
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031083	Abnormal response to human chorionic gonadotrophin stimulation test	['An anomalous response to intravenous stimulation by human chorionic gonadotrophin. Stimulation with hCG stimulates testicular Leydig cells to secrete androgens via the Leydig hormone receptors.']	人绒毛膜促性腺激素刺激试验反应异常	对人绒毛膜促性腺激素静脉刺激产生异常反应。用hCG刺激睾丸Leydig细胞，通过Leydig激素受体分泌雄激素。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031084	Excessive insulin response to glucagon test	An abnormally high increase in insulin levels following a glucagon stimulation test.	胰岛素对胰高血糖素试验反应过度	胰高血糖素刺激试验后胰岛素水平异常升高
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031085	Decreased prealbumin level	A reduced concentration of prealbumin in the blood. Prealbumin, also known as transthyretin, has a half-life in plasma of about 2 days, much shorter than that of albumin. Prealbumin is therefore more sensitive to changes in protein-energy status than albumin, and its concentration closely reflects recent dietary intake rather than overall nutritional status.	前白蛋白水平降低	血液中前白蛋白浓度降低。前白蛋白也称为转甲状腺素蛋白。其在血浆中的半衰期约为2天，远远短于白蛋白，因此前白蛋白比白蛋白更能敏感地体现蛋白质能量状态的改变。其浓度反映当前的饮食摄入量，而不是整体的营养状况。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031086	Ectopic ovary	Undescended or ectopic ovaries are characterized by the attachment of the upper pole of the ovary to an area above the level of the common iliac vessels.	卵巢异位	未下降或异位卵巢的特征是卵巢的上极附着在髂总血管以上的区域。

内分泌系统异常	HP:0031099	Abnormal circulating inhibin level	Any deviation from the normal concentration of iInhibins, which are heterodimeric protein hormones secreted by granulosa cells of the ovary in females and Sertoli cells of the testis in males. Inhibins suppress the secretion of pituitary follicle-stimulating hormone.	循环抑制素水平异常	抑制素水平超出正常范围。抑制素是由女性卵巢颗粒细胞和男性睾丸支持细胞分泌的异二聚体蛋白激素。抑制素抑制垂体促卵泡激素的分泌。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031100	Decreased inhibin B level	A reduced concentration of inhibin B in the blood.	抑制素B水平降低	血抑制素B浓度下降
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031101	Abnormal antimullerian hormone level	Any deviation from the normal range of the antimullerian hormone, a peptide produced by the granulosa cells of follicles. Anti-Mullerian hormone (AMH), also known as Mullerian inhibiting substance, is produced by the granulosa cells of small antral follicles of the ovary. AMH has an inhibiting role in the ovary, contributing to follicular arrest. AMH levels in women are low until the age of 8, rise rapidly until puberty and decline steadily from the age of 25 until menopause, when AMH production ceases.	抗苗勒氏管激素水平异常	抗苗勒氏管激素（AMH）水平偏离正常参考范围。抗苗勒氏管激素是由卵泡颗粒细胞分泌的激素。又称为苗勒抑制物质，由小窦卵泡的颗粒细胞分泌。AMH对卵巢有抑制作用，可导致卵泡发育的骤停。女性8岁前AMH水平较低，青春期后迅速升高，25岁后逐步下降，直至绝经期停止AMH的生成。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031102	Increased antimullerian hormone level	['An elevation above the normal range of the antimullerian hormone in the circulation.']	抗苗勒氏管激素水平升高	循环中抗苗勒氏管激素高于正常范围
内分泌系统异常	HP:0031103	Decreased antimullerian hormone level	['A reduction below the normal range of the antimullerian hormone in the circulation.']	抗苗勒氏管激素水平降低	循环中抗苗勒氏管激素低于正常范围

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031106	T-shaped uterus	An abnormality of the uterus characterized by a normal uterine outline but with an abnormal T-shaped uterine cavity with narrowing cavity due to thickened lateral walls with a correlation 2/3 uterine corpus and 1/3 cervix. The abnormlaity is said to resemble the letter T in hysterosalpingographic imaging.	T-形子宫	一种子宫畸形，其特点是子宫轮廓正常，但有一个异常的“T型”子宫腔，是与2/3的子宫体与1/3的子宫颈相关的子宫侧壁增厚所致。这种异常在子宫输卵管造影上与字母“T”类似。

肢体异常,肌肉组织异常	HP:0031108	Triceps weakness	['A lack of strength in the triceps muscle, which normally is responsible for extending (straightening) the elbow and mediating certain shoulder movements.']	肱三头肌无力	肱三头肌力量缺乏，肱三头肌通常负责伸展肘并调解某些肩关节运动。
乳房异常	HP:0031109	Agalactia	['Failure of secretion of milk following childbirth associated with an inability to breastfeed an infant.']	无泌乳	“分娩后的乳汁分泌不足，无法母乳喂养婴儿。”
胎儿产前发育或出生异常	HP:0031110	Twin-to-twin transfusion	As a result of sharing a single placenta, the blood supplies of monochorionic twin fetuses can become connected, so that they share blood circulation: although each fetus uses its own portion of the placenta, the connecting blood vessels within the placenta allow blood to pass from one twin to the other.Depending on the number, type and direction of the interconnecting blood vessels (anastomoses), blood can be transferred disproportionately from one twin (the donor) to the other (the recipient). This state of transfusion causes the donor twin to have decreased blood volume, retarding the donor's development and growth. The blood volume of the recipient twin is increased, which can strain the fetus's heart and eventually lead to heart failure.	双胎输血	由于共享同一个胎盘，单绒毛膜双胎血液供应可发生连接，形成血液循环共享：尽管每个胎儿使用自己的胎盘份额，但胎盘内血管连接可使双胎发生血液交流。取决于血管交通支（吻合）的数量、类型和方向，双胎之间可能发生非平衡的血液转运，使得血液从一个胎儿（供血儿）向另一个胎儿（受血儿）转运。双胎输血可导致供血儿血容量减少，使其生长发育受阻，而受血儿由于血容量增加，使其心脏负荷加重，甚至发生心力衰竭。
肿瘤	HP:0031111	Cutaneous hamartoma	['A hamartoma (tissue malformation consisting of an abnormal mixture of constitutive components) originating in the skin.']	皮肤的错构瘤	['一种错构瘤(是组织畸形，由结构成分的异常混合物构成)，源自于皮肤。']
心血管系统异常	HP:0031117	Purely bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by two equal-sized cusps, with no raphe and only two commissures. There is a lateral arrangement of the free edge of the cusps. Note that this differs from some other forms of BAV in which there are three commissures and two of the three cusps are joined by a raphe forming two functional leaflets. This type of BAV often is associated with aortic stenosis.	完全二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV），其特征为两个相同大小的尖瓣，有两个连合处无中锋。 瓣叶的边缘有一个横向排列。这与其他形式的BAV不同，无三个连合并且三个尖中的两个通过形成两个功能小叶的中缝连接等特征。 这种类型的BAV形成通常与主动脉瓣狭窄有关。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031118	Single raphe bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valvue (BAV) characterized by the presence of a single raphe that extends from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps, resulting in two leaflets of unequal size.	单缝二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV），其特征在于存在单个中缝，该中缝从连合处延伸至两个未发育的联合瓣膜的自由边缘，从而导致两个小叶尺寸不同。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031119	Bicuspid aortic valve with right-left cusp fusion	A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the right and left cusps (RL fusion pattern). This results in two leaflefts with an anterior-posterior leaflet orientation (also called the typical pattern). There is thus one completely developed noncoronary cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped left and right coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.	左右尖瓣融合的二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV）的类型，其特征在于右和左尖瓣之间的单个中缝（RL融合形式）。 这导致了具有前后小叶取向的两个叶片（也称为典型形式）。 因此有一个完全发育的非冠状尖，两个完全发育的合缝，和在发育不全的左右冠状动脉尖之间的中缝延伸至相应的畸形合缝。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031120	Bicuspid aortic valve with right-noncoronary cusp fusion	['A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the right and noncoronary cusps (RN fusion pattern). This results in two leaflets with right-left leaflet orientation (also called the atypical pattern). There is thus one completely developed left cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped right and noncoronary coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.']	二叶式主动脉瓣，伴随右冠状瓣与无冠状瓣融合	二叶式主动脉瓣的一种，其特征为右冠状瓣与无冠状瓣之间存在一条缝隙（RN融合模式），导致两个瓣叶均为叶右向叶左方向（也被称为非典型模式）。因此，存在一个发育完全的左冠状瓣，两个发育完全的交界，以及未发育完全的右冠状瓣和无冠状瓣之间有一条延伸至对应畸形交界处的单缝
心血管系统异常	HP:0031121	Bicuspid aortic valve with left-noncoronary cusp fusion	['A type of bicuspid aortic valve (BAV) characterized by a single raphe between the left and noncoronary cusps (LN fusion pattern). There is thus one completely developed right cusp, two completely developed commissures, and one raphe between the underdeveloped left and noncoronary coronary cusps extending to the corresponding malformed commissure.']	二叶式主动脉瓣，伴随左冠状瓣与无冠状瓣融合	二叶式主动脉瓣的一种，其特征为左冠状瓣与无冠状瓣之间存在一条缝隙（LN融合模式）。因此，存在一个发育完全的右冠状瓣，两个发育完全的交界，以及未发育完全的左冠状瓣和无冠状瓣之间有一条延伸至对应畸形交界处的单缝
心血管系统异常	HP:0031122	Two-raphe bicuspid aortic valve	A type of bicuspid aortic valvue (BAV) characterized by the presence of two raphes that each extend from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps. This type of BAV has developmental anlagen of three cusps, commissures, and sinuses, but two commissures are more or less malformed and obliterated, giving rise to a raphe, a fibrous ridge, which extends from the commissure to the free edge of the two underdeveloped, conjoint cusps. This type of BAV is typically associated with a high degree of aortic stenosis.	双缝二尖瓣主动脉瓣	一种二尖瓣主动脉瓣（BAV）的类型，其特征是存在两个各自从连合处延伸至两个不发育的联合瓣膜的自由边缘的缝。 这种类型的BAV具有发展性间叶原基的三尖瓣、合缝和窦，但是两种合缝或多或少会畸形并消失，从而产生中缝，纤维脊，其从连合处延伸到两个未发育的自由边缘 及联合尖端。 这种类型的BAV通常伴有高度的主动脉瓣狭窄。
免疫系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0031123	Recurrent gastroenteritis	['Increased susceptibility to gastroenteritis, an infectious inflammationof the stomach and small intestines manifested by signs and symptoms such as diarheas and abdominal pain, as manifested by recurrent episodes of gastroenteritis.']	复发性肠胃炎 	肠胃炎易患性增加，常表现为胃肠炎反复发作。胃和小肠感染性炎症常见症状为腹泻和腹痛。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031124	Decreased platelet thromboxane A2 receptor	['Decreased cell membrane concentration of thromboxane A2 receptor that is stimulated by thromboxane A2 (TBXA2).']	血小板血栓塞A2受体减少	血栓素A2(TBXA2)刺激下细胞膜表面血栓素A2受体的浓度降低。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031125	Decreased platelet alpha-2A-adrenergic receptor	['Decreased cell membrane concentration of alpha-2A adrenergic receptor that is stimulated by epinephrine.']	血小板肾上腺素ɑ2a受体减少	肾上腺素刺激下细胞膜表面肾上腺素ɑ2a受体的浓度降低。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031126	Impaired clot retraction	['Platelets contain contractile proteins (actin and myosin) that induce clot retraction. As the platelets contract, they pull on the surrounding fibrin strands, squeezing serum form the mass, compacting the clot and drawing the ruptured edges of the blood vessel more closely together. Clot retraction is directly proportional to the platelet count and inversely proportional to the fibrinogen concentration.']	血凝块回缩受损	血小板内含收缩蛋白（肌动蛋白和肌凝蛋白），从而可引发凝块收缩。当血小板收缩时，可拉动周围的纤维蛋白，挤压血清蛋白形成肿块，压住凝块并将血管破裂的边缘更紧密地联系在一起。凝块收缩与血小板计数成正比，与纤维蛋白原浓度成反比。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031127	Impaired convulxin-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to convulxin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of convulxin.']	convulxin诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对convulxin的反应下降，增加convulxin的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031128	Impaired collagen-related peptide-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to collagen-related peptide (CRP) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of CRP.']	胶原相关肽诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对胶原相关肽的反应下降，增加胶原相关肽的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031129	Impaired phorbol myristate acetate-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to phorbol myristate acetate (PMA) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of PMA.']	PMA诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对PMA的反应下降，增加PMA的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031130	Impaired calcium ionophore-induced platelet aggregation	['Abnormal response to calcium Ionophore (such as A23187) as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of the ionophore.']	钙离子通道剂诱导的血小板聚集受损	血小板对钙离子通道剂(比如A23187)的反应下降，增加钙离子通道剂的浓度，血小板的聚集降低或无血小板的聚集。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031131	Abnormal plaleletphosphatidyl serine exposure	An abnormality of phosphatidylserine (PS) on activated platelets. PS is normally located on the cytoplasmic face of the resting platelet membrane but appears on the plasma-oriented surface of discrete membrane vesicles that derive from activated platelets. Thrombin, the central molecule of coagulation, is produced from prothrombin by a complex (prothrombinase) between factor Xa and its protein cofactor (factor V(a)) that forms on platelet-derived membranes. This complex enhances the rate of activation of prothrombin to thrombin by roughly 150,000 fold relative to factor X(a) in solution. The negatively charged surface of PS-containing platelet-derived membranes is at least partly responsible for this rate enhancement.	血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸暴露异常	活化血小板的磷脂酰丝氨酸（PS）异常。磷脂酰丝氨酸通常位于未活化血小板的表面，但也可来源于血浆中与活化血小板膜表面分离的囊泡。凝血酶是血液凝固的中心分子，可被凝血酶原激活，通过一个复合体（凝血酶原酶）即FXa和其蛋白辅因子（FVa）形成于血小板细胞膜的表面。与血液中溶解的FX(a)相比，这复合体可使凝血酶原转化为凝血酶的速率提高约150,000。带负电荷的血小板表面的PS在这个过程中起了很大部分的作用。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031132	Impaired annexin V binding to platelet phosphatidylserine	['Reduced binding of annexin V to platelet membrane, which is mediated by exposed phosphatidylserine. This can be measured by flow cytometry.']	磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸结合受损	由磷脂酰丝氨酸介导的磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板结合减少，可通过流式细胞学来检测。
血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031133	Increased annexin V binding to platelet phosphatidylserine	['Elevated binding of annexin V to platelet membrane, which is mediated by exposed phosphatidylserine. This can be measured by flow cytometry.']	磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板磷脂酰丝氨酸结合增加	由磷脂酰丝氨酸介导的磷脂结合蛋白V与血小板结合增加，可通过流式细胞学来检测。

The acrosome is an organelle in the anterior half of the head of spermatozoa, and acrosin is a protease that contributes to the digestation of the zona pellucida in the fertilization process.']	精子头顶体酶降低	精子头部顶体的顶体酶减少，顶体是精子头部前半部分的细胞器，顶体酶是一种蛋白酶，在受精过程中有助于透明带的消化。

肌肉组织异常	HP:0031139	Frog-leg posture	['A type of rest posture in an infant that indicated a generalized reduction in muscle tone. The hips are flexed and the legs are abducted to an extent that causes the lateral thigh to rest upon the supporting surface. This posture is said to resemble the legs of a frog.']	蛙足姿势	婴儿的一种休息姿势，表现为臀部弯曲、腿部外展至一定程度，导致大腿外侧靠在支撑面，提示肌张力的全面降低。得名于这种姿势与青蛙腿相像。
消化系统异常	HP:0031140	Abnormal liver sonography	['An abnormal appearance of the liver or any of its components on sonography (ultrasound).']	肝脏超声异常	肝脏及组成结构的异常超声表现
消化系统异常	HP:0031141	Increased hepatic echogenicity	Increased echogenicity of liver tissue on sonography, manifested as an increased amount of white on the screen of the sonography device.	肝回声增强	是指在超声上肝脏组织回声增强，表现为超声屏幕上呈现增多的白色。
消化系统异常	HP:0031142	Abnormal hepatic echogenicity	Any deviation from the normal degree of echogenicity of the liver on sonography. Echogenicity refers to the ability of a tissue to reflect or transmit ultrasound waves in the context of surrounding tissues. Whenever there is an interface of structures with different echogenicities, a visible difference in contrast will be apparent on the screen. Based on echogenicity, a structure can be characterized as hyperechoic (white on the screen), hypoechoic (gray on the screen) and anechoic (black on the screen).	肝脏回声异常	是指任何偏离正常肝脏回声的超声表现，回声和组织反射或传送超声波的能力相关，不同组织界面，回声不同，在屏幕上存在明显差异。根据回声强弱，一个结构可描述为高回声（屏幕上呈白色），低回声（屏幕上呈灰色），和无回声（屏幕上呈黑色）
消化系统异常	HP:0031143	Decreased hepatic echogenicity	Reduced echogenicity of liver tissue on sonography, manifested as an increased amount of black on the screen of the sonography device.	肝回声降低	是指在超声上肝脏组织回声减弱，表现为超声屏幕上呈现增多的黑色。
消化系统异常	HP:0031144	Coarsened hepatic echotexture	['The appearance of the liver in sonographic images is normally uniform. This term applies when there is an irregular or non-uniform appearancde of the liver parenchyma in liver sonography.']	肝实质回声增粗	是指超声上肝实质回声不规则、不均一。
消化系统异常	HP:0031145	Starry sky appearance on hepatic sonography	An abnormal echotexture visible in liver ultrasound manifesting as a diffuse hyperechoic liver echotexture with multiple, small hypoechoic lesions. The appearance is said to resemble a starry sky (multiple white spots on a dark background).	肝脏满天星样改变	是一种异常的肝脏超声表现，表现为弥漫性高回声肝内伴有多个、小低回声病变，形似满天星样改变。
神经系统异常,消化系统异常	HP:0031146	Impaired oral bolus formation	An abnormality of swallowing characterized by reduced tongue coordination to form bolus after chewing. Food material spreads over the oral cavity instead of being concentrated into a bolus that is easily swallowed.	口腔内食物成团状能力受损	吞咽不正常的特点是咀嚼后舌头协调功能降低，从而不能使食物形成丸状。食物材料在口腔中弥散开而不是被浓缩成容易吞咽的丸剂
眼部异常	HP:0031150	Vitreomacular adhesion	Perifoveal vitreous separation with remaining vitreomacular attachment and unperturbed foveal morphologic features. It is an OCT finding that is almost always the result of normal vitreous aging, which may lead to pathologic conditions.	玻璃体黄斑粘连	玻璃体与黄斑部粘连，在中心凹周围分离，不影响中心凹形态特征。OCT结果显示，这是正常玻璃体老化的结果，可能导致病理性改变。
眼部异常	HP:0031151	Vitreomacular traction	Vitreomacular traction is characterized by anomalous posterior vitreous detachment accompanied by anatomic distortion of the fovea, which may include pseudocysts, macular schisis, cystoid macular edema, and subretinal fluid. Vitreomacular traction can be subclassified by the diameter of vitreous attachment to the macular surface as measured by OCT, with attachment of 1500 micrometers or less defined as focal and attachment of more than 1500 micrometers as broad.	玻璃体黄斑牵拉	玻璃体黄斑牵拉的特点是玻璃体后脱离异常，伴有中心凹解剖变形，可能包括假性囊肿、黄斑裂孔、黄斑囊样水肿和视网膜下积液。由OCT测量，根据玻璃体与黄斑表面粘连的直径分类，粘连直径≤1500μm 定义为局灶性病变，粘连直径＞1500μm 定义为广泛性病变。
眼部异常	HP:0031152	Full-thickness macular hole	Full-thickness macular hole (FTMH) is defined as a foveal lesion with interruption of all retinal layers from the internal limiting membrane to the retinal pigment epithelium. Full-thickness macular hole is primary if caused by vitreous traction or secondary if directly the result of pathologic characteristics other than vitreomacular traction. Full-thickness macular hole is subclassified by size of the hole as determined by OCT and the presence or absence of vitreomacular traction.	黄斑全层裂孔	黄斑全层裂孔是一种中心凹病变，从内界膜至视网膜上皮细胞层的视网膜全层发生断裂。黄斑全层裂孔主要由玻璃体牵拉引起，或继发于玻璃体黄斑牵拉以外的病理学改变。黄斑全层裂孔依据OCT测定的裂孔大小和玻璃体黄斑牵拉是否存在进行亚分类。

泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031197	Cellular urinary casts	['A type of urinary cast composed of cells incorporated in a protein matrx. The cells can be those found in the urinary sediment (erythrocytes, leuklocytes, renal tubular epithelial cells).']	细胞管型	一种由于细胞结合于蛋白质基质形成的尿液管型，可通过尿沉渣镜检发现（包括红细胞管型，白细胞管型，肾小管上皮细胞管型）

泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031199	Acellular urinary casts	['A type of urinary cast composed of a proteinaceous matrix without a substantial number of cells.']	非细胞管型	一种仅由基质蛋白而非实质细胞组成的管型。
泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031200	Hyaline casts	A type of acellular urinary cast that are composed only of Tamm-Horsfall glycoprotein, a fact which explains their low refractive index. Hyaline casts may display a spectrum of morphologies, which includes fluffy, compact, convoluted or wrinkled casts. Hyaline casts have a smooth texture and usually have parallel sides with clear margins and blunted ends.	透明管型	一种仅由Tamm-Horsfall糖蛋白组成非细胞管型，这种管型折光指数低。透明管型可呈现不同的形态，包括蓬松的、紧凑的、复杂的、皱褶的管型。透明管型质地平滑，两边相互平行，边界清楚，末端圆钝。
泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031201	Granular casts	A type of acelluar casts that have a surface composed of granules, which can vary in size. The granules can be rather heterogeneous, ranging from fine (finely granular cast) up to coarse (coarsely granular cast), dark, clear, and pigmented.	颗粒管型	一种表面具有颗粒状的非细胞管型，大小各异。颗粒管型呈多样化，从细颗粒（细小颗粒管型）到粗颗粒（粗颗粒管型），深色颗粒，清澈颗粒及着色颗粒。
泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031202	Waxy casts	A type of acellular urinary casts that display a melted wax (waxy) appearance, which gives them a high refractive index. They are frequently dark, with blunt extremities, indented and cracked edges and a large size, which is often several times that of other types of casts.	蜡样管型	一种呈现融化的蜡的表现的非细胞管型，折光指数高。颜色通常较深，末端圆钝，边缘呈锯齿状及崩裂状，属宽大管型，比普通管型大数倍。
泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031203	Fatty casts	A type of acellular urinary casts that contain lipid droplets, oval fat bodies or cholesterol crystals, and are often associated with the free forms of these elements. Their identification may require the use of polarised light microscopy, under which fatty particles embedded into the cast matrix appear as Maltese crosses.	脂肪管型	一种含有脂滴、椭圆脂肪体或胆固醇晶体的非细胞性管型，并通常与这些因素相关。如果其中包含脂肪颗粒，通过偏振光显微镜可被识别，而呈现“马尔他十字”表现。
泌尿生殖系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031204	Bacterial cell casts	A type of urinary cast that contain bacteria. Bacterial casts can be difficult to identify and can be distinguished from other types of casts using phase contrast microscopy. Bacterial casts are diagnostic of acute pyelonephritis or intrinsic renal infection.	细菌细胞管型	管型中含有细菌的一类管型。细菌管型很难被识别出但可以通过相差显微镜与其他管型鉴别。出现细菌管型可诊断为急性肾炎肾炎或肾实质感染。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031205	Reduced lysosomal acid lipase activity	Reduction in the activity of lysosomal acid lipase (LAL) in the blood. Lysosomal lipase activity is measured. LAL hydrolyzes cholesteryl esters derived from cell internalization of plasma lipoproteins.	溶酶体酸性脂肪酶活性降低	血液中溶酶体酸性脂肪酶（LAL）活性降低。溶酶体脂肪酶活性可以被检测。LAL可水解来源于细胞内血浆脂蛋白的胆固醇脂。
神经系统异常	HP:0031206	Striatal T2 hyperintensity	Abnormally bright T2 signal from the striatum on brain magnetic resonance imaging.	纹状体T2高信号	脑磁共振成像中异常的纹状体T2高信号

内分泌系统异常	HP:0031208	Increased pituitary glycoprotein alpha subunit level	['An increased concentration of circulating alpha polypeptide of glycoprotein hormones (Entrez Gene 1081). This alpha subunit is common to luteinizing hormone (LH) , follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) , thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) and human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG), which are glycoprotein hormones composed of an identical alpha subunit together with a beta subunit that confers biological specificity. The alpha subunit is used as a marker for tumors that produce these hormones.']	垂体α-糖蛋白水平升高	循环中垂体α-糖蛋白激素浓度升高。α亚基与黄体生成素（LH），卵泡刺激激素（FSH），促甲状腺激素（TSH）以及绒毛膜促性腺激素（hCG）相同，这类激素均由α亚基和β亚基组成。α亚基作为这些激素的肿瘤标记物。

The upper boundary is a somewhat arbitrary line crossing from the apices of the antitragus and the tragus.		
耳部异常	HP:0031229	Increased incisura length	The length of the incisura from the upper to lower border is greater than that observed in the average population.

肌肉组织异常	HP:0031238	Necklace skeletal muscle fibers	A histological alteration of muscle fibers that resembles a necklace (necklace fibers). A substantial proportion of fibers (4-20% in PMID:19084976) show internalized nuclei aligned in a basophilic ring (necklace) at 3 micrometers beneath the sarcolemma. Ultrastructurally, such necklaces consist of myofibrils of smaller diameter, in oblique orientation, surrounded by mitochondria, sarcoplasmic reticulum and glycogen granules.	项链骨骼肌纤维	属于肌纤维的组织学改变，表现类似于项链（项链纤维）。 大部分纤维（PMID中4-20％：19084976）显示在肌膜下3微米处的嗜碱环（项链）中排列的内化核。 在超微结构上，这样的项链由直径较小的肌原纤维组成，倾斜取向，被线粒体，肌质网和糖原颗粒包围

This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the thalamus.	丘脑动静脉畸形 	动静脉畸形是指正常循环模式的破坏，一般是动脉或小动脉绕过毛细血管床直接连接到静脉收集系统。该术语是指位于丘脑的动静脉畸形。 
神经系统异常	HP:0031255	Hypothalamic arteriovenous malformation	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the hypothalamus.	下丘脑动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指正常血运模式的破坏：动脉或小动脉绕过任何毛细血管床，直接连接到静脉收集系统。该术语是指位于下丘脑的动静脉畸形。
眼部异常	HP:0031256	Optic nerve arteriovenous malformation	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the optic nerve.	视神经动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指破坏了动脉或小动脉经毛细血管床与静脉收集系统连接的正常血管模式。此术语指位于视神经的动静脉畸形。
骨骼系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0031257	Arteriovenous malformation of the maxilla	An arteriovenous malformation is a disruption of the normal vascular pattern in which arteries or arterioles connect directly to the venous collection system, bypassing any capillary bed. This term refers to an arteriovenous malformation located in the maxilla.	上颌动静脉畸形	动静脉畸形是指正常血管形态的破坏，其中动脉或小动脉直接连接到静脉收集系统，绕过任何毛细血管床。这个术语指位于上颌的动静脉畸形。

Instead of the normal shaft configuration of the tibia, the tibia forms a triangle with the longest side corresponding to the proximal-distal dimension, and the apex of the triangle diected laterally (See Figure 2 of PMID:18616733).']	三角状胫骨 	胫骨短小，发育不全，呈三角形。与正常胫骨的结构不同，该异常胫骨呈三角形，最长边与肢体方向相平行，对应的顶点位于侧面（参见PMID 18616733图2）。

泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031263	Abnormal renal corpuscle morphology	['Any anomolous structure of the renal corpuscle, which is the initial component of the nephron that filters blood. The renal corpuscle consists of a knot of capillaries (glomerulus) that is surrounded by a double-walled capsule (Bowman capsule) that opens into a renal tubule.']	肾小体形态异常	肾小体的结构不规则。肾小体是肾单位首先进行过滤工作的单位，是一个由双壁囊（鲍曼囊）包围的毛细血管团（肾小球）组成，并通向肾小管。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031264	Abnormal morphology of Bowman capsule	['A structural anomaly of the double-walled capsule (Bowman capsule) that opens into a renal tubule.']	鲍曼囊形态异常	双壁囊（鲍曼囊）的结构异常，它通向肾小管。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031265	Abnormal podocyte morphology	Any structural anomaly of the podocyte, which is a highly specialized cell of the Bowman capsule and which forms multiple interdigitating foot processes. Podocytes are interconnected by slit diaphragms and cover the exterior basement membrane surface of the glomerular capillary.	足突细胞形态异常	足突细胞的结构异常，它是鲍曼囊高度分化的细胞，形成了多重交错的肾小球上皮细胞足突细胞。足细胞通过裂孔隔膜相互连接，覆盖在肾小球毛细血管的外部基底膜表面。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031266	Podocyte foot process effacement	An anomaly of podocyte morphology characterized by the loss of the interdigitating foot process pattern (generally called foot process effacement; FPE). The term FPE designates the loss of the usual interdigitating pattern of foot processes of neighboring podocytes, leading to relatively broad expanses of podocyte processes covering the glomerular basement membrane (GBM). It is widely viewed as a pathological derangement that is associated with leakage of macromolecules such as albumin through the glomerular filtration barrier.	足细胞足突消失	足突细胞形态学异常以肾小球上皮足突细胞的足部交错模式消失为特点（通常称为足细胞足突消失，FPE）。FPE这个术语指的是邻近的足突细胞的足部交错模式丢失，从而导致了覆盖肾小球基底膜（GBM）的足突细胞范围相对增加。它被广泛认为是一种病理上的异常，与肾小球可滤过白蛋白等大分子的肾小球滤过屏障有关。
免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031267	Abnormal CD69 upregulation upon TCR activation	Any abnormality in the upregulation of CD69 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR). Upregulation of CD69 is one of the earliest and most sensitive measures of antigen recognition in the periphery, and transient expression of CD69 is associated with positive selection in the thymus.	TCR激活CD69上调异常	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD69表达上调异常。CD69表达上调是外周抗原识别最早和最敏感的方式之一，CD69瞬时表达与胸腺的阳性选择有关。 
免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031268	Decreased CD69 upregulation upon TCR activation	Reduced or impaired upregulation of CD69 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR).	TCR激活CD69上调减弱	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD69上调表达减弱或损伤。 
免疫系统异常,代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0031269	Abnormal CD25 upregulation upon TCR activation	Any abnormality in the upregulation of CD25 on T cells after activation via the T cell receptor (TCR). CD25 is the alpha chain of the IL2 receptor. Ligation of the T cell antigen receptor leads to the induction of CD25 expression.	TCR激活CD25上调异常	T细胞受体（TCR）激活后的T细胞上的CD25表达上调异常。CD25是IL2受体α链。T细胞抗原受体连接诱导CD25表达。

心血管系统异常	HP:0031297	Unroofed coronary sinus	Unroofed coronary sinus (CS) is a rare congenital cardiac anomaly in which there is partial (either focal or fenestrated) or complete absence of the roof of the CS, which results in a communication between the CS and the LA. Unroofed CS is the rarest type of atrial septal defect. It is often associated with persistent left superior vena cava (LSVC) and other forms of complex congenital heart disease, usually heterotaxia syndromes. The morphological types have been classified into 4 groups: Type I, completely unroofed with persistent LSVC; type II, completely unroofed without persistent LSVC; type III, partially unroofed mid portion; and type IV, partially unroofed terminal portion.	无顶冠状静脉窦	无顶冠状静脉窦是一种罕见静脉窦上部分（焦点或窗状）或全部顶冠缺失的心脏畸形，导致静脉窦和左心房之间交流。无顶冠状静脉窦是房间隔缺失中最罕见的一种类型，通常伴随永存左上腔静脉和其他形式的复杂先天性心脏病。根据形态学可以分为4组：类型一，完全无顶冠并伴随永存左上腔静脉；类型二，完全无顶冠，无永存左上腔静脉；类型三，中间部分无顶冠；类型四，终端部分无顶冠

The current gold standard of amyloid typing is to determine the precursor protein using laser microdissection mass spectrometry.	单克隆轻链心脏淀粉样变性	一种与免疫球蛋白轻链沉积有关的心脏淀粉样变性病。 目前的淀粉样蛋白分型的金标准是使用激光显微切割质谱确定前体蛋白质

心血管系统异常	HP:0031333	Myocardial sarcomeric disarray	A disruption of the structure of the sarcomeres of cardiomyocytes. The sarcomere is the repeating unit between two Z lines comprised largely of myosin and action that mediates contractility, and normally sarcomeres are aligned with the long axis of cells, with the Z bands being in register throughout the length of the cardiac myocytes.	心脏肌节混乱	心脏肌节结构破裂。肌节是两条Z线之间的重复单元，主要由肌球蛋白组成，介导收缩作用。正常情况下，肌节沿着细胞长轴对齐，Z带则沿着心脏肌节对齐

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0031405	Poroma	A benign, well circumscribed sweat gland neoplasm with eccrine or apocrine differentiation. It usually presents as a solitary, dome-shaped papule, nodule, or plaque on acral sites. It is characterized by a proliferation of uniform basaloid cells in the dermis and it is associated with the presence of focal ductal and cystic structures [NCIT:C27273].	汗孔瘤	一种良性皮肤汗腺肿瘤，伴外泌或顶泌细胞分化。 通常表现为孤立的圆顶状丘疹、结节或肢体部位的斑块。 其特征是在真皮中均匀分布的基底细胞增生，并且与导管、囊状结构的病灶相关[NCIT：C27273]。

眼部异常	HP:0031420	Small yellow foveal lesion with surrounding grey zone	A lesion that is observed following light damage to the macula. Damage to the retinal by exposure to intense visible light, usually the sun. Intense light exposure such as staring at the sun causes fine structural anomalies in the outer segments of the photoreceptors and the retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) cells of the macula. Symptoms usually develop within 1 to 4 h after exposure and include decreased vision, metamorphopsia, micropsia, and central or paracentral scotomas. Fundus examination typically shows a small yellow spot with a surrounding gray zone in the foveolar or parafoveolar area. Spontaneous evolution leads to the improvement of visual acuity.	中心凹小黄点伴色素晕病变	在黄斑区光损伤后观察到的病变。暴露于强烈可见光，通常是太阳光，对视网膜造成的损伤。强光下暴露，如盯着太阳，会导致黄斑区光感受器外段和视网膜色素上皮细胞的精细结构异常。症状通常在暴露后1~4h内发展，包括视力下降、视物变形、视物变小、中央或旁中央暗点。眼底检查典型地表现为在中心凹或旁中心凹区可见黄色小点，被灰色带围绕。自然进化导致视敏度的提高。

肿瘤	HP:0031461	Intramuscular Myxoma	A benign tumor that is usually solitary, painless, palpable mass that is firm in consistency and slightly movable and often fluctuant. It can occur in any location, but tends to involve the muscles of the thighs, buttocks, and shoulders. On microscopic examination, there is abundant mucoid material and relative hypo cellularity and loose reticulin fibers. Vascular structures are sparse. The cells have a stellate shape with small hyper chromatic pyknotic nuclei and scanty cytoplasm. Some myxomas may show focal areas of hyper cellularity. However absence of nuclear atypia, mitotic figures or necrosis helps to rule out malignancy.	肌内粘液瘤	一种良性肿瘤，通常是孤独的、无痛的、可触知的肿块，它是稳定的、可轻微的活动，经常波动。它可以发生在任何部位，但往往好发于大腿、臀部和肩膀的肌肉。在显微镜检查中，有丰富的黏液物质和相对的低细胞结构和疏松的网状纤维。血管结构较少。细胞呈星状，有小的深染的致密的核和稀疏的细胞质。一些粘液瘤可能表现出高度细胞性的灶性区域。然而，没有核异型性、有丝分裂相或坏死有助于排除恶性肿瘤。
结缔组织异常	HP:0031462	Musculotendinous retraction	['Abnormal reduction in length of a tendon which tends to pull (retract) the attached muscle tissue with shortening of the muscle fibers often accompanied by atrophy and fatty degeneration of the affected muscle tissue.']	肌肉腱回缩	['肌腱长度的异常减少，牵拉(收缩)附着的肌肉组织，导致肌肉纤维缩短，并伴有受累肌肉组织的萎缩和脂肪变性。']
肿瘤,消化系统异常	HP:0031463	Esophageal squamous papilloma	A rare benign epithelial tumor that is usually asymptomatic but can present with pyrosis and epigastric discomfort with or without dysphagia. Histopathologically, esophageal squamous papilloma has fingerlike projections lined with acanthotic stratified squamous epithelium with conservation of normal cellular with or without cellular atypia.	食管鳞状上皮乳头状瘤	一种罕见的良性上皮肿瘤，通常无症状，但可伴有胃灼热和上腹部不适，伴或不伴吞咽困难。病理组织学上，食管鳞状上皮乳头状瘤有指状突起，内衬有棘突层状鳞状上皮，可观察到有异型性的和无异型性的正常细胞。

免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031514	Increased proportion of exhausted T cells	An abnormally elevated proportion of exhausted T cells (Tex) among circulating T cells. T cell exhaustion is a distinct differentiation state that can be distinguished from naive, effector, and memory T cells. Compared to effector (TE) and memory (TMEM) T cells, exhausted T cells (TEX) display impaired effector functions (e.g., rapid production of effector cytokines, cytotoxicity). TEX have limited proliferative potential, especially compared to some subsets of TMEM and naive T cells.	衰竭T细胞比例增加	T细胞循环中的衰竭性T细胞比例增加。衰竭性T细胞是一种特殊的分化状态，能与幼稚性T细胞、效应性T细胞、记忆性T细胞区分开来。与效应性T细胞和记忆性T细胞相比，衰竭性T细胞可使效应器的功能受损（例如，效应器细胞因子、细胞毒性的快速产生）。衰竭性T细胞与记忆性T细胞和幼稚性T细胞的亚群相比其增殖潜能受限。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031515	Abnormal meiosis	['Any anomaly of meiosis, a type of cell division that reduces the number of chromosomes in the parent cell by half and produces four gamete cells.']	减数分裂异常	一种异常的减数分裂，亲代细胞每分裂一次，染色体数目减半并产生四个配子。
泌尿生殖系统异常	HP:0031516	Oocyte arrest at metaphase I	Failure of oocytes to proceed through the stages of meiosis with stoppage at the first metaphase stage.	卵母细胞第一次减数分裂中期停滞	卵母细胞减数停滞在第一次减数分裂中期。
体壁的异常	HP:0031517	Verruciform xanthoma	A papillary or cauliflower-like growth characterized by the presence of foamy histiocytes within the elongated dermal papillae forms.	疣状黄瘤	乳头状或花椰菜状生长，其特征是在细长真皮乳头形式内存在泡沫状组织细胞。
神经系统异常	HP:0031518	Absent posterior alpha rhythm	Lack of normal alpha rhythm in the EEG. Alpha rhythm has been defined as a rhythm at 8-13 Hz occurring during wakefulness over the posterior regions of the head, generally with higher voltage over the occipital areas. Amplitude is variable but is mostly below 50 microvolt in adults. It is best seen with eyes closed and under conditions of physical relaxation and relative mental inactivity. It is blocked or attenuated by attention, especially visual and mental effort. One should here note the difference between the terms alpha rhythm and alpha activity: Alpha activity refers to activity in the range of 8-13 Hz and alpha rhythm is the activity of 8-13 Hz with specific characteristics as defined above.	α节律缺乏	脑电图缺乏正常的α节律。α节律被定义为在清醒时颅后部发生的8～13Hz的放电节律，通常在枕部区域具有较高的电压。α节律振幅是可变的，但在成人中大多低于50微伏。α节律检测最好是闭眼、身体放松和精神相对不活跃的情况下进行；集中注意力，尤其是视觉和精神活动能够阻止或者减弱这种放电。这里应该注意α节律和α活动之间的差异：α活动是指在8～13Hz范围内的活动，α节律是具有特定特征的8～13Hz的活动。

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0031525	Keratoacanthoma	Keratoacanthoma (KA) is a common benign epithelial tumour that originates from the pilosebaceous glands. In most cases, it is characterized by rapid evolution, followed by spontaneous resolution over 4 to 6 months. KA usually presents as a solitary flesh-coloured nodule with a central keratin plug on the sun-exposed skin of elderly individuals.	角化棘皮瘤	角化棘皮瘤（KA）是一种常见的良性上皮肿瘤，起源于毛囊皮脂腺。 在大多数情况下，皮损发展快，病程短，4至6个月内自发消退。 KA通常好发于老年人的皮肤暴露部位，皮损呈肉色孤立性结节，中央充满角质栓。

骨骼系统异常,肢体异常	HP:0031534	Passive dorsiflexion of the 5th finger more than 90 degrees	An abnormally increased ability to bend (dorsiflex) one's fifth finger. To assess this feature, the examiner requests to proband to extend the elbows,to bend the wrist back so that it forms a ninety degree angle to the forearm, and to extend the fingers. Then, the proband is requested to bend the fifth finger back as far as is possible without discomfort. If the angle of the fifth finger exceeds 90 degrees, this is considered to be abnormal.	第五指被动背屈大于90度 	第五指背屈能力异常增加。为测试该特征，要求先证者伸肘，手腕弯曲与前臂成九十度角，然后在不至于让受检者不适的情况下，尽可能将第五指向后弯曲。如果如果第五指弯曲角度超过90度，则认为异常。
神经系统异常	HP:0031535	Increased theta frequency activity in EEG	['Increased frequency of thetat wave activity in the electroencephalogram. Theta waves have a frequency of 3.5-7.5 Hertz, and are present in very small amounts in healthy waking adult EEGs. Theta activity is normal in small very amounts in the healthy waking adult EEG in a symmetrical distribution.']	脑电图θ节律增多	θ波具有3.5-7.5赫兹的频率，在健康清醒的成人脑电图中极少量对称存在。

Normally, these arteries arise from a common stem, the left main coronary artery (LMCA).	左前降支和左回旋支起源分离	冠状动脉起源异常，左前降支（LAD）和冠状动脉左回旋支（LCX）的起源分离。正常情况下，这两个动脉都起源于左主冠状动脉（LMCA）

免疫系统异常,血液和造血组织异常	HP:0031545	Abnormally low T cell receptor excision circle level	Reduced level of T cell receptor excision circle (TRECs) as measured by the TREC assay. Late in maturation, 70% of thymocytes that will ultimately express alpha/beta-T cell receptors form a circular DNA TREC from the excised TCRdelta gene that lies within the TCRalpha genetic locus. The circles are stable but do not increase following cell division and, therefore, become diluted as T cells proliferate. A quantitative polymerase chain reaction (PCR) reaction across the joint of the circular DNA provides the TREC copy number, a marker of newly-formed, antigenically-na?ve thymic emigrant T cells.	T细胞受体重排删除环含量降低	通过TREC检测方法检测到T细胞受体重排删除环含量降低。在成熟后期，70%的最终表达α/β受体的胸腺细胞可形成环状的DNA的T细胞受体重排删除环，它来自于位于TCRα基因座上的TCR δ基因。该环较稳固但不随细胞的分裂而增加，因此，随着T细胞的增殖减少。实时定量PCR反应可通过环状DNA的节点而检测TREC的拷贝数，是一种新形成的，先天抗原性的迁入胸腺的T细胞的标记。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031546	Cardiac conduction abnormality	['Any anomaly of the progression of electrical impulses through the heart.']	心脏传导异常	电脉冲在心脏传导中发生的任意异常

肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0031548	Follicular infundibulum tumor	A cutaneous adnexal neoplasm with variable clinical presentation. It tends to be located in the head and neck and the presentation is papulonodular, scaly, asymptomatic, measuring up to 1-2cm, simulating a basal cell carcinoma.	毛囊漏斗肿瘤	是一种具有临床表现多样性的皮肤附属器肿瘤。好发于头部和颈部，并呈现单丘疹结节，鳞状，无症状，测量长达1-2cm，类似基底细胞癌。
肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0031549	Lymphocytoma cutis	Lymphocytoma cutis, or Spiegler-Fendt sarcoid, is classed as one of the pseudolymphonas, referring to inflammatory disorders in which the accumulation of lymphocytes on the skin resemble, clinically and histopathologically, cutaneous lymphomas. Careful clinical evaluation, histopathological and immunohistochemical exams may be needed to make the correct diagnosis.	皮肤淋巴细胞瘤	皮肤淋巴细胞瘤(或Spiegler-Fendt肉样瘤)被归类为一种假淋巴瘤，这是指一类炎症性疾病，皮肤中淋巴细胞聚集，在临床上和组织病理学上，皮肤淋巴瘤。仔细的临床评估、组织病理学和免疫组织化学检查，可以做出正确的诊断。

心血管系统异常	HP:0031561	Coronary cameral fistula to right ventricle	An abnormal communication between the terminus of a coronary artery, bypassing the myocardial capillary bed and entering the right ventricle.	连接到右心室的冠状动脉腔瘘	冠状动脉末端与绕过心肌毛细血管床并进入右心室的异常通道。
心血管系统异常	HP:0031562	Balanced double aortic arch	A type of double aortic arch in which the two branches are of equal size. In most cases of double aortic arch, the right aortic arch is larger and located higher than the left aortic arch.	平衡性双主动脉弓	双主动脉弓的一种，其左右两个分支大小相同。一般情况下有主动脉弓比左主动脉弓更大，并且位于比左主动脉弓高的位置
心血管系统异常	HP:0031563	Coronary arteriovenous fistula	An abnormal communication between the terminus of a coronary artery, bypassing the myocardial capillary bed and entering any segment of the systemic or pulmonary circulation.	冠状动静脉瘘	冠状动脉末端与任一绕过心肌毛细血管床和进入全身或肺循环的之间存在的异常通道。
生长异常	HP:0031564	Bronchial isomerism	An anomalous mirror-imaged arrangement of some bronchial structures. Right isomerism is defined as a subset of heterotaxy where some paired structures on opposite sides of the left-right axis of the body are symmetrical mirror images of each other, and have the morphology of the normal right-sided structures (vice versa for left isomerism).	支气管异构	支气管结构的一种不规则的镜像排列。右异构被定义为异构体的一个子集，在身体的左-右轴的相对两侧的一些成对结构呈彼此对称的镜像，并且具有正常的右侧结构的形态(反之亦然，为左异构)。
