骨骼系统异常	HP:0100266	Synostosis of carpals/tarsals	The carpus consists of the scaphoid, lunate, triquetal, pisiform, captitate, hamate, trapezoid, and trapezium bones. The tarsus consists of the talus, calcaneus, navicular, cuboid, cuneiform, and navicular bones. This term applies if there is any fusion among the bones of the carpus or tarsus.	腕骨（跗骨）的骨性联接	腕骨由舟状骨、月骨、三角骨、豆状骨、头状骨、钩骨、小多角骨和大多角骨构成。跗骨包括距骨、跟骨、舟状骨、骰骨、楔状骨和舟形骨。如果腕骨和跗骨间发生任何骨融合的，应用此术语。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0100267	Lip pit	A depression located on a lip.	唇点凹	嘴唇上的小凹陷。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0100268	Upper lip pit	Depression located on the vermilion of the upper lip, usually paramedian.	上唇点凹	上唇唇红中线处两旁形成的凹陷。
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0100269	Paramedian lip pit	Depression located paramedially on the vermilion of a lip.	正中旁唇点凹	上嘴唇的唇红正中旁的凹陷。
肢体异常	HP:0100270	Abnormality of dorsoventral patterning of the limbs	An abnormality resulting from a defect or disruption of dorsoventral patterning that normally happens during early development of the limbs. A disruption of the normal development of the dorsoventral axis may lead to a variable spectrum of different phenotypic abnormalities that may affect the nails and or palmar and dorsal side of the hands and/or feet, ultimately changing the normal dorsoventral appearance of the affected limbs.	四肢背腹模式异常	因四肢早期发育过程中形成背腹模式发生缺陷或破坏造成的异常。背腹轴的正常发展的破坏可能导致不同表型异常，可能影响指甲和/或手掌、手和/或脚的背侧，最终导致受累肢体正常背腹侧外观的改变。
声音异常	HP:0100271	Hyponasal speech	Hyponasal speech is when there is an abnormally reduced nasal airflow during speech often in a setting of nasal obstruction or congestion.	鼻音低	讲话时通过鼻腔的气流减弱，这种异常发音通常是由于各种原因所致的鼻腔梗塞，气流受阻。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0100272	Branchial sinus	A congenital branchial sinus is a remnant of the embryonic branchial arches and their intervening clefts and pouches that has failed to regress completely. Sinuses typically have their external orifice inferior to the ramus of the mandible. They may traverse the parotid gland, and run in close vicinity to the facial nerve in the external auditory canal.	鳃窦	先天性腮窦是胚胎鳃弓及其中间开裂和口袋未能完全消退的残余。窦外口一般有低于下颌骨升支。他们可能会穿遍腮腺，并在外耳道里紧挨面神经并行。
肿瘤,消化系统异常	HP:0100273	Neoplasm of the colon	#####	结肠新生物	#####
神经系统异常,眼部异常	HP:0100274	Gustatory lacrimation	Gustatory lacrimation results from an aberrant innervation of fibres from the seventh cranial nerve to the pterygopalatine ganglion which are destined originally for the submandibular ganglion. This aberrant innervation leads to uncontrollable tearing while eating or in anticipation of a meal.	味觉流泪	味觉流泪源于第七对脑神经原先支配颌下神经节的纤维异位支配翼腭神经节。这种异常的神经支配导致吃饭时或想到美餐时无法控制的流泪。
神经系统异常	HP:0100275	Diffuse cerebellar atrophy	Diffuse unlocalised atrophy affecting the cerebellum.	弥漫性小脑萎缩	小脑弥漫非局灶性萎缩。
体壁的异常	HP:0100276	Skin pits	#####	皮肤凹点	#####
头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:0100277	Periauricular skin pits	Benign congenital lesions of the periauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.	耳周皮肤点凹	耳周软组织的良性先天性病变，包括狭窄的盲管或凹陷。
消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0100279	Ulcerative colitis	A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that includes characteristic ulcers, or open sores, in the colon. The main symptom of active disease is usually constant diarrhea mixed with blood, of gradual onset and intermittent periods of exacerbated symptoms contrasting with periods that are relatively symptom-free. In contrast to Crohn&#39;s disease this special form of colitis begins in the distal parts of the rectum, spreads continually upwards and affects only mucose and submucose tissue of the colon.	溃疡性结肠炎	一种慢性炎性肠病，包括结肠部位特征性的溃疡或破损。活动性疾病的主要症状通常包括带血的腹泻，与无症状期相比症状渐进性发作，周期性加重。与克罗恩病相比，这种特殊形式的结肠炎始于直肠的远端，连续向上扩展，且只累及结肠的粘膜层和粘膜下层组织。
消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0100280	Crohn&#39;s disease	A chronic granulomatous inflammatory disease of the intestines that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms. It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea which may be bloody, vomiting, or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside of the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration. Crohn&#39;s disease is thought to be an autoimmune disease, in which the body&#39;s immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract, causing inflammation.	Crohn&#39;s 病	肠道的一种慢性肉芽肿炎症疾病，可能累及从口到肛门的消化道的任何部分，引起多种症状。该病主要引起腹痛、腹泻（可能是血性）、呕吐或体重减轻，但也可能引起肠道外的并发症，如皮疹、关节炎、眼部炎症、疲倦、注意力不集中。克罗恩病被认为是一种自身免疫性疾病，由身体的免疫系统攻击胃肠道而引起炎症。
消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0100281	Chronic colitis	A chronic inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	慢性结肠炎	大肠（结肠、盲肠和直肠）的一种慢性炎症性疾病。
消化系统异常,免疫系统异常	HP:0100282	Acute colitis	An acute and self-limited inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).	急性结肠炎	大肠（包括结肠，盲肠和直肠）的一种急性和自限性的炎症性疾病。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0100283	EMG: continuous motor unit activity at rest	Continuous electromyographic activity of motor units at rest, i.e., without voluntary movement of the muscles.	EMG:休息中持续的运动单位活动	在休息中，运动单位持续的肌电活动，即无意识的肌肉运动。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0100284	EMG: myotonic discharges	High frequency discharges in electromyography (EMG) that vary in amplitude and frequency, waxing and waning continuously with firing frequencies ranging from 150/second down to 20/second and producing a sound that has been referred to as a dive bomber sound.	肌电图:肌强直性放电	肌电图出现不同振幅和频率的高频放电，产生150/s至20/s的频率波动，并会产生俯冲轰炸机样声音。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0100285	EMG: impaired neuromuscular transmission	An electromyographic finding associated with erratic or absent neuromuscular transmission with erratic, moment-to-moment changes in the shape of the motor unit potential (MUP).	肌电图:神经肌肉接头传递受损	肌电图提示不稳定或无神经肌肉传递伴不稳定的、形状时刻变化的运动单位电位（MUP）。
肌肉组织异常	HP:0100287	EMG: slow motor conduction	The presence of reduced conduction velocity of motor nerves on electromyography.	肌电图:运动传导慢	肌电图提示运动神经上肌电传导速度减小。
肌肉组织异常,神经系统异常	HP:0100288	EMG: myokymic discharges	The presence of spontaneous bursts of rapidly firing potentials that recur at regular intervals of 2-10 per second and are unaffected by voluntary effort. This is an electromyographic (EMG) finding.	肌电图:肌纤维颤搐放电	肌电图（EMG）显示以2-10次/秒的频率快速重复出现的自发性放电，不受意识控制。
眼部异常	HP:0100289	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常	图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常。

肢体异常,骨骼系统异常	HP:0100462	Patchy sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 4th toe	Uneven increase in bone density of the middle phalanx of the fourth toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.	第四脚趾中节趾骨斑片状骨硬化	第四脚趾的中间指骨骨密度不均匀增加。根据其严重性和分布可在X线上表现为多种形式。

肿瘤,消化系统异常	HP:0100580	Barrett esophagus	An abnormal change (metaplasia) in the cells of the inferior portion of the esophagus. The normal squamous epithelium lining of the esophagus is replaced by metaplastic columnar epithelium. Columnar epithelium refers to a cell type that is typically found in more distal parts of the gastrointestinal system.	Barrett食管	食管下部细胞的一种异常改变（化生）。食管的正常鳞状上皮层被化生的柱状上皮层取代。柱状上皮是指一种通常被发现于胃肠系统更远端部分的细胞类型。

消化系统异常	HP:0100594	Esophageal web	Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).	食管蹼	先天性或获得性的由粘膜层和粘膜下层组成的正常食管组织形成的薄膜（2-3mm）。先天性蹼通常出现在食管中、下三分之一，更可能是一个中心或偏心开孔的环状结构。获得性蹼较先天性蹼更为常见，通常出现在颈部区域（环状软骨后）。这种情况的临床症状包括选择性吞咽困难（固体多于液体）、胸痛、鼻咽返流、误吸、穿孔和食物嵌塞（最后两个非常罕见）。
骨骼系统异常	HP:0100595	Camptocormia	An abnormal forward-flexed posture e.g. forward flexion of the spine, which is noticeable when standing or walking but disappears when lying down. It is becoming an increasingly recognized feature of Parkinson&#39;s disease and dystonic disorders.	驼背	脊椎不正常的向前弯曲的姿势，站立或行走时明显，但平躺时前倾前屈位消失。它逐渐成为确认帕金森氏病和肌张力障碍性疾病的特征。

内分泌系统异常	HP:0100647	Graves disease	An autoimmune disease where the thyroid is overactive, producing an excessive amount of thyroid hormones (a serious metabolic imbalance known as hyperthyroidism and thyrotoxicosis). This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.	Graves病	一种自身免疫性疾病，甲状腺过度活跃，产生过量的甲状腺激素（导致严重代谢失衡，称为甲状腺功能亢进和甲状腺毒症）。这是由于抗TSH受体的自身抗体（TSHR-Ab）激活TSH受体（TSHR），从而刺激甲状腺激素合成和分泌以及甲状腺生长（导致弥漫性甲状腺肿）引起的。甲状腺功能亢进症可引起神经心理和生理症状和体征，会严重影响患者健康。

神经系统异常	HP:0500009	Dysplastic gangliocytoma of the cerebellum	It is a rare, slowly growing tumor of the cerebellum, a gangliocytoma sometimes considered to be a hamartoma, characterized by diffuse hypertrophy of the granular layer of the cerebellum.	小脑发育不良性神经节细胞瘤 	这是一种罕见的缓慢生长的小脑神经节细胞瘤肿瘤，有时被认为是错构瘤，以小脑颗粒层弥漫性肥大为特征。
代谢紊乱/稳态失衡	HP:0500010	Increased cholesterol esters	An elevated concentration of circulating cholesterol esters, which are fatty acid esters of cholesterol and make up about two-thirds of total plasma cholesterol.	胆固醇酯水平增高	循环胆固醇酯浓度增高，循环胆固醇酯是脂肪酸与胆固醇作用生成的酯，占血浆总胆固醇的2/3
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500011	Moon facies	A rounded, puffy face with fat deposits in the temporal fossa and cheeks, a double chin.	满月脸	圆圆的浮肿的脸，脂肪沉积在颞窝和脸颊，双下巴。
内分泌系统异常	HP:0500012	Abnormality of gonadotropin-releasing hormone level	A deviation from the normal circulating concentration of the normal gonadotropin-releasing hormone level secreted from the pituitary gland.	促性腺激素释放激素水平异常	血液循环中由腺垂体分泌的促性腺激素释放激素水平偏离正常范围
内分泌系统异常	HP:0500013	Lack of gonadotropin-releasing hormone pulsatility	Secretion of gonadotropin-releasing hormone that does not occur in a pulsatile fashion.	促性腺激素释放激素脉冲缺失	促性腺激素释放激素的分泌不以脉冲方式发生
神经系统异常	HP:0500021	Reduced brain gamma-aminobutyric acid level by MRS	An decreased level of gamma-aminobutyric acid in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).	MRS分析大脑γ-氨基丁酸水平偏低	磁共振波谱（MRS）分析显示大脑γ-氨基丁酸水平偏低
内分泌系统异常	HP:0500022	Abnormal serum dehydroepiandrosterone level	A deviation from the normal concentration of dehydroepiandrosterone in the circulation.	血清脱氢表雄酮水平异常	循环中脱氢表雄酮浓度异常

神经系统异常	HP:0500028	Cotton wool plaques	Deposition of large, diffuse cotton wool amyloid plaques (CWPs) lacking a dense core and associated neuritic changes.	棉絮斑	缺乏致密中心的淀粉样斑块，呈现出大片弥漫棉絮状沉积，与神经炎的改变有关。

神经系统异常	HP:0500032	Abnormal neuron branching	Abnormality of the structure and branching of the dendrites of a neuron.	神经元分枝异常 	神经元树突的结构与分支的异常

头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500034	Nasolacrimal sac obstruction	Blockage of the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊阻塞	鼻泪囊闭锁。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500035	Nasolacrimal sac granuloma	A mass of granulation tissue in response to chronic dacryocystitis as polypoid formations or they follow accidental injury, from probing and as a reaction to retained foreign bodies in the sac.	鼻泪囊肉芽肿	慢性泪囊炎引起的大量肉芽组织，如息肉样组织，或因探查而意外损伤以及对囊中残留异物的反应。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500036	Nasolacrimal sac papilloma	Benign tumor of the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊乳头状瘤	鼻泪囊良性肿瘤。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500037	Nasolacrimal sac epithelial papillary carcinoma	The malignant epithelial neoplasm with papillary growths in the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊上皮乳头状癌	在鼻泪囊中有乳头状增生的恶性上皮肿瘤。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500039	Conjunctival cicatrization	An abnormality of the conjuctiva and ocular surface caused by conjunctival inflammation and associated with scarring.	结膜粘连	结膜发炎引起的结膜和眼球表面异常，并与结膜瘢痕有关。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500040	Dermolipoma of the conjunctiva	A benign tumor composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue usually located near the temporal fornix.	结膜皮样脂肪瘤 	由脂肪组织和致密结缔组织组成的良性肿瘤，通常位于颞穹窿附近。
眼部异常	HP:0500041	Myopic astigmatism	A condition where one or both of the two principal meridians focus in the front of the retina when the eye is at rest.	近视散光	当眼睛在放松时，一个或两个主子午线聚焦在视网膜前的一种散光。
眼部异常	HP:0500042	Latent hypermetropia	['A term to describe when farsightedness is masked when the accommodative muscles are used to increase the focusing power of the eye.']	隐性远视	一种术语，用于描述当调节性肌肉作用，眼睛的聚焦能力提高而遮盖远视状态。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500043	Eyelid retraction	With the eyes in primary position, the sclera is visible above the superior corneal limbus.	眼睑挛缩	当眼睛自然睁开时，角膜缘上方的巩膜显露。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500044	Upper eyelid retraction	An elevation of the eyelid above the normal level in the primary position.	上眼睑孪缩	眼睑高度高于第一眼位正常水平。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500045	Collier's sign	A unilateral or bilateral eyelid retraction due to midbrain lesions.	Collier氏症	因中脑损伤而引起的单侧或双侧眼睑收缩。
眼部异常,免疫系统异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500046	Seborrhoeic blepharitis	Inflamation of the eyelid due to overactivity of the sebaceous gland.	脂溢性睑缘炎	皮脂腺过度活跃导致的眼睑发炎
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500047	Nasolacrimal sac lymphoma	A type of lymphoma that involves the nasolacrimal sac.	鼻泪囊淋巴瘤	一种累及鼻泪囊的淋巴瘤。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500048	Delayed canalization of nasolacrimal duct	A very common condition in which the extreme end of the nasolacrimal duct underneath the inferior turbinate fails to complete its canalization in the newborn period.	鼻泪管开放延迟（闭锁）	一种非常常见的情况，在新生儿期鼻泪管的末端位于下鼻甲下面，无法完成它的通气。
眼部异常	HP:0500049	Retinopathy of prematurity	An avascular or abnormally vascularized retina that occurs in premature infants and can lead to blindness.	早产儿视网膜病	一种发生于早产儿的视网膜无血管或血管形成异常性疾病，可致失明。
眼部异常	HP:0500050	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 1	The retinal vessels stop and then a linear flat white line is present that usually runs the circumference of the vascular retina.	早产儿视网膜病变1期	在有血管和无血管的视网膜交界处出现一条白色分界线。
眼部异常	HP:0500051	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 2	The accumulating neovascularization thickens and manifests as a linear bump. The neovascularization remains along the surface of the retina and does not extend off the retina into the cortical vitreous.	早产儿视网膜病变2期	新生血管停留于视网膜表面，累积变厚显现为线性隆起，未延伸至皮质玻璃体。
眼部异常	HP:0500052	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 3	The neovascularization accumulates at the edge of the vascularized retina and extends into the vitreous (also called extra retinal fibrosis proliferation). In cases of Zone 2 and Zone 3, this may be sausage shaped. In more posterior Zone 1 disease, the stage 3 can appear as a direct extension of the normal retinal vessels but extending tangentially over the avascular retina.	早产儿视网膜病变3期	新生血管在视网膜血管区边缘聚集，并延伸至玻璃体（也称视网膜外纤维增生）。在发生于2区和3区的病例中，形态呈香肠状。在多数后1区病例中，3期可表现为正常视网膜血管的直接延伸，但是在无血管的视网膜区呈间接延伸。
眼部异常	HP:0500053	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4	Scar tissue that forms a continuous sheet coming up from the edge of the vascularized retina. This scar tissue can grow toward the vitreous base/posterior lens capsule resulting in traction, distortion, and even detachment.	早产儿视网膜病变4期	疤痕组织从有血管的视网膜边缘形成一张连续的薄片，向玻璃体基底部/晶状体后囊生长，导致视网膜牵拉、扭转甚至脱落。
眼部异常	HP:0500054	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4a	A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that does not extend into the macula.	早产儿视网膜病变4a期	周边视网膜脱离，不涉及黄斑。
眼部异常	HP:0500055	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4b	A detachment that involves the peripheral retina that involves the macula itself. The detachment usually starts in the temporal periphery although can also involve the nasal retina as well.	早产儿视网膜病变4b期	周边视网膜脱离，涉及黄斑。脱离始于颞侧缘，但也可累积鼻侧视网膜。
眼部异常	HP:0500056	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5	Funnel detachment from the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5期	在四个象限内均发生牵拉性视网膜漏斗状脱离。
眼部异常	HP:0500057	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5a	An open funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5a期	在四个象限的牵引下，一种开放的漏斗式视网膜脱离。
眼部异常	HP:0500058	Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5b	A closed funnel detachment of the retina with generally traction in all four quadrants.	早产儿视网膜病变5b期	在四个象限的牵引下，一种闭合的漏斗式视网膜脱离。
眼部异常	HP:0500059	Retinopathy of prematurity zone I	Retinopathy which extends from the center of the optic disc to twice the distance from the center of the optic disc to the center of the macula.	早产儿视网膜病变 I 区	视网膜病变范围以视盘为中心，视盘到黄斑2倍距离为半径的圆形区域。
眼部异常	HP:0500060	Retinopathy of prematurity zone II	Retinopathy which extends centrifugally from the edge of zone I to the nasal ora serrata.	早产儿视网膜病变 II 区	视网膜病变从 I 区边缘延伸至鼻侧锯齿缘。
眼部异常	HP:0500061	Retinopathy of prematurity zone III	Retinopathy which is a residual crescent of retina anterior to zone II.	早产儿视网膜病变 III 区	 II 区外围的新月形区域到距离颞侧锯齿缘。
眼部异常	HP:0500062	Retinopathy of prematurity plus	Venous dilatation and arteriolar tortuosity of the posterior retinal vessels and may later increase in severity to include iris vascular engorgement, poor pupillary dilatation (rigid pupil), and vitreous haze. This definition has been further refined in the later clinical trials in which the diagnosis of plus disease could be made if sufficient vascular dilatation and tortuosity are present in at least 2 quadrants of the eye.	早产儿视网膜病附加病变	视网膜后极部至少2个象限出现视网膜血管扩张、迂曲,严重的附加病变还包括虹膜血管充血或扩张、瞳孔散大困难(瞳孔强直),玻璃体可有混浊。
眼部异常	HP:0500063	Retinopathy of prematurity pre-plus	As vascular abnormalities of the posterior pole that are insufficient for the diagnosis of plus disease but that demonstrate more arterial tortuosity and more venous dilatation than normal.	早产儿视网膜病附加前病变	后极部血管异常，表现为较多动脉迂曲和静脉扩张，但不足以诊断为附加病变。
眼部异常	HP:0500064	Retinopathy of prematurity threshold	A retinopathy with a 50% likelihood of progressing to retinal detachment. Threshold disease is considered to be present when stage 3 retinopathy of prematurity (ROP) is present in either zone I or zone II, with at least 5 continuous or 8 total clock hours of disease, and the presence of plus disease.	早产儿视网膜阈值病变	阈值病变表现在I区或Ⅱ区的3期+,相邻病变连续至少达连续5个钟点,或累积达8个钟点，有50%的可能进展为视网膜脱离。
眼部异常	HP:0500065	Retinopathy of prematurity prethreshold	High risk patients who were in Zone 1 (no Plus or stage 3) or Zone 2 with Plus or stage 3 but not both.	早产儿视网膜阈值前病变	高危病人具备I区病变（不伴附加病变或者3期病变同时具备），或发生于Ⅱ区合并附加病变，或者未达到阈值期的3期病变。
眼部异常	HP:0500066	Latent myopia	The difference between total and manifest myopia.	隐性近视	总近视和显性近视之间的差。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500069	Paralytic ectropion	A type of ectropion associated with orbicularis muscle weakness caused by cranial nerve VII palsy.	麻痹性睑外翻	一种由于颅神经VII麻痹引起的眼轮匝肌无力所致的睑外翻。
头部和颈部的异常	HP:0500070	Conjunctival dermolipoma	A conjuctival lesion composed of adipose tissue and dense connective tissue. Such choristomas of dermal elements are normally found at the outer canthus, and have a gelatinous appearance. Classically, there is an indistinct posterior border (with the lesion frequently extending into the orbit) and a well-demarcated anterior border several millimetres posterior to the limbus.	结膜皮样脂肪瘤 	由脂肪组织和致密结缔组织构成的结膜病变。这种真皮成分的绒毛通常出现在外眼角，具有胶状外观。典型的，有一个模糊的后缘(病变经常延伸到眼眶)和一个边界清晰的前缘，距离角膜缘几毫米。
眼部异常	HP:0500072	Absolute eccentric fixation	Eccentric fixation in which the angle of eccentricity equals the objective angle of deviation.	绝对偏心注视	偏心注视，偏心角度等于物体偏差角度。
眼部异常	HP:0500073	Abnormal ocular alignment	Any deviation from the normal ocular alignment.	异常眼校准	任何相对于正常眼对齐度的偏离。
眼部异常	HP:0500074	Dissociated vertical deviation	An incomitant tendency for an occluded eye to elevate and extort which resolves on uncovering.	分离垂直性偏斜	共同趋势是被遮盖眼上转，去除遮盖后上转眼即可下转。
眼部异常	HP:0500075	Dissociated horizontal deviation	A change in horizontal ocular alignment, unrelated to accommodation, that is brought about solely by a change in the balance of visual input from the two eyes.	分离水平性偏斜	与调节无关的双眼水平校准的改变，此变化仅由双眼视觉输入平衡的变化引起。
眼部异常	HP:0500076	Alternating hypetropia	A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated upwards.	交替性上斜视	一种垂直性斜视，当一眼注视，另一眼向上偏移。
眼部异常	HP:0500077	Alternating hyperphoria	A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates upwards.	交替性上隐斜	一种垂直性隐斜，在遮盖实验中，被遮盖眼向上偏移。
眼部异常	HP:0500078	Alternating hypotropia	A type of vertical tropia in which, when one eye is fixing, the other eye is deviated downwards.	交替性下斜视	一种垂直性显斜，当一眼注视时，另一眼向下偏移。
眼部异常	HP:0500079	Alternating hypophoria	A type of vertical phoria in which, in dissociation, the occluded eye deviates downwards.	交替性下隐斜	一种垂直性隐斜，在遮盖实验中，遮盖眼向下偏移。
眼部异常	HP:0500081	Pseudophakia	The term pseudophakia refers to having an artificial lens implanted after the natural eye lens has been removed. During cataract surgery the natural cloudy lens is replaced by an pseudophakia intraocular lens (IOL).	假晶状体	术语假晶状体是指在眼球晶状体被移除之后植入人工晶状体。 即在白内障手术中，浑浊的晶状体被人工晶状体(IOL)取代。
体壁的异常	HP:0550003	Proximal scleroderma	Symmetrical thickening, tightening and induration of the skin of the fingers and the skin proximal to the metacarpophalangeal or metatarsophalangeal joints. These changes can involve the entire limb, face, neck and trunk.	近端硬皮病	手指和皮肤近端掌指的或跖趾关节对称的增厚,皮肤紧缩和硬化，这些改变可涉及整个肢体,面部,颈部和躯干。
肿瘤,体壁的异常	HP:0550004	Verruca plana	Slightly raised wart 2-5 mm in diameter often associated with viral infections, commonly persistent in immunodeficient individuals.	扁平疣	直径2-5mm的疣状隆起，常伴有病毒感染，在免疫缺陷个体中常持续存在。
呼吸系统异常	HP:0550005	Bilateral basilar pulmonary fibrosis	It is a bilateral reticular pattern of linear or lineonodular densities that are most pronounced in basilar portions of the lungs on standard chest x-ray. It is the third minor criterion for scleroderma diagnosis.	双侧基底部肺纤维化	它是一种在标准胸片上肺部最明显的线性或线结节密度的双侧网状结构。这是硬皮病诊断的第三个次要标准。
耳部异常	HP:3000002	Abnormal inner ear epithelium morphology	Any structural anomaly of an inner ear epithelium.	内耳上皮细胞形态异常	内耳上皮细胞的任何结构异常。

肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:3000011	Abnormality of palatoglossus muscle	An abnormality of a palatoglossus muscle.	腭舌肌异常	腭舌肌异常。
肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常	HP:3000012	Abnormality of palatopharyngeus muscle	An abnormality of a palatopharyngeus muscle.	腭咽肌异常	腭咽肌异常。
肌肉组织异常,头部和颈部的异常,体壁的异常	HP:3000013	Abnormality of platysma	An abnormality of the platysma muscle.	颈阔肌异常	颈阔肌异常。
